targetString: ብተወሳኺ ናይ ኤሌክትሮላይት ሚዛን ምሕላው፣ ኻልኣዊ ሕማምን ሴፕቲክ ሾክን ምክልኻልን ወሰንቲ ክፍሊ ኣካላት ምሕላው ንናይ SARS-CoV-2 ሕሙማት ወሳኒ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, maintaining electrolyte balance, preventing secondary morbidity and septic shock and protecting key organs is critical for SARS-CoV-2 patients.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: እዚ ናይ cytokine storm ናይ SARSን MERSን ሕሙማት ካብ መጠን ንላዕሊ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ምላሽ እንትህቡ ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: This cytokine storm of SARS and MERS results when patients have an excessive immune response.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ዓይነት systemic inflammatory response (ስርዓታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ ግብረ መልሲ) ኮይኑ ብፈነወ ከም TNFα፣ IL-1β፣ IL-2፣ IL-6፣ IFNα፣ IFNβ፣ IFNγን MCP-1ን ዝመሳሰሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ሳይቶካይናት ዝመፅእ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm is a type of systemic inflammatory response caused by the release of various cytokines such as TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: እዞም ሳይቶካይናት ናይ መከላኸሊ ሕማም ዋህዮታት ፍሪ ራዲካልስ ንከፍርዩ ብምግባር ARDSን ብዙሓት ናይ ዉሽጣዊ ኣካል ፀገምን ከምፅእ ይገብር።
en-mt: These cytokines cause immune cells to produce free radicals, leading to ARDS and many internal organ problems.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: ኢሙኖሰፕረሽን(Immunosuppression) ን ሳይቶካይን(cytokine ) ጸፍዒታት ብተለይ ን ከበድቲ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: Immunosuppression is useful for treating cytokine plaques, especially in severe patients.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: anti-IL6 ሞኖክሎናል ኣንቲቦዲ ዝኾነ ቶኪሊዙማብ ከምኡውን ኮርቲኮስተሮይድ ብምጥቃም ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ንምፍዋስ ተኻኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: The anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, toquilizumab, and corticosteroids have been used to treat cytokine storm.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: ንሳይቶክሲን ስቶርም ካልኦት ናይ ሕማም መከላኸሊ እርምጃታት ብ ዋህዮ-ተኮር ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ምላሽ ሞዱለሽን የካትቱ ፣ ናይ IFN-γ ፣ IL-1ን TNFን መአገዲ፤ ናይ ጄ.ኪ. blinatumomab፤ ናይ ሳይቶኪን ምልክት ሲግናሊንግ 4ን ናይ HDAC ኢንሂቢተርስን ዘካትት እዩ።
en-mt: For cytoxin storm other immune measures include modulation by cell-specific immune response , inhibition of IFN-γ , IL-1 and TNF; The J.K. blinatumomab; It includes cytokine signaling 4 and HDAC inhibitors.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: ስቴርዮድስ(Steroids)፡ ከም ኢሙኖሰፕረሳንት(immunosuppressants)፡ ኣብ ናይ SARS ሕክምና ናይ ረኽሲ ጉድኣት ክብደት ንምቕናስ ብስፍሓት ኣብጥቕሚ ዝውዕሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Steroids, such as immunosuppressants, are widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of infection damage.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ልዑል መጠን ስቴሮይድስ(steroids ) ምውሳድ ኣብ ናት SARSን COVID-19 ሕሙማት ንዘሎ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ጉድኣት ጠቐምቲ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: However, high doses of steroids are not beneficial for severe lung damage in SARS and COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: ከም ኣቫስኩላር ኦስቲዮኔክሮሲስ ዝበሉ ሓደገኛ ናይ ጎናዊ ጉድኣት ብምኽታል ናይ እቲ ሕማም ትምቢት ዝቕይሩ እዮም።
en-mt: such as avascular osteonecrosis that alter the prognosis of the disease following dangerous side effects.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ናይ ኮርቲኮስተሮይድስ ሓጸርቲ ኮርስታት ኣብ ካብ ትሑት እስካብ ማእኸላይ ናይ መድሓኒታት መጠን ን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንክውዕሉ ዝምከር እዩ።
en-mt: However, in severe COVID-19 patients short courses of corticosteroids are recommended for use at low to moderate doses.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: እዚ ኣብ ዝተፃሓፈሉ እዋን ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነ ኣንቲ ቫይራል መድሓኒት ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral drugs are available.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ናይ nucleotide analog ዝተስትኻኸለ ምርመራ ንሓደ ኣሜሪካዊ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙም ውጽኢታዊ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: However, a nucleotide analog-corrected test has been found to be effective in an American COVID-19 patient.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: ሬምደሲቪር(Remdesivir) መጅመሪያ ብ ጊሊድ(Gilead) ን ኢቦላ ን ማርልበርግ ቫይረሳትን ዝተፈጠረ ሕማም ንምሕካም ተባሂሉ ዝተፈጠረ ናይ ኖቨል ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓኒት እዩ።
en-mt: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug originally developed to treat disease caused by Gilead and Ebola and Marlberg viruses.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: ጸኒሑ፡ሬምደሲቨር(remdesivir) ን MERS ን SARS ቫይረሳት ሓዊሱ ናይ ካልኦት ነጸላ ገመድ ዝኾኑ ናይ RNA ቫይረሳት ንምጥፋእ ከምዝኽእል ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Later, remdesivir was shown to kill other single-stranded RNA viruses, including MERS and SARS viruses.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: ኣብዚኦም ተደሪኽና፡ ጊሊያድ(Gilead) ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተጠቕዑ ውልቀሰባት ዝግበሩ ጽምዲ ሙከራታት ንምግባር ዘኽእል ውህድ ናብ ቻይና ዝለኣኸ እንትኾን፡ እቶም ውጽኢታት ድማ ብ ዓብዩ ትጽቢት ዝግበረሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Inspired by these, Gilead has shipped a compound to China to conduct pairs of trials on individuals infected with SARS-CoV-2, and the results are highly anticipated.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ baricitinb፣ interferon-α፣ lopinavir/ritonavirን ribavirinን ንሃንደበታዊ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ፀገም ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ከም ፈውሲ ከገልግሉ ከምዝኽእሉ ተነጊሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been reported as treatments for patients with sudden respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር ብሓንሳብ ምጥቃም ተቕማጥ፣ ዕዉልዉል ምባል፣ ተምላስ፣ ጉድኣት ፀላም ከብዲን ካልኦት ሓደጋታትን ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Concomitant use of lopinavir/ritonavir can cause diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage and other risks.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: ናይ እዞም ሕክምናታት ምስ ካልኦት መድሓኒታት ጠሚርካ ኣብ ሕሙማት ምጥቃም ብ ጥንቃቐ ክተሓዝ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The use of these treatments in combination with other drugs in patients should be handled with caution.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሕሙማት ዝተወስደ ፕላዝማን ኣንቲቦዲ ምፍራይን
en-mt: Plasma and antibody production from surviving patients

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: ካብ ተላባዒ ሕማም ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ደም ተወሲዱ ንካልኦት ዘይዳሓኑ ሕሙማት ከም መድሓኒት፣ ገና ንዘይተጠቕዑ ሰባት ድማ ከም መከላኸሊ ምጥቃም ነዊሕ ታሪኽ ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: There is a long history of using blood from infectious disease survivors as a cure for other patients who have not yet survived, and as a preventive measure for those who have not yet been infected.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: ብርግፅ፣ ካብ ሕማም ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ኣብ ደሞም ነቲ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ዘኽእል ዝለዓለ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ መጠን ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Indeed, survivors have higher levels of antibodies in their blood to protect against the disease.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: ጸረ ባዕዳውያን ( Antibodies) ብ ናይ B ልይምፎሳይት( B lymphocytes) ዝፈሪ ኢሙኖግሎቢን(immunoglobulin (Ig)) እንትኸውን፡ ሕማም ኣምጻእቲ ተህዋስያንን ካልኦት ን ሰብነትና ባዕዲ ዝኾኑ ነገራት ኣብ ምጥቃዕ፡ ኣብቶም ተሃዋስያን ዝርከቡ ብሕታዊ ሞሎኲላት ብ ምፍላይ ዘምክን ድማ እዩ።
en-mt: Antibodies are immunoglobulins (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes that destroy disease-causing bacteria and other foreign substances by detecting and destroying specific molecules in the bacteria.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: ካብ እዚ ብምብጋስ ካብ COVID-19 ካብ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ናይ ፕላዝማ ደም ብምውሳድ ን 10 ብኽፉእ ዝሓመሙ ሕሙማን ተዋሂቡ እዩ።
en-mt: Hence, plasma blood was taken from patients who recovered from COVID-19 and given to 10 seriously ill patients.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: ምልክታቶም ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ክመሓየሽ ክኢሉ እዩ፡ ዝቐነሰ ረኽሲን ዝተሓተ ኣብ ደም ውሽጢ ዝርከብ ናይ ቫረስ መጠን(viral loads ) ን ዝተመሓየሸ ናይ ኦክስጅን ምውህሃድ ኣብ ደምን ዝተዓጀቡ እዮም።
en-mt: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced infection, lower viral loads, and improved blood oxygenation.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና ቅድሚ ምዕባለ መድሓኒት ብዓቢ ደረጃ ምጥቃም ከምዝከኣል ዝገልፅ መብራህርህን መረጋገፅን ክህልዉ ይግባእ።
en-mt: However, there should be explanations and evidence that drugs can be used on a large scale before development.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ካብ ናይ ሕክምና ተፅዕኖ አንጻር ምስ ፕላዝማ ዝተዛመዱ ሕድሕድ ጉድኣታት ጥንቅቐ ክግበረሎም ይግባእ።
en-mt: In addition, care should be taken against plasma-related harms from medical exposure.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: ንኣብነት ኣንቲቦዲታት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ስርዓት ብምንቕቓሕ ናይ cytokine release syndrome (ሳይቶካይን ሰደድ ሲንድሮም) ዝበሃል ሓደገኛ ሕማም ከኸትል ይኽእል።
en-mt: For example, antibodies can stimulate the immune system, causing a serious disease called cytokine release syndrome.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: ኣብ ደም ዉሽጢ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ጻዕቒ ብኣብዝሓ ዉሑድ እዩ። ነቶም ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዝርከቡ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ድማ ናይ ፕላዝማ ጠለብ ዓብዪ እዩ።
en-mt: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low. The demand for plasma is huge to treat critically ill patients.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ብቅልጡፍ ፍሉይ ዝኾነ ኣንቲቦዲ ምፍራይ ይኸብድ እዩ።
en-mt: It is difficult to produce specific antibodies quickly to prevent the outbreak.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ናይ B ዋህዮታት ካብ ዝደሓኑ ሰባት ብምወሳድ ዉፅኢታዊ ኣንቲቦዲታት ኢንኮድ ዝገብሩ ጀነቲካዊ ኮዳት ወይ ድማ ዋና ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ፕሮቲን ንምጥፋእ ዝሰርሑ ዉፅኢታዊ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምድላይ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, it is important to take B cells from survivors and look for genetic codes that encode effective antibodies or effective antibodies that work to destroy the core protein of the virus.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: እዚ ብምግባር ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ ፍርያት ክብ ክነብሎ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: By doing this, we can increase the production of antibodies.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ዓመታት ኣብ ቻይና TCM ዝተፈላለዩ ሕማምት ንምሕካም ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ይርከብ።
en-mt: For thousands of years, TCM has been in use in China to treat various diseases.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር እቲ ዉፅኢት ብናይ ሕማም ዲያግኖሲስ ተመስሪቱ ኣብ ናይ TCM ስነሓሳብ ዝተደረኸ ናይ ምቅይያር ቀመር ተጠቒሙ ኣብ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ክፍልታት ጥምረት ዝተመስረተ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the results are based on a combination of different parts using a permutation formula based on a disease diagnosis and based on TCM ideology.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: ን ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ክፋላት ነጺልካ ኣውጺእኻ ንምፍላይ ኣጽጋሚ ብምዃኑ፡መብዛሕቲኦም እቶም ንቑሓት ክፋላት ኣይተፈለጡን ወይድማ ብግልጺ ኣይፍለጡን።
en-mt: Because it is difficult to isolate such components, most of the conscious components are unknown or not clearly known.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ሐዚ እዋን፡ ን COVID-19 ዝግበር ሕክምና ስሉጥ ዘይምኻኑን ሓደ ዝተፈለየ ሕክምና ዘይምህላዉን፡ TCM ን ቀሊልን ማእኸላይን ምልክታትን ካብ ከበድቲ ኩነታት ዝሓወዩ ተሓከምቲ ንምሕካም ካብቶም ዋና መማረጺታት እናኾነ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Currently, due to the inefficient treatment of COVID-19 and the lack of a separate treatment, TCM is becoming one of the main options to treat patients with mild and moderate symptoms who have recovered from severe conditions.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: ንኣብነት ሹ ፌንግ ጂ ዱ ከምኡውን ሊያን ሁዋ ኪንግ ዌን ዝተብሃሉ ካፕሱላት ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕክምና ኣድማዕቲ ከምዝኾኑ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: For example, Shu Feng Ji Du and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules have been shown to be effective in treating COVID-1

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ሕክምና፡ ብዙሓት ኣብ 87% ሕሙማትን ናይ TCM ሕክምና ዝተጠቐማ፡ ኣብ ጋንግሱ(63.7%)፡ ኒንግሲያ(50%)፡ ኣብ ሁናን(50%) ሓዊሱ ብዙሓት ግዝኣታት ልዑል ናይ ምድሓን ቁጽሪ ዘመዝገባ ኣለዋ፥ ነገር ግን እታ ናይ TCM ሕክምና ኣብ 30% ሕሙማት COVID-19 ጥራሕ ዝተጠቐመት ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት እቲ ዝተሓተ ናይ ምድሓን ቁጽሪ(13%) ኑይሩዋ።
en-mt: In the treatment of COVID-19 patients, many in 87% of patients and used TCM treatment, there are many states including Gangsu(63.7%), Ningxia(50%), and Hunan(50%) that have recorded high survival rates, but that Hubei Province, which used TCM treatment in only 30% of COVID-19 patients, had the lowest survival rate(13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ እዚ ማለት ኣዝዩ ትኽክለኛ ዘይኮነ ንጽጽር እዩ ምኽኒያቱም ካልኦት ከም ክብደትን ቁጽሪን ናይ ሕሙማት ኣብ እቲ ገምጋም ኣይተኻተቱን።
en-mt: However, this means a very inaccurate comparison because other factors such as weight and number of patients were not included in the assessment.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 18:2020፡ ቦሊ ጃንግን መሳርሕቱን ናይ ምዕራባውያን መድሓኒት(WM) በይኑ ዝግበር ሕክምና ምስ ናይ WM ን TCM ብሓባር ዝግበር ሕክምና ብምውድዳር መጽናዕቲ ኣቕሪቦም ነይሮም።
en-mt: On February 18:2020, Bolly Jang and colleagues presented a study comparing Western medicine(WM) treatment alone with WM and TCM combined.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: ምስ ጉጅለ WM ጥራሕ ተነፃፂሩ ኣብ ጉጅለ WM+TCM ዝርከቡ ሕሙማት ረስኒ ሰውነት ናብ ንቡር ንክምለስ፣ ምልክታት ንክጠፍኡን ካብ ሕክምና ንምዉፃእን ሓፂር እዋን ጥራሕ እዩ ዝደሊ።
en-mt: Compared to the WM alone group, patients in the WM+TCM group required only a shorter period of time for fever to return to normal, for symptoms to disappear, and for discharge.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: ብዝገርም ኹነታት ፣ ኣብ WM + TCM ጉጅለ ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ምብኣስ(ካብ ቀሊል ናብ ከቢድ) ካብ WM ጥራሕ ዘለዎ ጉጅለ ዝነኣሰ እንትኸውን(7.4% ብኣንጻር 46.2%)ን ኣብ WM + TCM ጉጅለ ውሽጢ ዝነበረ ናይ ሞት መጠን ካብ WM ጥራሕ ዘለዎም ጉጅለ ዝተሓተ ነይሩ (8.8% ብኣንጻር 39%)።
en-mt: Interestingly , the severity of symptoms in the WM + TCM group(from mild to severe) was lower than in the WM-only group(7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality rate within the WM + TCM group was lower than in the WM-only group (8.8% as opposed to 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: ናይ TCM ዉፅኢታዉነትን ድሕንነትን ንምርግጋፅ ብደምቢ ዝተቆፃፀረ ፈተነ ብዝዓበየ መንገዲን ኣብ ብዙሓት ማእኸላትን ክካየድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Well-controlled trials should be conducted on a larger scale and in more centers to ensure the efficacy and safety of TCM.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: ብዝተኽኣለ መጠን እቶም ናይ TCM ሕክምናታት ተግባራዊ መንገድታት ኣብ ምውሳንን ስሉጥ ብዝኾነ መልክዑ ክፋላቶም ኣብ ምውዳድ ተግባር ኣዝዩ ስምዒት ዝስሕብ እዩ።
en-mt: The act of determining the viable pathways of the TCM treatments as much as possible and organizing their parts in a seamless manner is very emotionally appealing.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: ብCOVID-19 ዝተጠርጠሩን ዝተረጋገፁን ሕሙማት ናይ እቲ ሕማም ተላጋቢነትን ሓደገኛነትን ተኸቲሉ ከቢድ ፍርሒ ይስመዖም። ኣብ ምዉሻብ ዝርከቡ ሰባት ድማ ትህኺት፣ ብሕታዉነትን ሕርቃንን ይስመዖም።
en-mt: Patients with suspected and confirmed COVID-19 experience severe fear following the contagiousness and danger of the disease. People in quarantine feel tired, lonely and angry.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ፡ ከም ረስኒ፡ ሃይፕሲያ(hypoxia)ን ምስዓልን ዝኣምሰሉ ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ምልክታትን ካልኦት ዘይተሓሰቡ ጽልዋታት ከም ብ ካርቲኮስትሮይድ ዝፍጠሩ ናይ ምድቃስ ጸገም( insomnia) ናብ ጭንቅትን ናይ ኣዕምሮ ዘይምርግጋዕን ክወስዱ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia and coughing and other unintended effects such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to anxiety and mental instability.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: ናይ SARS ለበዳ ኣብ መጀመርታ ደረጃ እንተሎ ከም ቀዋሚ ዲፕረሽን፣ ጭንቀት፣ ናይ ሽበራ መጥቃዕቲ፣ ሳይኮሞተር ኤክሳይትመንት፣ ሳይኮቲክ ምልክታት፣ ዲሊሪየም ከምኡዉን ዓርሰ ቅትለት ዝመሳሰሉ ናይ ኣእምሮ ሕማማት ተመዝጊቦም እዮም።
en-mt: Mental illnesses such as chronic depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium and suicide have been reported in the early stages of a SARS outbreak.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: ከም ኣካል ን ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ዝግበር ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ግብረ መልሲ፣ ግደን ክግበር ዘለዎ ናይ ርክብ ጽንዓትን ክትትልን ውሸባን፣ ሰባት ብዛዕባ እቲ ምምሕልላፍ፣ ውሸባን ኣብ ቤተሰቦም ኣዕርኽቶምን ዝህሉ ምግላልን ብምሕሳብ ኣዝዮም ክጭነቑን ናይ ጥፍኣት ስምዒት ክስመዖምን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: As part of the public health response to the COVID-19 pandemic, the role of communication surveillance and quarantine, people can become very anxious and feel devastated about the transmission, quarantine and isolation from their family and friends.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: ስለዚ ንCOVID-19 ሕሙማት፣ ተጠርጠርትን ምስኦም ርክብ ዘለዎም ሰባትን ከምኡውን ነቲ ሓፈሻዊ ህዝቢ ናይ ስነልቦናዊ ሓገዝ ክወሃቦም ይግባእ።
en-mt: Therefore, psychological support should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspects and their contacts as well as the general public.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሰነ-ኣእምሮኣዊ ድጋፍ ካብ ብዙሕ ሞያታት ዝተዋጽኡ ናይ ኣእምሮ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታት ጉጅለታት ምጥያሽ፣ ብዛዕባ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳን ናይ ሕክምና መደባት፣ ምስ ሰባት ቅሩብ ርክብ ካብ ምግባር ዓርስኻ ኣብ ምዕቃብ ኣጠቓቕማ ሞያዊ እሌክትሮኒክስ መሳርሕታትን መተግበሪታትን ዝምልከት ግልጺ ዝኾነ ስሩዓትን ትኽክለኛታትን ምምሕያሻት ዘለውዎ ርክብ ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: The psychological support Establish teams of multidisciplinary mental health professionals, transparent regular and accurate improvements in the use of professional electronic devices and applications regarding the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment programs, and keeping yourself away from close contact with people including their relationship.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: ካብ ተሸከምቲ እንስሳትን ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማትን ናብ ጥዕናኦም ዝተሓለወ ሰባት ዝተዘርገሐ ናይ መተሓላለፊ ሰንሰለት ንምብታኽ ዉፅኢታዊ ክትባት ኣድላይ እዩ። እዚ ክትባት ድማ ምስ ኣንቲቫይራል መድሓኒት ብሓባር ብምዃን እቲ ለበዳ ንምቁፅፃር ይሰርሕ።
en-mt: Effective vaccines are needed to break the chain of transmission from vector animals and infected patients to healthy people. The vaccine works in conjunction with antiviral drugs to control the outbreak.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: ናይ ነዊሕ እዋንን ፅቡቕ ዓቕሚ ዘለዎን ከምኡውን ዘዳኽም ኣንቲቦዲን ንSARS-CoV ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ክብ ዘብልን ኣብ S ፕሮቲን ዝተደረኸ ክትባት ንምስራሕ ፃዕሪ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Efforts are underway to develop S protein-based vaccines that are long-lasting, well-potentiated, and attenuating antibodies that enhance immunity to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: ንSARS ዝኾኑ ካብ ዝተዳኸሙ ቫይረሳት ዝተሰርሑ ክትባታት ኣብ እንስሳት ፈተነ ተኻይዱሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: Vaccines made from attenuated viruses for SARS have been tested in animals.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና እዞም ናይ ክትባት ሕፁያት ኣብ ዓበይቲ ሰባት ዘለዎም ናይ ኢን ቪቮ ዉፅኢታዉነት ከምኡውን ቀታሊ-ፈተና ሞዴላትን ካብ እንስሳ ዝመፁ ቫይረሳት ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሙ ቅድሚ ክሊኒካዊ መፅናዕቲ ምጅማሩ ዝዉሰን ይኸዉን።
en-mt: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in adults as well as lethal-assay models and their ability to protect against animal-derived viruses will be determined before clinical studies are initiated.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ቅድሚ 17 ዓመታት SARS ድሕሪ ምጥፋኡ ክሳብ ሕዚ ሓድሽ ጉዳይ ለበዳ ስለዘይተመዝገበ እዩ።
en-mt: This is because no new outbreak cases have been reported since the eradication of SARS 17 years ago.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: ብተፃራሪ፣ ዘይስሩዕ ናይ MERS ጉዳያት ለበዳን ክላስተርን ኣብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ብቐጻልነት እናተረኸቡ እዮም፣ ቀጻልነት ዘለዎም ናይ እንስሳት ተሸከምቲ ብምህላዎም ድማ ናብ ካልኦት ከባቢታት ኣብ ምስፍሕፋሕ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Conversely, irregular cases of MERS outbreaks and clusters are consistently reported in the Middle East and are expanding to other areas due to the presence of persistent animal vectors.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: ንMERS ዝኸዉን ናይ ክትባት ስትራቴጂ ዘይተነቓቕሑ ቫይረሳት፣ DNA ፕላዝሚድ፣ ቫይራል ቬክተርስ፣ ናኖፓርቲክልስ፣ ቫይረስ-ላይክ ፓርቲክልስን ሪኮምቢናንት ፕሮቲን ሳብዩኒትስን ብምጥቃም ተማዕቢሉ። ዝተወሰኑ ድማ ኣብ እንስሳት ፈተነ ተኻይድሎም።
en-mt: A vaccine strategy for MERS was developed using inactivated viruses, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles, and recombinant protein subunits. Some were tested on animals.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: እዚ ቀፃሊ ለበዳ ንምቁፅፃር ንSARS-CoV-2 መከላኸሊ ንዘይብሎም ሰባት ዝኸዉን ምዕባለ ድሕንነቱ ዝተሓለወን ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነን ክትባት የድሊ።
en-mt: The development of safe and effective vaccines for people who are not immune to SARS-CoV-2 is needed to control this ongoing epidemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ብሰንኪ ተለዋዋጢ ናይ CoVs ባህሪ ዝተልዓለ ክታበት ንምምዕባል ዘድሊ ዝተናወሐ ጊዜ(ብማእኸላይ 18 ኣዋርሕ) ነቲ ጸገም ንምስዓር ኣዝዩ ኣጸጋሚ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the prolonged time required to develop a vaccine (18 months on average) due to the variable nature of CoVs makes it very difficult to overcome the problem.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: COVID-19 ኖቨል ሕማም ብምዃኑ ሕዚ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ሙሉእ ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ኮርስ ኣብ ኣሽሓት ሕሙማት ምርኣይ ጀሚሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: COVID-19 is a novel disease and the full clinical course of the disease is now being seen in thousands of patients.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ሕሙማት ብዘይ ገለ ሕክምና ቀስብቐስ ዝድሕኑ እዮም።
en-mt: Patients usually recover slowly without any treatment.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ምስ SARS ን MERS ብተመሳሳሊ፡ COVID-19 ምስ ዝለዓለ ኣብቶም ከቢድ ጉዳይ ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ዝለዓለ ናይ ስነ-ኣዕምሮኣዊ ጸገም ምብጻሕን ሞትን ዘስዕብ እዩ።
en-mt: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 leads to higher incidence of psychiatric disorders and death in patients with severe cases.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: ስለዚ ናይ ጥዕና ኤጀንሲታት ብፍላይ ድማ ናይ ሃፍቲ ገደብ ኣብ ዘለዎም ቦታታት ናይ ግልጋሎት ተቐዳምነት ንምሃብ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ትምቢት ዝገልፅ ሞዴል ምህናፅ የድሊ እዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, health agencies need to build a predictive model of the disease in order to prioritize services, especially in settings with resource constraints.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣብ ዝተገብሩ ክሊኒካዊ መፅናዕትታት ተደሪኽና እዞም ዝስዕቡ ምኽንያታት ንCOVID-19 ናይ ሕማም ትምቢት ፅዕንቶ ዝገብሩ እዮም (Table ​(Table33):
en-mt: Based on clinical studies to date, the following factors influence the prognosis of COVID-19 (Table ​ (Table33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: ዕድመ፡ ዕድመ ንSARSን COVID-19ን ናይ እቲ ሕማም ትምቢት ንምርዳእ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Age: Age is important for understanding the prognosis of SARS and COVID-1

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: ኣብ 8866 ጉዳያት ዝተገበረ ጽንዓት ከም እቲ ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተገለጸ ክምዝሕብሮ፡COVID-19 ብ ዋናነት ኣብ ዕድመታት 30-65 እዩ ኣጋጢሙ፡ ካብዚኦም ድማ እቶም 47.7% ዝኾኑ ካብ 50 ንላዕሊ እዮም።
en-mt: A study of 8866 cases as mentioned above showed that COVID-19 mainly occurred in the age group 30-65, of which 47.7% were over

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ናይ ጽኑዕ ክንክን ኣገልግሎት ዝጽበዩ ሕሙማት ዝጸንሐ ናይ ጥዕና ጸገም ዘለዎምን ብዕድመ ዝዓበዩን (ማእኸላይ ዕድመ 66 ብኣንጻር 51) ብምዃኖም ዕድመ ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ናይ ሕማም ጻዕቒ እጃም ከምዘለዎ ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: Patients awaiting intensive care services have chronic health problems and are older (mean age 66 versus 51), suggesting that age plays a role in disease severity in COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: ፆታ፡ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተገለፀ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ደቂ ኣንስቲዮ ንደቂ ተባዕቲዮ ብዝበለጸ ከምዘጥቅዕ (0.31/100,000 ምስ 0.27/100,000) ዝፍለጥ እዩ።
en-mt: Gender: As mentioned above, SARS-CoV-2 is known to affect men more than women (0.31/100,000 vs. 0.27/100,000).

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: ተወሳኺ ሕማማትን ሳዕቤናትን፡ ላዕለዋይ ናይ ሕክምና ሓገዝ ዘድልዮም ብCOVID-19 ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማት ምስ ካልኦት እንትነፃፀሩ ብዝላዓለ ኩነታት ናብ ሃንደበታዊ ናይ ልቢ ጉድኣትን ኣሪትሚያን ይቃልዑ እዮም።
en-mt: Additional diseases and consequences: Patients with COVID-19 who require advanced medical care are at increased risk of sudden heart attack and arrhythmia compared to others.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ሳርስ(SARS) ሞት ምስ ልቢ ዝተተሓሓዙ ጉዳያት እውን ርኡይ ተራ ዝነበሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Heart-related issues also played a significant role in SARS deaths.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት SARS-COV-2 ምስ ACE2-positive cholangiocytes ብምጥማር ናይ ጣፍያ ሕማም ከምጽእ ከምዝኽእል ሓበሬታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In COVID-19 patients, SARS-COV-2 has been reported to combine with ACE2-positive cholangiocytes to cause cholangitis.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: ዕድመን ናይ ጥዕና ኹነታትን ዝዛመዱን ዝጻረሩን ክኾኑ ከምዝኽእሉ ኣቓልቦ ክወሃቦ ይግባእ።
en-mt: Attention should be paid to the fact that age and health status may be related and contradictory.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: ካብ ንቡር ወፃኢ ዝኾነ ናይ ላብራቶሪ ዉፅኢት፡ ኣብ ደም ዝርከብ መጠን C-ሪኣክቲቭ ፕሮቲን (CRP) ናይ እቲ ኢንፍላሜሽን ወይድማ ናይ ቲሹ ጉድኣት መጠን ከምዝገልፅን ናይ እቲ ሕማም ትምቢት፣ ንመድሓኒት ዘለዎ መልሲን ናይ እቲ ሕሙም ምድሓንን ክነግረና ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Abnormal laboratory results, blood C-reactive protein (CRP) levels indicate the extent of the inflammation or tissue damage and can tell us the prognosis of the disease, response to treatment and the patient's survival.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: ናይ CRP መጠን ምስ ናይ COVID-19 ትምቢት ክዛመድ ከምዝኽእል እዉን ሓሳብ ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: It has also been suggested that CRP levels may be associated with COVID-19 prognosis.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ ሓፍ ዝበለ መጠን ላክቴት ዲሃይድሮጂኔዝ (LDH)፣ ኣስፓርቴት ኣሚኖትራንስፈሬዝ (AST)፣ ኣላናይን ኣሚኖትራንስፈሬዝ (ALT)፣ ከምኡውን ክሪኣቲን ካይኔዝ (CK) ዉፅኢት ንምትንባይ ክሕግዝ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, elevated levels of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may help predict outcome.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: እዞም ኣብ እዋን ናይ ክፋል ናይ ሰበነት ኣካል ሓደጋ ዝፍነዉ ኤንዛይማት ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ኣካላት ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ልቢን ፀሊም ከብድን ብጻዕቒ ዝግለጹ እዮም።
en-mt: These enzymes, which are released during partial organ accidents, are highly expressed in various organs, especially the heart and liver.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ናይ ልቢ ወይድማ ፀሊም ከብዲ ሕማም ክነግሩና ዝኽእሉ ልሙዳት ሓበርቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Therefore, they are common indicators that can tell us about heart or liver disease.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: ዋና ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት፡ ናይ ደረት ራድዮግራፊ ን ጊዜያዊ ምዕባለ ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት ምስ ካልኦት ኩነታት ብሓደ ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ናይ ውጽኢት ትንበያታትን ዘምጽኦ ሕልኽላኻት ኣብ ምትንባይ ኣብ ግምት ውሽጢ ክኣትዉ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Key clinical signs, chest radiography and temporal development of clinical signs with other conditions should be taken into consideration in predicting the outcome of COVID-19 and its complications.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: ናይ ስቴርዮድስ (steroids) ጥቕሚ፡ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተገለጸ፡ ስቴርዮድስ ኢሙኖሰፕረሳንት( immunosuppressant) ኮይኖም ብልሙድ ኣብ ናይ ረኽሲ ሕማማት ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ጉድኣት ክብደት ንምቕናስ ከም ተተሓሓዚ ሕክምና ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Benefits of Steroids As mentioned above, steroids are immunosuppressants and are commonly used as adjunctive therapy to reduce the severity of the infection in infectious diseases.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: ምውሳድ ልዑል መጠን ኮርቲኮስተሮይድስ(corticosteroids) ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ይትግበር ብምንባሩ፣ መብዛሕቲኦም ካብ እቲ ሕማም ዝተረፉ ሰባት ብ ኣቫስኩላር ኦስቲዮኔክሮሲስ(avascular osteonecrosis) ዝበሃል ሕማም ብምጥቃዖም፣ ናይ ዕድመ ልክዕ ናይ ኣካል ጉድኣትን ድኹም ናይ ሂይወት ኰነታትን ኣጋጢሙዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Because high doses of corticosteroids were used in severe SARS patients, most survivors developed avascular osteonecrosis, with lifelong disability and poor quality of life.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ፡ ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ስቲርዮድስ ብ ትሑት መጠን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Therefore, steroids should be used in low doses in COVID-19 patients if necessary.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: ናይ ኣዕምሮ ጸቕጢ፡ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተገለፀ ኣብ እዋን ለበዳ COVID-19 ሰባት ንበይኖም እንትውሸቡን ናይ ቐረባ ዘመድን ሕሙማትን ክሞቱ እንትርእዩን ብዙሓት ሕሙማት ብናይ ኣዕምሮ ጸቕጢ እናተሳቐዩ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Depression: As mentioned above, many patients are suffering from depression during the COVID-19 pandemic when people are isolated and close relatives and patients die.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: ነዞም ሕሙማት ካብ ጭንቀት ወጺኦም ናብ ንቡር ሂወቶም ንምምላስ፡ ሰነ-ኣዕምሮኣዊ ምኽሪን ናይ ነዊሕ ጊዜ ድጋፍ ምሃብ ከምዝግባእ ርዱእ እዩ።
en-mt: Psychological counseling and long-term support are needed to help these patients recover from depression.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: በመሰረት ዝተኻየዱ ናይ ሰነ-ህዝቢ ጽንዓታት፡ COVID-19 ካብ SARS ዝተፈለየ ናይ ኢፒዲሚዮሎጂካል(epidemiological) መርኣያታት ኣለውዎ።
en-mt: According to demographic studies, COVID-19 has epidemiological patterns that are different from SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ምርባሕ ብተወሳኺ ልክዕ ከም ሳዓል ዘምፁ ካልኦት CoVs ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ብምርባሕ ኣብ እቲ ናይ ፈላማይ ደረጃ ቀሊል ዝበሃል ወይድማ ምንም ዓይነት ምልክት ዘይከርእዩ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition to multiplying in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can multiply in the upper respiratory tract just like other CoVs that cause coughing and may show mild or no symptoms in the initial stage.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: ስለዚህ፡ እቶም ኣብ ናይ መጀመሪያ ድረጃ ወይድማ ናይ ምፍልፋል ደረጃ ዝርከቡ በቲ ረኽሲ ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማት፡ኣብ ዕለታዊ ምንቅስቓሳት ብዙሕ መጠን ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ናይ ምፍራይ ተኸእሎ ዘለዎም ብምዃኖም ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምቁጽጻር ዓብዪ ጸገም ዘስዕቡ እዮም።
en-mt: Therefore, patients infected in the early or late stages of the infection are likely to produce large amounts of virus during daily activities, posing a major problem in controlling the outbreak.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ናይ SARS-CoV ምምሕልላፍ ሕሙማት ብጽኑዕ ካብ ዝሓመሙ ዝለዓለ እንትኾን ኣብ መጀመርታ ብርኪ ካብ ዘለው ሕሙማት ኣዝዩ ዝነኣሰ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the incidence of SARS-CoV transmission is higher in severely ill patients and much lower in early stage patients.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ድማ ልዕሊ ለበዳ SARS ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ብጣዕሚ ሓደገኛ ምዃኑ ይግለፅ።
en-mt: Therefore, the COVID-19 pandemic is more dangerous than the SARS pandemic.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ብምዕፃውን እቲ ህዝቢ ክዉሸብ ብምግባርን ለበዳ SARS-CoV-2 ንምቕናስ ኣብ ቻይና ዝተፈላለዩ ፃዕርታት ኣብ ምክያድ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Various efforts are being made in China to reduce the spread of SARS-CoV-2 by closing Wuhan and its surroundings and quarantined the population.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: ዋላእኳ እዞም ተግባራት ነቲ ቁጠባን ካልኦት ዘርፍታት ናይ እታ ሃገር ዝጎድኡ እንተኾኑ ናይ ሓደሽቲ ሕሙማት ቁፅሪ ይቕንስ ኣሎ እዚ ድማ እቲ ለበዳ ይቕንስ ምህላዉ ዘመላኽት እዩ።
en-mt: Although these practices are damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new cases is decreasing, indicating that the epidemic is decreasing.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ማርች ከምዘቋርፅን ዉሑድ ቁፅሪ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ድማ ን 3-4 ኣዋርሕ ከምዝፀንሑን ይግመት።
en-mt: The outbreak is expected to end in March and a small number of cases are expected to last for 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ገለ ሰብ ሞያ ክንድዚ ኣወንታዊ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: However, some professionals are not so positive.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter, et al., ካብ SARS ዝበኣሰ ዝመስል COVID-19 ኣብ 2020 ኣየብቅዕን ኢሉ ይግምት።
en-mt: Paul Hunter, et al., predicts that COVID-19, which appears to be worse than SARS, will not end in

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini, et al., ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ዉፅኢት ንምግማት ዘኽእል ሞዴል ብምስራሕ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ ዓለም ክልተ ሲሶ ህዝቢ ከጥቅዕ ከምዝኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Ira Longini, et al., developed a model to predict the outcome of the pandemic and said that SARS-CoV-2 could affect two-thirds of the world's population.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: ከም ጸብጻብ ሓደ ናይ ካናዳ ጉጅለ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ክልቲኡ ማለት እውን ኣብ ቅድሚ 2 ሰሙን ካብ ሆስፒታል ሓዊዮም ዝወጽኡ ሕሙማት ሚድ-ተርቢኔትን ኣብ ናይ ጉሮሮ መሕጸቢ ፋሳሲን እቲ ቫይረስ ክርከብ ክኢሉ እዩ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ሐዚ ሓዱሽ ዝተረኸበ ቫይረስ ሳይክላዊ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ክኸውን ክምዝኽእል ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: According to a Canadian team, SARS-CoV-2 has been detected in both mid-turbinate patients discharged from hospital two weeks earlier and in throat lavage fluids, suggesting that the newly discovered virus may be cyclic like influenza It is a seed.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ኣና ቐነሱ ኣብ ዝመጹሉ፡ ኣብ ቻይና ተስፋ ዝህቡ ምልክታት ኣጋጢሞም እዮም፡ እዚ ድማ እዞም ኣብ እዚ ሐዚ እዋን ዘለዉ ስትራቴጂታት እናሰርሑ ክኾኑ ከምዝኽእሉ ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: However, as new cases of ANA have declined, there have been promising signs in China, suggesting that these current strategies may be working.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: ኢቦላ ኣስታት ሓደ ሚልዮን ጉዳያት ለበዳ ከምዘኸትልን ፍርቂ ሚሊዮን ሞት ከምዘምፅን ተተምቢዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Ebola was predicted to cause about one million cases and half a million deaths.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ጽኑዕ ውሸባን ዓርሰ ተነጽሎን፡ እቲ ሕማም ኣብ ቁጽጽር ክውዕል ክኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: However, strict quarantine and self-isolation have brought the disease under control.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoV፡ SARS-CoV-2 እውን ኣብ ረኽሲ ናይ ምሳዓብን ሞት ናይ ምስዓብን ተኽእሎኡ ዝተሓተ ክኸውን እንከሎ ኣብ ከይዲ ምስ ደቂ ሰባት ብሓባር ዝነብር፡ ትሑት ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Like SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 is less likely to cause infection and death and may be a low-risk virus that coexists with humans in the process.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ምስ SARSን MERS ዘለዎ ንጽጽር ኣብ ታሕቲ ዘሎ (Fig. ​(Fig.55) ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A comparison of the COVID-19 outbreak with SARS and MERS is shown below (Fig. 55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብ ምስዓልን ምህንጣስን ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፋይ እንትኾን፡ ምስ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተበከሉ ናውቲታት ዝግበር ቀጠተዊ ዝኾነ ምንኽኻእ እውን ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmitted by coughing and sneezing, but can also be transmitted by direct contact with contaminated objects.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሰገራ እዉን ብምርካቡ ካብ ሰገራ-ናብ-ኣፍ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዓቕሚ ክህልዎ ክመዝኽእል ይሕበር።
en-mt: The virus is also found in feces and may have the potential for fecal-to-mouth transmission.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: ኣብ 138 ጉዳያት ዝተገበረ ናይ ቀረባ እዋን ጽንዓት ከምዝጸብጸቦ፡ 41% ጉዳያት ብ ኖሶኮሚያል(nosocomial) ረኽሲታት ዝተፈጠሩ ከምዝኾኑን ካብዚኦም ድማ 40 ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ ሓዊሱ እቶም 17 ሕሙማት ካልኦት ሕማማት ዘልዉዎም እዮም።
en-mt: A recent study of 138 cases reported that 41% of cases were caused by nosocomial infections, of which 17 patients, including 40 health care providers, had other diseases.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ደቂ-ሰባት ንምሕላው ብፍላይ ድማ ን ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ፡ ማሕበራዊ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ ናይ ቤተሰብ ኣባላት፡ መሳርሕቲን ዋላ ኣብ እቲ ዘይምልከቶም ምስ ሕሙማት ንኽከእ ዘለዎም ሰባት እውን እንትኾነ ንምሕላው ዓብዪ ጥንቃቐ ክግበር ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Therefore, great care must be taken to protect human beings, especially health care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues and even those who have to interact with patients where they do not belong.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ሓደጋ ኣብ ምቕንስ እቲ ከም ናይ መጀመሪያ መሰመር ምክልኻል ኣብ ጥቅሚ ክውዕል ዝኽእል ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክ ፡ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ይኹን ናይ N95 ናይ መተንፈሲ ማስክታት( series # 1860s) ዝበሃሉ ማስክታት ምግባር እንትኸውን፡ እዚኦም ድማ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ንምቁጽጻር ዝሕግዙ እዮም።
en-mt: In reducing the risk of the infection the first line of defense is to wear a face mask , surgical mask or N95 respiratory masks( series # 1860s) which help to control the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: ናይ መጥባሕቲ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ማስክታት ካብ በቲ ረኽሲ ዝተጠቕዐ ሰብ ዝወጽኡ ፈሰስቲ ንጣባት ኣብ ኣየር ከይጎዓዙን ኣብ ናይ ነገራት ገጽ ተጣቢቖም ናብ ካልኦት ሰባት ንከይመሓላለፉ ዝከላኸሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from an infected person from traveling in the air and sticking to the surface of objects and spreading to others.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና 10 to 80 nm ዝኾኑ ኣናእሽተይ ቫይሮናት ንምክልኻል ዘኽእል N95 (series # 1860s) ማስክ ጥራሕ እዩ። ካብዞም ኣናእሽተይ ቫይሮናት 5% ጥራሕ ነቲ ማስክ ጥሒሶም ክኣተዉ ይኽእሉ። መጠን ክልቲኦም SARS-CoV-2ን SARS-CoVን ከባቢ 85 nm እዩ።
en-mt: However, only the N95 (series # 1860s) mask can protect against small viruses of 10 to 80 nm. Only 5% of these small viruses can break through the mask. The size of both SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV is around 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: ባእታትት እስካብ ሓሙሽተ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክታት ዘሊቖም ናይ ምእታው ተኽእሎ ዘለዎም ብምዃኑ፡ ምስ ሕሙማት ቀጥታዊ ርክብ ዘለዎም ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ከይኮነ N95 (series # 1860s) ማስኪታት ክገብሩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Because elements have the potential to penetrate up to five surgical masks, health care providers in direct contact with patients should wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks rather than surgical masks.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: ካብ ማስክ ሓሊፉ ናይ ጥዕና ባዓል ሞያታት ንዕዖም ዝምጥን ንፁል ጋዎን ብምኽዳን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምምሕልላፍ ምቕናስ የድሊ።
en-mt: In addition to masks, health professionals need to wear appropriate gowns to reduce the transmission of the virus.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: ቫይረሳት ን ሓደ ሰብ ብዓይኒ እዉን ከጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Viruses can also infect a person's eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 22፣ 2020 ሓደ ሓኪም ዋላ እኳ N95 ማስክ ተጠቒሙ እንተነበረ ብSARS-CoV-2 ተጠቒዑ። እቲ ቫይረስ ብኢንፍላማቶሪ ኣዒንቲ ኣቢሉ ከምዝኣተወ ይግመት።
en-mt: On January 22, 2020, a doctor contracted SARS-CoV-2 despite wearing an N95 mask. The virus is thought to have entered through inflammatory eyes.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: ሕሙም ክሕክሙ ከለዉ ናይ ጥዕና ባዓል ሞያታት ብርሃን ዘእቱ ናይ ገፅ መሸፈኒ ወይድማ መነፀር ክጥቀሙ ይግባእ።
en-mt: Health professionals should wear reflective face masks or goggles when treating a patient.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: ኣብ ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታታት ንዝነብሩ ህዝቢታት ኢድና ብሳሙና ካብ ዝተለመደ ጊዜ ንላዕሊ ምሕፃብ፣ ኣብ ገዛ ምዉሻብን ምስ ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ዘለና ርክብ ምቕናስ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: People living in affected areas need to wash their hands with soap more often than usual, stay at home and reduce contact with affected people.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: ሰባት ካብ ሕሙም ሰለስተ እግሪ ዝኣክል ክርሕቑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: People should stay three feet away from a patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: እዞም ተግባራት ኢንፌክሽን ናይ ምፍጣር ሓደጋ ንምቕናስን እቲ ሕማም ንከይላበድ ንምክልኻልን ዝጠቕሙ ዉፅኢታዊ መንገድታት እዮም።
en-mt: These practices are effective ways to reduce the risk of infection and prevent the disease from spreading.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: ዋላኳ SARS-CoV-2 ንወድሰብ ሓድሽ ቫይረስ እንተኾነ ኣብ 7 ጥሪ 2020 ከምዝተገለፀ ኣብ 2003 ብዘጋጠመ ናይ SARS ለበዳ መሰረት ብምግባር እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ SARS-CoV ዘለዎ ተመሳሳልነት ንቻይና ዓቢ መጠንቀቕታ ክኸዉን ኔሩዎ።
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV-2 is a new virus to humans, it was announced on January 7, 2020 that the similarity of the virus to SARS-CoV should have been a major warning to China based on the 2003 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ እስካብ ጃኑዋሪ 19 2020 ናይ ዉሃን ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ማእኽል ዳይሬክተር ነቶም ዜጋታት እቲ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ትሑት ተዛማትነት ከምዘለዎን ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ድማ ውሱን ተፋራይነት ከምዘለዎን፡ ንምቁጽጻሩ ድማ ኣጸጋሚ ከምዘይኸውን ሓቢሮም ከረጋግኡዎም ኣይከኣሉን ነይሮም።
en-mt: However, as of January 19, 2020, the director of Wuhan's Center for Disease Control had failed to reassure the citizens that the novel virus had low contagiousness, limited human-to-human reproducibility, and would not be difficult to control.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: እዚ መልእኽቲ ኣብ እቲ ህዝቢ ዝነበረ ፍርሒ ክቕንስ ጌርዎ እዩ ብፍላይ ድማ እታ መላእ ሃገር ነቲ ናይ Spring Festival (ፅድያ ባዓል) እንትዳሎ እቲ ሕማም ገና ኣብ ዉሃን እንተሎ ንምቁፅፃር ዘኽእል ዝነበረ ወሳኒ ጊዜ ሓሊፉ እዩ።
en-mt: The message has eased fears among the public, especially as the entire country prepares for the Spring Festival.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ዝርከብ ናይ ሕማም ቁፅፅር ኤጀንሲ እዚ ከቢድ ትምህርቲ ቀሲሙ ንቀፃሊ ኣገዳሲ ምምሕያሻት ከምፅእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The disease control agency in China can learn this hard lesson and make important improvements for the future.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: ንኣብነት፡ እዞም ኤጀንሲታት(1) ናይ ህዝባዊ መግለጺታት ኣብ ዝህብሉ ሰዓት ብዛዕባ ዝጥቀሙዎም ሕድሕድ ቃላት ክጥንቀቑ ኣለዎም ምኽኒያቱም ናይ ዜጋታት ኣመለኻኽታን ውሳነታትን ክቕይር ዝኽእል ብምዃኑ፡ (2) ስሩዕ ናይ ዶክተራት ወይድማ ናይ ሰበ ስልጣናት መግለጺ ካብ ምጽባይ፡ ተኣፍፍነት ን ተዋሃድነትን ዘለዎም ዘይተለመዱ ናይ ክሊኒክ ሓበሬታት (3) እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ናይ መጀመሪ ደረጃ እናሃለው ዝግባእ ናይ ምክልኻል ስራሕ ምስራሕ ነቲ ህዝቢ ንምርግጋዕ ካብ ምፍታን (4) ናይ ህዝቢ ብዛዕባ እቲ ለበዳ ዘለዎ ንቕሓትን ግንዛበን ንምዕባይ፡ ንጹር ዝኾኑን ሽቶኦም ዝፍለጡን ኣካይዳታት ብምኽታል፡ ናይ እቲ ማሕበረሰብ ምርመራን መልሲ ወሃቢ ስርዓት ስሩዕ ብ ዝኾነ መንገዲ ምምሕያሽ።
en-mt: For example, these agencies must (1) be careful about each word they use when making public statements because they can change citizens' attitudes and decisions; (3) Doing appropriate preventive work while the outbreak is in its early stages rather than trying to stabilize the population; Improving the way.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: እቲ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተብሃለ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ዝተበገሰ ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 እዩ ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic, caused by the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus, began in December

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: እዚ ፅሑፍ ኣብ ዝፀሓፈሉ እዋን ክልተ ኣዋርሕ ኣብዘይመልአ ጊዜ ኣብ መላእ ቻይናን ናብ ልዕሊ 50 ሃገራትን ተላቢዑ እዩ።
en-mt: In less than two months at the time of writing, it has spread across China and to more than 50 countries.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ ብምዃኑን እቶም ምልክታቱ ድማ ኣብ መንጎ COVID-19ን ኣብ SARS እውን ተመሳሰልቲ ብምዃኖም፡ ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ልክዕ ከም ናይ SARS ዓይነት ስምዒት ዝፈጠረ እዩ።
en-mt: Because the virus is similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the COVID-19 pandemic has a SARS-like feel.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር ኣብ ሞንጎ COVID-19ን SARSን ነቲ ሕማምን ለበዳን ንምቁጽጻር ዘኽእሉ ኣገደስቲ ኣፍላላይ ይርኣዩ እዮም።
en-mt: However, there are important differences between COVID-19 and SARS that allow for the control of the disease and epidemic.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 ካብ መንእሰይ ንላዕሊ ንዓበይቲ፣ ካብ ደቂ ኣንስቲዮ ንላዕሊ ድማ ንደቂ ተባዕቲዮ ዘጥቅዕ እዩ። ናይ እቲ ሕማም ሓደገኛነትን ናይ ሞት መጠንን እዉን ካብ መናእሰይ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ይገድድ።
en-mt: COVID-19 affects adults more than young people, and men more than women. The risk and mortality rate of the disease is also worse in adults than in young people.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS ምስ COVID-19 እንትነፃፀር ናይ ሞት መጠኑ (10.91% ኣንጻር 1.44%) ዝለዓለ እዩ።
en-mt: SARS has a higher mortality rate (10.91% vs. 1.44%) compared to COVID-1

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ዋላኳ ምልክት ኣየርእዩ ነቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎም ፡ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ግን ኣዝዮም ኣብ ዝሓሙሉ ጊዜ እዩ እዚ ክኸውን ዝኽእል እዚ ድማ፡ ን COVID-19 ምቁጽጻር ካብ SARS ኣዝዩ ዝኸበደ ንክኸውን ይገብሮ።
en-mt: COVID-19 patients are likely to transmit the virus even though they show no symptoms , but this can happen when SARS patients are very sick which, makes controlling COVID-19 much more difficult than SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: እዚ ድማ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ SARS-CoV ብዝሰፍሐ መጠን ንምንታይ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ዘረድእ እዩ።
en-mt: This explains why SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted at a greater rate than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እቲ ስሩዕ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዝኽነ RNA ኣብ ገለ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ኣሉታዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The regular SARS-CoV-2 RNA may be negative in some COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: ብኻልእ ወገን ድማ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ን ኻልኣይ ግዘ እቲ ቫይረስ ክርከቦም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, recovered patients may become infected a second time.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: እዞም ርካቦታት ብቕጽበት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ዝውሰኹ እዮም።
en-mt: These findings are added immediately after the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: እቶም ዝተገብሩ ቅልጡፋት ናይ CoVID-19 ምርመራታት ብምውሳድ ብዙሓት ወሰንቲ ሽግራት ከምዚ ዝስዕብ ፍታሕ ይጽበዩ ኣለው።
en-mt: With the rapid CoVID-19 tests done, many critical problems are awaiting resolution as follows.

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካበይ ዝመጸ እዩ?
en-mt: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: ዋላኳ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን ክልተ ናይ መንካዕ SARS-መሰል CoVs 96% ናይ ጀነቲክ ሆሞሎጎ ዝተረኸቡ እንተኾኑ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ መንካዓት ኢልና ምውሳን ኣይንክእልን።
en-mt: Although 96% of genetic homologue was detected between SARS-CoV-2 and two tick SARS-like CoVs, we cannot rule out SARS-CoV-2 from ticks.

sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: ነቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ዋና ተሸካሚኡ፡ ማለት እውን ካብ መንካዕ ናብ ሰባት ከም ማእኸላይ መማሓላለፋይ ዝኾነ እንስሳ እንታይ እዩ?
en-mt: What is the animal that serves as the medium of transmission of the virus from its main carrier, namely, from ticks to humans?

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: ናይ #1ን 2ን መልሲ እንተይፈለጥና እቲ ሕማም ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ክንዓግቶ ኣይንኽእልን በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ እቲ ለበዳ ካሊእ ጊዜ ተመሊሱ ክመፅእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Without knowing the answers to #1 and 2, we cannot completely prevent the disease and therefore the outbreak may come back another time.

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: ናይ ሞለኪል ሞዴሊንግን ባዮኬሚካል ኣሴይን SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ACE2 ከምዝጣመር ዋላ እንተገለፀ እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ዝርከቡ ዋህዮታት ከመይ ጌሩ ኣቲዩ ፓቶሎጂካል ለዉጥታት የምፅእ?
en-mt: How does the virus enter cells in the respiratory tract and cause pathological changes, even though molecular modeling and biochemical assays suggest that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2?

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ACE2-EXPRESSING ወህዮታት እውን ዝሓዘ ድዩ?
en-mt: Does the virus also contain ACE2-EXPRESSING cells?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: ነዞም ሕቶታት ዝወሃብ ግልጺ ዝኾነ መልሲ ኣብዘይተውሃበሉ፡ ቅልጡፍን ምርመራን ስሉጥን ሕክምናን ምግባር ኣይንኽእልን።
en-mt: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot provide prompt, diagnosis, and efficient treatment.

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ክሳብ መዓስ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል?
en-mt: How long can the outbreak last?

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ኣብ ዝላገበሉ እዋን እቲ ቫይረስ ከመይ ጌሩ ጀነቲካዊ ምዕባለታት የርኢ?
en-mt: How does the virus make genetic changes during human-to-human transmission?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: ዓለምለኸዊ ለበዳ ክኽዉን ዶ ይኾን፣ ከም SARS ይጠፍእ ወይድማ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ሓልሓሊፉ ዝኽሰት ይኸዉን?
en-mt: Will it become a global pandemic, disappear like SARS or become occasional like influenza?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: ኣገዳሲ ዋላ እንተኾነ ነዞም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዘለዉን ካልኦት ሕቶታትን ንምምላስ ዘድልዩ መፅናዕቲ ንምክያድ ግዜ ከድሊ እዩ።
en-mt: Important as it is, time will be needed to conduct the research necessary to answer the above and other questions.

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፡ ዝሓቶ ዝኾነ ይኹን ወጻኢ ወጺኡ፡ ነዚ ለበዳ ብ ዝተኽኣለ መጠን ኣብ ዝሓጸረ ጊዜ ጠጠው ኣቢልናዮ ናብ ልሙድ ሂወትና ክንምለስ ካብ ምግባር ካልእ ኣማራጺ የብልናን።
en-mt: However, we have no choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and return to normal life at all costs.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: ናይ ደቂ ሰባት ኮሮናቫይረስ ዙኖቲካዊ መበቆል
en-mt: The zoonotic origin of human coronaviruses

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ንዝቑጸሩ ዓመታት ብምኽንያት ሚዩቴሽንን ምልማድን ንወድሰብ ሓዊሱ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረሳትን(CoVs) መጸግዒታቶምን ዝግመት ለውጢ ኣምጽዮም እዮም።
en-mt: Over thousands of years, mutations and adaptations have brought about predictable changes in humans, including coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: ቕድሚ 2003 ክልተ ናይ ሰባት CoVs (HCoVs) ከም ሰዓል ዘበለ ማእኸላይ ሕማም ከምዘስዕቡ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Prior to 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause moderate diseases such as influenza.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: ናይ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም (SARS) ለበዳን ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ (MERS) ለበዳን ናይ HCoV ረኽሲ ክንደየናይ ንህይወት ኣስጋኢ ከምዝኾነ ከርእዩና ክኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) outbreak and the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) outbreak have shown us how life-threatening HCoV infection can be.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብኣቆጻጽራ ኣውሮፓ ኣብ መፈጸምታ 2019 ኣብ ማእኸላይ ቻይና ብምርካቡ CoVታት ኣብ ኣተኩሮኣትዮም ነይሮም። CoVs ልዑል ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለት ዋላ’ኳ እንተለዎ ካብ SARS-CoV ግን ዝተሓተ ናይ ሕማም ተኽእሎ የርእይ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 was detected in central China in late 2019 and CoVs were in the spotlight. CoVs show a lower disease potential than SARS-CoV, although they have a high transmissibility.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: HCoV ረኽሲ ዙኖሲስ እንትኸውን ናይ HCoVs ዙኖቲክ መበቆል ምርዳእ ድማ ብዝግባእ ዝጠቕመና እዩ።
en-mt: HCoV is a zoonotic infection and understanding the zoonotic origin of HCoVs is in our best interest.

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም HcoVታት ካብ ለዃኺቶታት ዝመጹ ኮይኖም ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ድማ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: Most HcoVs are infectious and do not cause disease.

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: እቶም መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ናይ HCoVs እውን ፍሉጣት እዮም።
en-mt: The intermediate residences of HCoVs are also well known.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: ናይ እንስሳ ፍልፍል ምፍላጥ ናይቲ ሕማም ምክልኻል ኣብ ምርካብ ዓብዪ እጃም ይጻወት።
en-mt: Detection of the animal source plays an important role in obtaining immunity.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: ናይ CoV ቫይረስ ተጠቃዕቲ ምስ እንስሳት ዝነብሮም ርክብ ምጽናዕን ምምርማርን ዝሓሸ መረዳእታ ምምሕልላፍ ነቲ ሕማም ንምርካብ ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: Studying and examining the interactions of CoV infected people with animals helps to transmit better data to help detect the disease.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኣብዚ ምርምር ኣብቶም ሸውዓተ HCoVs ዘለና ፍልጠት ብመሰረት ናይ ረኸበ ታሪኽን ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ኩነትን ነጠቓልል።
en-mt: In this investigation we summarize our knowledge on the seven HCoVs according to acquisition history and animal-to-human transmission status.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: ብቐንዲ ድማ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነታት HCoVs ብመንጽር ዝግመት ለውጢ ቫይረስን ናይ ጀኖም ጥምረትን ዘለዎም ምምስሳልን ምፍልላይን ንጠቅስ።
en-mt: We mainly mention the similarities and differences of different types of HCoVs in terms of predictable changes in virus and genomic cohesion.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: አዚ ግዜኣዊ CoV ሕማም 2019 (COVID-19) ለበዳ ኣብ እዚ ሓሳብ እዚ ምይይጥ ተገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: This temporary CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic has been discussed in this context.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ንዕውት ካብ መሕደሪ ናብ መሐደሪ ምስግጋርን ናይ እዚ ቫይረስ ዕብየት ኣብ እቲ ናይ ሕማም ከቢድነት ብዛዕባ ዘስዕቦ ጽልዋ እውን ትኹረት ተዋሂቡዎም እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, attention was also paid to successful transition from residence to residence and the impact of the growth of the virus on the severity of the disease.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: ኮሮና ቫይረስ(CoVs) ምስ Coronaviridae(ኮሮናቫይሬድ) ዝበሃል ዓሌት ይምደብ። Coronaviridae ድማ enveloped(ዝተዓሸጉ)፣ positive-sensed(ፖዘቲቭ ሴንስድ)፣ single-stranded(ነጸላ ቅርንጫፍ ዘለዎም) ዝበሃሉ ናይ RNA ቫይረስ ጉጅለታት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Coronaviruses(CoVs) belong to the genus Coronaviridae(coronaviruses). Coronaviridae includes enveloped, positive-sensed, and single-stranded RNA virus groups.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: እዞም ቫይረሳት ካብ 26 ክሳብ 32 ኪሎ ቤዝ ዝኸውን ዓብዪ ጂኖም ዝሕዙን ብዓይኒ ዘይረኣዩ ትሃዋስያን ኮይኖም ብምኽንያት ኣብ ትሕቲ ኤሌክትሮን ማይክሮስኮብ ዘርእዩዎ ዘውዲ መሰል ቕርጺ “CoVs” ብምባል ይጽውዑ።
en-mt: These viruses contain a large genome of 26 to 32 kilobases and are invisible to the naked eye.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: ብ መንጽር ኣካላዊ ቅርጺ፣ CoVs ተመሳሳሊ ስርዓት ኣወዳድባ ዝውንኑ ዘይተኸፋፈሉ ጀኖማት ኣለዉዎም።
en-mt: In terms of physical structure, CoVs have unsegmented genomes that possess similar organizational systems.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: ብግምት ክልተ ሰለስታዊ ናይ እዚ ጄኖም ክልተ ዓበይቲ ተደራረብቲ ክፍቲ ተነበብቲ ፍሬማት (ORF1a ን ORF1b ን) ኣለውዎም፣ እዚኦም ድማ ናብ pp1a ን pp1ab ን ሪፕሊኬዝ ፖሊፕሮቲናት ዝትርጎሙ እዮም።
en-mt: Approximately two thirds of this genome have two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b ), which are translated into pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: እቶም ፖሊፕሮቲናት nsp1~16 ዝበሃል በዓል 16 ዘይተዋቐሩ ፕሮቲናት ከምርቱ ይግበሩ።
en-mt: The polyproteins are made to produce 16 unstructured proteins called nsp1~1

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: እቲ ዝተረፈ ክፋል ናይ እቲ ጄኖም፣ spike (S)፣envelope (E)፣membrane (M)ን nucleoprotein (N) ሓዊሱ ነቶም ቅርጻዊ ፕሮቲናት ORF ዝወስድ እዩ።
en-mt: The remaining part of the genome, including spike (S),envelope (E),membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N) carries the ORF for the structural proteins.

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ዓሌታዊ-መሰረት ዘለዎም መበቆል ፕሮቲናት እውን ብዝተፈላለዩ ናይ CoVs ዓሌታት ሓበሬታት ዝተመልኡ እዮም።
en-mt: Many species-based origin proteins are also populated with information on different species of CoVs.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ፕሮቲን መስርዕ ኣፈላላይ ብምምርኳስ CoVs ኣብ ኣርባዕተ (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoVን delta-CoVን) ይኽፈሉ። ካብዚኣቶም beta-CoV መብዛሕትኦም HCoVs ዝሕዝ ኮይኑ ኣርብዕተ ክፍልታት (A, B, C and D) ኣልዎም።
en-mt: Based on protein sequence differences, CoVs are divided into four (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV). Among them, beta-CoV contains most HCoVs and has four classes (A, B, C and D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: ፓይሎጀኒክ መረዳእታ ለዃኺቶታትን ኣንጭዋታትን ናይ መብዛሕትኦም ኣልፋ-CoVs ን ቤታ -CoVs ን ጂን ምንጪታት እዮም፣ ኣዕዋፍ ድማ ናይ ጋማ-CoVs ን ደልታ-CoVs ዋና መሕደሪታት እየን።
en-mt: Pylogenetic Data Mice and rodents are the gene sources for most alpha-CoVs and beta -CoVs, and birds are the principal hosts for gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: ንኣሽሓት ዓመታት፣ CoVs ናይ ዓሌታት ገደባት ጥሒሱ ሓሊፉ እዩ ሓደሓዲኦም ድማ ከበድቲ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ኮይኖም መጺኦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: For thousands of years, CoVs have crossed species boundaries and some have become seriously pathogenic in humans.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ፣ ሸውዓተ ናይ ደቂ ሰባት CoVs (HCoVs) ተፈሊጦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) have been identified.

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: ካብኣቶም ድማ HCoV-229E ን HCoV-NL63 ን alpha-CoVs እዮም።
en-mt: Among them are HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63, the alpha-CoVs.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: እቶም ካልኦት ሓሙሽተ ቤታ-CoVs በዓል HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1፣ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም (SARS-CoV)፣ ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ (MERS-CoV) ከምኡውን SARS-CoV-2 የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS-CoV), Middle Eastern Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: HCoV-229E፣ HCoV-OC43፣ HCoV-HKU1 ከምኡ'ውን HCoV-NL63 መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ከም ሰዓል ከምኡ'ውን/ወይድማ ተቕማጥን ዝኣምሰሉ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ሕማም የኸትሉ።
en-mt: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms such as fever and/or diarrhea.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: ምስ SARS-CoV፣ MERS-CoV ከምኡውን ምስቲ ሓድሽ ዝተረኸበ SARS-CoV-2 ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣዝዩ ልዑል ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ዓቕሚ ኣለዎ፣ ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ረኽሲ ብምስዓብ መብዛሕትኦም ሰባት ድማ ናይ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ከምኡውን ካብ ሳንባ ወጻኢ ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ናይ ምርኣይ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Compared to SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly discovered SARS-CoV-2, it has a very high morbidity, causing severe lower respiratory tract infections and most people develop severe respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and from the lungs They are more likely to show external symptoms.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: B814 ዝበሃል እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ HCoV-229E ዘርኢ ኣብ መፋርቕ 1960 ካብ ናይ ሰዓል ሕሙም ንፋጥ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: B814, the first HCoV-229E strain, was recovered in the mid-1960s from febrile patient sputum.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: ካብኡ ንዳሓር ኣብቶም ክልተ ዓርሰ ውሱንነት ምልክታት ዘስዕቡ ቫይረሳት HCoV-229Eን HCoV-OC43ን ብዝተገብረ ዓሙቕ መፅናዕቲ ብዙሕ ግንዛበ ክእከብ ተኻኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: Since then, much insight has been gathered through in-depth studies on the two self-limiting symptomatic viruses, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: ቅድሚ ለበዳ SARS ምፍጣሩ ብ HCoVs ዝመፅእ ሕማም ጎዳኢ ከምዘይኮነ ይእመን ኔሩ።
en-mt: Before the SARS epidemic, disease caused by HCoVs was believed to be harmless.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: እቲ ኣብ ታሪክ ዝኸፍእ ናይ SARS ለበዳ ኣብ 2003 ተኸሲቱ። በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ ልዕሊ 8,000 ሰባት ተጠቒዖም፤ ካብኦም ድማ 10% ሞየቶም።
en-mt: The worst SARS outbreak in history occurred in As a result, more than 8,000 people were affected; Of these, 10% died.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: ድሕሪ ዓሰርተ ዓመታት፣ ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድረም (MERS) ጎንፊ ኣብ ዓረብ ፔኒንሱላ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ለበዳ ብምስዓብ፡ ናብ ዝተረፈ ዓለም ድማ ሓሓሊፉ ተዛሚቱ እዩ።
en-mt: Ten years later, the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) epidemic followed a continuing outbreak in the Arabian Peninsula, and spread occasionally to the rest of the world.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: ኣብ 2019 ዝትርኣየ HCoV (2019-nCoV) SARS-CoV-2 ብምባል ዝተሰየመ ናይዚ ሕጂ ዘሎ ናይ ኮሮና 2019(COVID-19) ሕማም ክሳብ መጋቢት 3, 2020 ናይ ልዕሊ 3,120 ሰባት ሂወት ዝወሰደን ልዕሊ 91,000 ሰባት ዘጥቀዐ ዝኾነ ሕማም መልዓሊ እዩ።
en-mt: The 2019 HCoV (2019-nCoV) named SARS-CoV-2 is the trigger of the current coronavirus 2019(COVID-19) pandemic that has claimed the lives of more than 3,120 people and infected more than 91,000 as of March 3,

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ደወል ተደዊሉ’ሎ ዓለም ድማ ን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ሕማም ክትዳሎ ኣሎዋ።
en-mt: The bell has been rung and the world must prepare for the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: ኩሎም ሸውዓት ዓይነታት HCoVs ካብ ከም ሎዃኺቶ፣ ኣንጭዋን ካልኦት አንስሳት ዘቤት ዝመጹ እዮም።
en-mt: All seven strains of HCoVs come from pets such as rats, mice and other domestic animals.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ መረጋገጺ መስመራት ናይ ኩሎም HCoVs ዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ኣመጻጽኣ ካብ ለዃኺቶ ምዃኑ ዘርእዩ እዮም፣ እቶም ቫይረሳት ድማ ብኣግባቡ ዝተላመዱን ሕማም ዘየስዕቡ ኮይኖም ግን ሰፊሕ ጀነቲካዊ ፍልልይ ዘርእዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Multiple confirmation lines of all HCoVs show a presumed tick origin, and the viruses are appropriately adapted and non-pathogenic but exhibit wide genetic variation.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ዓብዪ ሕክምናውን፣ ስነፍልጠታዊን/ሳይንሳዊን፣ ማሕበራዊን፣ ከምኡ'ውን ሞራላዊን ማሕለኻታት ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ዓለምን ኣምጺኡ እዩ።
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic has brought major medical, scientific, social, and moral challenges in China and around the world.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: ናይ HCoVs ዙኖቲክ መበቆላት ንምክትታል ናይ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ታሪክ፣ ዘንቀሳቕሶ ዘሎ ሓይሊን ናይ ዓሌታት ገደብ ምኽንያታት ምርዳእ የድሊ።
en-mt: Tracking the zoonotic origins of HCoVs requires an understanding of the natural history, driving forces and species limiting factors.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ነቶም መሕደሪ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝኾኑ፡ኣብ መንጎ ዝርከቡን ኣባዛሕቲ ዝኾኑ መሕደሪ(ታት) ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዝኾኑ እንስሳት ንምርካብ ኣብ ዝግበር ኣለሻ ክመርሕን ከሳልጥን እውን ዝኽእል እዩ፣ ፣ ን ቀጸልቲ ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ብምምሕልላፍ ከጋጥሙ ዝኽእሉ ጎንፊታት/ለበዳታት ኣብ ምክልኻል ድማ ጠቐምቲ ኣንፈታት ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: This can also lead and facilitate the search for animals that are the host, intermediate and reproductive host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, , in preventing further outbreaks/outbreaks that may occur from animal to human transmission and has useful directions.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ክለሳ ናይ HCoVs እንስሳዊ መበቆል፣ ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ዝህሉ ምምሕልላፍን ሕማም ናይ ምምጻእ ዓቕምን ዝድህስስ ርኢቶ ክነቕርብ ኢና።
en-mt: In this review we will provide an overview of HCoVs animal origin, interspecies transmission and disease-causing potential.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: ብፍላይ፣ ብዛዕባ እቶም ናይ HCoV ዓሌታዊ ቫይረሳት ፍልይ ብዝበለ መልክዑ ኣብቲ ልሙድ መሕደሪኦም ሕማም ዘየስዕቡ ምዃኖምን ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ኣብ ዝህሉ ምምሕልላፍ ግን ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ከምዝኾኑ ትኹረት እንህበሉን ንመያየጠሉን እዩ።
en-mt: In particular, we focus on and discuss the fact that the HCoV strains of viruses are uniquely non-pathogenic in their usual habitat but pathogenic in inter-strain transmission.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: ከይዲ ናይ HCoV ዝግመታዊ ኣመጻጽኣ ከይዲ ዝምልከት፡ማለት እውን መብዛሕቲኡ ግዜ ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ምቕናስ ምስ ወሰኽ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ከምዝመጽእ እውን ንድህስስ ኢና።
en-mt: We also explore the process of HCoV hypothesized origin process, that is, that a decrease in the likelihood of disease following usually comes with an increase in the likelihood of transmission.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: ናይዚ ቀጻሊ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ውጽኢት እውን ኣብዚ ሓሳብ እዚ ምይይጥ ተገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: The implications of this ongoing SARS-CoV-2 epidemic were also discussed in this context.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
