targetString: ናይ እንስሳት CoVs ካብ መወዳእታ 1930 ጀሚሮም ፍሉጣት እዮም።
en-mt: Animal CoVs have been known since the late 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: ቅድሚ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ዓይነት HCoV-229E ዝኾነ B814 ካብ ሰዓል ዝሓመመ ሰብ ንፋጥ ምርካቡ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ኮሮና ቫይረሳት ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ዝተለኽፉ እንስሳት ከም ታኪን፣ ኣንጭዋ፣ ላሕሚ፣ ድሙን ከልብን ተረኺቦም ኔሮም'ዮም።
en-mt: Before the first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was found in the sputum of a person with a cold, various coronaviruses had been found in infected animals such as chickens, ducks, cows, donkeys and dogs.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: ኣብዘን ዝሓለፉ ዓሰርተታት ዓመታት፣ ሸውዓተ HCoVs ተፈሊጦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Over the past decades, seven HCoVs have been recognized.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: ሓጺር መጠቓለሊ ታሪኽ ኣመጻጽኣ HCoV ብቕደም ሰዓብ (ሰንጠረዥ 1) ሓባሪን መሃሪን ይኸውን።
en-mt: A brief summary of the origin history of HCoV is informative and informative, respectively (Table 1).

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ HCoV-229E ዘርኢ ኣብ 1966 ካብ ናይ ላዕለዋይ ኣካል መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ዝተወሰደ እዩ፣ ድሕሪኡ ግን ተላሚዱ ኣብ ናይ ሳንባ ዋህዮ መስመራት WI-38 ክዓቢ ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The first HCoV-229E strain was derived from upper-body respiratory tract patients in 1966, but has subsequently been adapted and grown in the lung cell lines WI-38.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: እቶም ብ HCoV-229E ዝተለኸፉ ሕሙማት ኣብቶም ካብ 10~20% ዝኾኑ ጉዳያት ለበዳ፡ ን ሕማም ርእሲ ፣ ምህንጣስ፣ ናይ ሕማም ስምዒትን ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛን፣ ረስኒን ሰዓልን ዘጠቓልሉ ልሙዳት ናይ ሰዓል ምልክታት ዘርእዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Patients infected with HCoV-229E in 10~20% of the outbreak cases present with typical febrile symptoms including headache , dyspnea, feeling of sickness and sore throat, nausea and fever.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: ኣብ 1967፣ HCoV-OC43 ካብ ናይ ኦርጋን ካልቸr ተረኺቡ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ኣንጭዋ ሓጎል ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: In 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ cultures and subsequently in mouse brains.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ዝርአ ረኽሲ ናይ HCoV-OC43 ምስ HCoV-229E ተመሳሳሊ ዝኾነ ምልክታት ሕማም ኣለዎም። እዚኦም ድማ ካብ ካልኦት ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽስታት ዘስዕቡ ከም ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ኤን ራይኖቫይረስ ዝመሳስሉ ቫይረሳት ዝተፈለየ ናይ ሕማም ምልክት የብሎምን።
en-mt: Clinically visible infections of HCoV-OC43 have clinical manifestations similar to HCoV-229E. These have no illness symptoms unlike other viruses that cause respiratory infections, such as influenza N rhinoviruses.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: HCoV-229E ን HCoV-OC43 ን ብዓለም ለኸ ተሰራጭዮም፣ ኣብዚ ናይ ሓገይ ወቕቲ ኣብ ደጉዓዊ ነባሪ ኣር ኣብ ዘሎሉ ብሰፊሑ ክስፋሕፍሑ ይረኣዩ።
en-mt: HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 have spread internationally, and appear to be widespread this summer in the presence of resident R in the desert.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ፣ ናይ እዞም ክልተ ቫይረሳት መጫጭሒ ግዘ ትሕቲ ሓደ ሰሙን እዩ፣ ቀጺሉ ድማ ዳርጋ ናይ 2-ሰሙን ሕማም ይስዕብ።
en-mt: In general, the incubation period of these two viruses is less than a week, followed by an illness of almost 2 weeks.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: ኣብ ፍቓደኛታት ውልቀሰባት ዝተገብረ ምርምር፡ ብ HCoV-229E ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ቅልል ዝበለ ናይ ሰዓል ምልክታት ከምዝነበሮም የረድእ።
en-mt: In consenting individuals, subjects infected with HCoV-229E had mild febrile symptoms.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: ካብቶም ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ትሑት ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት እቶም ዉሑዳት ጥራሕ ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ኣጋጢሙዎም።
en-mt: Only a minority of immunocompromised patients developed severe lower respiratory infections.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS፣ “ዘይልሙድ ኒሞንያ” ተባሂሉ እውን ዝፍለጥ፣ ናይ መጀመርያ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ታሪኽ ዓለምለኸዊ ለበዳ ከም ዝፈጠረ ብኣግባቡ ዝተመዝገበ HCoV-እዩ ጠንቁ ድማ SARS-CoV ከምዝኾነን፣ ሳልሳይ HCoV ድማ ከምዝተፈለጠ ይግለጽ።
en-mt: SARS, also known as “unusual pneumonia”, is the first HCoV in human history to be significantly documented as causing a global pandemic-caused by SARS-CoV, and the third HCoV identified.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ SARS ጉዳይ ለበዳ ኣብ መወዳእታ 2002 ኣብ ጋንግዶንግ ናይ ቻይና ኣውራጃ እዩ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The first SARS case outbreak occurred in late 2002 in Gangdong, China's province.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: ለበዳ SARS ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራትን ኣህጉራትን ብምዝማት ናይ 8,096 ሰባት ጉዳያት ለበዳ ዝተሓበረ እንተኸውን 774 ድማ ንሞት ተቓሊዖም እዮም።
en-mt: The SARS outbreak has ravaged many countries and continents with 8,096 cases reported and 774 deaths.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: እቶም ብልዑል መንገዲ ዘመሓላልፉ ገዲፍካ ሕድሕድ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንኣስታት ክልተ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ክዳርግ ይኽእል። እዚ ድማ ካብ 4 እስካብ 7 ማዓልቲ ዝኸዉን ናይ ኢንኩቤሽን እዋን የድልዮ እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ መጠን ድማ ኣብ 10ይ መዓልቲ ይፍጠር።
en-mt: Each outbreak can lead to about two new outbreaks, except for those that are highly transmissible. This requires an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the maximum viral load occurs on the 10th day.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: ብSARS-CoV ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ናይ ጨዋዳ ቓንዛ፣ ሕማም ርእሲ፣ ረስኒ፣ ድኻምን ቑሪን፣ ሕጽረት ኣየር፣ ሰዓልን ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማምን ምልክታት የርእዩ።
en-mt: People infected with SARS-CoV show symptoms of muscle aches, headache, fever, fatigue and chills, shortness of breath, fever and respiratory illness.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: ሊምፎፒንያ፣ ዝተዛበዐ ናይ ጉበት ስራሕ ምርመራታት፣ ልዑል ናይ ክሬቲን ካይኔዝ ልሙዳት ናይ SARS ኣብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዘርእዮም ዘይልሙዳት ተርእዮታት እዮም።
en-mt: Lymphopenia, distorted liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common uncommon laboratory manifestations of SARS.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: ዲፊዩዝ ናይ ኣሊቪዮላር ጉድኣት፣ ናይ ኢፒቴልያል ዋህዮ ምብርባርን ናይ ማክሮፌጃት ምብዛሕን ኣብ ናይ SARS ሕሙማት ዝተረኣዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Diffuse alleviolar damage, epithelial cell scraping, and proliferation of macrophages have been reported in SARS patients.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: ዳርጋ 20-30% ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ጽኑዕ ክንክንን ሜካኒካዊ ventilation(ምጽራይ ኣየር) ዝሓቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Almost 20-30% of patients require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: ካብ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ብተወሳኺ ከም ማዓንጣ፣ ፀላም ከብድን ኩላሊትን ዝመሳሰሉ ክፍለኣካላት እዉን ከቢድ ሕማም እንተጋጥም ክጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ እዮም። ኣብ ከምዚ ዓይነት ኩነታት ብዝሒ ሳይቶካይን ስለዝህሉ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ትሑት ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ዝኸፍአ ፀግም ከምፅእ ይኽእል።
en-mt: In addition to the lower respiratory tract, organs such as the intestines, liver and kidneys can also be affected in the event of severe illness. In such cases, the abundance of cytokines can lead to worse problems in immunocompromised patients.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ መጀመርያ ካብ ግዋንግዡ ናብ ሆንግኮንግ ዝተጎዓዘ ሕሙም ብመጥባሕቲ ካብ ሳንባ ብዝተወሰደ ባየፕሲ ዝተፈለየ እዩ።
en-mt: The virus was first isolated from a surgical lung biopsy from a patient who traveled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: ድሕሪኡ፣ ብዙሓት ጻዕሪታት ንናይ HCoV መጽናዕቲ ክውዑል ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: Since then, many efforts have been devoted to HCoV research.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ኣብ መወዳእታ 2004 ካብ 7-ወርሒ ዝዕድሚኣ ኔዘርላንዳዊት ህጻን ተወሲዱ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 was obtained in late 2004 from a 7-month-old Dutch child.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: መጀመርያ ኣብ ህጻናት፣ ሽማግለታትን ኣብ ብናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማም ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማትን ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሞም ዝተዳኸመ ሰባትን እዩ ብብዝሒ ዝርአ ኾይኑ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: It was first found to be more common in children, the elderly, and in patients with respiratory diseases and people with weakened immune systems.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: ናይ ኮሪዛ፣ ኮንጃክቲቫይቲስ፣ ረስኒን ብሮንኮላይትስን ምልክታት ኣብ ብ HCoV-NL63 ዝምዕብሉ ሕማማት ልሙዳት እዮም።
en-mt: Symptoms of coryza, conjunctivitis, rash, and bronchiolitis are common in cases developed with HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: ካልኦት ዓርሶም ዝኸኣሉ መጽናዕቲታት ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ ካብ 8-ወርሒ ዝዕድሚኡ ብኒሞንያ ዝተጠቐዐ ህጻን ካብ ናይ ኣንቻ ስዋብ ናሙና ዝተወሰደ ተመሳሳሊ ቫይረስ ክረኽቡ ምኽኣሎም ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Other independent studies in the Netherlands have found the same virus in an ancha swab sample from an 8-month-old child with pneumonia.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: ዋላኳ ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ ዝተፈልጠ እንተኾነ ብዓለም ደረጃ ተስፋሕፊሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Although known in the Netherlands, it has spread worldwide.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ክሳብ 4.7% ዝኾኑ ልሙዳት ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት ዘስዐበ እዩ፣ ዋና ኣጋጣሚታቱ ድማ ኣብ ክረምቲ መጀመርያ፣ ኣብ ጽድያን ሓጋይን እዮም ዝፍጠሩ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 caused up to 4.7% of common respiratory illnesses, with principal episodes occurring in winter first, in spring and summer.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ምስ ክሩፕ(croup) ዝበሃል ምዕጋት ነድሪ ላንቃ ይተሓሓዝ።
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is associated with croup, an inhibitor of laryngeal inflammation.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: ኣብ እቲ ዓመት HCoV-HKU1 ኣብ ወዲ 71 ዓመት ዝኮነ ብምኽንያት ኒሞንያንያን ብሮንካይተስን ናብ ሕክምና ዝኣተወ ሰብኣይ ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: That year, HCoV-HKU1 was detected in a 71-year-old man in Hong Kong who was admitted to hospital for pneumonia and bronchitis.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: HCoV-HKU1 ካብ ናይ ማሕበረሰብ ኒሞንያን ብሮንካይተስን ብተወሳኺ ምስ ኣክዩት ኣዝማ ጥምረት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: HCoV-HKU1 is associated with acute asthma in addition to community pneumonia and bronchitis.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: ምስ HCoV-NL63፣ HCoV-229E፣ ከምኡውን HCoV-OC43 ብተመሳሳሊ፣ HCoV-HKU1 ቀለልቲ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ሕማማት ብምስዓብ፣ እውን ኣብ ዓለም ሙሉእ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Similarly to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E, and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 caused mild respiratory illnesses, also occurred worldwide.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: እዞም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ከባቢ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ምስሰባት ብጽቡቕ ተላሚዶም እዮም ከቢድ ሕማም ንምስዓብ ሚችዌት ናይ ምግባር ክእለቶም ድማ ትሑት እዩ፣ ብዘይተፈለጡ ምኽንያታት ሓደጋታታት ኣጋጢሞም ዋላ እንተኾኑ ብዙሓት ዓይነታት HCoV-NL63፣ ኣብ ቀረባ ግዘ ኣብ ቻይና ከቢድ ናይ ታሕተዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ሕማም ኣስዒቦም እዮም።
en-mt: These four locally derived HCoVs have adapted well to humans and have low ability to cause severe disease. Although accidents have occurred for unknown reasons, many strains of HCoV-NL63 have recently caused severe lower respiratory disease in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: ብጠቕላላ HCoVs ናይ ምትሕልላፍን ኣብ ሰብነትና ኣቲዩ ናይ ምንባርን ዓቕሙ ክብ እንተብል ጉድኣት ናይምብፃሕ ክእለቱ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: Overall, the ability of HCoVs to transmit and survive in the body increases, decreasing their ability to cause harm.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS-CoV ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ኣብ 2012 ኣብ ሳዑዲ ዓረብያ ከቢድ ናይ ሳምባ ምቺን ናይ ኩላሊት ሕማም ኣብ ዝሓዞም ወዲ 60 ዓመት ሕሙም ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: MERS-CoV was first detected in 2012 in a 60-year-old patient with severe pneumonia and kidney disease in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ብቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ካብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ዝመጹ እዮም፣ ካብ ደገ ዝኣተዉ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ምስ ሓሓሊፉ ዘጋጠሙ ቀረባ ርክባት ዝግበሩ ናይ ካልኣይ ደረጃ ምልባዓት ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሃገራትን ቱኒዝያን ጸብጻብ ተገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Most laboratory-confirmed outbreak cases originated from the Middle East, imported outbreak cases with occasional close contacts secondary outbreaks have been reported from various European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: ኣብ 2015 ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ብ186 ዝተረጋገጸ ኩነት ካልኣይ ደረጃ ለበዳ ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: In 2015, there were 186 confirmed cases of secondary outbreaks in South Korea.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: ናይ MERS ክሊካላዊ ምልክታት ናይ SARS እዮም፣ ብእንዳገደደ ዝኸይድ ከቢድ ኒሞንያ የስዕቡ።
en-mt: The clinical symptoms of MERS are those of SARS, causing progressively more severe pneumonia.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: ካብ SARS ፍልይ ብዝበለ መንገዲ፡ ብዙሕሓት ብMERS ዝተጠቕዑ ሕሙማት ሃንደበታዊ ናይ ኩላሊት ሕማም የጋጥሞም። እዚ ፀባዩ ድማ ካብ ካልኦት ብHCoV- ዝመፁ ሕማማት ፍሉይ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS develop sudden kidney disease. This characteristic sets it apart from other HCoV- caused diseases.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: ልዕሊ 30% ዝኾኑ ሕሙማት ከም ተቕማጥን ንዓቐብ ምባልን ዝበሉ ናይ ከስዐ መዓንጣ ምልክታት ዝቐርቡ እዮም።
en-mt: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms such as diarrhea and cramping.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: ካብ ፌብሩዋሪ 14, 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ልዕሊ 2500 ኣብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ልዑል ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 34.4% ኣረእዮም እዮም፣ ን MERS-CoV ኣብ ሰባት ካብ ዝፈለጡ ኣዝዮም ክፉኣት ቫይረሳት ክኾኑ ጌርዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Since February 14, 2020, more than 2,500 laboratory-confirmed cases have shown a high comparative mortality rate of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most deadly viruses known in humans.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 ማእኸል፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ብዝተተሓሓዘ ኒሞንያ ዝሓመሙ ሕሙማት ኣብ ውሃን፣ ሁቤይ ኣውራጃ ቻይና ተራእዮም።
en-mt: In December 2019, the Center reported cases of pneumonia associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: ዉድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነዚ ብSARS-CoV-2 ዝመፅእ ቀፃሊ ዝኾነ ናይ ታሕተዋይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ጎንፊ ፣ ናይ ዓለምለኸ ህዝቢ ጥዕና ናብ ሓደጋ ዝዳርግ ብምባል ሽሙ ድማ COVID-19 ብምባል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has declared the ongoing lower respiratory infection pandemic caused by SARS-CoV-2 , a global public health threat, and named it COVID-1

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 3 2020 ብዓለም ደረጃ 90,053 ዝኾኑ ናይዚ ሕማም ኩነታትን 3.4% ሞትን ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: As of March 3 2020, there have been 90,053 cases and 3.4% deaths worldwide.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ ሁበይ በዚ ሕማም ጥራይ ዝተከስተ መጠን ሞት 4.2% ክኸውን ከሎ፣ ካብኣ ወጻኢ ግን 1.2% እዩ።
en-mt: In particular, the death rate from the disease alone in Hubei is 4.2%, compared to 1.2% outside it.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ከም SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV ብረስኒ፣ ሰዓልን ሕጽረት ትንፋስን ዝግለጽ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ የስዕብ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2, like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, causes severe respiratory infections manifested by fever, cough, and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: ተቕማጥ ኣብ ገለ ሕሙማት ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Diarrhea was seen in some patients.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ኒሞንያ ካብቶም ከበድቲ ምልክታቱ ሓደ እዩ ብቕልጡፍ ድማ ናብ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትነፋስ ዲስተረስ ሲንድረም ክዓቢ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Pneumonia is one of its most serious symptoms and can rapidly progress to severe respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: ዋላ'ኳ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን SARS-CoV-2 ብናይ ልዑል ኒኩሎታይድ ሲኬንስ ሆሞሎጂ 82% ተመሳሰልቲ እዮም፣ ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ፓይሎጀኒክ ጨንፈራት እዮም ግን ዝቕመጡ።
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are 82% identical by high nucleotide sequence homology, they are located on different pylogenic branches.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV እንትነጻጸር ዝነኣሰ ናይ ሕማም ምምጻእን ዝለዓለ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has lower disease emergence and higher transmission potential compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: ብ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ሪፖርት ተገይሮም እዮም ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ንዘሎ ፈጣን ስርጭት ኣስተዋጽኦ ይገብሩ ይኾኑ እዮም።
en-mt: Asymptomatic cases of SARS-CoV-2 infection have been reported and may be contributing to the rapid spread around the world.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ እቶም ካልኦት ሽዱሽተ ናይ HCoVs ቫይረሳት ምንጽጻር ብልዑል ተገዳስነት ዝርኣዩ ተመሳሳልነትን ፍልልይን የርእዩ።
en-mt: Comparisons of SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs show similarities and differences of high interest.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ እቲ ናይ መራብሒ ግዘን ናይ HCoV ሕማም ከይዲን ኣዝዮም ተመሳሰልቲ እዮም።
en-mt: First, the reproductive period and the course of HCoV disease are very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: ነዚ ብዝምልከት፣ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ ካልኦት ሽድሽተ HCoVs ሓፈሻዊ መገዲ እዩ ዝኸተል።
en-mt: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general pathway of the other six HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ከቢድነት ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV ን እቶም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝውሰዱ HCoVs (ንኣብነት፣ HCoV-229E፣ HCoV-OC43፣ HCoV-HKU1 ን HCoV-NL63 ) ዝርከብ እዩ።
en-mt: Second, the severity of COVID-19 symptoms is intermediate between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (e.g., HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 ).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ፣ ዘይንጹር፣ ቀሊል ምልክት ወይ ምንም ምልክት ዘይምርኣይ እውን ሓዊሱ፣ ኣብቶም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ዘለዉ ባህርያታት የርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, SARS-CoV-2 infections often show characteristics of community-acquired HCoVs, including vague, mild or no symptoms.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ፣ ዋላ እቲ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ትሑት እንተኾነ፣ ከም ናይ SARS-CoV ረኽሲ ግዳያት ንእሽተይ ክፋል ካብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ግዳያት ክረአ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, even if the comparative rate is low, it may be seen as a small proportion of victims of SARS-CoV infection than victims of severe COVID-1

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምምሕልላፍ ዘገርሙ ናይ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰድ HCoVs ን SARS-CoV ን ባህርያዊ ምምስሳላተ እውን ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows remarkable characteristic similarities between community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሓላላፍነት ክንዲ እቶም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ልዑል እዩ።
en-mt: On the one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: ብኻልእ መዳይ ድማ፣ ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoVን MERS-CoVን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዓቕሙ ከምዝቕንስ ገና ኣይተፈልጠን።
en-mt: On the other hand, it is not yet known whether SARS-CoV-2, like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, reduces its ability to be transmitted from person to person.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ከም ካልኦት HCoV፣ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ናይ ቀልቀል ናሙናታት ውሽጢ ክርከቡ ይኽእሉ ፡፡
en-mt: Finally, like other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be found in sprout samples.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ቀልቀል ናብ ኣፍ ምምሕልላፍ፣ ከም ናይ SARS-Co V፣ ብውሑዱ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓደሓደ ኩነታት፣ ወሳኒ ግደ ኣሎዎዶ የብሉን ዝብል ኣብ ቀጻሊ ብዝግበሩ ምርምራት ክበርህ ትጽቢት ዝግበረሉ'ዩ።
en-mt: Whether oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2, like SARS-Co V, plays a critical role, at least under certain circumstances, is expected to be clarified in future research.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ወቕትታት ዓመት SARS-CoV-2 ዘርእዮ ለውጢ ካብ ብ HCoVs ዝተጠቕዑ ሕብረተ ሰብ ክርከብ ትጽቢት ይግበር።
en-mt: Changes in SARS-CoV-2 during different seasons of the year are expected to be found in communities infected with HCoVs.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነግን ባህርታት SARS-CoV-2፣ ከም ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዓቕሙ፣ ሓደገኛነቱን ቀጻልነት ዝርግሐኡ ኣብ ሰባት ድሕሪ ምሕላፉን ሓዊስካ፣ ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይዚ ቀጻሊ ለበዳ COVID-19 ናይ መወዳእታ ዕጫ ጽልዋ ክህልዎም'ዩ።
en-mt: However, the characteristics of SARS-CoV-2, including its ability to transmit, its danger and its continued spread after passing on to humans, will have an impact on the ultimate fate of this ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: እቶም ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝርከቡ HCoVs ቀሊል ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ዘርእዩ እንትኾኑ ምስ ደቂ ሰባት ድማ ብዝግባእ ዝተለማመዱ እዮም።
en-mt: The four community-acquired HCoVs exhibit mild disease symptoms and are well adapted to humans.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: ብኻልእ ኣጠማምታ ክርአ ኸሎ፣ ደቂ ሰባት ምስዞም ኣርባዕተ HCoVs ጽቡቕ ጌሮም ተላሚዶም ክኾኑ ከምዝኽእሉ ሓቂ ክኸውን ይኽእል'ዩ።
en-mt: From another perspective, it may be true that humans may have adapted well to these four HCoVs.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: ብካልእ ኣበሃህላ፣ ክልቲኦም ካብ እቶም ጥንቲ ዝተራእዩ ናይ HCoV ለበዳታት ብህይወት ዝተረፉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In other words, both may be survivors of ancient HCoV outbreaks.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: ኣብ ወዲ ሰብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘምፅኡ HCoVs ከምኡ'ውን ብምኽንያት HCoV ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘማዕበሉ ሰባት ተወጊዶም'ዮም።
en-mt: HCoVs that caused severe disease in humans and people who developed very serious disease due to HCoV were excluded.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: እዚ ንክኾን፣ HCoVs ናይ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ደረትቲ ረቛሒታት ንምምካት ዘኽእል ምእካብ ናይ ዝተለምዱ ለውጥታት (adaptive mutations) ብዝፈቅድ መንገዲ ኣብ ደቂሰባት ብእኹል መጠን ክራብሑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: For this to occur, HCoVs must replicate in humans in sufficient quantities in a manner that allows the accumulation of adaptive mutations to counteract the limiting factors of a host animal.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት እዚ፣ እዚ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ብዝቐጸለ ቁጽሪ ከምኡድማ ብዙሓት ሰባት እንዳለኸፈ ብዝኸደ ቁጽሪ፣ ምስ ሰባት መሉእ ንሙሉእ ናይ ምልማድ ዕድሉ ሰፈሕ እዩ።
en-mt: For this reason, the more this SARS-CoV-2 outbreak continues and the more people it infects, the more likely it is to become fully infected with people.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: ብግቡእ እንተድኣ ተላሚዱ፣ ብውሸባ ወይ ብካልኦት ናይ ረኽሲ መቆጻጸሪ ስጉምትታት ምግታእ ኸቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: If properly adapted, it becomes difficult to control with quarantine or other infection control measures.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: ንብዙሕ ዓመታት እቶም ኣርባዕተ ኣብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝርከቡ CoVs ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት እናተዘዋወሩ ንጥዕናኦም ዝተሓለወ ሰባት ብምጥቃዕ ሰዓል የምጽኡ እዮም።
en-mt: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs have circulated in humans, affecting healthy individuals and causing fever.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: እዞም ቫይረሳት ናይ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ኣየድልዮምን።
en-mt: These viruses do not require animal shelter.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: ብንጽጽር፣ ልዑል ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ዘለዎም SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoVን ምስ ሰባት ብኣግባቡ ኣይተላመዱን ኣብ መንጎ ሰባት ዘለዎም ምትሕልላፋት እውን ቀጻልነት ክህልዎ ኣይኽእልን እዩ።
en-mt: In contrast, SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which are highly pathogenic, have not adapted significantly to humans and their interhuman transmissions may not be sustainable.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: ኣብ እንስሳዊ መዕቖቢታቶም ብምጽናሕን ብምብዛሕን፣ ቀጺሎም ድማ ሓደ ወይ ካብኡ ንላዕሊ መንጎኛን መባዛሕቲን መሕደሪታት ብምጥቃም ናብ ብቐሊሉ ተጠቃዕቲ ግዳያት ዝኾኑ ደቂ ሰባት ናይ ምፍሳስ ዕድል ድማ ክጽበዩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: They must expect the opportunity to spread to vulnerable human victims by staying and breeding in their animal shelters and then using one or more intermediate and breeding habitats.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ SARS-CoV/MERS-CoVን ምስ እቶም ካልኦት ኣርባዕተ ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝውሰዱ HCoVs ተመሳሳሊ ባህርያታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 shares characteristics with SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and with the other four community-acquired HCoVs.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: እንተነኣሰ ንግዜኡ፣ ከምቲኦም ካብ ማሕበረሰብ-ዝርከቡ HCoVs፣ ብሉዕል መጠን ዝመሓላለፍ እዩ።
en-mt: At least temporarily, it is highly transmissible, as are community-acquired HCoVs.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: ኮይኑ ግና፣ ብ ሕማም ኣምጸኣይነቱ፣ ካብ ኣብ ማሕበረሰብ ዝተረኽበ HCoVs ዝበኣሰን ካብ SARS-CoV ወይ MERS-CoV ድማ ዝሓሸን እዩ።
en-mt: However, in terms of pathogenicity, it is worse than community-acquired HCoVs and better than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: ሙሉእ ንሙሉእ ናብ ሰባት ክላመድ ድዩ ወይስ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰባት ብዘይ መዐቖቢ ወይ መንጎኛ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ክዘዋወር ይኽእል ድማ ዝብል ገና ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: It remains to be seen whether it will fully adapt to humans or whether it can move within humans without a shelter or intermediate animal shelter.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: ቅድሚ ናይ HCoVs እንስሳዊ መበቆላት ምግላጽና፣ ናይቶም ብዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ዝማዕበሉ፣ ባህርያውያን፣ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዑ (reservoir)፣ ሞንጎኛታትን አጋደድቲ መዕቆብቲ ትርጉማትን ጠባያትን ምግላጽ ይጠቅም።
en-mt: Before describing the animal origins of HCoVs, it is useful to describe the definitions and characteristics of the natural, reservoir, intermediate, and aggravating reservoirs that have evolved through hypothetical changes.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: ሓደ እንስሳ ከም ብዝግመታዊ ለውጢ ዝማዕበለ (evolutionary) ናይ HcoV መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል፣ ብደረጃ ኣሰራርዓ ኒዩክሎታይ (nucleotide sequence) ልዑል መበቆላዊ ምምስሳል ዘለዎ ብቐረባ ዝዛመዶ ቅዱም ወለዶ/ኣበው ምስዘዕቁብ እዩ።
en-mt: An animal serves as an evolutionary host for HcoV when it harbors a closely related ancestor with high ancestral similarity at the nucleotide sequence level.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: እዚ ካብ ዘርኢ ዝውረስ ቫይረስ መብዛሕቲኡ ግዜ ኣብ መሕደሪኡ ብጽቡቕ ኩነት ዝተላመደን ሕማም ዘየስዕብን እዩ።
en-mt: This seed-borne virus is usually well adapted to its habitat and does not cause disease.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ፣ ሓደ በቲ ቫይረስ ዘይጥቃዕ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ብቐጻልነትን ንነዊሕ ግዘን ናይ HcoV መጸግዒ ኮይኑ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Similarly, a shelter animal that is not infected with the virus may remain a harbor of HcoV on a continuous and long-term basis.

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: ኣብ ክልቲኦም ጉዳያት፣ እዞም መሕደሪታት እዚኦም ብተፈጥሮ ዝልከፉ ኮይኖም ናይ HCoV ወይ ናይ ዘርኣዊ ቫይረስ ተፈጥሮኣዊ መሕደሪ እዮም።
en-mt: In both cases, these hosts are naturally infectious and are the natural host of HCoV or the seminal virus.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: ብምንጽጻር ክርአ ኸሎ፣ እቲ HCoV ቀቅድሚ ንደቂ ሰባት ምጥቃዕ ምጅማሩ ወይድማ ኣብቲ ከባቢ ከጥቅዓሉ ዝጀመረ እዋን ንመጀመርያ ግዘ እንተድኣ ንሓደ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ኣጥቂዑ፣ ምስዚ ሓድሽ መዕቆቢ ብጽቡቕ ስለዘይተላመደ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ሕማም የስዕብ እዩ።
en-mt: In comparison, if the HCoV first infects an intermediate host before it begins to infect humans or when it begins to infect the environment, it often causes illness because it is not well adapted to this new host.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: እቲ ማእኸላይ ተሸካማይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝኾነ እንስሳ ከም ምንጪ ረኽሲ ናይ ወድሰብ ኮይኑ የገልግል ብተወሳኺ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ንሓፂር እዋን ኣብ ዉሽጢ እቲ ተሸካሚ/መዕቆቢ ክራባሕ ብምፍቃድ ደሓር ድማ ናብ ሰባት ኣማሓላሊፉ መጠን ዝልከፉ ሰባት ከምዝዓቢ ብምግባር ናይቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምጥቃዕ ዓቕሙ ንኽጎልሕ ዓቢ እጃም ይፃወት።
en-mt: The central carrier of the virus serves as a source of human infection and also plays a major role in enhancing the infectivity of the virus by allowing the virus to multiply within the carrier/shelter for a short time and then transmit it to humans.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: ሓደ HCoV ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ተመሓላላፍነቱ ክቕጽል እንተዘይክኢሉ፣ ናይ ምልካፍ ዓቕሙ ኣብ ሞት ዝመወዳእታኡ ኩነት ክበጽሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: If an HCoV cannot continue to be transmitted within the intermediate host, its infectivity may reach a fatal state.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ ድማ፣ HCoVs ምስቲ መንጎኛ መሕደሪ ክላመድ ይኽእል፣ ዋላ'ውን ነዊሕ ግዘ መጽንሒ ክገብሮም ይኽእል።
en-mt: On the other hand, HCoVs can adapt to the intermediate host, even making them persistent for a long time.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: ኣብዚ ጉዳይ እዚ፣ እቲ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ባህርያዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይልከፍ መዕቆቢ (reservoir host) ይኸውን።
en-mt: In this case, the intermediate host is a naturally non-infectious reservoir host.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: ናይ ሕማም ዝርገሐ፣ ጠንቂ፣ ናይ ሓደጋ ረቛሒታት እኩብ ሓበሬታ (epidemiological data) ንድሕሪት ተመሊሱ ከምዝሕብሮ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ SARS ሕሙም (index case) ምስ ናይ መዘናግዒ እንስታታት ናይ ርክብ ታሪኽ ከምዝነበሮ ገሊጽዎ'ዩ።
en-mt: Epidemiological data on disease prevalence, causes, and risk factors retrospectively showed that the first SARS patient (index case) had a history of contact with recreational animals.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: ተኸታተልቲ ናይ ኣብ ህዝቢ ዘሎ መጠን ቫይረስ (seroprevalence) ምርመራታት ከምዘርእዩዎ፣ ናይ እንስሳት ነጋዴታት ምስ እቲ ሓፈሻዊ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ልዑል ናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV IgG ተሸከምቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Consecutive seroprevalence tests have shown that animal traders are high carriers of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared to the general population.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ እንስሳት ብህይወቶም ዝሽየጥሉ ዕዳጋታት ዝነበሩ ዝተሸፈኑ ዝባዳት (ፓጉማ ላርቫታ)ን ራኩን ኣኻልብን ዳርጋ ምስ SARS-CoV ሓደ ዝኾኑ SARS-CoV ዝመስሉ ቫይረሳት ከምዝሸከሙ ንመጀመርያ ጊዜ ተለልዮም።
en-mt: Covered zebras (paguma larvata) and raccoon dogs in live animal markets were identified for the first time as carrying SARS-CoV-like viruses that were almost identical to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: ነዚ ሓቂ'ዚ ብተዘዋዋሪ መንገዲ ዘረጋግጽ ጭብጢ ድማ፣ ኣብተን ዕዳጋታት ዝነበሩ ኩሎም ዝባዳት ድሕሪ ምቕታሎም ዝኾነ ተወሳኺ ሕማም SARS ክርአ ዘይምኽኣሉ'ዩ።
en-mt: Indirect evidence of this fact is that no further SARS cases were reported after all the zebras in the markets were killed.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ዝተሸፈኑ ናይ በረኻ ወይ ናይ ሕርሻ ዝባዳት ብዘይ ናይ ብሂወት ዘለዉ ናይ እንሰሳት ዕዳጋ ምቅላዕ ብሰፊሑ ን SARS-CoV ኔጌቲቭ እዮም ኔሮም፣ እዚ ድማ ዝተሸፈኑ ዝባዳት ከም መንጎኛ መባዛሕቲ መሕደሪታት እምበር ከም ማእኸላይ መዕቖብቲ SARS-CoV ከምዘይኮኑ የርኢ።
en-mt: however, covered wild or agricultural grasslands were broadly negative for SARS-CoV without live animal market exposure, indicating that covered grasslands act as intermediate multiplicative habitats and not as central reservoirs for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: ብግልጺ፣ ካብ 80% ናይ እዞም ዝተፈላለዩ ኣብ ናይ ግዋንግዙ ዕዳጋ ዘለዉ እንስሳት ጸረ-SARS-CoV ኣንቲቦዲታት ስለዘለዎም፣ ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ኣናእሽተይ መጥወብቲ ከም መንጎኛ መራብሕቲ መሕደርቲ ናይ SARS-CoV ናይ ምዃን ተኽእሎታት ከምዘሎ ኣብ ግምት ክኣቱ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Apparently, since more than 80% of these different animals in the Guangzhou market have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, it must be considered that small mammals of different breeds have the potential to act as intermediate breeding grounds for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኩሎም እዚኦም እቶም ናይ መወዳእታ ናይ SARS-CoV መሕደሪ ይመስሉ።
en-mt: All of these appear to be the ultimate residence of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: ን ናይ SARS-CoV ተፈጥሮኣዊ እንስሳ መሕደሪ ንምርካብ ኣብ ዝግበሩ ተኸታተልቲ ኣለሻታት፣ ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ናይ ፈረስ ጫማ ለዃዂቶታት ዝርከብ፣ SARS-ዝዛመዱ ርሂኖሎፈስ ለዃዂቶታት CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3) ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ፣ ቀረባ ዝምድና ዘለዎ ናይ ለዃዂቶ CoV ገሊጾም እዮም።
en-mt: In a series of searches for the natural animal habitat of SARS-CoV, they have described a closely related mosquito CoV, called SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which is found in Chinese horseshoe rats.

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: እዞም ለዃኺቶታት ንናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV ኣንቲቦዲታትን ናይ ጄኖም ተኸታታሊ SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 ፖዚቲቭ እዮም።
en-mt: These mice are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and the genomic sequence SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: እዚን ካልኦት ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ምስ SARS-CoV 88-92% ዝመሳሰል ናይ ኒክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ኣካላዊ ተመሳሳሊነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: This and other infectious CoVs have 88-92% physical similarity to SARS-CoV in their nicklotide arrangement.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: እዞም መጽናዕቲታት ለዃኺቶታት ኣብ ምምጻእ ዝርከቡ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ባእታት ከሕድሩ ከምዝኽእሉ ዘርኢ ሓድሽ ሓሳብ መሰረት ኣንቢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: These studies have laid the foundation for a new idea that insects can infect emerging pathogens in humans.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ብዙሓት SARS ዝመስሉ CoVs (SL-CoVs) ካብ ለኻኺቶታት ተለልዮም ክርከቡ ኺኢሎም እዮም፣ እንተኾነ ግን ካብዚእቶም ብዘይካ ሓደ WIV1 ዝተባህለ እንተዘይኮይኑ ካልእ ብህይወቱ ፈሊኻ ክውሰድ ዝተኻለ የለን።
en-mt: In addition, many SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have been identified from infectious agents, but none of these have been isolated alive except for one, WIV1

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ናይ ደቂ ሰብ ኣንጂዮቴንሲን ቀያሪ ኤንዛይም 2 (ACE2) ናይ SARS-CoV ተቐባሊ ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እዩ።
en-mt: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is the well-known host of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: ካብ ናይ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ ሰገራ ናሙና ዝተወስደ WIV1፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ፣ ዝባድን ወዲሰብን ACE2 ከም ናይ ዋህዮ መእተዊ ተቐበልቲ ከምዝጥቀም ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: WIV1 from insect fecal samples, insect, worm and human ACE2 have been shown to use as cell entry receptors.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: ብዝገርም መንገዲ፣ ካብ SARS ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት ዝተረኽበ ደም (ሴራ) ን WIV1 ከጥፍእዎ ክኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Interestingly, blood (sera) from SARS recovered patients were able to eradicate WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: ክሳብ እዚ እዋን፣ WIV1 እቲ ኣዚዩ ዝቐረበ ዝምድና ዘለዎ ናይ ለኻኺቶ SARS-CoV ኣበው ክውክል ከሎ፣ 95% ናይ ኒዩክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: To date, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of the infectious SARS-CoV, with 95% nucleotide sequence similarity.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ እዞም ክልተ ቫይረሳት ልዑል ምምስሳል ዋላ እንተሃለወ፣ WIV1 ናይ SARS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወላዲ ቫይረስ ከምዘይኮነ ብሓፈሽኡ ይእመን ከምኡ ድማ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወለዶ/ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዓ መሕደርቲ ኣይኮናን።
en-mt: Despite the high similarity between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the primary parent virus of SARS-CoV and that infections of SARS-CoV are not first-generation/directly non-infectious hosts.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: ናይ ወለዶታት ዘገምታዊ ለውጢ ዝምድናታት (Phylogenetic) ትንተና ን MERS-CoV ምስ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU4 ን ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU5 ጉጅለ ይምድቦ።
en-mt: Phylogenetic analysis classifies MERS-CoV with the infectious CoV-HKU4 and infectious CoV-HKU5 groups.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU4ን MERS-CoVን ናብ መዕቆቢ እንስሳ ዝኣትወሉ፣ dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) ዝበሃል ሓደ ዓይነት መቐበሊ (receptor) ይጥቀሙ።
en-mt: Infectious CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV use the same receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), to enter animal shelters.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: ናይ MERS-CoV ናይ RNA-dependent RNA polymerase ኣሰራርዓ ምስ ኣብ ኣፍሪካን ኣውሮፓን ዝርከቡ ናይ ለኻኺቶ beta-CoVs ዘሎ ናይ ወለዶታት ዘገምታዊ ለውጢ ዝምድናታት (phylogenetic) ምምስሳል ኣለዎም።
en-mt: The RNA-dependent RNA polymerase mechanisms of MERS-CoV are similar to the phylogenetic relationships of infectious beta-CoVs in Africa and Europe.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ ኣብ ናይ በረኻ ለዃኺቶታት ዋላ ሓደ MERS-CoV ብህይወት ክርከብ ኣይከኣለን።
en-mt: To date, no MERS-CoV has been detected alive in wild boars.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MERS-CoV ን እቲ ናይ ቀረባ ዘመዱ ዝኾነ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU25 ን 87% ጥራይ ናይ ኒክሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: MERS-CoV and its closest relative, the infectious CoV-HKU25, have only 87% nicklotide sequence identity.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ስለዚ፣ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ MERS-CoV ቀዳማይ ወለዶ/ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዓ መሕደርቲ ክኾና ይኽእላ እየን።
en-mt: Therefore, infections of MERS-CoV may be first-generation/directly non-infectious hosts.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: በቲ ካልእ ወገን፣ ኣብ ማእኸላዊ ምብራቕ ዝተኻየዱ መጽናዕቲታት፣ ናይ ኣዕራብ/ሶማል ኣግማል (dromedary camels) ልክዕ ከምቶም መበቆሎም ካብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ሓያለ ናይ ኣፍሪካ ሃገራት ዝርከቡ ኣግማል፣ ን MERS-CoV ብፉሉይ ዘምክኑ ኣንቲቦዲታት ከምዝተረኽቦም (ሴሮፖዚቲቭ ከምዝኾኑ) ኣርእዮሞ እዮም።
en-mt: On the other hand, studies in the Middle East have shown that dromedary camels, like camels of Middle Eastern origin in several African countries, are seropositive for antibodies that specifically neutralize MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ምስ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ዝተረኸበ ቫይረስ ሓደ ዓይነት ዝኾነ ሂወታዊ MERS-CoV ካብ ናይ ኣዕራብ/ሶማል ኣግማል ኣፍንጫ ንምርመራ ዝተወስዱ ቫይረስ (nasal swabs) ተለልዩ ክርከብ ተኻኢሉ ክኸውን ከሎ፤ እዚ ድማ ኣግማል ከም ናይ MERS-CoV ሓቀኛ በቲ ቫይረስ ዘይጥቅዑ መሕደርቲ ኮይኖም ከምዘገልግሉ ዘመልክት'ዩ።
en-mt: Live MERS-CoV, identical to the virus found in humans, has been identified from nasal swabs of Arabian/Somali camels. This suggests that camels serve as true MERS-CoV-free habitats.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ ንፈተነ ብ MERS-CoV ዝተለኸፉ ኣግማል ብሓፈሻ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ምስ ጽዑቕ ናይ ቫይረስ ስርጭት ከምዝተረኣየ ምግላጽ እውን ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: It is also important to note that in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV generally mild symptoms were observed with intense viral transmission.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: ብግልጺ፣ ዝተለኸፉ ኣግማል ነቲ ቫይረስ ብ ናይ መተንፈሲ መንገዲ ጥራሕ ዘይኮነስ ብካብ መቐመጫ-ናብ-ኣፍ መንገዲ እውን የመሓላልፍዎ እዮም፣ እዚ ድማ ለኻኺቶታት ነዚ ቫይረስ ዘላባዓሉ ዋና መገደን እዩ።
en-mt: Clearly, infected camels transmit the virus not only by the respiratory route but also by the seat-to-mouth route, which is the main route by which insects spread the virus.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: ይኹን ደኣምበር፣ ብዙሓት ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ MERS ሕሙማት ቅድሚ ስሚዒታት ሕማም ምኽሳቱ ምስ ኣግማል ናይ ምንኽካእ ታሪኽ ዘይብሎም ብምዃኑ፣ ሕዚ'ውን ሕቶታት ይሃልዉ ድኣምበር፣ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ምምሕልላፋት ውይድማ ን MERS-CoV ዝሽከሙ ዘይተፈልጡ ናይ እንስታታት ዓሌት ዘለውዎ ዘይተፈልጠ ናይ ምምሕልልፋ መስመር ክህሉ ይኽእል እዩ ዝብል ከም ክውንነታዊ ዝኾነ ውሁብ ምኽንያት ይውሰድ።
en-mt: However, since many confirmed MERS patients have no history of contact with camels before symptoms develop, there may still be questions about human-to-human transmissions or an unknown transmission route with unknown animal species carrying MERS-CoV is taken as a realistic given.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ካብ ራይኖለፈስ ኣፊንስ ለኻኺቶታት ዝተወሰደ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV RaTG13 96.2% ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has 96.2% nucleotide identity with infectious CoV RaTG13 from Rhinolephus affins infections.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: ከምቲ ኣብ ናይ SARS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን MERS-CoV ዘሎ ኩነታት፣ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ከምኡ'ውን RaTG13 ዘሎ ናይ ኣሰራርዓ ፍልልይ ስፍሓት (sequence divergence) ብጣዕሚ ገፊሕ ብምዃኑ ናይ ወላዲን-ውሉድን ዝምድና ኣለዎም ክትብል ዘኽእል ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: As in the case of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too extensive to suggest a parent-child relationship.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: እዚ ማለት፣ ኣብ መጻኢ ዳርጋ ሓደ ዓይነት ዝኾኑ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs እንተዘይተረኺቦም፣ ለኻኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቀጥታዊ በቲ ሕማም ዘይልከፋ መሕደርቲ ዘይክኾና ይኽእላ እየን።
en-mt: This means that, unless nearly identical infectious CoVs are found in the future, SARS-CoV-2 infections may not be direct non-infectious hosts.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: እቶም ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ሞንጎኛ መዕቆብቲ እንስታታት ምናልባት ካብቶም ኣብ ሁናን ዝርከብ ናይ ጅምላ ዕዳጋ ዝተሸጡን ዝተሓርዱን ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌት እንስሳታት ዘገዳም ክኾኑ ኣለዎም፤ ብዙሓት ካብቶም ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ COVID-19 ሕሙማት ምስዚ ዕዳጋ ዝተኣሳስሩ እዮም፣ እዚ ድማ ካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ ዝተመሓላለፈሉ ኣጋጣሚ ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ዘመልክት'ዩ።
en-mt: The SARS-CoV-2 intermediate reservoir animals must probably be from different species of wildlife that were sold and slaughtered at a wholesale market in Hunan; Many of the first cases of COVID-19 were associated with this market, suggesting that it may have been an occasion for animal-to-human transmission.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣብ ቀረባ ግዘ ዝተገበሩ ኣብ ሜታጂኖሚካዊ ኣሰራርዓ (beta-CoVs) ዝተመርኮሱ መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእይዎ፣ ሓደ ጽንተት ዘንጸላልዎ ዘሎ ማንጎሊንስ [pangolins (Manis javanica)] ዝበሃል ጉጅለ ንኣሽቶ መጥበውቲ እንስታታት ን ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝዛመድ ኣበው beta-CoVs ከጸግዕ ይኽእል'ዩ።
en-mt: Many recent studies based on metagenomic approaches (beta-CoVs) have shown that an endangered group of small mammals called pangolins [pangolins (Manis javanica)] may rely on ancestral beta-CoVs associated with SARS-CoV-2 .

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: እዞም ሓደሽቲ ናይ ፓንጎሊን CoV ጂኖማት ምስ SARS-CoV-2 85-92% ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: These new pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence similarity with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: ነገር ግን፣ ንሳቶም'ውን ብደረጃ ናይ ኑክሊዮታይድ ኣሰራርዓ 90% ምምሳል (identity) ብምርኣይ ምስ RaTG13 ብማዕረ ናይ ቀረባ ዝምድና ኣለዎም።
en-mt: However, they are also equally closely related to RaTG13, showing 90% identity at the nucleotide arrangement level.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: ንሳቶም ኣብቲ ናይ ወለዶታት ሓረግ (phylogenetic tree) ናብ ክልተ ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝመስሉ ንኡሳን-ሓረጋት ወለዶ ዝጉጀሉ ክኾኑ ከለዉ፣ ሓደ ካብእቶም ድማ 97.4% ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት ብምርኣይ፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝያዳ ተመሳሳሊ ሪሰፕተር ባይንዲንግ ዶሜይን [receptor binding domain (RBD)] ኣለዎ።
en-mt: They cluster in the phylogenetic tree into two SARS-CoV-2-like sub-lineages, one of which shows 97.4% amino acid arrangement similarity, with the most similar receptor binding domain to SARS-CoV-2 [ 1 ]. receptor binding domain (RBD)].

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: ኣብ ክቱር ንጽጽር፣ ዋላ ልዑል ዲግሪ ናይ ጄኖም ኣሰራርዓ ተመሳሳልነት(sequence homology) ይሃልዎም፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ን RaTG13 ን RBD ታት ፍልልዮም እናገፍሐ ዝኸዱ እዮም።
en-mt: In extreme contrast, despite their high degree of sequence homology, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 differ widely.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ኣቐዲሙ ኣብ ዝሓመሙ ፓንጎሊናት ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ እውን ካብ ናይ ሳንቡእ ናሙና viral contig ምርካቡ ጸብጺቡ እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሳሳልነት ዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: An earlier study in sick pangolins also reported the detection of viral contig from a lung sample, with similarities to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: እዚ መጽናዕቲ ዝተፈላለዩ መተኣኻኸቢ መንገድታን ኣመራርፃን ብምጥቃም ክፋል ናይ'ቲ ጀኖም ሲክወንስ ፈጢሩ። እዚ ድማ 86.3% ናይቲ ሙሉእ ቁመት ናይቲ ቫይረስ ጀኖም ይዉንን።
en-mt: This study used various assembly methods and selections to create part of the genome sequence. This accounts for 86.3% of the entire length of the virus genome.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ፓንጎሊን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መንጎኛ ናይ እንስሳ መዕቖቢ ናይ ምዃን ዕድል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Pangolins have the potential to be an intermediate animal reservoir for SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ኣብ'ዚ ሕዚ እዋን ብምኽንያት ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን ፓንጎሊን ምስ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዙ ቤታ-CoVs ዘሎ ናይ ኣሰራርዓ/ሲክወንስ ፍልልይ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ብቐጥታ ካብ ፓንጎሊን ከምዝመጸ ዝነግር መረዳእታ የለን።
en-mt: However, there is currently no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 originated directly from pangolins due to sequence differences between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolins and SARS-CoV-2-associated beta-CoVs.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ሞንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን RaTG13 ዘሎ ርሕቐት ካብ ኣብ ሞንጎ SARS-CoV-2ን ምስ ናይ ፓንጎሊን SARS-CoV-2-ዝመሳሰል beta-CoVsን ይሓጽር።
en-mt: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is shorter than between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-like beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ለኻኺቶን ፓንጎሊናትን ካልኦት መጥበውቲን ኢቮልሽናዊ መገዱ ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in leeches, pangolins, and other mammals remains unknown.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ሲክወንስ ተመሳሳልነት ድማ ኣብ RBD ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን ፓንግልዮንን ዝተረኸበ ኮይኑ፣ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ ቤታ-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 ን RaTG13 ን ድማ ልዑል ናይ መላእ ጄኖም ኣሰራርዓ/ሲክወንስ ተመሳሳልነት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: The highest sequence similarity was found in the RBD between SARS-CoV-2 and Panglion, while SARS-CoV-2-associated beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 have high whole-genome arrangement/sequence similarity.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ፓንጎሊ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ beta-CoVs RBD ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ዘሎ ልዑል ምምስሳል፣ብ selectivity-mediated (ተመሪጹ-ዝመሓላለፍ) convergent evolution (እናጸበበ ዝኸድ ዝግመታዊ ለውጢ) ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: The high similarity in Pangoli's SARS-CoV-2-associated beta-CoVs RBD to SARS-CoV-2,is caused by selectivity-mediated (selectively-transmitted) convergent evolution.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ፓንግሊዮን ምስ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ beta-CoV ን RaTG13 ን ኣብ ሳልሳይ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ዓሌት recombination(ጀነቲካዊ ምድቓል) ንክካየድ ካለእ ሓሳብ የድሊ እዩ።
en-mt: Another consideration is needed for recombination between Panglion's SARS-CoV-2-associated beta-CoV and RaTG13 in a third wildlife species.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: ከም ናይ ግምታዊ ለውጢ(evolution) ዝገንሕ ሓይሊ፣ ምድቓል ናይ ቤታ-CoVs ተስፋሕፊሑ።
en-mt: As a rebuking force of hypothetical evolution, the hybridization of beta-CoVs has expanded.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቀጥታዊ ዙኖቲካዊ መበቆል ገና ኣይተፈልጠን።
en-mt: The direct zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 remains unknown.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: ካብቲ ልዑል ናይ ሕምም ናይ ምሳዓብ ክእለት ዘለዎ HcoVs ብተወሳኺ፣ ናይ HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 ን HCoV-HKU1 ን ዙኖቲክ መበቆሎም መጽናዕቲ ተገይርሎም እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the HcoVs with high disease-causing ability, the zoonotic origins of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have been studied.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: ፋይሎጀኒቲካዊ መረዳእታ HCoV-NL63 ን HCoV-229E ን ካብ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs መጽዮም ከምዝኾኑ የርኢ፣ ናይ HCoV-OC43 ን HCoV-HKU1 ን ድማ ካብ ኣናጹ እዮም መጽዮም።
en-mt: Phylogenetic data indicate that HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E are derived from infectious CoVs, whereas those of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 are derived from monkeys.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካዊ- ሰለስተ ዝሕብሩ ለኻኺቶ ዝተረኽበ ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) ዝተባህለ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV ምስ HCoV-NL63 ምምስሳል ከምዘለዎ ይሕበር።
en-mt: ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV), a tick CoV detected in a North American- three-colored tick, is reported to have similarities to HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: ብኻልእ ወገን፣ HCoV-229E ምስ ካልእ Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008 ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ፣ ኣብ ጋና ዝተረኸበ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoV ጀነቲካዊ ምትሕሓዝ ዝነበሮ እዩ፣ ኣግማል ድማ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ክኾና ይኽእላ እየን ዝብል ጥርጣረ ኣሎ።
en-mt: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another infectious CoV known as Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, detected in Ghana, and it is suspected that camels may be an intermediate host.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: ንንጹር መግለጺ፣ ናይ HCoVs ናይ እንስሳ መበቆሉ ክሳብ ሕዚ ዘሎ ፍልጠት ኣብ ስእሊ 1ን ሰንጠረዥ 2 ይርክብ።
en-mt: For a clear description, the knowledge to date of the animal origin of HCoVs is found in Figure 1 and Table 2 .

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: ፋይሎጀነቲክ ትንተና ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ብዛዕባ ዘሎ ናይ HCoVs ናይ ምምሕልላፍ መረዳእታታት ኣብ ታሪክ ከምዘሎ ይሕብር።
en-mt: Phylogenetic analysis reveals that data on the transmission of HCoVs among species are available in history.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: HCoV-OC43 ካብ እንስሳ ዘቤት ሓሊፉ ንወድሰብ ከጥቅዕ ምስጀመረ ኣብ 1890 ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲ ለበዳ ተኸሲቱ።
en-mt: An epidemic of respiratory infections occurred in 1890 when HCoV-OC43 began to affect humans beyond domestic animals.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: ታሪኽ ናይ ኣብ ሞንጎ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት እንስሳ ናይ HCoV-229E ምምሕልላፍ ንጹር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: The history of interspecies transmission of HCoV-229E is unclear.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: ናይ ሎዃኺቶ alpha-CoVs ምስ HCoV-229E ዝለዓለ ምምስሳል ሃሊዎም ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Local alpha-CoVs have been found to have the highest similarity to HCoV-229E.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎኦም alpaca alpha-CoV ኣሎ።
en-mt: Among them is alpaca alpha-CoV.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ብቐጥታ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ናብ ሰባት ከምዝትሓላለፍ መረዳእታት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: Evidence suggests that the virus is transmitted directly from infected persons to humans.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: ቅድሚ ኣልፓካስ፣ ሰባት ምስ ለኻኺቶ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ናይ ስነ ምህዳር ሰፈር ምትንኽኻፍ ነይርዎም።
en-mt: Before alpacas, people had contact with leeches in the same ecosystem.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: ኣብ ክንድኡ፣ ሰባት ምስ ኣልፔካታት ቀረባ ርክብ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Instead, people have a close relationship with alpecas.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ ምስ HCoV-229E-ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ለኻኺቶ alpha-CoVs ኣብ ለኻኺቶ ፍሉያትን ሕማም ዘየስዕቡን እዮም፣ ይኹን ደኣምበር alpaca alpha-CoV ኣብ ዝተለኸፉ እንስሳት ናይ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ሕማም ለበዳ የስዕብ እዩ።
en-mt: Second, HCoV-229E-associated tick alpha-CoVs are specific to ticks and do not cause disease, however alpaca alpha-CoV causes respiratory disease outbreaks in infected animals.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ alpaca alpha-CoV ኣብ ኣራዊት እንስሳት ኣይተረኸበን።
en-mt: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been detected in feral animals.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ድማ፣ ኣልፔካታት ነዚ ምስ HCoV-229E-ዝተተሓሓዘ alpha-CoV ካብ ደቂ ሰባት ሓሊፍዎም ክኸውን እውን ይኽእል እዩ ዝብል ሓሳብ ክንጸግ ኣይክእልን።
en-mt: Therefore, the possibility that alpecas may have passed on this HCoV-229E-associated alpha-CoV from humans cannot be ruled out.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: ብሓቂ፣ ለዃኺቶታት ናይ ሰባት ሕማም መምጽኢ ቫይረሳት ቀጥተኛ ምንጪታት እዮም ከም ራቢስ ቫይረስ፣ ኢቦላ ቫይረስ፣ ኒፋ ቫይረስን ሄንድራ ቫይረስን ሓዊስካ።
en-mt: In fact, ticks are direct sources of human disease-causing viruses, including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipha virus, and Hendra virus.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: በዚ ድማ ለዃኺቶታት HCoV-229E ብቐጥታ ናብ ሰባት ከመሓላልፋ ምኽኣለን ዘገርም ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: Thus, it is not surprising that ticks can transmit HCoV-229E directly to humans.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ዋላ'ኳ ናይ ለኻኺቶ alpha-CoVs ናይ HCoV-229E ምጸገዕቲ እንተኾኑ ከም ኣልፓካስን ናይ ዓረብ ገመልን ዝኣመሰሉ እንስሳት MERS-CoV ከመሓላልፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Although infectious alpha-CoVs are dependent on HCoV-229E, animals such as alpacas and Arabian camels can transmit MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: MERS-CoV ከም ብሉጽ ኣብነት ናይ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምምሕልላፍ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ናብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ከምኡ'ውን ካብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ናብ ሰባት ክውሰድ ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: MERS-CoV can be considered as an excellent example of interspecific transmission from insects to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: ናይ MERS-CoV መበቆላዊ ኣመጻጽኣ ካብ ለኻኺቶ ምዃኑ ካብ ፋልማይ ዝተለለየሉ ግዘ ኣትሒዙ ዝፍለጥ ኮይኑ፣ እዚ ከኣ ድሒሮም ዝተረኽቡ መረዳእታታት እናተጠናኸረ መጽዩ።
en-mt: The origin of MERS-CoV has been known to be infectious since it was first identified, and this has been reinforced by subsequent evidence.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: ለኻኺቶታት ን ኣብ መንጎ ዓሌታት ዝግበር ናይ ጀነቲካዊ ባእታታት ልውውጥን፣ ምምሕልላፍትን፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ቫይረሳት ዓሌታት ሒዞም ከምዝርከቡ ግልጺ እዩ።
en-mt: Infections and the exchange of genetic elements between species, transmission, obviously carry many strains of viruses.

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: ለኻኺቶ ናይ'ዚ ቫይረስ ቀንዲ መመሓላለፊ ዝኾነሉ ምኽንያት ነዊሕ ዕድመ፣ ጽዑቕ መንበሪ፣ ምቅርራብን ናይ ምብራር ዓቕምን ስለዘለዎ እዩ።
en-mt: The leukemia is the main vector of the virus because of its longevity, dense residence, proximity and ability to fly.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ ድማ፣ MERS-CoV ንዓሰርተታት ዓመታት ናብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ተኣታትዩ እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced into dromedary camels for decades.

sourceString: It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host.
targetString: ምስዞም ኣግማል ብዕዉት ዝተላመደ ብምዃኑ፣ እዞም ኣግማል ካብ ግዝያዊ ናብ ቀዋሚ መቐመጢ ተለዊጦም።
en-mt: Having successfully adapted to these camels, these camels were converted from temporary to permanent residences.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.
targetString: ኣብዞም እንስሳት MERS-CoV ቀሊል ሕማም እዩ ዘምጽእ; ምልውዋጥ(mutation) ናይ ምክያድ ክእለቱ ድማ ትሑት አዩ።
en-mt: In these animals, MERS-CoV causes mild disease; Its ability to mutate is low.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.
targetString: ናይ'ዚ ሕማም ዘይስሩዕ ምትሕልላፉ ናብ ሰብ ወዝቢ ብምዃኑን፣ ወድ ሰብ ናይ MERS-CoV ናይ መወዳእታ ተሸካሚ ስለዝኾነን እቲ ዝርግሐ/ለበዳ ቀጻልነቱ ድሩት እዩ።
en-mt: Because of the irregular transmission of the disease to humans, and because humans are the ultimate carriers of MERS-CoV, the spread/outbreak is limited in continuity.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.
targetString: በንጻሩ ድማ ኣብ ናይ MERS-CoV-2ምምሕልላፍ ፓንጎሊናት ዝጻወትዎ ተራ(ናይ ብሓቂ ተራ እንተሃልይዎ) ካብ ናይ ኣግማል ተራ ዝተፈልየ እዩ።
en-mt: Conversely, the role(if any) of pangolins in MERS-CoV-2 transmission is different from that of camels.

sourceString: Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins.
targetString: ብፍላይ፣ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ -CoVs ኣብ ፓንጎሊናት ልዑል ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ክእለት ዘለዎም እዮም።
en-mt: Specifically, pangolin beta -CoVs are capable of causing high disease in pangolins.

sourceString: They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም ናይ SARS-CoV ዝባድ ኬዛት፣ ናይ መወዳእታ መሕደሪ ናይ SARS-CoV-2-ዝተተሓሓዘ ቤታ-CoVs ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Like severe cases of SARS-CoV, they can be the final residence of SARS-CoV-2-associated beta-CoVs.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ እንስሳታት ናብ ሰባት ምምሕልላፍ መገድታት ኣብ ቐጻሊ ምርምራት ክትንተኑ ትጽቢት ይግበር።
en-mt: Various animal-to-human transmission routes of SARS-CoV-2 are anticipated to be analyzed in ongoing investigations.

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: መጀመርያ፣ ለኻኺቶ ምስ ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝመስል ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝዛመድ ቫይረስን መሕደሪ ኮይኑ ከገልግል ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: First, the infection can serve as a host for SARS-CoV-2-like and SARS-CoV-2-related viruses.

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.
targetString: ሰባት ብምሕራድ ወይ ፈሓም ዕደና ምስ ለኻኺቶታት ኢኮሎጂካዊ ኒች ክካፈሉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: People can share ecological niches with insects through slaughter or charcoal mining.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ ፓንጎሊን ዝተብሃለ እንስሳ ካብቶም ናይቲ ቫይረስ ዓቕሚ ዘጉልሑ ናይ ማእኸላይ ቫይረስ ተሸከምቲ እንሳታት ሓደ ብምዃኑ ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝመስል ቫይረስ ተረኺብዎ።
en-mt: In addition, the pangolin was found to be one of the intermediate vector animals highlighting the potential of the virus, resulting in the detection of a SARS-CoV-2-like virus.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ሰባት ስጋ ኣብ ዝሓርድሉን ዝበልዕሉን ግዘ እዩ ዝሓልፎም።
en-mt: The virus is passed on to people when they slaughter and eat meat.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ዘቤታውያን እንስሳት ሓዊስካ ብዙሓት መጥወብቲ እንስሳት ን SARS-CoV-2 ተቓላዕቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Many mammals, including domestic animals, may be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ዱር እንስሳትን እንስሳት ዘቤትን ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት መጽናዕቲ ምግባር ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: Antibiotic studies in wildlife and domestic animals are necessary.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ኣብ ላዕሊ ከምዝተጠቐሰ፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምትሕውዋስን(recombination) ምልማድን ኣብ ሳልሳይ ዓሌት ዝተፈጠረ ክኸውን ይኽእል፣ ማለት ምስ ክልኢቶም ለኻኺቶን ፓንጎሊንን ርክብ እንተነይርዎ።
en-mt: Third, as mentioned above, SARS-CoV-2 recombination may have occurred in a third species, ie if it had contact with both the tick and the pangolin.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መበቆል እንስሳ ምድላይ ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣብ መስርሕ ይርከብ።
en-mt: The search for the animal of origin of SARS-CoV-2 is still in progress.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: ካብ እዞም ዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነታት ናይ እንስሳ መዕቖቢ፣ CoVs ናብ ካልእ ዓሌት ንከይሰግር ንምግዳብ ሰለስተ ዓበይቲ ሜላታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: From these different types of animal shelters, there are three major methods to limit the spread of CoVs to another species.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: ቅድሚ ኹሉ፣ ኣብ RNA ምርባሕ(replication) ዘለዎም ልዑል ናይ ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutation) ንጽጽራዊ መጠን።
en-mt: First of all, their relatively high rate of genetic mutation in RNA replication.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: ምስ ካልኦት ንጽል ገመድ ዘለዎም(single stranded) RNA ቫይረሳት ክወዳደር ከሎ፣ ናይ CoVs ምልዋወጥ መጠን(mutation rate) ካብ ማእኸላይ ክሳብ ዝለዓለ ከምዝኾነ ይሕሰብ። ኣብ ሳይት 2 ብኣቨሬጅ ኣብ ዓመት ~10-4 ናይ ምትካእ ፍጥነት ኣለዎ፣ ነዚ ድማ CoV ምስ'ቲ ሓድሽ ተሸካማይ ዘለዎ ምልምማድ ይዉስኖ።
en-mt: Compared to other single stranded RNA viruses, the mutation rate of CoVs is thought to be moderate to high. Site 2 has an average replacement rate of ~10-4 per year, which is determined by CoV's adaptation to the new carrier.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: CoVs proof-reading exoribonuclease ኣለዎም። ናይዚ ምጥፋእ ድማ ዝለዓለ ምልማድን ምቅይያርን ዋላ'ውን ሞት የስዕብ።
en-mt: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease. The loss of this leads to increased habituation and changes and even death.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: እቲ ረምዲስቪር(Remdesivir) ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ ናይ ኒኩሎታይድ ኣናሎግ ንኢክዞራይቦኒዩክሊዝን (exoribonuclease) ናይ RNA ጽግዕተኛ RNA ፖሊመሬዝን(RNA-dependent RNA polymerase) ደው ብምባል ምርባሕ CoVs ይከላኸል።
en-mt: The nucleotide analog remdesivir prevents the reproduction of CoVs by inhibiting exoribonuclease and RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: ካብ'ቶም ኣብ ክሊንካዊ መጽናዕቲ ዘለዉ ጸረ SARS-CoV-2 መድሃኒታት፣ እቲ ዝለዓለ ተስፋ ዘለዎ Remdesivir እዩ።
en-mt: Of the anti-SARS-CoV-2 drugs in clinical trials, the most promising is Remdesivir.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: እንተኾነ እውን፣ ናይ CoVs መጥነ ምልውዋጥ(mutation rate) ልዕሊ ናይ መሕደሪታቶም ብሚልዮናት ይበልጹ።
en-mt: However, the mutation rate of CoVs is millions of times higher than that of their hosts.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ምስ መጸገዕቲ ዘይምልማድ ኣብዝህሉ ግዘ፣ CoVs ልዑል መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ይህልዎም።
en-mt: In addition, when there is no adaptation to dependencies, CoVs have a high degree of variability.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: ምስ ልዑል መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ዘለዎ SARS-CoV ምስዝወዳደር፣ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 መጠነ ምልውዋጥ ትሑት እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ልዑል ምስ ሰባት ናይ ምልማድ ዓቅሚ ከመዘለዎ የርኢ።
en-mt: Compared to SARS-CoV, which has a high mutation rate, SARS-CoV-2 has a low mutation rate, indicating a high adaptability to humans.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: ምናልባት ናብ ሰባት ካብ ምስ ሰባት ምቅርራብ ዘለዎም እንስሳት ቀዲሙ ተመሓላሊፉ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: It may have been transmitted to humans earlier than animals close to humans.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም SARS-CoV-2፣ እዚ እንኮላይ ን MERS-CoV እውን ይምልከት። MERS-CoV ምስ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ብጽቡቕ ዝተላመደ እዩ።
en-mt: Just like SARS-CoV-2, this even applies to MERS-CoV. MERS-CoV is well adapted to dromedary camels.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: ብዓይኒ ስነ ሓሳብ ብምራእ፣ እቲ ናይ ጀነቲክስ ኣፈላላይ ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝስራሕ ክታበት ወይ ድማ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ዘይዉጽኢታዊ ኣይገብሮን።
en-mt: From a theoretical point of view, the genetic differences do not make SARS-CoV-2 vaccines or antiviral drugs ineffective.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: ካልኣይ፣ እቲ ኣብ CoVs ዘሎ ዓብዪ ናይ RNA ጄኖም፣ ኣብ ንጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutations)ንጀነቲካዊ ምድቓል(recombination) ዝግበሩ ናይ ጄኖም ምምሕያሻት ተወሳኺ ተለጣጢነት ብምስዓብ፣ በዚ ድማ ዕድል ናይ ካብ ዓሌት ናብ ዓሌት ዝግበር ሓባራዊ ለውጢ(evolution) ይውስኽ፣ ኩነታት ኣብ ዝጥዕሙሉ እቲ ሓድሽ CoVs ንኽምዕብል ድማ ይጥዕሞ።
en-mt: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs results in increased flexibility in genome modifications for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the likelihood of species-to-species co-evolution, where conditions are favorable It suits the development of new CoVs.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ 3’ ጫፍ ናይቲ ጄኖም ዝተቐመጡ ብዙሓት ፈለምቲ ናይ ንባብ ሳንዱቕ(reading frames)ን ስራሕ ፕሮቲንን ዝድግፍዎ ሓቂ እዩ።
en-mt: This is a fact supported by many pioneering reading frames and protein functions positioned at the 3' end of the genome.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: ሳልሳይ ድማ ኣብ እዋን ምርባሕ RNA፣ CoVs ሃንደበታውን ብብዝሕን ቅርጾምን ቦትኦምን ይቕይሩ።
en-mt: Third, during RNA replication, CoVs abruptly and massively change their shape and position.

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: ኣብ'ቲ መተሓዋወሲ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል መዕቖቢ እንስሳ፣ ኣብ እዋን CoV RNA ትራንስክሪፕሽን ናይ ስትራንድ ምቅይያር ብተደጋጋሚ ይፍጠር እዩ።
en-mt: In the host animal that serves as a mixture, strand changes occur frequently during CoV RNA transcription.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: ብጣዕሚ ዝመሳሰሉ ሙሉእ ቁመትን ሳብጀኖሚክን ዝኾኑ RNA ተጣሚሮም ሓድሽ CoVs ይፈጥሩ።
en-mt: Highly similar full-length and subgenomic RNAs are paired to form new CoVs.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: ኣብ HCoV-HKU1ን HCoV-OC43ን ከምኡ'ዉን ኣብ ከም ለኻኺቶ SL-CoV and ለኻኺቶ CoV-HKU9 ዝኣመሰሉ ንእንስሳ ዘጥቅዑ CoVs ቫይረሳት ናይ ተፈጥራዊ ሪኮምብኔሽን ፋይሎጀነቲክስ መረዳእታ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: Natural recombination phylogenetic data were obtained in HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43 and in animal-infecting CoVs viruses such as infectious SL-CoV and infectious CoV-HKU9.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ መዕቖብን ቫይረስን ዘሎ ርክብ ምስ ተመሓላለፍነት ክነጻጸር ከሎ
en-mt: Relationship between host and virus compared to transmissibility

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ ናይ'ቶም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተጠቐሱ ሰለስተ ናይ ቫይረስ ረቛሒታት፣ እቲ ቫይረስ ምስ ናይ መሕደሪኡ ተቐበልቲ ዘለዎ ርክብ ንመንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነቱ ዝውስን ዓቢ ረቛሒ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the three viral factors mentioned above, the virus's relationship with its hosts is a major factor in determining its interracial transmission.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV ጥምረት ከም ኣብነት ምዉሳድ ይከኣል እዩ። እዚ ድማ ኣብ እዋን መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነት ኣወንታዊ ምርጫ ከምዝካየድ የረድእ።
en-mt: The SARS-CoV combination is an example. This suggests positive selection during interracial transmission.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ሰባትን ዝባድን SARS-CoVsዝተገበረ ንጽጽር , SARS-CoV ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ መሕደሪታት ብቐሊሉ ከምዝለማመድ ኣርእዩ፣ ብፍላይ ናይ RBD ናይ S ፕሮቲን ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ (mutations) ብምጥቃም።
en-mt: A comparison between human and zebrafish SARS-CoVs , showed that SARS-CoV readily adapts to a variety of niches, specifically using genetic mutations of the RBD of the S protein.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ፣ ኣብ ናይ CoV S ፕሮቲን ዘሎ RBD ምስ እቲ ዋህዮኣዊ ተቐባሊ ይራኸብ እዩ፣ በቲ ናይ እቲ መሕደሪኡ ኣንቲቦዲ ምላሽ ድማ እዩ ዝምረጽ።
en-mt: Generally, the RBD in the CoV S protein interacts with the cellular host, and is selected by the antibody response of its host.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: ኣብ SARS-CoV፣ RBD ኣብ መበል 318 ክሳብ 510 ኣሚኖኣሲድ ኣብ S1 ፍራግመንት እዩ ዝርከብ፣ ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ን ተሓባበርቲ ተቐበልቱን ብምጥባቕ ድማ ንምእታው ቫይረስ ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is located at the 318th to 510th amino acids in the S1 fragment, and aids virus entry by binding to human ACE2 and its co-receptors.
