sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: እቲ ናይ SARS-CoV ዝኾነ RBD፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ፣ ዝባድ፣ ኣንጭዋን ራኩንን ከልቢን ዘጠቓልል ዝተፈላለዩ እንስሳት ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ናይ ምፍላጥ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎ፣ እዚ ድማ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምምሕልላፍ ዘፍቅድ እዩ።
en-mt: The RBD of SARS-CoV has the potential to recognize ACE2 receptors of a variety of animals, including leeches, zebrafish, mice, and raccoons and dogs, allowing for interspecies transmission.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ብርግጽ ኣብ'ቲ RBD ናይ ካብ ሰባትን ዝባድን ዝተወስዱ ቫይረሳትን፣ 6 ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ጽራር(residue) ፍልልያት ጥራሕ ከምዘለዎ ተራእዩ፣ እቶም 4 ድማ ምስ ናይ ACE2 ተቐባሊ ዘራኽብ ሰፈር እዮም ዝርከቡ።
en-mt: Indeed, in the RBD of viruses derived from humans and Zbad, it was found to have only 6 amino acid residue differences, 4 of which are located in the neighborhood that binds to the ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ናይ ዝባድ SARS-CoV K479N ን S487T ን ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutations) ኣብ RBD ኣለዎ፣ እዞም ስፓይክ ፕሮቲናት ምስ ናይ ሰብ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ናይ ምትእትታው ዓቕሙ ልዑል ክገብሮ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Zbad SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T genetic changes(mutations) in the RBD, these spike proteins may enhance its ability to interact with human ACE2 receptors.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: ብካልእ ኣበሃህላ፣ እዞም ክልተ ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ተተካእቲ ናይ'ቲ ቫይረስ ምስ ሰባት ዘለዎ ተለማማድነት ወሰንቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In other words, these two amino acid substituents may be critical to the virus' adaptability to humans.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoVs-2 ምስ SARS-CoV ሓደ ዓይነት ናይ ዋህዮ ተቐባሊ ከምዘለዎም ትኹረት ክወሃቦ ይግባእ።
en-mt: It should be emphasized that SARS-CoVs-2 share the same cellular receptor as SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: ኣብ S1 ዩኒት ናይ S ፕሮቲን ናይ 30% ፍልልይ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን SARS-CoV ን ዘሎ፣ S ፕሮቲኑ ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ናይ ምትሕሓዝ ዓቕሙ ከምዝልውጦ የርኢ።
en-mt: The 30% difference in the S1 unit of the S protein between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV, shows that its S protein modulates its ability to interact with human ACE2.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: ኣብ cryo-EM ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ኣብ ሰባት ዝርከብ ACE2ን ናይ SARS-CoV S ፕሮቲን ዘለዎ ጥምረት ብ10 ክሳብ 20 ዕጽፊ ይልዕል።
en-mt: in cryo-EM studies is 10- to 20-fold higher than the combination of ACE2 and the SARS-CoV S protein in humans.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ንኽመሓላለፍ ካልእ ተወሳኺ ተቐባሊ ዘድሊ ምዃኑ እዉን ክነረጋግጽ ይግባእ።
en-mt: We should also confirm that another additional host is required for SARS-CoV-2 to be transmitted.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: ብዘገርም ኩነታት፣ HCoV-NL63 ብዝተፈለየ ናይ S ክፋል ምስ ACE2 እውን ይተሓሓዝ እዩ።
en-mt: Surprisingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 through a separate S segment.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ HCoV ተቐበልቲ ኣለዉ ከም ኣሚኖፔፕቲዴዝ ኤን ን HCoV-229E ከምኡ ድማ 9-O-acetylated sialic acid ን HCoV-OC43።
en-mt: There are many HCoV receptors such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ እንስሳት ናብ ደቂ ሰባት ዝሓልፉ CoVs ዕዉት ምልማድ ክህልዎም ይኽእል።
en-mt: CoVs passed from different animals to humans can have successful adaptation.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ዋህዮ ተቐበልቲ ብተወሳኺ፣ ካልኦት ናይ መዕቖቢ ጽግዕተኝነትን እገዳን ረቛሒታትንውጽኢታውነት ናይ መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ተመሓላላፍነት ናይ HcoVs ይጸልውዎ እዮም።
en-mt: In addition to cellular hosts, other host dependence and restriction factors affect the efficacy of interspecies transmission of HcoVs.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን ተፈጥሮኣዊ መዕቖቢታት ናይ HCoVs ከም ለኻኺቶታት፣ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማልን ኣናጹን ዘሎ ናይ መዕቖቢ ፕሮቲን ፍልልያት፣ ንመንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምትሕልላፍ ዕንቅፋት ክኾኖ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Host protein differences between humans and natural hosts of HCoVs such as rodents, dromedary camels, and monkeys, may hinder interspecies transmission.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: HcoVs ዕዉት መንጎ ዓሌታዊ ምትሕልላፍ ንክህልዎ፣ ኣብ መዕቖቢ እንስሳ ዘለዉ ንጽግዕተኛነት ወሰንቲ ጉዳያትን ክቆጻጸርን ንገደብ ወሰንቲ ጉድያት ድማ ክስዕሮም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: For HcoVs to have successful interspecies transmission, dependency and key issues in shelter animals must be controlled and restrictive key issues must be overcome.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት ኣብ'ቲ ናይ ቫይረስን መዕቆቢኡን ዘሎ ዝምድና፣ ኣብ ሞለኲላር ደረጃ ወሰንቲ ዝኾኑ ረቛሒታት ከነለልዮምን ከነጽንዖምን ይግባእ።
en-mt: For this reason, we need to identify and study the factors that are critical in the relationship between the virus and its host, at the molecular level.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: ናይ CRISPR ስልጡን ቴክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም፣ ሚዛናዊ ዝኾነ ናይ እቲ መዕቆቢ ጄኖም-ሙሉእ ብምምርማር፣ ንSARS-CoV-2 ወሰንቲ ዝኾኑ ናይ ጽግዕተኝነትን ገደባትን ረቛሒታት ምፍታሽ ውጽኢታዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Using the hybrid technology of CRISPR, screening a balanced genome-whole of the host may be cost-effective to screen for the dependence and restrictive factors that are key to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: ናይ እዚ ሓድሽ HcoVs ኣመጻጽኣ: ናብ መበገሲኡ ተመሊስካ ምኻድ
en-mt: The origins of this new HcoVs: going back to the origins

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ዝርከብ ፍልልያት ንኣመጻጽኣ ሓድሽ HcoVs ገፊሕ ዕድል ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: Differences among infectious CoVs provide ample opportunities for the emergence of new HcoVs.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: እዚ ማለት፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ከም መራብሒ ጂን ፑል ናይ HCoVs ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: This means that, infectious CoVs can act as a breeding gene pool of HCoVs.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ቅልጡፍ ጀነቲካዊ ለውጢ(mutation)ን ጀነቲካዊ ምድቓላት( genetic recombination) ናይ HcoV ግመታዊ ለውጢ ብምኽታል፣ ኣብ'ዚ መስርሕ ክልተ ኣገደስቲ ስጉምትታት ኮይኖም የገልግሉ።
en-mt: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination serve as two important steps in this process, following the hypothetical changes of HcoV.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ ሓደሽቲ ፕሮቲን-ኮዲንግ ጂናት ምእካብ ወይ ምስኣን ነቲ ፌኖታይፓት ናይ'ቲ ቫይረስ ብሰፊሑ ክለዋውጥ የኽእሎ።
en-mt: For example, the accumulation or loss of new protein-coding genes allows the virus's phenotype to vary widely.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: ORF8 ሓደ ካብ'ቶም ናይ SARS-CoV ተሓጋገዝቲ ፕሮቲናት ኮይኑ፣ ኣብ ሰባት ንምልምማድ ኣገዳሲ ምዃኑ ይግመት። ስለምንታይ፣ ዋላ'ኳ ORF8 ፕሮቲን ኣብ ናይ ለኻኺቶ SARS-CoV እንተተረኽበ፣ ዓይነቱ ዝተፈልየ እዩ።
en-mt: ORF8 is one of the SARS-CoV accessory proteins, thought to be important for adaptation in humans. Why, although the ORF8 protein is found in the infectious SARS-CoV, it is of a different type.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoVs 29-ኒክሎታይድ ምድምሳስ ባህርያት ኣብ'ቶም መፈለምታ ናይ ደቂ ሰባት ለበዳ ዝተረኽቡ ዝተፈለዩ ስትረይናት ዝርከብ እዩ።
en-mt: The 29-nucleotide deletion characteristics of SARS-CoVs are found in various strains found in the early human outbreaks.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: እዚ ምድምሳስ ንORF8 ናብ ORF8aን ORF8bን ይገምዖ፣ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ሓደ መዕቆቢ ናብ ካልእ ንክመሓላለፍ ዝሕግዝ ናይ ምልማድ ሙቴሽን እዩ።
en-mt: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b, which are acclimation mutations that facilitate the translocation of the virus from one host to another.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: SARS-CoV ምስ ናይ ኣልፋን ጋማን መስመር ናይ ምትሕውዋስ ታሪኽ ኣለዎም። ኣብ RNA ጽግዕተኛ ዝኾነ RNA ፖሊመሬዝ ድማ ነነእሽቱ ናይ ምትሕውዋስ ሰፈራት(recombination regions) ብብዝሒ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV have a history of coinfection with the alpha and gamma lines. Small recombination regions were abundant in RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ nsp9፣ መብዛሕትኡ nsp10ን ሓደሓደ ክፋል nsp14ን ናይ ምትሕውዋስ ሰፈራት ተፈልዮም ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Also in nsp9, most of nsp10 and some part of nsp14 hybridization nests are isolated.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ፣ ኣብ ናይ MERS-CoV ለበዳ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ምትሕውዋሳት ከምዘጋጠምዎ ተራእዩ እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ስዑዲ ዓረብ ዲሪሞንድሪ ኣግማል ዝተረኣየ እዩ።
en-mt: Similarly, it has been shown that mixtures of different breeds have occurred in MERS-CoV outbreaks, which has been observed in Saudi Arabian dirimundry camels.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: ካብ SARS-CoVን MERS-CoVን ሓሊፉ'ውን ናይ ምትሕውዋስ መስርሕ ኣብ ካልኦት HCoVs እዉን ይርአ እዩ። HCoVs ምስ ኣብ እንስሳ ዝርከቡ CoVs በቲ ዘይተዋቐረ ጅን ምትሕውዋስ የካይድ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the process of infection is also seen in other HCoVs. HCoVs do replicate with CoVs in animals by the unstructured gene.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን ኣርቴፍሻል ሰሌክሽን ዘይተደልዩ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ጄኖም ለውጥታት ክፈጥሩ ይኽእሉ። እዚ ድማ ብመዕቖቢ ዝፍጠሩ ካብ ሕማም ዝከላኸሉ ባእታታት ብዝፈጥርዎ ጽዕነት ክፍጠር ይኽእል።
en-mt: Artificial selection can also cause unwanted changes in the virus's genome. This can be caused by the loading of immune components produced by preservatives.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: ናይዚኦም ተጽዕኖታት ኣብነት ብክልተ-ኒዮክሳይድ ስረዛ ምኽንያት HCoV-229E ፕሮቶታይፕ ሙሉእ ቁመት ORF4 ምስኣን እዩ።
en-mt: An example of these effects is the loss of the HCoV-229E prototype full-length ORF4 due to a two-neuoxide deletion.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: ዘይተተንከፈ ORF4 ኣብ ለኻኺቶን ገመልን ዝርከቡ ንHCoV-229E ዝመስሉ ቫይረሳት ክርከብ ይኽእል። alpaca alpha-CoV ነጸላ ኑክሊዮታይድ ኢንሰርሽን ዘርኢ ኮይኑ ፍሬምሺፍት ድማ ይፈጥር።
en-mt: An unaffected ORF4 can be found in leopard and camel HCoV-229E-like viruses. alpaca alpha-CoV displays single nucleotide insertions and generates frameshifts.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ ድማ፣ ናይ ሓድሽ HCoVs ግምታዊ ለውጢ(evolution) ብሰንኪ ናይ መዕቖቢኦም ጸቕጢ ምርጫ ስለዝካየድ እዩ።
en-mt: Finally, the hypothetical evolution of new HCoVs is due to their host pressure selection.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: ለዃኺቶታት ብ CoVs እንትልከፉ ምልክት ዘይምርኣይ ወይ ቀሊል ምልክት ጥራሕ ምርኣይ ተራእዩ ኔሩ፣ እዚ ድማ ናይ CoVs ለዃኺቶን ክልተኣዊ ልምምድ ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: Mice were asymptomatic or only mildly symptomatic when infected with CoVs, indicating a bilateral habit of CoVs infection.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: ለኻኺቶታት ምስ CoVs ብ ኣናቶሚካዊን(anatomically) ፊዝዮሎጂያዊን(physiologically) ብሰፊሑ ዝተላመዱ ከምዝኾኑ ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Infectious agents have been shown to be widely adapted anatomically and physiologically to CoVs.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ ኣብ መንክዓት ቅድመ-ነድሪ ምላሽ ብምንቕቓሕ፣ ብርቱዕ ሕማም ናይ ምምጻእ ክእለት ናይ CoVs የጉድሎ እዩ።
en-mt: For example, it reduces the ability of CoVs to cause severe disease by stimulating a pre-inflammatory response in the lungs.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ ብሰንኪ ልዑል ዝርግሐ ናይ ከልካሊ NKG2/CD94ን ትሑት ዝርግሐ ናይ ሜጀር ሂስቶኮምፓተብሊቲ ኮምፕሌክስ ክላስ ሞለኲልታትን፣ ናይ ለኻኺቶ ቀተልቲ ዋህዮታት ዘለዎም ንጥፈት ይዕገት።
en-mt: In addition, due to the high prevalence of inhibitory NKG2/CD94 and low prevalence of major histocompatibility complex class molecules, the activity of infectious killer cells is inhibited.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ፣ ካብ ልዑል ናይ ለኻኺቶ ሜታቦሊክ ንጥፈታት ዝምንጭው ልዑል ናይ ኦክሲጅን ዓሌት ሪኣክቲቬሽን (ROS) ደረጃ፣ ናይ CoV ምብዛሕን የጉድልን ንኤክሶራይቦኒኩለስ'ውን ይጸልዎን እዩ። እዚ ድማ ጽንኩር ናይ ምርጫ ክሊማ ብምፍጣር፣ ናብ ሓድሽ መዕቆቢ ምስኣተዉ ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ልዑል ክእለት ዘለዎም ቫይረሳት ከምስዝርሑ ይገብር።
en-mt: In addition, high levels of oxygen species reactivation (ROS) resulting from high insect metabolic activity reduce CoV replication and affect exoribonuclease. This creates a harsh selection climate, causing viruses with high potential to spread disease once they enter a new host.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: ሕማም ናይ ምስዓብ ልዑል ክእለት ዘለዎም ናይ CoV ዓሌታት ፕሮቲኖም ወይ ናይ ፕሮቲን ባህሪ ብምቕያር ከጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: CoV strains with a high ability to cause disease can attack by changing their protein or protein behavior.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: ስለ'ዚ ኣብ'ዘን ዝሓለፋ ዕስራ ዓመታት፣ ሰለስተ ሓደሽቲ HCoVs ምፍጣሮም ናይ ኣጋጣሚ ነገር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: So it's no coincidence that in the last twenty years, three new HCoVs have emerged.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoVs ሕማም ዘየምጹ ወይ ድማ ቀሊል ዝበሃል ምልክት ዘምጹ ተሃዋስያን ኮይኖም ኣብ ለኻኺቶን ገመልን ተጸጊዖም ዝነብሩ እዮም።
en-mt: CoVs are allergens that do not cause disease or cause mild symptoms and rely on ticks and camels.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: ሓያል ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ እንተዘየለ ብቕልጡፍ ይራብሑ::
en-mt: They multiply quickly in the absence of a strong immune system.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ግን ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ንምንታይ ኣልዉን ኣብ ሰባት ድማ ንምንታይ ከቢድ ረኽሲ ይፈጥር ኣሎን ንዝብሉ ምስጢራት መፍቲሒኦም ኣብ'ዚ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Here are the solutions to the mysteries of why there are asymptomatic but infected people and why it is causing serious infections in people.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: ጠንቂ መነገሲ ናይ'ዞም ከበድቲ ምልክታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ብሰንኪ ናይ ስርዓተ-ምክልኻል ሕማም ልዕሊ ዓቐን ምንቕቓሕን ዝስዕብ ናይ ሳይቶካይን ማዕበል እዩ፣ በዚ ድማ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ጥንኩር ኣብ ዝኾኑሉ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣት ከቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: The cause of the onset of these severe symptoms is often due to an overstimulation of the immune system and a subsequent wave of cytokines, thus making lung damage more severe when the immune system is strong.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: ብተጸራሪ ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ተሸከምቲ እቲ ቫይረስ፣ እቲ ናይ ኣካለ-ምክልኻል ግብረመልሲ ካብ'ቲ ምርባሕ ናይ CoV ዝተነጸለ እዩ።
en-mt: In asymptomatic carriers of the virus, the immune response is isolated from the reproduction of CoV.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ወገን ምስ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ከምዝንጸል ምግባር ኣብ ናይ ጸረ-SARS-CoV-2 ሕክምና ጠቐምቲ ጽልዋታት ከሕድር ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, its isolation with the immune system may have beneficial effects on anti-SARS-CoV-2 treatment.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኢንተርፌሮን(interferon) ግብረመልሲ ብፍላይ ኣብ ለኻኺቶ ጥንኩር እዩ።
en-mt: This interferon reaction is particularly strong in infection.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: ስለዝኾነ ተነኣሰ ኣብ ፈለማ ደረጃ ዝርከቡ ወድሰብ ዘጥቅዑ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽስታት ታይፕ ኢንተርፌሮን ምሃብ ጠቓሚ ይኸዉን።
en-mt: Therefore, it is useful to give interferon type at least in the early stages of human SARS-CoV-2 infections.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ NLRP3 ናይ ነድሪ ምላሽ ምንቕቓሕ ኣብ ለኻኺቶታት ኣይሰርሕን።
en-mt: In addition, NLRP3 stimulation of inflammatory responses does not function in infections.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት MCC950 ብምጥቃም ንNLRP3 ዝስዕብ ነድሪ ምዕጋት ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ሕክምና ጠቓሚ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: For this reason, inhibition of NLRP3-induced inflammation using MCC950 may be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣመጻጽኣ፣ SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoV ን ዝተለዓሉሉ ሓፈሻዊ ኣካይዳ ዝተኸተለ እዩ።
en-mt: The origin of SARS-CoV-2 followed the same general pattern in which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV emerged.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን ናይ ለኻኺቶ beta-CoV ምስ ናይ SARS-CoV ኒዩክሎታይድ ናይ 95% ምምስሳል፣ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ድማ ናይ 96% ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: and infectious beta-CoV has 95% identity to SARS-CoV nucleotides, and 96% identity to SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: ኣብ'ቲ ዕዳጋ ዝነበሩ እንስሳት ምስ SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ ቫይረስ ሒዞም ዝተረኸቡ ዋላ'ኳ እንተኾኑ፡ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ማእከላይ ቀጥተኛ መምሓላለፊ ግን ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: Although the animals in the market were found to be carrying the same virus as SARS-CoV, the central direct transmission of SARS-CoV-2 has not yet been identified.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ብዝገርም መንገዲ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሳሳሊ(homologous) ኮይኖም ተረኺቦም፣ እዚ ድማ ፓንጎሊናት ከም መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ ኮይኖም ከገልግሉ ከምዝኽእሉ ወይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ንናይ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ መወዳእታ ክፋል ናይ ጂን ፍራግመንትታት ኣስተዋጽኦ ይገብር እዩ ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: Pangolin beta-CoVs were found to be strikingly identical(homologous) to SARS-CoV-2, suggesting that pangolins may serve as intermediate hosts or that pangolin beta-CoVs contribute gene fragments to the final portion of SARS-CoV-2 is.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: ዘይተመለሱ ሕቶታት ዋላ እንተሃለዉ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ብኣጋጣሚ ይኹን ኮነ ተባሂሉ ብሰብ ከምዝተሰርሐ ዘርእይ መረጋገጺ የለን።
en-mt: Despite the unanswered questions, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 was accidentally or deliberately man-made.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoVs ተፈላጥነቶም ምስ'ዚ ሕዚ ዝርአ ዘሎ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ዳግማይ ክምለስ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: CoVs recognition has been restored with the current SARS-CoV-2 outbreak.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ለኻኺቶን ካልኦት እንስሳታትን CoVs ዝተኻየደ መጽዕናቲ፣ ኣገዳስነት ናይ ዙኖቲክ መበቆላትን ናይ እንስሳት መዕቖቢነትን ናይ HCoVs ኣብ ልዕሊ ናብ ሰብ ዘለዎ ተመሓላላፍነት ክንርዳእ ጌርና እዩ።
en-mt: Studies on infectious and other animal CoVs have helped us understand the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs on human transmission.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV ከምኡ'ውን SARS-CoV-2 መበቆሎም ካብ ለኻኺቶ ከምዝኾነን ናብ ሰባት ድማ ብካልእ መንጎኛ መዕቖቢ ኣቢሎም ከምዝመሓላለፉን መረዳእታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: There is evidence that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 originate from insects and are transmitted to humans through other intermediate hosts.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: ምንጪ ናይ SARS-CoV ረኽሲ ካብ ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን ዝባዳትን ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዘጋጥም ርክብ ምዃኑ ካብ ፈለጥና፣ ጥሉል ዕዳጋታት(wet markets) ምዕጻውን ዝባዳት ምቕታልን ናይ SARS ለበዳ ብብቕዓት ክዛዝሞ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Once we know that the source of SARS-CoV infection is from contact between people and pests in the market, closing wet markets and killing pests can efficiently end the SARS outbreak.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ምኽንያት ከምኡ'ውን ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተተሓሓዙ ዝተፈላለዩ ሊኒዬጃት ናይ ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ስለዝተረኽቡ፣ ፓንጎሊናት ዙኖቲክ ምምሕልላፋት ንምክልኻል ካብ ዕዳጋ ክውገዱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: For the same reason and because different lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs have been found associated with SARS-CoV-2, pangolins should be removed from the market to prevent zoonotic transmissions.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ፓንግሊናትን ካልኦት መጥወብትን ናብ ሰባት ይመሓለለፍ ድዩን ብኸመይ ይመሓላለፍን ንዝብሉ ሕቶታት ኣብ መጻኢ ብምርመራታት ክጻረዩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: however, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted from panglians and other mammals to humans needs to be investigated in the future.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: ብካልእ ገጹ፣ MERS-CoV ኣብ ድሮሜዳሪ ኣግማል ንነዊሕ ግዘ ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been present in dromedary camels for a long time.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: እዞም ኣግማል ከም መጓዕዝያን ናይ ስጋ፣ ጸባ፣ ሌዘርን ናይ ቆርበት ፍርያማትን ምንጪታት ንሰባት የገልግሉ።
en-mt: These camels serve as transportation and sources of meat, milk, leather and leather products for people.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: ኣብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕን ኣፍሪካን ብሰፊሑ ኣስፋሕፊሖም እዮም።
en-mt: They have spread widely in the Middle East and Africa.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ስለዚ ድማ MERS ንምቁጽጸር ተባሂሉ ኩሎም ኣግማል ከተጥፍኦም ኣይከኣልን እዩ፣ ልክዕ ከም'ቲ ኣብ ቻይና ናይ SARS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ምስፍሕፋሕ ደው ንምባል ኣብ ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ዕዳጋ ዝተኻየደ ማለትዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, it is not possible to exterminate all camels to control MERS, just as it was done in China to stop the spread of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 in the wildlife market.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: ነዚ ናይ MERS ተደጋጋሚ ለበዳታት ደው ንምባል፣ ኣንጻር ናይ ኣግማል MERS-CoV ብቑዕ ክትባት ንምምዕባል፣ ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ረኽሲ ቁጽጽር ስጉምቲታት ብምሕዋስ ሓፈሻዊ ኣቀራርባ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: To stop these recurring outbreaks of MERS, a holistic approach in combination with other infection control measures is necessary to develop an efficient vaccine against equine MERS-CoV.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: ነዞም ቫይረሳት ክነወግዶም ስለዘይከኣልና፣ ለበዳ ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ሓደሽቲ genotypes(ተመሳሳሊ ጀነቲካዊ ቅርጺ ዝውንኑ ድቀቕቲ ህይውታውያን) ክመጹ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Because we cannot eliminate these viruses, new genotypes(tiny organisms with similar genetic makeup) may emerge that can cause epidemics.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ዙኖቲክ CoVs ኣብ ሞንጎ እንስሳት ዘገዳም ይዘዋወሩ እዮም ።
en-mt: Various zoonotic CoVs circulate among wildlife .

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: ብፍሉይ ድማ ናብ ሰባት ክመሓላለፉ ዝኽእሉ ናይ ለኻኺቶ CoVs ብዙሓት እዮም።
en-mt: In particular, there are many infectious CoVs that can be transmitted to humans.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: እዞም ናይ እንስሳት CoVs ኣብ ቐጻሊ ተራቢሖምን ማዕቢሎምን ዝዓበየ ናይ ምልባድ ዓቕሚ ዘለዎን ንደቂሰብ ሓደገኛ ዝኾኑን CoVs ክፍጠሩ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: These animal CoVs can continue to reproduce and evolve to form CoVs with greater infectious potential and dangerous to humans.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን እንስሳትን ዘሎ ርክብ ንምቕናስ ኣብ ገለ ናይ ቻይና ቦታታት ዘሎ ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ምብላዕ ባህሊ ክእገድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The culture of eating wild animals in some parts of China should be banned to reduce contact between people and animals.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: ናይ SARS, MERSን COVID-19ን ጸገም ንምግታእ፣ ዝሓሸ ድልውነትን ግብረመልስን ክህሉ ይግባእ።
en-mt: To contain the problem of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, there should be better preparedness and response.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: ብሓቂ፣ ብዙሓት ቫይረሳት ኣብ እዛ ፕላኔት ንኣዝዩ ነዊሕ ግዘ ዝነበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: In fact, many viruses have been around on this planet for a very long time.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: ናይ ምፍሳስ ዕድል ክሳብ ዝርከብ ኣብ ናይ ባዕሎም ተፈጥሮኣዊ መቐመጢ ይጸንሑ።
en-mt: They remain in their own natural habitat until there is an opportunity for dissolution.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: ለኻኺቶታት ነቲ ቫይረስ ከመሓላልፍዎ ዘኽእልዎም ባህሪያት ዋላ እንተሃለወን፣ ሰባት ምስ ለኻኺቶ ኮነ ካልኦት ናይ በረኻ እንስሳት ዘለዎም ርክብ ንኽጎድል ኣፍልጦኦም ክብ ምባል ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: Although ticks have characteristics that allow them to transmit the virus, it is necessary to raise awareness to reduce contact with ticks or other wildlife.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: ንቐጻሊ ካብ እንስሳት ናብ ሰባት ሕማም ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዕድል ንምቕናስን ናይ መጻኢ ለበዳታት ንምውጋድን፣ ኣብ ኣጥበውቲ እንስሳት ጥቡቕ ቁጽጽር ክግበር ይግባእ።
en-mt: To reduce the chance of continued transmission of disease from animals to humans and to avoid future outbreaks, mammals should be strictly controlled.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: ከም መደምደምታ፣ ካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ ዝሓልፍ ሕማም ንምክልኻል እቲ ውጽኢታዊ መንገዲ ካብ መዕቖቢ ሓደገኛ ቫይረስ ዝኾኑ እንስሳት ዝነብርሉ ስነ ምህዳር ምርሓቕ እዩ።
en-mt: In conclusion, the most effective way to prevent animal-to-human disease is to avoid environments where animals harbor dangerous viruses.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ኣመጻጽኣ SARS-CoV-2 ሕንቅልሕንቅሊተይ ዛጊድ እውን ዘይተፈልጡ ዛዕባታት ይርከቡ።
en-mt: There are still unknown issues in the puzzle of the origin of SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ ለዃኺቶታት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዓሌታዊ መበቆል ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ናብ ፓንጎሊን ዘመሓላልፉ እንተኾይኖም፣ ኣብ ከመይ ዝበሉ ኩነታት እዩ ለዃኺቶታትን ፓንጎሊንን ተመሳሳሊ ኢኮሎጂያዊ ኒች ዝውንኑ ኢልካ ምርኣይ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: First, if ticks transmit a virus of SARS-CoV-2 species origin to pangolins, it is important to consider under what circumstances ticks and pangolins possess similar ecological niches.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: ካልኣይ ነገር እዚ ሕማም ናብ ሰብ ንክሓልፍ ለኻኺቶ ዓቢ እጃም ብምህላዉ፣ ደቂሰባት ምስቲ እንስሳ ዘለዎም ርክብ ክዉሰን ይግባእ።
en-mt: Secondly, as infectious agents play a major role in the transmission of the disease to humans, human contact with the animal should be determined.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፣ ሳልሳይ መጥበዊ እንስሳ ከም ትኽክለኛ መንጎኛ መዕቆቢ እንተኾይኑ፣ ምስ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ሰባት፣ ለኻኺቶታትን ፓንጎሊንን ሓዊሱ ከመይ ከምዝተኣታቶ ክጻረ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Third, if a third mammal is to be used as a valid intermediate refuge, how it is introduced with different species including humans, rodents and pangolins must be investigated.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ዘቤታውያን እንስሳት ሓዊስካ ብዙሓት መጥወብቲ እንስሳት ን SARS-CoV-2 ተቓላዕቲ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም፣ ናይ ቀረባ ክትትልን ናይ ፈተነኣዊ ረኽስታት ክካየዱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Finally, many mammals, including domestic animals, may be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, and close surveillance and experimental infections should be conducted.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: ዋላ ኣብ ለኻኺቶ፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮነ ካልእ መጥበዊ እንስሳ እንተኾነ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ወይ ድማ ወለዱ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ኣብ ናይ ተፈጥራዊ መጸግዒ ከም ዝርከብ ይእመን።
en-mt: Even in a mosquito, pangolin or other mammal, SARS-CoV-2 or its parents are believed to continue to be found in natural habitats.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: ኣብዚ ጉዳይ ዝግበር ቀጻሊ ምርመራ፣ ኣብ ናይ እንስሳት SARS-CoV-2 መንገድታት ናይ ግምታዊ ለውጢ(evolutionary) ከመይ ምዃኑ ከጻርይ ኣለዎ፣ ስለምንታይ እዚ ጉዳይ'ዚ ኣብ ሰባት ናይ COVID-19 ምክልኻልን ምቁጽጻርን ዓቕሚ ዓቢ ጽልዋ ስለዘለዎ።
en-mt: Further research on this issue should investigate the evolutionary patterns of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, as this issue has a major impact on the ability to prevent and control COVID-19 in humans.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ‘’ዝተጠርጠረ ጉዳይ ለበዳ’’ ከምኡዉን ‘’ዝተረጋገፀ ጉዳይ ለበዳ’’ ምርመራ ሮቑሓ በብጊዜኡ ክመሓየሽ ይግባእ።
en-mt: The COVID-19 ''suspected outbreak case'' and ''confirmed outbreak case'' diagnostic criteria should be updated from time to time.

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 6 2020፣ ጉጅለና ዘሐተሞ ጽሑፍ ናይ ኮሮና ኖቭል 2019 (2019-nCoV) ኢንፌክሽን ንምምርምርን ንምምኻርን ቕልጡፍ መምርሒን ተመኩሮታትን ብምቕራብ ብ ብርኪ ዓለም ነዚ ለበዳ ንምውጋእ ንጡፍ ምስክር ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: On February 6 2020, our team published an article providing quick guidelines and experiences for diagnosing and counseling for coronavirus novel 2019 (2019-nCoV) infection and providing active testimony to fighting this pandemic globally.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ግና ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019(ኮቪድ-19) ሓድሽ ሕማም እዩ። መጽናዕትታትን ኣብ ባይቶ ዘሎ ክምናዊ ተመክሮታት ንኣፍልጦና በብቁሩብ እናስፍሖ ይመጽእ ኣሎ። ስለዚ ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናን ስትራተጂታት ቀጻሊ እናተመሓየሹ ክመጹ’ዮም።
en-mt: But the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19) is a new disease. Studies and experiences in parliament are gradually expanding our knowledge. Therefore, screening and treatment strategies will continue to improve.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: ኣብዚ ደብዳበ፡ ኣብ መምርሒና ዘሎ ሓደ ርእይቶ ግብረመልሲ ብምሃብ፡ በቲ ናይ ቻይና ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ዝወጸ ሓድሽ ናይ ሕክምናን ክትትልን ምርሒታት COVID-19 (ሻውዓይ ሕታም) ዝተቐየደ ን”ጥርጡራት”ን ”ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማትን” ምርመራ ዝምልከት ሓደሽቲ መምርሒታት ኣውጺና።
en-mt: In this letter, in response to a comment in our guidelines, we have issued new guidelines for the testing of “suspected” and “confirmed patients” in accordance with the new COVID-19 treatment and surveillance guidelines issued by the Chinese Public Health Committee (Seventh Edition).

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ኣብዚ እዋን ብሕማም ኮሮና 2019(ኮቪድ-19) ዝፍለጥ ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019(2019-nCoV) ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2019 ክዝርጋሕ ጀሚሩ፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ከኣ ከቢድ ኣኪዩት ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2(SARS-CoV-2) ይበሃል።
en-mt: The new coronavirus 2019(2019-nCoV), currently known as coronavirus 2019(COVID-19), began to spread in December 2019. The virus is called Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2(SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 11 2020፣ ወድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) COVID-19 ዓለምለኸ ለበዳ ከምዝኾነ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 11 2020, the World Health Organization(WHO) declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2መልከፍቲ ክንዕወት እንተኮይና ብቅልጡፍ ዝርከብ ናይ ምኽሪ መምርሒ ኣዳሊና ብ06 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ኣብ ናይ ውትድርና ሕክምና መጽናዕቲ ብመርበብ ኢንተርነት ዘርጊሕናዮ ኣለና።
en-mt: If we are to succeed against SARS-CoV-2infection, we have developed a readily available advisory guide and published it online on 06 February 2020 in the Military Medical Research.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: ካብ ዝሕተም ብዙሕ ኣተኩሮ ስሒቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: It has attracted much attention since it was published.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር COVID-19 ሓድሽ ሕማም ምዃኑ ኣብ ግምት ብምእታው፣ ንቕሓትናን ፍልጠትናን ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ መጽናዕታዊ ርኽበታትን ተሞክሮ ክሊኒካዊ ልምምዳትን ብምምርኳዝ በብቁሩብ ይዓቢ ኣሎ፣ ስለዚ እቲ ናይ ምምርማርን ምሕካምን ስትራቴጂ ብቐጻሊ ይሕደስ ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, given that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually growing based on ongoing research findings and clinical experience, so the screening and treatment strategy is constantly being updated.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ብሃገራዊ ኮሚሽን ጥዕና ቻይና ናይ COVID-19 ምርመራን ሕክምናን መምርሒ ካብ 16 ጥሪ 2020 ክሳብ 3 መጋቢት 2020 ገለ ትሕዝቶታቱ ቀይሩ ብሓፈሻ ሸውዓተ ሕታማት (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) ኣሕቲሙ ኣሎ።
en-mt: For example, the National Health Commission of China has published a total of eight editions (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) of the COVID-19 diagnosis and treatment guidelines with some changes from January 16, 2020 to March 3,

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: ሐዚ መምርሒና ካብ Zhou et al. ርኢቶ ተቐቢሉ ኣሎ፣ ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ተሞክሮኦም መሰረት ዝገበረ ቀሊል እማመ ድማ ኣተኣታትዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Our current guide is adapted from Zhou et al. Comment has been received, and they have introduced a simple proposal based on their clinical experience.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ስርሖም ንመምርሒና ሓድሽ መረዳእታ ዝወሰኸ እንትኾን ብ ብርኪ ዓለም ድማ ዋጋ ዘለዎ መነጻጸሪ ሰሪሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Their work added new insights to our guidelines and provided valuable comparisons globally.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: ምስጋናና እናገለጽና ነዚ ኣገዳሲ ስርሖም ንድግፎ።
en-mt: We express our gratitude and support their important work.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር በቲ ሓድሽ ናይ COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) ምርመራን ሕክምናን መመርሒን ሓደሽቲ መፅናዕትታን መሰረት እቲ ስርሖም ምምሕያሽ ዘድልዮ እዩ።
en-mt: However, their work needs to be improved based on the new COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) diagnosis and treatment guidelines and new research.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: ብመሰረት እቲ ሻውዓይ ሕትመት (3 መጋቢት 2020)፣ ነቶም ተጠርጢሮም ዘለዉ ናይ ኬዛት ድሌታት ንምርጋግጽ ሓደ ኣቕሓ መልክዕ ናይ ስነ-ሕማም ለበዳ ታሪኽን ክልተ ኣቑሑት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ መርኣያታት ብምሕዋስ ርዱእ ዝኾነ መጽናዕቲ ንምስራሕ፣ ወይ ሰለስተ ኣቑሑት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ መረዳእታ እንድሕር ንጹር ስነ-ሕማም ለበዳዊ ታሪኽ ዘየለ።
en-mt: According to the seventh edition (March 3, 2020), to verify the needs of suspected cases, combine one item of epidemiological history and two items of clinical specimens to make a comprehensive study, or three items of clinical data if a clear epidemiological history Nonexistent.

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: ስነ-ለበዳዊ ታሪኽ፥ (1)ናይ ጉዕዞ ታሪኽ፡ ተቀማጢ ከተማ ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ተቀማጢ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 14 መዓልታት ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ናይ COVID-19 መልከፍቲ ዝተመዝገሎም ቦታታት፡ (2) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት(ብኑክለዪክ ኣሲድ መርመራ ዝተረጋገጸ)፡ (3) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ ረስኒ ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት ምስትንፋስ ዘለዎ ተቀማጢ ከተማ ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ወይ ተቀማጢ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 14 መዓልታት ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ናይ COVID-19 መልከፍቲ ዝተመዝገሎም ቦታታት፡ (4) ታሪኽ ርክብ ምስ ጉጅለ ዝተረጋገጹ ሕሙማት(≥ 2 ኣብ ውሽጢ 2 ሰሙን ረስኒን/ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት ምስትንፋስ ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ጸበብቲ ባታታት ከም ገዛ፡ ቤት-ጽሕፈት ወይ ክፍሊ ቤት-ትምህርትታት…ወዘተ)
en-mt: Epidemiological history: (1)Travel history, resident of Wuhan and surrounding area resident of places where COVID-19 infection was recorded in the past 14 days prior to symptoms, (2) history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 patients(confirmed by nucleic acid testing ), (3) history of contact with a resident of Wuhan and surrounding areas with cough or other respiratory symptoms or a resident of places where COVID-19 infection was recorded in the past 14 days prior to symptoms, (4) history of contact with a group of confirmed patients(≥ 2 within Patients with cough and/or other respiratory symptoms, especially in cramped spaces such as home, office or school classroom...etc.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት፣ (1) ረስኒን ወይ ምልክታት ምስትንፋስን፣ (2) ምስ ምስሊ ባህሪ ረኽሲ COVID-19፣ (3) ቁጽሪ ድምር ጻዓዱ ዋህዮታት ደም ንቡር፣ ጎዲሉ፣ ወይ ዝጎደለ ቁጽሪ ሊምፈሳይት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያናይ መልከፍቲ ደረጃ።
en-mt: Clinical signs, (1) fever and or respiratory symptoms, (2) with the characteristic features of COVID-19 infection, (3) normal total white blood cell count, decreased, or decreased lymphocyte count at the initial stage of infection.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: በዞም ዝስዕቡ ፓቶጀኒክ ወይ ሴሮሎጂክ መርመራታት ጥርጡራት ብመርመራ ምርግጋጽ፥ (1) real-time PCR test positive ንሳርስ-ኮቭ-2: (2) viral whole genome sequencing ምስቶም ዝተፈልጡ ኮሮናቫይረሳት high homogeneity ምስዘርኢ፥ (3)ናይ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 specific IgM antibodyን IgG antibodyን positive ምስዝመጽእ፡ ወይ ድማ SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody ካብ ኔጌቲቭ ናብ ፐዘቲቭ ምስዝልወጥ፡ ወይ ኣብ ናይ መገገሚ ክፍለ ግዜ ካብቲ ኣኪዩት ክፍለ ግዜ ብ≥4 ግዜ ምስዝዛይድ።
en-mt: Confirm suspects by the following pathogenic or serological tests: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2: (2) when viral whole genome sequencing shows high homogeneity with the known coronaviruses, (3) SARS-CoV-2 specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody positive, or SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody changes from negative to positive, or increases ≥4 times during the recovery period than during the acute period.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Real-time PCR for nucleic acid ሳምፕላት ናይ ስርዓተ-ምስትንፋስን ደምን ኣብቲ ካልኣይን(18 ጥሪ 2020) ሳልሳይን(22 ጥሪ 2020) ሕታማት ወጽዮም።
en-mt: Real-time PCR for nucleic acid samples of respiratory tract and blood were published in the second(January 18, 2020) and third(January 22, 2020) editions.

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: ምልላይ ጠንቂ ሕማም ናይ ደም መርኣያ ኣብቲ ራብዓይን (27 ጥሪ 2020) ሓሙሻይን (8 ለካቲት 2020) ሕትመታት ተጠቓሊሉ ኔሩ፣ ብድሕሪ እዚ እቲ ሴሮሎጂካዊ ጭብጢ ናብቲ ሻውዓይ ሕታም ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: The diagnosis of the blood specimen was included in the fourth (January 27, 2020) and fifth (February 8, 2020) editions, after which the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: እዘን ለውጥታት ኣብ ስሉጥ ናይ ኑክለይክ ኣሲድ ዲተክሽን ኪት ንምርካብ ጻዕርታት ተመራመርቲ ዝተመርኮሰ’ዩ። ብተወሳኺ ዝበለጸ ናይ ደምን ስርዓተ-ትንፋስን ሳምፕላት ኣብ ምርካብን ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢታት ጸረ-ነፍሳት ናብ ዝተረጋገጸ መምዘኒታት ንምእታው ኣብ ምድጋፍን ይምርኮስ።
en-mt: These changes are based on researchers' efforts to develop efficient nucleic acid detection kits. It also relies on obtaining the best blood and respiratory samples and supporting the inclusion of positive antibiotic results into validated criteria.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: ምስ እዚ ጎኒ ን ጎኒ፣ ኣብ እቶም ዘይልሙድ ምልክታት ዘለዎምን ምንም ምልክት ኣብ ዘየርእዩን ሰባት ትኹረት ምግባር ከምዘድልየና ዘዘኻኽሩ መረዳእታት ብዙሓት መረዳእታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Alongside this, there is a lot of evidence that reminds us that we need to focus on people with unusual symptoms and those who show no symptoms.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ስለዚ ናይ Zhou et al. flow chart ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ሰባት “ኣብ ትሑት ሓደጋ ኣለዉ” ዝብል ክመሓየሽ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Therefore, the Zhou et al. flow chart People without symptoms “are at low risk” should be updated.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: እዚ ምእራም መንገዲ ተወሳኺ ግብራውን መጽናዕታውን ምርግጋጽ ከድልዮ’ዩ።
en-mt: This correction will require further practical and research verification.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: ንምጥቕላል ዝኣክል፣ ንፁር ዝኾነ መረዳእታ ንኽንረክብን መንበብትና ስልኪ ደዊሎም ርኢቶኦም ክህቡናን ተስፋ ንገብር።
en-mt: To summarize, we hope to get clear data and our readers to call us and give us their feedback.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: ኣብ "ዝተጠርጠረ ጉዳይ ለበዳ" ን "ዝተረጋገፀ ጉዳይ ለበዳ" ን ብ ምርመራ ኣብ ምፍላይ፣ ናይ እቲ ዝነብሩሉ ዓዲ ሓዱሽ መምርሒ ክትጥቀሙ ንላበው።
en-mt: In distinguishing between “suspected outbreak cases” and “confirmed outbreak cases” by diagnosis, we recommend that you use the new guidelines of your country of residence.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: ጉጅለና እውን ሓገዝ ንምሃብ ጊዜኡ ሓልዩ ነቲ መምርሒ ክሕድስ እዩ።
en-mt: Our team will also update the guidelines in a timely manner to provide assistance.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction

en-mt: In Australia, stores have reduced the number of toilet sofas that can be bought at a time.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: ኣብ ሰንበትን ቀዳምን ምሸታት፡ ናይ ኣውስትራሊያ ናይ መደብራት ሰንሰለት ዎልዎርትስ ን ኮልስን ኣብ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ኣብ ሕድሕድ ልውውጣት ሓደ ውይድማ ከለት ፓኬት ክብላ ኣንቢረናኦ ዝነበራ እገዳታት ትሕት ክብል ገይረን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: On Saturday and Saturday nights, Australian store chains Walworth and Coles eased restrictions on toilet paper packets per exchange.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ብሰኑይ’ውን ALDI ሓደ ባኮ ጥራይ ዝብል ዕገዳ ኣተኣታትዩ።
en-mt: On Monday, ALDI also introduced a one-bacon ban.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: እዞም ወሰናት እዚኦም ኣብ መውጽኢታት ን ኣብ ፌስቡክን ክም መልእኽቲታት ተጠቒዖም እዮም።
en-mt: These boundaries have been posted in outlets and on Facebook as messages.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: ብሰንኪ COVID-19 ዝትላዕለ ነብሰ-ውሸባ ከድሊ እዩ ብዝብል ስግኣት ፡ ልዕሊ መጠን ዕድጊ ክካየድ ከምዝጸንሐ ይሕበር።
en-mt: Over-purchasing has been reported due to fears of self-quarantine being required due to COVID-1

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: ኣብ ሓሙስ፡ ዎልዎርትስ ናብ ገዛ ኣብዝለኣኽ ናይ ሽንትቤት ወረቐት መሸጣ ብሕድሕድ ትእዛዝ ሓደ ፓኬት ንክኾን ወሰን ገይራ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Walworth limited home delivery toilet paper sales to one packet per order.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: እዞም ለውጥታት ብድሕሪ’ቲ ዝጸንሐ ብዉልዎርዝስን ኮልስን ብ4ን 5ን ማርች ዘውጽእዎ ‘ልዕሊ ኣርባእተ ባኮ ብሓንሳብ ምግዛእ ክልኩል’ ዝብል ዕገዳ እዩ መጽዩ።
en-mt: The changes follow a ban imposed by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: ኮልስ፡ ኣብቲ ብ ማርች 8 ዘቕረቦ መግለጺ፡ ዕገዳ ናይ ዝያዳ ኣርባዕተ ባኮ ዕድጊ ኣብ ቦትኡ ከሎ፥”ብዙሓት ድኳናት ሸቀጦም ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ሰዓት ናይ ምብጻሕ ከም ዝውዳእ ዘሎ” ይሕብር። ነዚ ጠለብ ድማ “ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” ኢሉ ክገልጾ ከሎ፡ ALDI ከኣ ”ዘይተጸበናዮ” ኢሉ ኣብ ፌስቡክ ብሰሉስ ፖስት ገይርዎ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Coles said in a statement on March 8 that while the ban on more four-pack purchases remains in place, “many stores are running out of goods within an hour of delivery.” He described the demand as “unprecedented” and ALDI posted it on Facebook on Tuesday as ”unexpected”.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: ሓደ ወኪል ዉልዎርዝስ ከምዝበሎ፡ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ዕዳጋታት ልዑል ወሰኽ ኣርእየን።
en-mt: A Woolworths representative said markets were up last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: ኣብ ካንበራ ዝርከብ ናይ ኮስትኮ መደብር ካብቲ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣትሒዙ እቲ ዝፍቀድ መጠን ክልተ ፓኬት ገይሮም።
en-mt: The Costco store in Canberra has increased the allowed size to two packets since last week.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: ነቲ ሕጽረት ብዝበለጸ ንምብዳህ፣ ኮልስ ዓበይቲ ፓኬጃት ካብ ኣቕረብቲ ብምእዛዝ፣ናይ ምብጻሓት ድግግም ወሲኹ፣ ዉልዎርዝስ ድማ ተወሳኺ ቀረብ ኣዚዙ፣ALDI ድማ ነቲ ዝተወጠነ ናይ ረቡዕ ስፒሻል ቀረብ ኣቐዲሙ ከምዝርከብ ገይሩ።
en-mt: To better overcome the shortage, Coles increased the frequency of deliveries by ordering larger packages from suppliers, Woolworths ordered more supplies, and ALDI made the planned Wednesday special supplies available earlier.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: ራስል ዚመርማን፣ ናይ Australian Retailers Association (ኣውስትራሊያ ናይ ሸቃጦ ማሕበር) ዋና ጸሓፊ፣ ሸቃጦ ናይ ሸቐጥ ቀረብ መጠን ልዕል ከብሉዎ ፈቲኖም፣ እንተኾነ ግን ብ ናይ እቲ ከባቢያዊ ባይቶ ኣብ ናይ ኣቑሑ መብጻሕቲ መኻይን ዝተነበረ ናይ ግዜ/ሰዓት ክልከላታት ከቢድ ገይርዎ እዩ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman, secretary-general of the Australian Retailers Association, said retailers tried to increase supply, but it was made difficult by the local council's time/hour restrictions on delivery vehicles.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: ድኳናት ጠለብ ከማልኡ መታን ናይ ፍርያታት ዋጋ ክውስኽ ይጽበዮ።
en-mt: He expects stores to raise prices to meet demand.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: ብሰሉስ፡ ALDI ብሰንኪ ቅልጡፍ ዕደላ ቀረብ ገለ ድኳናት እቲ ናይ ረቡዕ ፍሉይ ዕዳግኦም ከሰላስሉ ዘይምኽኣሎም ገሊጹ።
en-mt: On Tuesday, ALDI said some stores were unable to process their Wednesday special due to rapid supply distribution.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ News.com.au ሪፖርት፣ ዶ/ር ጋሪይ ሞርቲመር፣ ኣብ ኩዊንስ ላንድ ቴክኖሎጂ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ምችርቻር በዓል ሞያ ክምዝበሉዎ፣ እቶም መድብራት ኩል ግዜ ምሸት መድብሮም እናመልኡ እዮም።
en-mt: According to News.com.au, Dr Gary Mortimer, a retail specialist at Queensland University of Technology, said the shops are always filling up in the evening.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ሶፍት ብበዝሒ ዝርከብ ከምዝኾነ፣ ኣብ መሸጣ ኣዝዩ ትሑት ብዝሒ ክህሉ ዝገብር፣ ከምኡ እውን፣ ኩሉ ምስተሸጠ፣ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ናይ መሸጢ ቦታ ጥራሖም ከምዝገብር፣ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ሕጽረት ስምዒት ከምዘጋድዶ ኣመልኪቱ።
en-mt: He pointed out that toilet sofas are available in large quantities, leading to very low quantities in sales, and, when all is sold, leaving very much of their sales space empty, which exacerbates the sense of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: "ክም ምልከታ ኮልስን ዎልዎርትስን፣ ኣብ እቲ ሼልፍ ብዙሕ ዓቁሑ ምሃለዉ፣ ክም ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐትን ከም ሳኒታይዘርን ዝበሉ ምህርቲታት ክዕደጉን ብበዝሒ ዝርከቡን እንተደኣ ኾይኖም ፣ ምናልባት ነቲ ድንጋጸ ምቕናስ ይከኣል ይኸውን" ኢሉ ራሰል ዚመርማን ካብ ABC News ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: "According to Coles and Walworths, there would be more items on the shelf, and if products like toilet paper and sanitizer were available in large quantities, it might be possible to reduce the sympathy," said Russell Zimmerman of ABC News.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: ሪሳይክል ዝተገበረ ናይ ሽንትቤት ወረቐት መፍረዪ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሓሙስ ምህርቲ ክውድኡ ክምዝኽእሉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: He said the recycled toilet paper mill could finish production last Thursday.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቀት ክሊነክስ ዘዳሉ ኪምበርሊ-ክላርክን ሶርበንት ተዳሉ ሶላሪስ ወእቐትን ቀረብ ንምሕላው ብምባል 24/7 ይሰርሑ ከምዘለዉ ኣብ News.com.au ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Toilet paper maker Kimberly-Clark and sorbent maker Solaris Weket are working 24/7 to maintain supply, they told News.com.au.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com ዝተብሃለ ናይ ሪል እስቴት ድህረ ገጽ፣ ገለ ሸየጥቲ ብ ሰንኪ ዝተናውሑ ናይ መዓልቲ ሸቃሎ ባዓላት ን ናይ ሰሙን መጨረሻ ምስ ምዃኑ ወሑዳት ጨረታታት እንትካየዱ ከለው ኣብ ሜይልቦርን ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ጨረታ ዝተሳተፉ ናይ መጅመሪያ ተጫረትቲ ናጻ ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐት ሂቦም። ክብል ጽብጺቡ።
en-mt: Real estate website Domain.com offered free toilet paper to the first bidders at a Melbourne auction as some sellers held fewer bids due to extended Labor Day holidays and the weekend. he reported.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: NT News ዝተባህለ ኣብ ዳርዊን ዝሕተም መዓልታዊ ጋዜጣ፡ ኣብ ናይ ሓሙስ ሕታሙ ተቆሪጹ ከም ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ከገልገል ዝኽእል ሸሞንተ ገጻት ዝሓዘ ክፋል ኣሕቲሙ።
en-mt: The NT News, a Darwin daily newspaper, published an eight-page section in its Thursday edition that could have been cut and served as toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ ማርች 3 ናይ ABC ኣውስትራሊያ ጸብጻብ ፣እቶም መደብራታ መጀምሪያ ኣብ ዕድጊት ኣቑሑት ናይ መጠን ወሰናት ናይ ምግባር መድብ ከምዝየብሎም ብምሕባር ነቲ እገዳ ንምፍጻም ምዝሕሓል የርእዩ ነይሮም።
en-mt: According to a March 3 ABC Australia report ,its stores were initially slow to implement the ban, saying they had no plans to impose quantity limits on purchases.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: ራስል ዚመርመን ን ማስክታት፣ ናይ ንጽህና ፈሳሲ፣ ዝነቐጹ ኣቑሑት፣ ኤድ መሕጸብን ሑሩጭን ሓውስካ፣ ካልኦት ምህርትታት እውን ኣብ ልዑል ጠለብ ከምዝርከቡ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman said other products, including masks, hygiene liquids, dry goods, ed baths and flour, are also in high demand.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: በተመሳሳሊ፣ካብ ኣውስትራሊያ ወጻኢ ፣ ኣብ ሰንበት ምሸት ናይ እንግሊዝ ኦንላይን ሱፐር ማርኬት ኦካዶ ኣብ ናይ ኣንድሬይስ ናይ ሽንት ቤት ወረቐት ዕድጊት ናይ 12 ሮል ፓኬት ወሰን ክገብር ተራእዩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Similarly,outside Australia , British online supermarket Ocado was seen limiting Andreas' toilet paper purchases on 12-roll packets on Saturday night.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ኢሉ ኣዊጅዎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization has declared COVID-19 an epidemic.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: ብረቡዕ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ነዚ ለብዒ COVID-19- ኮሮናቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 ዘስዕቦ ሕማም- ለበዳ ምዃኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the COVID-19- coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: ምንም እኳ "ለበዳ" ዝብል ቃል እቲ ሕማም ክንደየናይ ከምዝተላበደ እምበር ክንደየናይ ሓደገኛ ከምዝኾነ ዝውክል እንተዘይኮነ፡ WHO መንግስታት ናብ ተግባር ክኣትዉ ከምዘለዎም ኣቐሚጡ።
en-mt: Although the term "epidemic" represents how widespread the disease is, not how dangerous it is, the WHO stipulates that governments must act.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: “ኩለን ሃገራት መንገዲ ናይዚ ለበዳ ዋላ ሕጂ’ውን ክልውጥኦ ይኽእላ እየን።”
en-mt: “All countries can change the course of this epidemic even now.”

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: ናይ WHO ዋና ዳይሬክተር፣ Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus፣ ሃገራት መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ ንህዝበን ኣብ ምልላይ፣ ምምርማር፣ ምንጻል፣ ምክትታልን ምጉዕዓዝን እንተጌረን” ኢሉ።
en-mt: WHO Director-General, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, said if countries respond by identifying, testing, isolating, monitoring and transporting their people.”

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: “እዚ ዘሰቅቕ መጠነ ዝርግሐን ጽኑዕነትን ከምኡ’ውን ኣሻቓሊ መጠን ሸለልትነት ብዙሕ የተሓሳስበና ኣሎ።”
en-mt: “We are very concerned about this alarming level of prevalence and persistence and the worrying level of neglect.”

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: ብ መሰረት ዶ/ር ቶም ፍሬይደን፡ ኣብ ሕሉፍ እዋን ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ማእኸል ቁጽጽርን ምክልኽልን ሕማም ዳይሬክተር ዝነበሩ፡ እቲ ለበዳ "ዘይተሓሰበ" ክብሉ ኣቐሚጦሞ።
en-mt: According to Dr. Tom Freiden, former director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the outbreak was "unexpected.

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ CNN ናይ ፈብሩዋሪ ሕታም፣ ''ካብ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ወጻኢ፣ ካብ መልዓሊኡ እስካብ ዓለምለኻዊ ዝርጋሐኡ ኣሰሩ ዝተጸንዐ ናይ መተንፈሲ ቫይረስ የለን።" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: According to CNN's February issue, "Other than influenza, no respiratory virus has been traced from its outbreak to its global spread.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: ገብረየሱስ “ ከምዚ ዝመሰለ ብኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተላዕለ ለበዳ ተራዕዩ ኣይፈልጥን” ክብል ተመሳሳሊ ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: Gebreyesus said, “ There has never been such an outbreak caused by the coronavirus.”

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ''ቅድሚ ሐዚ ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ እዋን ኣብ ቁጽጽር ክውዕል ዝኽእል ለበዳ ርኢና ኣይንፈልጥን' ኢሉ ድማ ቀጸለ
en-mt: “We have never seen an outbreak that can be controlled at the same time before,” he said

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: እቲ ሓድሽ ቅዋም ነቲ ናይ ጥሪ ናይ WHO ናይ ላብዕ ውሳኔ ተኸቲሉ፣ ነዚ ዓለምለኸ ትኹረት ዘድልዮ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ህጹጽ ኣዋን ክብል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The new constitution followed the January WHO pandemic decision, declaring it a public health emergency that required international attention.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ብሄራዊ ናይ ሕማም ኣለርጂን ረኽሲን ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ኣንቶኒ ፋውሲ "ናይ መጨረሻ መስመር፣ ኣዝዮ እናገደደ ክኸይድ እዩ" ኢሎም።
en-mt: "The bottom line, it's going to get much worse," said Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the US National Director of Allergy and Infection.

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: ብሓሙስ ኣሶስየትድ ፕርስ ኣብ ዓለም ብውሕዱ 126,000ሕሙማት ኮቪድ-19 ከምኡ’ውን 4,600ሰባት ከም ዝሞቱ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On Thursday, the Associated Press reported at least 126,000 cases and 4,600 deaths worldwide.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: እዚ ኣብ 2019-20 ዝተኸስተ ለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ከም መቀጸልታ ናይ 2019 ለበዳዊ ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ( COVID-19) ኮይኑ፡ብ ስቪር ኣኲት ረስፒራቶሪ ሲንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2(ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2) ዝተባህለ ቫይረስ ዝመጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: The 2019-20 pandemic is a continuation of the 2019 pandemic of the coronavirus ( COVID-19), caused by the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ዲሰምበር 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን፣ ቻይና ተፈሊጡ፣ ፌብሩዋሪ 30 2020 ደማ ህጹጽ ዓለምለኽዊ ሓደጋ ተባሂሉ ተኣዊጁ፣ ክም ለበዳ ድማ ኣብ ማርች 11 ፣2020 ኣፍልጦ ተዋሂቡዋ።
en-mt: The outbreak was detected in December 2019 in Wuhan, China, declared a global emergency on February 30 2020, and recognized as an outbreak on March 11 ,2

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: ካብ 10 ኤፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣስታት 1.61 ሚልዮን ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ኣብ 210 ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ተመዝጊቦም ይርከቡ። 97,000 ከኣ ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, there are approximately 1.61 million registered cases in 210 countries and territories. 97,000 died.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: ከባቢ 364000 ዝኾኑ ሰባት ሓውዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሞት ደረጃ ኣብ ቻይና 4%፣ ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ ድማ ካብ 13.04% ኣብ ኣልጀሪያ ክሳብ .08% ኣብ ኒውዚላንድ ከምዝኸውን ተገሚቱ ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The mortality rate was estimated to be 4% in China and 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand internationally.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: እቶም ዝተለመዱ ምልክታት ረስኒ፡ ሰዓል ን ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕጽረት ዘጠቓለሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሕልኽላኻት ከም እኒ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ከምኡ እውን ከቢድ ናይ ምትንፋስ ጸቕጢ ምልክት ዘጠቓለሉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Complications may have included such as pulmonary stroke as well as severe respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ካብ እዋን ተጋላጽነት ስጋብ ምልክታት ምርኣይ ዘሎ ጊዜ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲታት ክኾንከሎ፡ ይኹን ደኣምበር ካብ ክለተ እስካብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲታት ክዛይድ ይኽ እል እዩ።
en-mt: The time from exposure to symptoms is five days, but can be longer than two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ ዝተፈልጠ ክታበት ወይ’ውን ውሱን ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒት የለን።
en-mt: To date, there is no known vaccine or specific antiviral drug.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: መጀመርያ ዝወሃብ ምልክታውን ደገፋውን ሕክምና እዩ።ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ኣፍካ ሸፊንካ ምስዓል፡ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀትካ ምሕላው፡ ንዝተጠርጠሩ ሕሙማት ድማ ፈሊኻ ምክትታል ገለ ኣብነታት ከም ቅድመ-ሕክምና ክግበሩ ዝኽእሉ ጥንቃቄታት`ዮም።
en-mt: It is the first symptomatic and supportive treatment.Hand washing, covering your mouth and coughing, maintaining social distance, and isolating suspected patients are some examples of precautions that can be taken as pre-treatment.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ሰበ ስልጣን ግብረመልሲ በዚ ዝስዕብ መንገዲ ሂቦም ናይ ጉዕዞ ክልከላታት፣ ውሸባ፣ እዋን እቶእቶ፣ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ምክልኻል መጉዳእቲ፣ ከምኡ ውን ምዕጻው ትካል ብምፍጻም መልሲ ሂቦም እዮም።
en-mt: Authorities around the world have responded by imposing travel bans, quarantines, curfews, workplace injury prevention, and closures.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ብዙሓት ዓለምለኻዊ ማሕበራዊን ቁጠባዊን ምፍርራስ ንኽምርሑ ዝገበረ እንትኾን፣ ናይ ስፖርታዊ ጸወታታት፣ ሃይማኖታዊ ጉዳያት፣ ፖለቲካዊን ባህላዊን ምድላዋት ፣ጊዜ ምምሕልላፍ ውይድማ ስረዛን ምስ ናይ ድንጋጸ ዕድጊት ዓቑሑት ተተሓሒዙ ናይ ቀረባት ሕጽረት እውን ኣጋጢሙ እዩ።
en-mt: The pandemic has led to many global social and economic disruptions, including sporting events, religious affairs, political and cultural events, cancellations and shortages of supplies related to compassionate purchases.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: ትምህርትታትን ትካላት ላዕለዋይ ትምህርትን ብሃገር ደረጃ ወይ’ውን ብዞባዊ ደረጃ ኣብ 193 ሃገራት ተዓጽየን። እዚ ከኣ ንኣስታት 99.4 ምኢታዊት ናይ ዓለም ተመሃሮ ዝጸሉ’ዩ።
en-mt: Schools and higher education institutions were closed nationally or regionally in 193 countries. This affects about 99.4 percent of the world's students.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: ብ መንገዲ ናይ ኢንተርኔት መርበብ ኣቢሉ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጋገየ ሓበሬታ ተዘርጊሑ እዩ፡ ናብ ናይ ቻይና ህዝቢታትን፡ ናብ ካልኦት ናይ ምብራቕን ደቡብ ምብራቕ ኤሽያ ዝኾኑ ሰባትን ዝመስሉን ናብ ካብ ብቲ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዐ ቦታ ዝመጹ ሰባት ዘቕነዐ ናይ ዜኖፎቢያን ምግላላልን ኣጋጣሚታት ነይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus has been spread through the Internet, and there have been instances of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other East and Southeast Asians, and people from affected areas.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ውሑድ ጉዕዞን ናይ ከበድቲ ኢንዱስትሪታት ምዕጻዉን፣ ኣብ ብኽለት ኣየር ን ናይ ካርቦን ልቀትን ቀኒሱ እዩ።
en-mt: Due to less travel and the closure of heavy industries, air pollution and carbon emissions have decreased.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን፣ ቻይና(ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ዋና ኸተማ) ዝርከቡ ናይ ጥዕና ሰብ ስልጣናት፣ ድሕሪ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 31 2019 መልዓሊኦም ዘይፍለጡ ናይ ኒሞኒያ ጉጅለ ግዳያት ጸብጻብ ምቕራቦም፣ ኣብ መጀመሪያ ወርሒ ጃኑዋሪ 2020 ምርመራ ምክያድ ተጅሚሩ።
en-mt: Health officials in Wuhan, China(the capital of Hubei province) began investigating in early January 2020 after a group of pneumonia cases of unknown origin were reported on December 31,

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: መብዛሕቲኦም ጉዳያት ምስ ሁዋናን ናይ ባሕሪ ምግቢ ጅምላ መሸጢ ዕዳጋ ርክብ ዝነበሮም እዮም በዚድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳት ዝተበገስ ክምዝኸውን ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: Most of the cases were related to Huanan seafood wholesale markets, so the virus is thought to have originated from animals.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ነዚ ለበዳ ዘምጽኦ SARS-CoV-2 ዝተባህለ ሓድሽ ቫይረስ ኮይኑ ምስ ኣብ መንካዕ ዝርከቡ ኮሮናቫይረሳት፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮሮናቫይረሳትን ሳርስ-ኮቭን ዝመሳሰል’ዩ። እቲ መጀመርታ ምልክታት ዘርኣየ ሰብ ብ1ዲሰምበር 2019 ከምዝሓመመ ድሒሩ ተፈሊጡ። እዚ ሰብ ከኣ ምስቶም ብድሕሪኡ ዝተረኽቡ ናይ ዕዳጋ ዓሳን ካልእን ጉጅለ ርኡይ ርክብ ከምዘይብሉ’ዩ ዝፍለጥ።
en-mt: The outbreak is caused by a new virus called SARS-CoV-2, which is similar to the mosquito-borne coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses and SARS-CoV. The person who first showed symptoms was later diagnosed on December 1, The man is known to have no apparent connection to the subsequent group of fish marketers and others.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: ክልተ ሲሶ ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ብታሕሳስ 2019 ዝተረኽቡ ጉጅለ ሕሙማት ምስቲ ቦታ ዕዳጋ ርክብ ነይርዎም።
en-mt: Two-thirds of the first group of patients seen in December 2019 had contact with the marketplace.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 13 2020፣ ሓደ ምንጩ ዘይተፈለጠ ጸብጻብ ከምዝሓበሮ ናብ ኖቨምበር 17 2019 ብምምላስ፣ ኣብ ሓደ ወዲ 55 ዓመት ናይ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ነባሪ ዘጋጠመ ጉዳይ እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ክኾን ከምዝኽእል ጥቆማ ሂቡ። ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 26 2020 ዝተገበረ ናይ WHO ጸብጻብ ክምዝሕበሮ፣ ኣብ ቻይና ዝርከቡ ሓደሸቲ ጉዳያት እናቐነሱ ኣብ ዝኸዱሉ፣ ኣብ ጣላያን፣ ኢራን ን ደቡብ ኮሪያን ሃንደበት ብምውሳኹ፣ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ዘጋጥሙ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ንመጀመሪያ ካብቶም ኣብ ቻይና ውሽጢ ዝረኣዩ በሊጾም ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: On March 13, 2020, an unsourced report suggested that going back to November 17, 2019, a case involving a 55-year-old resident of Hubei province could be the first. According to a WHO report on February 26 2020, while new cases in China were declining, new cases outside China initially outnumbered those inside China with a sudden increase in Italy, Iran and South Korea.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: በተላይ ኣብ መንጎ እቶም ቀሊል ምልክት ዘርኣዩ ተተሓሒዙ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ቁጽሪ ዘለዎ ናይ ጉዳያት ኣትሒትካ ጸብጻብ ምግባር ክህሉ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: There may be a very large number of underreporting cases, especially among those who showed mild symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: ብ ፌብሩዋሪ 26 ኣብ መንእሰያት ዝወሓደ ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ተራእዩ፡ 19ን ትሕቲኡን ዝዕድሚኦም 2.4% ናይ ዓለም ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ነይሮም። Herd immunity ክምዕብል እንተኾይኑ፡ 60% ህዝቢ ብሪተይን በቲ ቫይረስ ክልከፉ ከምዘለዎም ናይ ብሪተይን ቀንዲ ኣማኻሪ ሳይንስ ፓትሪክ ቫላንስ ይትንትን።
en-mt: On February 26, the lowest number of cases was seen in young people, with 2.4% of the world's cases aged 19 and under. If herd immunity is to develop, 60% of the UK population must be infected, according to UK chief science adviser Patrick Vallance.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: ግዳይ ክበሃል ከሎ ቁጽሪ ናይቶም COVID-19 ዝተመርመሩን፡ ውጽኢት መርመርኦም ከኣ በቲ መሰረት ዝተዳለወ ፕሮቶኮል ሕማም ከምዘለዎም ምስዝረጋገጽ’ዩ።
en-mt: A victim is the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19 and whose test results confirm that they have the disease according to the protocol.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: ኣብ 23 ማርች፡ ልዕሊ 3% ህዝቦም ዝመርመሩ ወላሓደ ሃገር ኣይነበርን። ብዙሓት ሃገራት ከም በኣል ጥልያን፡ ነዘርላንድስ፡ ስፓኛን ስዊዘርላንድን ውሑድ ምልክታት ንዘለዎም ከይምርምሩ ወግዓዊ ፖሊሲታት ነይርወን።
en-mt: On March 23, no country tested more than 3% of its population. Many countries, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland, had official policies not to test for those with few symptoms.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ክሳብ 23 ጃኑዋሪ ኣስታት 86% ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መልከፍቲ ብመርመራ ከምዘይተረኽበን እዞም ዘይተመዝገቡ መልከፍቲ ከኣ ኣብ 79% ናይ እቶም ዝተረኽበሎም ሰባት ከም መበገሲ ናይ እዚ ለብዒ ከምዝነበረ ብ16 ማርች ዝተዘርግሐ መጽናዕቲ ይሕብር።
en-mt: About 86 percent of China's COVID-19 cases were undetected as of January 23, and these unrecorded cases were the trigger for 79 percent of those diagnosed, according to a study released on March

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: ብ30 ማርች ዝተሓትመ ጸብጻብ ብዘርእዮ ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን ካብቲ ዝተሓበረ መጠን ከም ዝዛይድ ተገምጊሙ።
en-mt: A report published on March 30 shows that the number of cases in Italy is higher than reported.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ፈለማ ናይ COVID-19መሰረታዊ ቁጽሪ ምርባሕ(R0) ኣመልኪቱ ዝነበሩ ግምታት 1.4 እስካብ 2.4 እዮም ነይሮም።
en-mt: The initial estimates for the COVID-19 baseline reproduction number(R0) were 1.4 to

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: ብ ናይ US ማእኸል ቁጽጽር ሕማምን ምክልኻልን ዝተሓተመ ጽንዓት ምናልባት 5.7 ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ እሉ መደምደምታ ገይሩ።
en-mt: A study published by the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it was probably

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: ብዙሓት COVID-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ይሓውዩ’ዮም።
en-mt: Many people with COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: ኣብቶም ዘይኮኑ፡ ካብ ናይ ምልክታት ምዕባለ ጀምሩ እስካብ ሞት ዘሎ ጊዜ ካብ 6 ክሳብ 41 መዓልቲታት ኮይኑ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዝተለመደ ግን 14 መዓልቲታት እዩ።
en-mt: In those who are not, the time from symptom development to death ranges from 6 to 41 days, but the most common is 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 10 2020 ጅሚሩ፣ክባቢ 97,000 ዝኾኑ ሞታት ብሰንኪ COVID-19 እዮም ኣጋጢሞም።
en-mt: As of April 10 2020,around 97,000 deaths have occurred as a result of COVID-1

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ካብ ፈብሩዋሪ 5 ጀሚሩ ክባቢ 80% ዝኾኑ ሞታት ኣብቶም ካብ 60 ዓመት ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ እንትኾን እቶም 75% ድማ ን ናይ ልቢ ሕማማትን ናይ ሽኮሪያን ሓዊሱ ካልኦት ዝጸንሐ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ዘለዎም እዮም። እቶም ዕላው ዝተገበሩ ናይ ብ COVID-19 ለበዳ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ማለት እቶም ብ ኦፊሳላዊ ፕሮቶኮላት ዝተረጋገጹ COVID ዝተረኸቦም ዝሞቱ ሰባት ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: In China, since February 5, about 80% of deaths have been in people over the age of 60, and 75% have other pre-existing health conditions, including heart disease and diabetes. The announced deaths from the COVID-19 outbreak are those deaths from COVID confirmed by official protocols.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: ሓቀኛ ቁጽሪ ሞት ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ነቶም ከይተመርመሩ ኣብ ገዛ፡ ኣብ ክንክን ቦታታት...ወዘተ. ዝሞቱ ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ስለዘይኮነንዝያዳ ክኽውን ተኽእሎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The true number of deaths from COVID-19 for those who are not tested at home, in care facilities...etc. It is likely to be more because it does not take into account the dead.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን ዝተረኽበ ሓበሬታ ከምዝረኽቦ፡ ኣብቲ ግዜ ለበዳ ዝነበረ ቁጽሪ ዝያዳ ሞት ነቲ ወግዓዊ ናይ ኮቪድ ቁጽሪ ሞት ብ4-5x ይበልጾ።
en-mt: Data in Italy show that the number of deaths during the pandemic is 4-5x the official death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: ናይ U.S. ማእኽል ምቁጽጽር ሕማምን ምክልኻልን( CDC) ቃል ኣቐባሊ "እቲ ናይ ሞት ትምበያ ኣትሒትና ገሚትናዮ ኢና" ክብሉ ኣሚኖም፡ እዚ ድማ፡ ብ ናይ U.S. ናይ ትሕተ ግምት ቁጽሪታት ክም ናይ 2009 H1N1 ዝበሉ ናይ ስዋይን ፍሉ ለበዳታት ዝተውሃቦም ትሕተ ግምት ዝጠናኸር ኣገላልጻ እዩ። እቲ ናይ መጀምሪያ ዝተረጋገጥጸ ጉዳይ ኣብ ዉሃን ጃኑዋሪ 9 2020 እዩ ነይሩ።
