en-mt: Of course, this does not describe European unity.”

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 22፣ ድሕሪ ምስ ናይ ጣልያን ቀዳማይ ሚንስተር ጁሰፔ ኮንቴ ዝተገበረ ናይ ስልኪ ምይይጥ፣ ናይ ሩስያ ፕሬዝዳንት ቭላድሚር ፑቲን ናብ ጣልያን ወታደራዊ ናይ ሕክምና ናውቲን፣ ፍሉያት ናይ ጸረ-ታህዋሲያን መግበሪ ተሽከርከርቲን ካልኦት ናይ ሜዲካል ናውቲን ናብ ጣልያን ንክልእኽ ን ናይ ሩስያ ሓይሊ ምክልኻል ኣተሓባቢሮም ።
en-mt: On March 22, after a telephone conversation with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered the Russian Defense Forces to send military medical equipment, special antibiotics and other medical equipment to Italy They coordinated.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: ክም ናይ ጣልያን ላ ስትማፓ ጋዜጣ ካብ ሓደ ስዉር "ለዑል ናይ ፖለቲካ ምንጪ" ረኸብዮ ብዝበለቶ ሓበሬታ ካብ እቲ ሩስያ ን ጣልያን ዝሓገዝቶ እቲ 80% "ጥቕሚ ዘይብሉ ውይድማ ን ጣልያን ዘይጠቕማ እዩ ነይሩ"።
en-mt: According to information obtained by the Italian newspaper La Stampa from a hidden "high political source", 80% of Russia's aid to Italy was "useless waste that did not benefit Italy"

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: እቲ ምንጪን ሩስያ ኣብ "ጂኦፖለቲካዊን ዲፕሎማስያዊን" ምሕዝነታት ኣቶኪራ ብዝብል እቲ ምንጪ ክሲ የቕርብ።
en-mt: The source accuses Russia of focusing on "geopolitical and diplomatic" alliances.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ሎምባርዲ ኣቲልዮ ፎንታናን ናይ ጥልያን ሚንስተር ወጻኢ ሉዊጂ ዲ ሜዮን ነቲ ናይ ሚድያ ወረታት ብምኹናን፡ ምስገንኦም ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: Lombardy President Attilio Fontana and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio condemned the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: ሩስያ እውን ናብ ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕክምና ኣቑሑ ዝጸዓነት ካርጎ ኣወሮፕላን ሰዲዳ ኣላ።
en-mt: Russia has also sent a cargo plane carrying medical supplies to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: “ኣብ US ንዝርከቡ መሳርሕትና ረድኤት ክንህብ ከለና፡ [ፑቲን] ናይ US ፋብሪካታት መሳርሒ ሕክምና ደሓን ዝኾነ መርገጺ ምስሓዙ፡ ምስዘድሊ ነቲ ሓገዝ ከማልስዎ ብዝብል ርድኢት’ዩ” ይብል ድሚትሪ ፐስኮቭ ዝተባህለ ወኪል ክረምሊን።
en-mt: “When we provide aid to our colleagues in the US, [Putin] does so with the understanding that once US medical device manufacturers take a safe stance, they will return the aid if necessary,” said Dmitry Peskov, a Kremlin spokesman.

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: ኣብ መደብ ዝነበረ ናይ NATO“ዲፈንደር 2020” ዝተባህለ፡ ዝዓበየ ናይ NATO ፈተነ-ኲናት ድሕሪ መፈጸምታ ናይ Cold War፡ ኣብ ጀርመን፡ ፖላንድን ባልቲክስን ክግበር ዝተሓስበ ናይ ውትሕድርና ሙከራ፡ ብትሑት መልክዑ ክካየድ ተወሲኑ።
en-mt: NATO's planned “Defender 2020”, NATO's largest post-Cold War military exercise in Germany, Poland and the Baltics, has been postponed.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: ናይ ዲፈንደር 2020 ንጥፈት ብኬት ሃድሰን ዝተበሃለት ሓፈሻዊ ጸሓፊት ናይ ኑክሊያር ዲስኣርማመንት ካምፐይን “ኣብ’ዚ ዘለናዮ ቅልውላው ጥዕና፡ እዚ ፈተነ ሂወት ናይ ብዙሓት ተሳተፍቲ ኣሜሪካውያንን ኤሮጵያውያን ወተሓደራትን ከምኡ’ውን ናይ’ቶም ኣብቲ ፈተነ ዝግበረለን ሃገራት ተቀማጦ ሕብረተሰብ ሓደጋ ከውርድ ይኽእል’ዮ” ብምባል ወቒሳ። መንግስቲ ኢራን በቲ ቫይረስ ብከቢድ’ዩ ተጸልዩ። ክሳብ እስራን ኣርባዕተን ኣባላት ናይ’ቲ ፓርላማ ከምኡ’ውን ኣሰርተ ሓሙሽተን ተወሳኺ ፖለቲካውያን፡ ነበር ኮነ ህልው፡ በቲ ቫይረስ ተለኺፎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Kate Hudson, secretary-general of the Nuclear Disarmament Campaign, condemned Defender 2020 as “in our current health crisis, the test could endanger the lives of many US and European soldiers involved, as well as the communities of the testing countries.” . The Iranian government has been severely affected by the virus. Up to twenty-four members of parliament and fifteen other politicians, past and present, have been infected.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: ናይ ኢራን ፕሬዝደንት ሃሰን ሮሃኒ፣ ኣብ ማርች14 2020፣ ናብ ዓለም መራሕቲ ርዳእታ ዝሓትት ዕላው ደብዳቤ ጽሒፎም፣ ብሰንኪ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ኢራን ዘንበረቶ ማዕቀብ ናይ ዓለምለኸ ዕዳጋ ናይ ምርካብ ዕድል ዘይብሎም ምስምዃኑ፣ሃገሮም ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምቅላስ ኣዝዩ በዳሂ ኮይኑዋ ከምዘሎ ሓቢሮም። እቲ ለበዳ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ እውን ልክዕ ከም ካልኦት ሃፍታማት ሃገራት ካም ዩኒቨርሳል ናይ ጥ ዕና ክንክን፣ ዩኒቨርሳል ናይ ህጻናት ክንክን፣ ክፍሊት ዘለዎ ናይ ስድራ ቤት ናይ ስራሕ ፍቓድ ዝ ኣምሰሉን ካልኦት ዓበይቲ ደረጃ ናይ ፐብሊክ ጥዕና ናይ ገንዘብ ድጋፋት ዘጠቓለለ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ፖሊሲ ኣብ ስራሕ ንኸተውዕል ኣገዲዱዋ እዩ።
en-mt: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani, on March14 2020, wrote an official letter to world leaders asking for help, saying his country is facing a very challenging fight against the epidemic due to the lack of access to international markets due to US sanctions against Iran. The epidemic forced the United States, like other rich countries, to implement social policy that included universal health care, universal child care, paid family work permits, and other large-scale public health financial supports is.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: ናይ ፖለቲካ ተንተንቲ ክምዝብሉዎ፣ ኣብ ናይ ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ኣብ 2020 ፕሬዝዳንታዊ መረጻ መሊሶም ናይ ምምራጽ ዕድሎም ኣሉታዊ ጽልዋ ክሕድር ይኽእል እዩ ኢሎም። ኣብ መንጎ ደቡብ ኮሪያን ጃፓንን ዘሎ ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ርክብ ብ ሰንኪ እዚ ለበዳ ተጋዲዱ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Political analysts say it could have a negative impact on Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations between South Korea and Japan have been strained by the outbreak.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮሪያ ድሕሪ ጃፓን ማንም ካብ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ዝመጽእ ውልቀ ሰብ ኣብ መንግስቲ ዘዳለዎ ቦታ ን ክልተ ሰሙናት ክቕመጥ እዩ ምባላ፡ "ግልጽነት ዝጎድሎን ቅልጡፍ ዘይኮነን ናይ ኳራታይን ጻዕሪታት"ብምባል ኮኒናቶ።
en-mt: South Korea has condemned Japan's decision to quarantine anyone coming from South Korea for two weeks.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: ሕብረተሰብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ብናይ ፕረዚደንት ሙን ጀይ-ኢን ግብረመልሲ ኣብዚ ግዚ ቕልውላው መጀመርያ ተሓጒሶም።
en-mt: South Korean society was initially pleased with President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኮሪያውያን ውይ ብሰንኪ እቲ መንግስቲ ነቲ ለበዳ ዝሓዘሉ መንግዲ ግጉይ ብምባል ሙን ናብ ሕጊ ንኽቀርቡ ወይድማ ብ ምውዳስ ናይ ፊርማ ምትእኽኻብ ኣብ ምግባር ይርከቡ። እዚ ለበዳ ሃገራት ህጹጽ ኣዋጃት ንኽሕልፋ ኣኽኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: Many Koreans are collecting signatures either to prosecute Moon or in praise of him for the government's mishandling of the outbreak. The outbreak has led to states of emergency.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: ገለ ርኢቶ ወሃብቲ መንግስቲታት ናይ ስልጣን ትሕዝቶኦም ንኸጠንክሩ ክገብሮም እዩ ኢሎም ስክፍታኦም ይገልጹ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Some commentators are concerned that it will cause governments to strengthen their hold on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: ኣብ ሃንጋሪ፣ እቲ ፓርላማ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ቪክቶር ኦርባን፣ ብ ኣዋጅ ነዝይተወሰነ ግዜ ን ኽገዝኡ ድሕሪ ምፍቃድ፣ ፓርላማን መረጻን ጠጠው ከብሉን ኣብቶም ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስን ናይ መንግስቲ ነቲ ጉዳይ ዝሓዘሉ መንገዲታትን ናይ ሓሶት ሓብሬታ ዘጋውሑ ድማ ንኽቅጽዑ ወሲኑ።
en-mt: In Hungary, the parliament allowed Prime Minister Viktor Orban to rule indefinitely by decree, suspended parliament and elections and punished those who spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the issue.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ ን ብዙሓት ናይ ኣቕርቦት ሕጽረታት፣ ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምቅላስ ክበሃል ናይ ኣቑሑ ምጥቃም ዝወሰኸ ምስ ምዃኑ፣ በ ድንጋጸ ንዝግበሩ ዕድጊታት ፣ ናይ ፋብሪካን ናይ ሎጂስቲክ ስራሕቲ ብምቁርራጽ ክም ምኽኒያት ዝጥቀስ እዩ።
en-mt: The coronavirus pandemic is cited as the reason for many supply shortages, with the increased use of goods to fight the virus, by compassionate procurement , shutting down factory and logistics operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ናይ ምግቢን መድሓኒትን ምምሕዳር ብሰንኪ እቲ ወሲኹ ዘሎ ናይ ዓማዊል ድልየትን ናይ መቕረብቲ ምቁርራጻትን ሕጽረት መድሓኒትን ናይ ሕክምና ኣቑሑን ከጋጥም ክምዝኽ እል ኣጠንቂቑ።
en-mt: The US Food and Drug Administration has warned of a shortage of drugs and medical supplies due to increased customer demand and supply disruptions.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: ኣብ ውሱናት ቦታታት ከኣ ካብ ፍርሒ ዝተላዕለ ልዕሊ መጠን ዕድጊ ተራእዩ። በዚ ምኽንያት ምውዳእ መግቢ፡ ናይ ሽቓቅ ሶፍትን ዕሹግ ዝስተ ማይን ሕጽረታት ቀረብ ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: In certain places, there was over-purchasing out of fear. As a result, food shortages, toilet soap and bottled drinking water were in short supply.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: ናይ ቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪ ብዛዕባ ምድንጓያት ምልኣኽ ናይ ኤሌትሮኒክ ኣቑሑት ብፍሉይ ከጠንቅቕ ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: The technology industry has been specifically warning about delays in shipping electronics.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ WHO ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ፣ ን ናይ ወልቀም መሐለዊ ኣቑሑት ድልየት ብ 100 ዕጽፊ ወሲኹ ኣሎ።
en-mt: According to WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus , the demand for personal protective equipment has increased 100-fold.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: ብሰንክዚ ጠለብ፡ዋጋታት ክሳብ ስራ ዕጽፊ ንቡር ክብ ክብልን ከምኡ’ውን ምብጽጻሕ ናውቲ ሕክምና ብኣባርባዕተ ክሳብ ሽድሽተ ኣዋርሕ ክደናጎይ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: Due to this demand, prices have doubled and deliveries of medical supplies have been delayed by four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ሕጽረት ናይ ነብሰ ምክንኻን ናውቲ’ውን ኣምጺኡ። ክሳብ ኣብ ሂወት ሰራሕተኛታት ሕክምና ሓደጋ ከምዘውርድ ው.ጥ.ዓ የጠንቕቕ።
en-mt: It also brought about a global shortage of self-care items. The WTA warns that it can even endanger the lives of medical personnel.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ብምኽንያት እዚ ለበዳ ንደይጉ ሾፐርስ ውጽኢቶም ንቻይና ክሸጡ ዕድል ረኺቦም።
en-mt: In Australia, the outbreak has given Daegu shoppers the opportunity to sell their products to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: እዚ ንጥፈት ሕጽረት ናይ ህጻናት ፎርሙላ ኣብ ገለ ሱፐር-ማርኬትታት ስለዘምጸአ ብመንግስቲ ኣውስትራልያ ተኸልኪሉ። ዋላ’ኳ ሰሜናዊ ጥልያንን ዉሃንን ብ COVID-19ን ምስኡ ዝመጽእን ሓያል ጠለብ መግብን ዝያዳ እንተጠቅዓ፡ ክልቲአን ሃገራት ብሕጽረት መግቢ ኣይተሸገራን።
en-mt: This activity caused a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was banned by the Australian government. Although northern Italy and Wuhan have been hit hardest by COVID-19 and the strong food demand that comes with it, neither country has suffered from food shortages.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: እቲ ብቻይናን ጣልያንን ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣገደስቲ ኣቑሑት ምውህላልን ብኹቡር ምሻጥን ዝተገብረ ስጉምቲ ዕውት ነይሩ፣ ኣብ ኣውሮጳን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ክኸውን ዝኽእል እዩ ተባሂሉ ዝተገመተ ከቢድ ሕጽረት ምግቢ፣ ክውገድ እውን ተኻኢሉ እዩ።
en-mt: The measures taken by China and Italy to accumulate and sell essential commodities at high prices were successful, and severe food shortages in Europe and North America were avoided.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: ሰሜናዊ ጣልያን ምስ እቲ ዓብዪ ሕርሻዊ ምህርቲታታ፣ ዓብዪ ናይ ምህርቲ ምቕናስ እኳ እንተዘየጋጠማ፣ ብመሰረት ናይ ኢንዱስትሪ ወኪላት ግን ናይ ዋጋ ምውሳኽ ክህሉ ክምዝኽእል ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Northern Italy, with its large agricultural production, has not experienced a major decline in production, but there is a possibility of price increases, according to industry representatives.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: ባዶ መኽዘናት መግቢ ንግዚኡ ጥራይ’ዩ ተራእዩ፡ ኣብ ከተማ ዉሃን’ውን ዋላ እንተኾነ። ሓለፍቲ መንግስቲ ቻይና ነቲ ኣብ መኽዘን ዝነበረ ስጋ ሓሽማ ንህዝቢ ክቕልብ ናብ ሓፋሽ ዘርጊሖም።
en-mt: Empty food pantries have only been seen temporarily, even in Wuhan. Chinese government officials released the warehoused meat to the public.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: ኣብ ጣልያን እውን መፍረይቲን ህጹጽ እዋናት ዝኾን መሐለውታ ንክሕዙ ዘገድስ ተመሳሳሊ ሕጊ ኣሎ።
en-mt: There is a similar law in Italy that requires manufacturers to hold emergency protection.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: ኣብ'ቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ቁጠባ ዝበጸሐ ጉድኣት ኣብ ቻይና እዩ ተሰሚዑ ብመሰረት ናይ ማርች 16 ናይ ሚድያ ጸብጻብ፡ ብምኽኒያት መንግስቲ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ምዝማት ንምቁራጽ ዝወሰዶም ስጉምቲታት ናይ ቻይና ቁጠባ ኣብቶም ናይ 2020 መጀምሪያ ክልተ ሰሙናት ኣዝዩ ተሃስዩ ነይሩ፡ ናይ ችርቻሮ ዋጋ ድማ ብ 20.5% ንሂሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The damage to the global economy was felt in China According to a March 16 media report, the Chinese economy was hit hard in the first two weeks of 2020 due to the government's measures to curb the spread of the virus, with retail prices falling 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: ሜይን ላንድ ቻይና ዓብዪ ናይ ቁጠባን ናይ ፍርያትን ማእኸል ከም ምዃኑ፣ እቲ ናይ ቫይረስ ላብዕ ንናይ ዓለምለኸ ቁጠባዊ ንጥፈታት ኣዝዩ ዓቢዪ ናይ ምዕናው ስግኣት ከምጽኣሉ ከምዝኽእል ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Mainland China is a major economic and manufacturing center, and the pandemic could pose a serious threat to global economic activity.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: ኣጋቴ ዴማሪያስ ዝተብሃለ ካብ ኢኮኖሚስት ኢንተለጀንስ ክፍሊ ዝኾነ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዘሎ ዘይምርግጋዕ ፣ እስካብ ኣብ'ቲ ክመጽእ ዝኽእል ውጽኢት ንጹር ምስሊ እስካብ ዝዝርክብ ክምዝቕጽሉ ትብያኡ ኣቐሚጡ።
en-mt: Agate Demarias of the Economist Intelligence division predicted that the volatility in the market , will continue until a clear picture is available on the likely outcome.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ጃኑዋሪ 2020፡ገለ ተንተንቲ እዚ ለብዒ ኣብ ዓለማዊ ዕቤት ከስዕቦ ዝክእል ቁጠባዊ ውድቀታት ነቲ ኣብ 2002-2004 ምስ ምልዓል ሳርስ ዘጋጠመ ውድቀት ክሓልፎ ከምዝክእል ይግምቱ።
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts predict that the pandemic's economic slowdown in global growth could surpass the fallout from the 2002-2004 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: ክም ሓደ ናይ ኣብ St. Louis ዝርከብ ዋሺንግቶን ዩኒቨርሲቲ( Washington University) በዓል ሞያ ትንበያ፣ ኣብ ናይ ዓለም ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት እስካብ $300+ ቢልዮን ዝኾን ን ኽልተ ዓመት ዝጸንሕ ጽልዋ ክህሉ እዩ።
en-mt: As one of the in St. Louis. Louis, a Washington University forecaster, predicts a two-year impact of up to $300+ billion on the global supply chain.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: ትካል ናይ ፔትሮሊየም ኤክስፖርት ዝገብራ ሃገራት (OPEC) ብ ሰንኪ ብ ወገን ቻይና ዘጋጠመ ትሑት ናይ ነዳዲ ድልየት ናይ ነዳዲ ዋጋ ኣዝዩ ዝወረድ ምስ ምዃኑ እቲ ትካል "ክምዝተረበሸ" ጸብጻባት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) is reportedly "upset" as oil prices fall sharply due to low demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ COVID-19 ዝተረኽቦም ሰባት ቁጽሮም ብምውሳኹ ብ 24 ፌብሩዋሪ ዓለምለኻዊ ዕዳጋታት ወሪደን።
en-mt: Global markets fell on February 24 as the number of COVID-19 cases outside China increased.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: ኣብ 27 ፌብሩዋሪ፣ ብብዕባ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ እኩብ ጭንቀት ምኽንያት፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ U.S. ስቶክ ኢንዴክሳት NASDAQ-100፣ S&P 500 ኢንዴክስን ሓዊሱ ዶው ጆንስ ኢንዳስትርያል ማእኸላይ ካብ 2008 ዝበልሐ ውድቀት ፖስት ጌሮም፣ እቲ ዶው ምስ ምውዳቑ ተተሓሒዙ 1191 ነጥቢታት፣ ድሕሪ ናይ 2007-08 ናይ ፋይናንስ ቅልውላው ኣብ መዓልቲ ዘጋጠመ ልዑል ውድቀት እዩ።
en-mt: On February 27, due to collective anxiety over the coronavirus pandemic, various US stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 index and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their biggest fall since 2008, with the Dow falling 1191 points, after 20 years 07-08 of The financial crisis is the high point of the day.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ’ዚ ሰሙን ሰለስቲአን ምልክታት ብ10% ወሪደን።
en-mt: By the end of the week, all three brands were down 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 28፣ Scope Ratings GmbH ናይ ቻይና ናይ ልቓሕ ደረጃ ኣረጋጊጹ፣ እንተኾነ Negative Outlook (ኣሉታዊ ውጽኢት) ረኹቡ።
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China’s Credit Rating, but acquired a Negative Outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: ብ16 ማርች ዕዳጋታት ካብ ፍርሒ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተበገሰ ዝዓበየ ውድቀት ኣርእየን።
en-mt: On March 16, markets fell the most on fears of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ቁጠባዊ ቅልውላው ከጋጥም ከምዝኽእል ይግምቱ።
en-mt: Many predict an economic crisis.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: ክኢላ ቁጠባ መሓማድ ኢል-ኢርያን ነተን ብማእከላዊ ባንክታትን ሃገራትን ዝተወስደ እዋናዊ ህጹጽ ስጉምትታት ኣመስጊኑ።
en-mt: Economist Mohammad El-Irian thanked the timely emergency measures taken by central banks and countries.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: ማእኸላዊ ባንክታት ካብ እቲ ናይ 2008 ቁጠባዊ ውድቀት ብዝቐልጠፈ ግብረመልሲ ይህባ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Central banks are reacting faster than the 2008 recession.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: ብ ሰንኪ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ መስሕባት ሓዊሱ ህዝባዊ ቦታት ምዕጻው፣ ብ መንግስቲታ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝኾነ ዓይነት ጉዕዞ ኽግበር የብሉን ዝብሉ ምኽሪታት፣ ናይ ቱሪዝም ሴክተር ካብቶም ኣዝዮም ዝተሃሰዩ እዩ።
en-mt: The tourism sector is among the worst affected by travel bans, closures of public places including travel attractions, and government no-travel advice around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: ከም ሓደ ውጽኢቱ፡ ብዙሓት መንገድታት ኣየር፡ ከም ብሪቲሽ ኤርዌይስ፡ ቻይና ኢስተርን ኤርላይንስን ኳንታስ በረራታተን ክስርዛ ከለዋ፡ ብሪቲሽ ሪጅናል ኤርላይን ፍላይቢ ደስኪሉ።
en-mt: As one result, many airlines, such as British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qantas canceled flights while British regional airline Flybe was suspended.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ባህሪ ቱሪዝም ዘምጽኦ ጽልዋ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ተራእዩ ኣብ ዘይፈልጥ ደረጃ’ዩ በጺሁ።
en-mt: Its impact on nature tourism has reached an unprecedented level.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ባቡር ጣብያታትን ናይ ፌሪ ወደባትን እውን ተዓጽየን ይርከባ።
en-mt: Many train stations and ferry ports are also closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ምስ እቲ ቹንዩን ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ ምስ ናይ ቻይና ሓዱሽ ዓመት ዝተሓሓዝ ዋና ናይ ጉዕዞ ወቕቲ ተገጣጢሙ።
en-mt: The outbreak coincided with the main travel season, called Chunyun, which coincides with the Chinese New Year.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: ዓበይቲ ምድላዋት ሓዊሱ ብዙሓት ምድላዋት ብ ብሄራዊን ክልላዊን መንግስቲታት ት ኣጊዶም፡ እዞ ኦም ድማ ዓመታዊ ናይ ሓዱሽ ዓመት ፌስቲቫላት ዘጠቓልል ኮይኑ፡ ናይ ውልቀ ትካላት ድማ ብወገኖም ሹቓቶምን ናይ ቱሪስት ቦታት ክም ሆንግ ኮንግ ዲዝኒ ላንድ ዝ ኣምሰሉ ዓጺዮም ።
en-mt: Many events, including major events, have been banned by national and regional governments, including annual New Year's festivals, while private companies have closed their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: ብዙሓት መደባት ናይ ቻይናውያን ሓድሽ ዓመትን ሰሓብቲ ቱሪዝምን ከም ናይ በይጂንግ ፎርቢድን ሲቲ ን ካልኦትን ምትእኽኻባት ንምውጋድ ተባሂሉ ከምዝዕጸዋ ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: Many Chinese New Year events and tourist attractions such as Beijing Forbidden and City have been closed to avoid gatherings.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: ካብተን 31 ናይ ቻይና ግዝኣታት፣ ማዘጋጃ ቤታት ን ክልላትን፣ ኣብተን 24 ሰብ ስልጣናት ናይ ሓዱሽ ዓመት በዓላት ናብ ፌብሩዋሪ 10 ዘናውሑ እንትኾን ኩሎም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ድማ እስካብ እቲ መዓልቲ ከይኽፍቱ ድማ መምርሒ ሓሊፉ እዩ።
en-mt: Of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, 24 have extended New Year's holidays to February 10 and all workplaces have been ordered not to open until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: እዞም ክልላት ካብ ኣጠቓላሊ ናይታ ሃገር GDP 80% ዝውክላ እንትኾና፣ ካብ ኤክስፖርት ድማ ነቲ 90% ዝውክላ እየን።
en-mt: These regions represent 80% of the country's total GDP and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: ሆንኮንግ ነቲ ናይ ተመሓላለፍቲ ሕማማት ግብረመልሱ ናብቲ ዝለዓለ ጥርዚ ክብ ኣቢሉ፡ቤት-ትምህርታት ክሳብ መጋቢት ብምዕጻውን ጽንብላት ሓድሽ ዓመት ብምስራዝን ኩነት ሕጹጽነት ኣዊጃ። ብምኽንያት ምጉዳል ሰዓታት ሸቐጥን ምዕጻው ድኳናትን ኣብ ዕዳጋታት ዓለም ጽልዋ ኣውሪዱ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has declared a state of emergency by closing schools until March and canceling New Year's celebrations. It affected world markets due to reduced trading hours and shop closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: ብዝሒ በጻሕቲ ድኳናት ኣብ ኤሮጳን ላቲን ኣሜሪካን ብ40% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: The number of store visitors decreased by 40% in Europe and Latin America.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: ናይ ሰሜን ኣሜርካን ማእኸላይ ምብራቕን ቸርቸርቲ ካብ 50–60% ዝኾን ቕነሳ ኣጋጢምዎም።
en-mt: North American and Middle Eastern retailers experienced discounts of 50–60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ዚ`ውን ኣብ ናይ ዕድጊ ማእከላት ብ ማርች ዝተራእየ ብዝሂ ናይ እግረኛታት ምስ ናይ ፌብሩዋሪ ክነጻጽር ከሎብ33–43% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: As a result, the number of pedestrians in shopping malls decreased by 33–43% in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዘለው ናይ ዕዳጋ ማእኸላት፣ ከም ናይ ገደብ ምውሳኻት፣ ናይ ሸመትቲ ሙቐት ንምልካዕ ናይ ተርማል ስካነር ምትእትታው፣ ከምኡ እውን ናይ መደባት ምስራዝ ዝበሉ ተወሳኺ ስጉምትታት ኣተኣታትዮም እዮም። ብመሰረት United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America(ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ናይ ቁጠባ ኮሚሽን) ግምት፣ እቲ ለበዳ ዘኸተሎ ዝሕተላ እቲ ለበዳ እንተዘይህሉ ከኸትል ካብ ዝኽእል ኣብ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ ዝያዳ ንኣስታት 14 ክሳብ 22 ሚሊዮን ሰባት ኣብ ኣዝዩ ትሑት ናይ ድኽነት ደረጃ ከብጽሖም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Shopping centers around the world have introduced additional measures, such as increased restrictions, the introduction of thermal scanners to measure shoppers' temperatures, and cancellations. According to the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, the slowdown caused by the pandemic could leave about 14 to 22 million people in Latin America at a much lower level of poverty than it would have been in the absence of the pandemic .

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: ኣብ ጃኑዋሪን ለካቲትን 2020, ኣብ ዉሃን ኣብ ግዜ ልዑል ጻዕቂ ናይ’ዚ ለብዒ፡ ኣስታት 5 ሚልዮን ህዝቢ ቻይና ስራሕ ኣልቦ ኮይኖም።
en-mt: In January and February 2020, about 5 million Chinese people lost their jobs in Wuhan during the height of the outbreak.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ቻይና 300 ሚሊዮን ናይ ገጠር ስደተኛ ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ደሴት ዝርከቡ ገዛውቲ ተበታቲኖም ይርከቡ፣ ወይ ድማ ኣብ ሁበይ ግዝኣት ተሓይሮም ይርከቡ። ኣብ ማርች 2020, ልዕሊ 10 ሚልዮን ኣሜሪካውያን ስራሕ ስኢኖም ናብ ናይ መንግስቲ ድጋፍ ኣመልኪቶም እዮም።
en-mt: Most of China's 300 million rural migrant workers are scattered in island homes, or detained in Hubei province. As of March 2020, more than 10 million Americans were unemployed and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: ክም Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis፣ ናይ ኮርና ቫይረስ ለበዳ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ 47 ሚልዮን ዝኮኑ ስራሓት ዝጸሉ ኮይኑ ናይ ስራሕ ስእነት መጠን ድማ 32% ክበጽሕ ይኸእል እዩ። እቲ ምዕጻው ብ ዓሰርተታት ሚልዮናት ዝቑጸሩ ህንዳውያን ስደተኛ ሰራሕተኛታት(መዓልታዊ ክፍሊት ዝረኽቡ ዝነበሩ) ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ገይሩ እዩ።ኣብ ኣንጉስ ሬይድ ዝተገበረ ዳህሳስ ክምዝሕበሮ ካብ ናይ ካናዳ ስድራቤታት እተን 44% ገለ ዓይነት ስእነት ስራሕ ኣጋጢሙወን እዩ። ኣብ ስፔይን ካባቢ 900000 ሰራሕተኛታት በሰንኪ ኣብ ማእኸል ማርች 2020 ዝተነብረ ምዕጻው ስራሖም ክስእኑ ክኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Like the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis. Louis, the coronavirus pandemic will affect 47 million jobs in the United States and the unemployment rate could reach 32%. The closure has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers(who were earning daily wages) out of work.A survey in Angus Raid found that 44% of Canadian households experienced some form of unemployment. In Spain, around 900,000 workers lost their jobs as a result of the shutdown in mid-March

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: ኣብ ካልኣይ ክፋል ወርሒ ማርች፡ 4 ሚልዮን ሰራሕተኛታት ፈረንሳ ብሰንኪ ስራሕ ኣልቦነት ግዝያዊ ሓገዝ ክወሃቦም ሓተታ ኣቅሪቦም። ብተመሳሰሊ ሓገዝ ዝሓተቱ ብዝሒ ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ብሪጣንያ 1 ሚልዮን ክበጽሕ ከሎ፡ ኣብ ጀርመን’ውን ልዕሊ ፍርቂ ሚልዮን ትካላት ሰራሕተኝኦም ብመንግስቲ ዝተመወለ ‘ኩርዛባይት’ ዝተባህለ ግዝያዊ ሓገዝ ክረኽቡ ኣኽኢሎም።
en-mt: In the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits. Similarly, the number of workers who have applied for assistance has reached 1 million in the UK, while more than half a million companies in Germany have enabled their employees to receive state-funded temporary assistance.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: ብጀርመን ዝተወጠነ ናይ ስራሕ ካሕሳ መደብ ብፈረንሳን ብሪቴንን ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ።
en-mt: A work compensation scheme planned by Germany was accepted by France and Britain.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: ናይ መድረኽ ስነ-ጥበብ ምድላዋትን ባህላዊ ቅርሲ ሴክተራት በዚ ለበዳ እቶም ኣዚዮም ዝተሃሰዩ እዮም፣ በዚ ድማ ብዓለም ደረጃ ዘለው ናይ ትካላት ከምኡውን ናይ ውልቀ ሰባት ስራሕን ፣ ክልቲኦም ዝትቖጸሩን ዓርሶም ዝኸኣሉን ጽልዋ ሕዲሩዎም እዩ።
en-mt: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors are the most affected by the epidemic, with both corporate and individual work globally , both employed and self-sustaining.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: ውዱባት ስነ-ጥበብን ባህልን ባህላዊ ውርሻ ንኮም ክፉት ምግባር፡ ድሕነት ናይ ሰራሕተኝኦምን ሓፋሽን ምሕላው ከምኡ’ውን ንክኢላታት ስነ-ጥበብ ምድጋፍን ዘጠቃልል (መብዛህትኡ ግዜ ብህዝቢ ዝተመወለ)ሸቶኦም ንምትግባር ጽዒሮም።
en-mt: Arts and culture organizations sought to achieve their (often publicly funded) goals, which included keeping cultural heritage open to the community, protecting the safety of their employees and the public, and supporting arts professionals.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020፣ ኩሎም ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ን ብዝተፈላለየ ደረጃን፣ሙዝየማት፣ ላይበረሪታት፣ ናይ መድረኽ ስራሕ ቦታታት ን ካልኦት ባህላዊ ትካላት ንዘይተወሰነ ግዜ ተዓጽዮም፣ ዘካይዱዎም ኢግዚቢሽናት፣ ምድላዋት ን ናይ መድረኽ ስራሕቲን ድማ ተሰርዚም ወይድማ ናብ ካሊእ እዋን ተምሓላሊፎም እዮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, all museums, libraries, stage venues and other cultural institutions around the world and at various levels were closed indefinitely, and their exhibitions, events and stage performances were canceled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: ከም ግብረመልሲ ብዲጂታል መርበባት ዝወሃቡ ኣገልግሎታት ኣብ ምሃብ ጽዑቕ ጻዕርታት ተኻይዶም። ብቀረባ እዋን ብቅጽበት ካብዘጋጠሙ ሳዕቤናት እዚ ሕማም ምስራዝ ሃይማኖታዊ መደባት፡ ስፖርታዊ ንጥፈታትን ካልኦት ማሕበራዊ መደባት ከም ናይ ሙዚቃ ፈስቲቫላትን ኮንሰርታት፡ ናይ ቴክኖሎጂ ኣኼባታትን ፋሽን ሾውን የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: In response, intensive efforts have been made to provide services through digital networks. Recent immediate consequences include the cancellation of religious events, sporting events and other social events such as music festivals and concerts, technology meetings and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: ፊልም ኢንዱስትሪ’ውን ዝንባለታት ኣጋጢምዎ ይርከብ። ቫቲካን ነቲ ኣብ ሮማ ዝግበር ጸሎተ ሕማማት፡ ማለት መጨረሽታ ሰሙን ጾም ዓርብዓ፡ ከምዝተሰረዘ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The film industry is also facing trends. The Vatican has announced the cancellation of the Pentecost prayer in Rome, the weekend of Lent.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዲያቆናት ነቶም ብዕድመ ዝደፍኡ ኣመንቲ ክርስትያን ካብ ሰንበት ምቅዳስ ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑ ይመኽርዎም ኣለዉ። ገሊአን ቤተ-ክርስትያናት ብመርብብ ራዲዮ፡ ኢንተርኔት ወይ ቴሌቭዥን ይሰብካ ኣለዋ፥ ገሊአን ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ ማኪና ኮይንካ ከምዝስማእ ይገብራ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Many deacons are advising older Christians to stay home from Sunday Mass. Some churches are preaching over the radio, the Internet, or television, and others are making it heard from inside a car.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: ናይ ሮማን ካቶሊክ ደብሪታት ቤተ ክርስትያናቱ ምዕጻዉን ናይ ቅዱስ ጴጥሮስ ኣደባባይ ካብ ክርስቲያናዊ በጻሕቲ ነጻ ኣብዝኾነሉ፣ ካልኦት ናይ ሃይማኖት ኣካላት እውን ኣገልግሎታቶም ብ ምስራዝ፣ ኣብ ቤተ ክርስትያናት፣መስጊዳት፣ ምኹራባት፣ ቤተ-መቕደሳትን ኣብ ጉርድዋራ ዝግበሩ ህዝባዊ ምትእኽኻባት ወሰን ንኽግበሩ ገይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: While Roman Catholic monasteries have closed their churches and St. Peter's Square has been freed from Christian visitors, other religious bodies have also canceled their services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: ናይ ኢራን ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስተር ኣብቶም በቲ ለበዳ ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታት ናይ ዓርቢ ጸሎት ስርዛ ከምዝገበረ ድሕሪ ምእዋጅ ሼሪናት ድማ ጸኒሖም ክዕጸዉ ተገይሮም እዮም ፡ ሱዕዲ ዓረብ ድማ ካብ ወጻኢ ዝመጹ ናይ ሃይማኖት ተጉዓዝቲ ናብ ዓዳ ክይኣትዉ ድሕሪ ምክልኻል ዜጋታታ ድማ ናብቶም ኣብ መካን መዲናን ዝረከቡ ቅዱሳት ቦታት ንኽይኽዱ ኣጊዳ።
en-mt: Iran's health minister announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in the affected areas and sherines were later closed , while Saudi Arabia banned its citizens from visiting the holy sites in Mecca and Medina after preventing foreign pilgrims from entering the country.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ድሕሪ ካልኣይ ዂናት ዓለም ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ ስፖርትዊ ካላንደራት እቲ ዝዐበየ ምቁርራጽ ኣስዒቡ እዩ።
en-mt: The epidemic has caused the biggest disruption to international sporting calendars since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: መብዛሕቲኦም ዓበይቲ ንጥፈታት ስፖርት ከም በዓል 2019-20 UEFA Champions League፡ 2019-20 Premier League፡ UEFA Euro 2020፡ 2019-20 NBA season ከምኡ`ውን 2019-20 NHL season ተሰሪዞም ወይ ተሰጋጊሮም።
en-mt: Most major sporting events such as the 2019-20 UEFA Champions League, 2019-20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019-20 NBA season and 2019-20 NHL season have been canceled or postponed.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: ብምኽንያት’ዚ ለበዳ ኣብ መወዳእታ ወርሒ ሓምለ ክጅምር ተመዲቡ ዝነበረ ናይ ክረምቲ ኦሊምፒክስ 2020 ተሰሪዙ። “ድሕሪ 2020 ግን ቅድሚ ክረምቲ 2021 ከም ዝሰጋገር” ከኣ ብዓለምለኻዊ ኮሚተ ኦሊምፒክስ ብ24 መጋቢት ተሓቢሩ። ካሲኖታት ብዓለም ደረጃ ክዕጸዋ ከለዋ ናይ ፖከር ወይ ጠላዕ ውድድራት ከኣ ተሰጋጊረን ወይ ተሰሪዝን።
en-mt: The 2020 Winter Olympics, which were scheduled to start in late July, have been canceled due to the outbreak. “After 2020 but before the winter of 2021,” the International Olympic Committee said on March Casinos have been closed worldwide, and poker or gambling tournaments have been postponed or cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: እዚ ንብዙሓት ጠላዕ ተጻወቲ ናብ ኦንላይን ንክኸዱ ገይርዎም፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ኦንላይን ጣልዕ መጻወቲ መርበባት ድማ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ወሰኽ ቁጽሪ ተሳተፍቲ ኣብ ሓድሽ መምዝገቢአን ከምዘሎ ጸብጻብ ገይረን። ብዙሓት ናይ ሙዚቃ ጉጅለታት ናይ ኮንሰርት ዙር የቋርጹን ይስርዙን ብምህላዎም፣ እቲ ናይ መዘናግዒ ኢንዱስትሪ እውን ተጸልዩ እዩ።
en-mt: This has led many gamblers to go online, and many online gambling sites have reported a huge increase in the number of participants in their new registries. With many music groups discontinuing and canceling concert tours, the entertainment industry has also been affected.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: ካም ኣብ ብሮድዌይ ዘለዋ ዝበላ ብዙሓት ዓበይቲ ቲያትራት ኩሎም ምድላዋትን ጠጠው ኣቢለን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Many of the major theaters that Cam said are on Broadway have stopped all preparations.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: ገለ ኣርቲስትታት ኣብ ኢንተርኔት ስራሕቶም ክሰርሑን ከቕርቡሉ ዝኽእሉሉ መንገዲታት ረኽቦም ኣለው፣ ካብ'ቲ ባህላዊ ብቐጥታ ስራሕቲ ካብ ምቕራብ በተጻራሪ፣ ብ ኢንተርኔት ቐጥታ ፈነወታት ዝመሓላለፉ ሙዚቃዊ ምድላዋት ውይድማ ኣብ መርበብ ኢንተርኔት ዝተደረኹ ኣርቲስታት ስርሕቶም ዘቕርቡሉ፣ ዘከፋፍሉሉ፣ ዘሕትሙሉ "ፌስቲቫላት" ከም መማረጺ ቐሪቦም ኣለው።
en-mt: Some artists have found ways to work and present their work online, as opposed to traditional live performances, live musical performances over the Internet and “festivals” where online-based artists perform, distribute, and publish their work There are.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣብ ኦንላይን ዝዝርግሑ ኣብ ኮረና ቫይረስ ዘተኮሩ ሜምማት ኣብ መንጎ እቲ ዘሎ ስጋኣት ብምስሓቅ ን ብምዝንጋዕና ናብ ብዙሓት ተባጺሖም እዮም።
en-mt: Many online memes focused on the coronavirus have reached many by laughing and entertaining us amidst the fears.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: COVID-19 ካብ ዝዝርጋሕ ኣብ ልዕሊ ቻይናውያን፡ ምብራቕ ኤሽያ ዝመቦቐሎም ሰባትን ካብተን ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ዘለወን ሃገራት ሕቡራት መንግስታትን ኤሮጳን ዝመጹ ሰባትን ምፍልላይ፡ ጽልኢ ወጻእተኛታትን ዘርኣዊ ስጉምትታትን ክውሰድ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, discrimination, xenophobia and racial measures have been taken against Chinese, people of East Asian origin and people from the United States and Europe with the highest number of cases.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: ናይ ፍርሓት፡ ጥርጣረታትን ሕማቕ ሓሳባትን ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት በተለይ ድማ ኣብ ኣውሮፓ፡ምብራቕ ኤሽያ፡ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካ ን ኣብ ናይ ኤሽያ ፓስፊከ ክልላትን ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: Fears, suspicions and negative thoughts have been observed in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America and the Asia Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: ክም ናይ ፌብሩዋሪ ጽብጻባት(ኩሎም ጉዳያት ኣብ ውሽጢ ቻይና ጥራይ እንዳሃለው) ዶክመንት ዝተገበሩ ህዝቢታት ቻይና እቲ ቫይረስ ዝግብኦም እዩ፣ ዝግበኦም ቅጽዓት ድማ እዩ ዝብሉ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ብዝርከቡ ዝተፈላለዩ ጉጅለታት ዝተውሃቡ ዘርኣዊ መግለጺታት ኣለው።
en-mt: There are racist statements made by various groups around the world that the Chinese people deserve the virus and deserve punishment, documented as in the February reports (all cases within China only).

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: ገለ ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ዘሰጉማኦ ጸረ ቻይና ዝኾኑ ኣካይዳታት ምውሳኽ ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: There has been an increase in anti-China behavior promoted by some countries in Africa.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ዉሃንን ሁበይን ነበርቲ ብሰንኪ ናይ ኣከባቢያዊ መበቆሎም መድልዎ ከምዝበጽሖም ሪፖርት ገይሮም።
en-mt: Most residents of Wuhan and Hubei reported discrimination because of their local origins.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ኢንተርኔት መርበብን ካብኡ ወጻኢን ፡ ነቶም ኣብ ቻይና ዘለዉ በቲ ለብዳ ኣዝዮም ዝተጠቕዑ ቦታት ድጋፍ ይግበር ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: On and off the Internet , there has been support for the worst-affected areas in China.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ለበዳ ናብ ሓደሽቲ ቦታት ምዝማት ስዒቡ፣ ካብ ጣልያን፣ እታ ካብ ኣውሮፓ ሃገራት ብ COVID-19 ለበዳ ዝተጠቕዐት ናይ መጀመሪያ ሃገር፡ ዝኾኑ ስባት፡ ናብ ኣቶም ዘቕነዐ ጥርጣረን ዜኖፎቢያን ክጋጥሞም ይኽእል እዩ። ዜጋታት ማሌይዢያ፡ ኔው ዚላንድ፡ ሲንጋፖርን ደቡብ ኮሪያን ኣብ መጀምሪያ፡ነቲ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ብዝብል፡ ናይ ቻይና ዜጋታት ናብ ሃገሮም ከይ ኣትዉዉ ዝብል ናይ ፊርማ ምስብሳብ ስራሕቲ ክገብሩ ጸኒሖም እዪም።
en-mt: Following the spread of the epidemic to new areas, people from Italy, the first European country to be affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, may face suspicion and xenophobia directed at them. Citizens of Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea have initially been collecting signatures to prevent Chinese citizens from entering their country to prevent the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: ኣብ ጃፓን ኣብ ትዊተር ዝተዘርግሀ#ቻይናውያን-ናብ-ጃፓን-ኣይምጽኡ ዝብል ሃሽታግ ብዙሕ ኣዛራቢ ኮይኑ።
en-mt: The hashtag #Don't-Come-Chinese-to-Japan became a hot topic on Twitter in Japan.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: ህዝቢታት ቻይናን ካልኦት ኣብ እንግሊዝ ን ኣብ ኣሜሪካን ዝነበሩ ናይ ኣሽያ ህዝቢታት ካብ ጊዜ ናብ ጊዜ እናወሰኹ ዝመጹ ዘርኣዊ በደላትን መጥቃዕቲታትን ይበጽሖም ከምዘሎ ይዛረቡ።
en-mt: The peoples of China and other Asian peoples in the UK and the US say they are experiencing increasing racial abuse and attacks.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: US ፕረዚደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ንኮሮና ቫይረስ “እቲ ቻይናዊ ቫይረስ” ኢሉ ብምጽዋዕ ነቐፌታት ወሪዱዎ። እቲ ብሂል ብብዙሓት ከም ዘርኣውን ኣንጻር ቻይናውያንን ኮይኑ ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has been criticized for calling the coronavirus “the Chinese virus”. The saying is thought of by many as racist and anti-Chinese.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: ኣብ ዩክረይን ካብ ዉሃን ናብ ኖቪ ሳንዣሪ ዝተመልሱ ዩክሬናውያንን ወጻእተኛታትን ዝሓዘት ኣቶቡስ ብተቓወምቲ ተጠቒዓ።
en-mt: In Ukraine, a bus carrying Ukrainians and foreigners returning from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhari was attacked by protesters.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ካብ ምስ ቻይና ትዳወብ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቅ ህንዲ መጽዮም ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ህንዲ ዝመሃሩ ተምሃሮ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ግፍዒታት ከም ዝወረዶም ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: Students from northeastern India bordering China have been harassed in major Indian cities due to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: ዲሊፕ ጎሽ ዝተባህለ ናይ ባራትያ ጃንታ ፓርቲ ፕረዚደንት ናይ ምዕራብ ቤንጋል “ቻይናውያን ኣንጻር ተፈጥሮ ብምኻዶም’ዩ ኣምላኽ ቀጺኡዎም” ኢሉ ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: "God punished the Chinese for going against nature," said Dilip Gosh, president of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) in West Bengal.

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: እቶም ዝተውሃቡ ርኢቶታት ድማ ብ ኣብ ከልካታ ዝርከቡ ሰበ ስልጣን ቻይና "ገጉይ" ዝብል ነቐፌታ በጺሑዎም እዩ። ኣብ ቻይና፡ ብዚ ለበዳ ዝተጎሃሃረን ናብ ወጻእተኛታት ዘቕነዐን ወጻእተኛታት "ባዕዳዊ ጎሓፋ" ዝብለን "ይጎሓፉ" ዝብልን ዜኖፎቢያን ዘረእኛነትን ተራእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: The comments have been criticized as "wrong" by Chinese officials in Calcutta. In China, there has been xenophobia and racism, fueled by the epidemic and directed at foreigners, calling them "foreign garbage" and "throwing them away.

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ክፍሊት ገጽታት ዘለዎም ጋዜጣታት፡ ምእንተ ኮረና ቫይረስ ሽፋን ክብሉ ብ ኸፊል ውይድማ ሙሉእ ብምሉእ ኣልዒሎሞም ኣለው።
en-mt: Many newspapers with paid pages have partially lifted them completely for the sake of coronavirus coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሳይንሳዊ መጽሄታት ነዚ ለበዳ ዝገልጹ ሳይንሳዊ ጽሑፋት ብነጻ ከምዝዝርግሑ ገይሮም።
en-mt: Many scientific journals have published free scientific papers describing the epidemic.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: ገለ ሳይንቲስታት ዝረኸቡዎም ውጽኢታት ኣብ ልከዕ ክም bioRxiv ዝበሉ ቅድመ ምሕታም ሰርቨራት ምዝርጋሕ ይመርጹ።
en-mt: Some scientists prefer to publish their findings on prepublishing servers such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: ዝቐላቕሉ ተላባእቲ ሕማማት- ብሓድሽ ዝተቐላቐለ ባእታ ዝመጹ ተላባእቲ ሕማማት፡ ብዙሕ ግዜ ኣብ ዓቕሚ ዝርገሐን ናይ ምትሕልላፍ መንገድታት ሓደሽቲ’ዮም።
en-mt: Emerging infectious diseases- Infectious diseases caused by a newly introduced agent are often new in their ability to spread and their routes of transmission.

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: ግሎባላይዘሽንን ሕማምን- ናይ ግሎባላይዘሽን ናይ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍን ሓፈሻዊ ርኢቶ
en-mt: Globalization and disease—an overview of globalization and disease transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: ናይ ለብዒታትን ለበዳታትን ዝርዝር ሊስታ-ዝርዝር መጠነ-ሞት ብሰንኪ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት
en-mt: List of epidemics and epidemics-List of death rates from infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: ናይ ዱር እንሰሳት ኮንትሮባንድን ካብ እንሰሳት ናብ ደቂ ሰባት ሕማም ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ምህላውን- ምስ ናይ ዱር እንስሳት ንግዲ ዝተትሓሓዙ ናይ ጥዕና ሓደጋታት
en-mt: Wildlife smuggling and the potential for transmission of disease from animals to humans—health risks associated with the wildlife trade

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: ን ናይ ሕማም ምስትንፋስ ኮረና ቫይረስ 2019 (COVID-19) ንSARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስን ዝግበሩ ናይ ላብራቶሪ ፈተነታት ህላወ ናይ ቫይረስን ረኽሲ መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ ዝፈርዩ ጸረ-ነፍሳትን( antibodies) ዘፍልጡ መንገዲታት ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: Laboratory tests for the respiratory disease coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) and SARS-CoV-2 viruses include ways to detect the presence of the virus and the antibodies produced in response to infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: ኣብ ናሙናታት እቲ ቫይረስ ምህላዉ ብ RT-PCR እዩ ዝረጋገጽ፣ ናይቲ ኮሮናቫይረስ ' RNA ስለዘለሊ።
en-mt: The presence of the virus in samples is detected by RT-PCR, as it detects the coronavirus ' RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ እዚ ስፔስፊክ እዩ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ RNA ንከለሊ ጥራሕ እዩ ድማ ተሰሪሑ።
en-mt: This test is specific and is only designed to detect SARS-CoV-2 virus RNA.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: ናይ ቀረባ ግዜን ንጡፍ ረኽሲን ንምርግጋጽ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝወዓለ እዩ።
en-mt: It was used to confirm recent and active infection.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: ናይ ኣንቲ ቦዲታት ምርመራ (ሴሮሎጂ) ንምርመራን ህዝባዊ ሓለዋን ይጠቅም እዩ።
en-mt: Testing for antibodies (serology) is useful for diagnosis and public protection.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምርመራታት ክንደይ ሰባት በዚ ሕማም ከምዝተተሓዙ እዩ ዘርኢ፣ እቶም ምልክታቶም ኣዝዮም ኣናእሽተይ ዝነበሩ ወይ ምልክት ዘየርአዩ እውን ሓዊሱ።
en-mt: Antibiotic tests show how many people are infected, including those whose symptoms were very minor or showed no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: ትኽክለኛ መጠነ-ሞት ናይዚ ሕማምን ብዝሒ ናይ herd immunityን ብውጽኢት ናይዞም ምርመራታት እዮም ዝፍለጡ።
en-mt: The exact mortality rate of the disease and the amount of herd immunity are determined by the results of these tests.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: ውሱን ምርመራ ብምህላዉ፡ ካብ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ዝኾነ ሃገር ብዛዕባ ዝርግሐ ናይ'ቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ህዝብታቶም እሙን ዳታ ዘልዎ የለን።
en-mt: Due to limited testing, no country has reliable data on the spread of the outbreak in their populations since March

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: ኣብ 23 መጋቢት፣ ልዕሊ 3% ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ዝመርመረት ማንም ሃገር ኣይነበረትን፣ ኣብ ሃገራት ምርመራታት ዝካየዱሎም መገዲታት ድማ ዓብዪ ኣፈላላይ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and testing methods vary greatly across countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: እዚ ቁጽሪ ሪፖርት ንዝተገበሩ ናይ ሞት ኬዛት እውን ብዓብዪኡ ዝጸልው እዩ ዝመስል፣ ኣብ ገለ ሃገራት ልዕሊ ዝተገመቱ ክኾኑ ይረኣዩ ስለዘለዉ።
en-mt: This number also appears to significantly affect reported death cases, as they appear to be higher than expected in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: ናይ ብሓቂ ሪቨርስ ትራንስክሪፕሽን ፖሊመሬዝ ቸይን ግብረ መልሲ (rRT-PCR) ብምጥቃም እቲ ምርመራ ብዝተፈላለዩ ሜላታት ካብ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ብዝተወሰዱ ናሙናታት፣ ናዞፋሪንጃል ስዋብ ወይ ናይ ዓኽታ ናሙና ሓዊሱ ክካየድ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Using true reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the diagnosis can be performed by a variety of methods including samples from the respiratory tract, nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝተወሰኑ ሰዓታ ክሳብ 2 መዓልቲታት ክቐርቡ እዮም።
en-mt: Results will be available within certain hours and up to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: እቲ ብናይ ጎሮሮ ስዋብ ዝስራሕ ናይ RT-PCR ምርመራ ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይቲ ሕማም ሰሙን እዩ ተኣማኒ።
en-mt: The RT-PCR test with a throat swab is reliable in the first week of the disease.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: ጸኒሑ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሳንቡእ እናተራበሐ እንከሎ ኣብ ጉሮሮ ክጠፍእ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Later, the virus may disappear in the throat as it multiplies in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: ንኣብ ካልኣይ ሰሙን ምርመራ ዝገበሩ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት፣ ከም መማረጺ ናይ ናሙና ማቴርያል ካብ ውሽጢ መተንፈሲ ኣካላት ብሳክሽን ካቴተር ወይ መስዓሊ ማቴርያል (ዓኽታ) ምጥቃም ይከኣል።
en-mt: For infected persons tested in the second week, a suction catheter or drawing material (cough) can be used as an alternative to sampling material from within the respiratory tract.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: ሓደ ካብ እቶም ናይ መጀመሪያ ናይ PCR ፈተነታት ሓደ ኣብ በርሊን ውሽጢ ኣብ ቻሪቴ( Charité) ብ ወርሒ ጥሪ 2020 real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ብምጥቃም ማዕቢሉ እዩ፣ በዚ ድማ 250,000 ዝኸውን ኪት( kits) ብ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ተዘርጊሑ እዩ።
en-mt: One of the first PCR experiments was developed in Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), thus 250,000 kits by the World Health Organization It has been spread.

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ኣብ 23 ጥሪ 2020 ምርመራ ኣማዕቢላ እያ።ናይ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ተትካል Kogenebiotech ክሊኒካል ደረጃ ዘለዎ፣ PCR-መሰረት ዝገበረ SARS-CoV-2 መለለዪ ኪት (PowerChek ኮሮናቫይረስ) ኣብ 28 ጥሪ 2020 ኣማዕቢሉ።
en-mt: The United Kingdom developed a test on January 23, 2020. South Korean plant Kogenebiotech developed a clinical-grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek coronavirus) on January 28,

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: ነቲ ብኹሎም ቤታ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ሼር ዝተገበረ ናይ "E" ጂን ይደሊ፣ እቲ RdRp ጂን ድማ ብፍሉይ ን SARS-CoV-2።ኣብ ቻይና፣ BGI ጉጅለ ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ሕክምና ምህርቲታት ምምሕዳር ን PCR-መሰረት ዝገበረ SARS-CoV-2 መለለዪ ኪት ንኢመርጀንሲ ናይ ምጥቃም ፍቓድ ካብ ዝረኸቡ ትካላት ሓደ እዩ ኔሩ።ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ፣ ናይ ሕማም ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ማእኸል (CDC) ናይ 2019-ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ናይ ብሓቂ RT-PCR መመርመሪ ፓነል ናብ ናይ ህዘባዊ ጥዕና ሓለዋ ቤተ ፈተነታት ብናይ ዓለምለኻዊ መወሃሃዲ ሓገዛት ኣቢሉ ኣሰራጭዩ።
en-mt: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specifically for SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group of China National Medical Products Administration developed a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 identification kit for emergency of In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has provided a real RT-PCR test panel for the 2019-new coronavirus (2019-nCoV) to public health laboratories through global coordination grants It's a distributor.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: ካብ እቶም ሰለስተ ዝጸንሑ ናይ ጄነቲክ ፈተነታት( genetic tests) እቲ ሓደ ብሰንኪ ግጉይ ሪኤጀንትን( reagents) መደምደምታ ዘይብሎም ውጽኢታት እዩ ተረኺቡዎ ከምኡ ድማ ኣብ ኣትላንታ CDC ዝተናወሐ ናይ ፈተነ ኩነታትን ኣስዒቡ፥እዚ’ዩ ድማ ኣብ ሙሉእ ወርሒ ለካቲት 2020 መዓልታዊ ብገምጋም ካብ 100 ዘይበዝሕ ናሙናታት ብዕዉት ንኽካየዱ ዝገበረ።
en-mt: One of the three existing genetic tests was due to inconclusive results due to incorrect reagents and resulted in extended testing conditions at the Atlanta CDC, which is an average of no more than 100 samples per day throughout February successfully conducted them.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: ክልተ ኣካላት ተጠቒምካ ምረርመራ ምግባር ክሳብ 28 ለካቲት 2020 ተኣማኒ ተገይሩ ኣየተወሰደን ነይሩ፣ ድሕሪኡ ድማ እዩ ናይቲ ግዝኣትን ከባቢያዊን ቤተ ፈተነታት እቲ ምርመራ ክጅምርዎ ተፈቒድዎም።
en-mt: Two-body testing was not considered reliable until February 28, 2020, after which state and local laboratories were allowed to begin testing.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ ብናይ መግቢን መድሓኒትን ምምሕዳር ፍቓድ ተዋሂብዎ እዩ ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ግዘ ጥቕሚ ፍቓድ።US ኮመርሻል ቤተ ፈተነታት ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 መጀመርያታት ምርመራ ጀሚሮም።
en-mt: This test is approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an emergency benefit license. US commercial laboratories began preliminary testing in March

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 5 2020 ጀሚሩ ላብኮርፕ( LabCorp) ኣብ RT-PCR ዝተደረኸ ህላወ ናይ COVID-19 ብሃገር ደረጃ ምርመራ ክገብር ምዃኑ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: Starting March 5, 2020, LabCorp( LabCorp) will offer RT-PCR-based testing for the presence of COVID-19 nationwide.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics (ኩዌስት ዳያግኖስቲክስ) ብተመሳሳሊ ኣብ 9 መጋቢት 2020 ሃገር ለኻዊ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics also launched a nationwide COVID-19 test on March 9,

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: ምንም ዓይነት ናይ ገደብ ቁጽሪ ኣይተኣወጀን; ናይ ናሙና ምእካብን ፕሮሰስ ምግባርን ብናይ CDC ረቛሒታት መሰረት ክካየድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: No limit numbers were announced; Sample collection and processing must be conducted in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: ኣብ ሩስያ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ብናይቲ ግዝኣት ናይ ቫይሮሎጂን ባዮቴክኖሎጂን መጽናዕቲ ማእኸል VECTOR ማዕቢሉ ዝቐረበ እዩ።
en-mt: In Russia, the H1N1 test is developed and presented by the state's Virology and Biotechnology Research Center VECTOR.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ኣብ 11 ለካቲት 2020 እቲ ምርመራ ብፌደራል ናይ ሓለዋ ኣገልግሎት ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ዝተመዝገበ እዩ ኔሩ።ኣብ 12 መጋቢት 2020፣ ማዮ ክሊኒክ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ረኽሲ ዘለሊ ምርመራ ኣማዕቢሉ ተባሂሉ።ኣብ 13 መጋቢት 2020፣ Roche Diagnostics ኣብ 3.5 ሰዓታት ልዑል በዝሒ ምርመራታት ክገብር ንዝኽእእል ምርመራ ናይ FDA ፍቃድ ረኺቡ፣ ስለዚ ድማ ሓደ ማሽን ኣብ24 ሰዓታት 4,128 ዝኾኑ ምርመራታት ከካይድ ይገብር።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the test was registered by the Federal Protection Service. It received FDA approval, so a machine can perform 4,128 tests in 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: ኣብ 19 መጋቢት 2020፣ FDA ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ጥቕሚ ፍቓድ (EUA) ንናይ Abbott ቤትፈተነታት ሂቡ ኣብ Abbott's m2000 ሲስተም ንዝግበሩ መርመራታት; FDA ተመሳሳሊ ፈቓዳት ን Hologic, LabCorp, ከምኡውን Thermo Fisher Scientific ሂቡ ኔሩ።
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for testing on Abbott's m2000 system; The FDA granted similar approvals to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: ኣብ 21 መጋቢት 2020፣ Cepheid ብተመሳሳሊ ናይ 45 ደቓይቕ ዝወስድ ምርመራ EUA ካብ FDA ተቐቢሉ። ።
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid received a similar 45-minute EUA test from the FDA. .

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA ኣይዞተርማል ኒዩክሊክ ኣሲድ መጉልሂ ቴክኖሎጂ ዝጥቀም ምርመራ ኣብ ክንዲ PCR ንምጥቃም ፈቓድ ሂቡ።
en-mt: The FDA approved the use of isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: እዚ ቀጸልቲ ተቐያየርቲ ሙቐታት ዘየድሊ ስለዝኾነ እዞም ሜላታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓሙሽተ ደቓይቕ ዝኸውን ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ 13 ደቓይቕ ድማ ኣሉታዊ ውጽኢታት የቕርቡ።
en-mt: These techniques provide positive results within five minutes and negative results within 13 minutes as this continuous temperature variables are unnecessary.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ 18,000 ዝኾኑ እዞም U.S. ን Abbott ን ዘለዉ ማሽናት 50,000 ምርመራታት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ንከካይዱ ትጽቢት ይግበሮ ኣሎ።ሞኖክሎናል ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምስ ናይቲ ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኒዩክሎካፕሲድ ፕሮቲን (N ፕሮቲን) ብምትሕሓዝ ዝሰርሕ ምርመራ ኣብ ታይዋን ይምዕብል ኣሎ፣ ምርመራታት ከም ናይ ቅልጡፍ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ምርመራታት ኣብ 15 ክሳብ 20 ደቓይቕ ከካይድ ተስፋ ተገይርዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Currently, 18,000 are expected to conduct 50,000 tests in one day for machines and 50,000 machines in the same day. It is expected to run in 15 to 20 minutes.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: ናይ መጋቢት 2020 ናይ ጽሑፋት ገምጋም ናይ "ኣፍ ልቢ ራድዮግራፋት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይቲ ሕማም ደረጃ ነቲ ሕማም ናይ ምርካብ ክእለቶም ውሑድ እዩ፣ CT [computed tomography] ግን ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምፍጣሮም እውን ከለልዮ ይኽእል እዩ " ክብሉ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: A March 2020 literature review of "Oral cardiac radiographs have little ability to detect the disease in the early stages of the disease, but CT [computed tomography] can detect it even before symptoms develop

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: ኣብ CT ዝረኣዩ ልሙዳት ባህርያታቱ ክልተኣዊ ማልቲሎቡላር ሳዕሪ ዝመስሉ ምሽፋን ናብ ጸግዓዊ፣ ዘይምቕሩሕ ዳሕረዋይ ኣካል ምስርጫው እዮም።
en-mt: Its typical features on CT are bilateral multilobular grass-like coatings with infiltration into the lateral, unresolved hindlimb.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: ሳብፕሉራል ዓብላሊነት፣ ርግራግ ባይታን ኮንሶሊዴሽነን እቲ ሕማም እንዳገደደ ክኸይድ ከሎ ይምዕብሉ።
en-mt: Subplural dominance, background fractures and consolidation develop as the disease progresses.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: ኣብ መበቆል ናይዚ ሕዚ ለበዳ ዉሃን PCR ን CT ን ምንጽጻር ኣብ ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ፡ CT ልዕሊ PCR ብዝበለጸ ሕማም ከምዘሎ ዝፈልጥን ዋላ እንተኾነ፣ ብዝተሓተ ግን ኣየናይ ሕማም ኣይፈሊን`ዩ፣ መብዛሕትኦም ስሊታቱ ምስ ኒሞንያን ካልኦት ሕማማትን ዝመሳሰሉ እዮም።
en-mt: In a study comparing PCR and CT at the origin of the current Wuhan outbreak, although CT detects disease better than PCR, at least it does not distinguish which disease, most of its cells are similar to pneumonia and other diseases.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ናይ ራዲዮሎጂ ኮሌጅ( American College of Radiology) " CT ከም ናይ መጀምሪያ መጻረዪ ወይከዓ ናይ መጀምሪያ ደርጃ ናይ COVID-19 መመርመሪ ክኸውን የብሉን" ክብሉ ተላቢዮም። ካብ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ድማ CDC PCR ከም ናይ መጀመሪያ መጻረዪ ንክኸውን ለበዋኡ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: In March 2020 , the American College of Radiology recommended that " CT should not be used as a primary screening or first-line test for COVID-1 Starting in March 2020, the CDC recommended PCR as the primary screening test.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: ነዚ ሕማም ንምጥቃዕ ዝግበር ናይ ኣካላትና ስርዓተ-ምክልኻል ግብረ መልሲ IgM ን IgG ን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምምስራት ዘጠቃለለ እዩ።
en-mt: The body's immune response to attack this disease has included the formation of IgM and IgG antibodies.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: እዚኦም ድማ ምልክታት ድሕሪ ምጅማሮም ኣብ 7 መዓልታት ወይ ድሕሪኡ ነቲ ረኽሲ ንምርካብ፣ በዚ ሕማም ዘይጥቅዑ ከምዝኾኑ ንምርግጋጽን፣ ንናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ሓለዋን ይጠቕሙ።መርመራታት ኣብ ማእኸላይ ቤተ ፈተነታት (CLT) ወይ ብናይ ክንክን ነጥቢ ምርመራ (PoCT) ይካየዱ።
en-mt: These are useful for detection of the infection at or after 7 days after the onset of symptoms, to ensure that they are immune to the disease, and for population protection.Tests are performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: እቲ ልዑል-ዝሓለፈ ኣውቶሜትድ ሲስተም ኣብ መብዛሕትኦም ክሊኒካል ቤተ ፈተነታት እዞም ምርመራታት እዚኦም ከካይዱ ይኽእሉ እዮም ኣቕርቦቶም ግን ኣብ ናይ ሕድሕድ ሲስተም መምርቲ ሬት ዝድገፍ ይኸውን።
en-mt: The high-throughput automated system in most clinical laboratories can perform these tests but their delivery is subject to the respective system testers rates.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: ሴርያል ናሙናታት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምክትታልን ዋላ`ኳ እንተጠቀሙ፡ CLT ናይ ደም ነጻላ ናሙና እዩ ብልምዲ ዝጥቀም።
en-mt: Although serial samples are used to monitor immune function, CLT is commonly used as an isolated blood sample.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: ን PoCT ነጸላ ናይ ደም ናሙና መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ኣብ ቆርበት መርፍእ ብምውጋእ ዝውሰድ እዩ።
en-mt: An isolated blood sample for PoCT is usually obtained by injection into the skin.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: ከም ናይ PCR ሜላታት ኤክስትራክሽን ስጉምቲ ቅድሚቲ መርመራ ኣየድሊን።ኣብ መጋቢት 26, 2020, FDA ከምዝተሓተትዎ ነቲ ኤጀንሲ ምልክታ ዝሃቡ 29 ትካላት ሓቢሩ ስለዚ ድማ ሕዚ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ምርመራታቶም ከሰራጭዉ ክኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: As with PCR methods, the extraction step does not require pre-testing. On March 26, 2020, the FDA said 29 companies had applied to the agency and were now able to disseminate their antibiotic tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: ካብ ሚያዝያ 7, 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ብናይ ሃንደበታዊ ጥቕሚ ፈቓድ ብ FDA ሓደ ምርመራ ጥራሕ እዩ ተፈቒዱ።ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 መወዳእታታት፣ Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics (ዩሮኢሚዩን ናይ ሕክምና ቤተ ፈተነታት ዳያግኖስቲክስ) ን Epitope Diagnostics (ኢፒቶፕ ዳያግኖስቲክስን) ንናይ ምርመራ ኪታቶም ፍቓድ ረኺቦም፣ ኣብ ናይ ደም ናሙናታት ኣንጻር እቲ ቫይረስ ዝምረቱ IgG ን IgA ን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ንምልላይ ይጠቕሙ።
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one test has been approved by the FDA under contingency benefit approval.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received approval for their test kits, at Blood samples are useful for identifying IgG and IgA antibodies produced against the virus.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚ ዝተፈላለዩ ሓደ ሚእቲ ናሙናታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰዓታት ይምርምር፡ ስለዚ ድማ ልዕሊ እቲ ልሙድ ናይ ቫይረስ RNA PCR ምርመራ ኣዝዩ ዝፈጠነ እዩ።
en-mt: Assay capability tests one hundred different samples in a matter of hours, and is therefore much faster than conventional viral RNA PCR testing.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: እዞም ጸረ-ነፍሳት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድሕሪ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ምፍጣር 14 መዓልቲታት እዮም ዝፍለጡ።ኣብ ኣፕሪል መጀመርያ፣ UK ዝዓደገቶም ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኪታት ንምጥቃም ብቑዓት ከምዘይኮኑ ኣረጋጊጻ።
en-mt: These antibiotics are usually diagnosed 14 days after the infection occurs.In April first, the UK confirmed that antibiotic kits it had purchased were not fit for use.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: ሆንግ ኮንግ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑሉ ዝኽእሉሉ ሜላ ኣዳልያ፣ "ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ክፍሊ ናይ መመርመሪ ናሙና ቱቦ ነቲ ተሓካሚ ይህቦ "፣ እንትፍ ይብሉሉ ውጽኢቶም ድማ ጸኒሖም ክፈልጡ ይግበሩ።ናይ ብሪታንያ NHS ዝተጠርጠሩ ኬዛት ኣብ ገዛኦም ዝሕከሙሉ ሜላ ክጅምር ከምዝኾነ ሓቢሩ፣ ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ናብ ሆስፒታል ኣብ ዝመጹሉ ግዜ ከስዕብዎ ዝኽእሉ ስርጭት ንምቕናስ ወይ ሕሙማት ዘምጽኣ ኣምቡላስታት ዝግበረለን ዲስኢንፌክት ምግባር ንምቕናስ፡ ኣብ ናይ መኪናኻ ኮይንካ ብዝርከብ ኣገልግሎት ዝግበሩ ናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠርጠሩ ኬዛት ምርመራታት፣ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሰብ ሞያ ኣግባባዊ ዝኾኑ ቅድመ ጥንቃቐታት ወሲዱ ናሙናታት ይወስድ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has developed a method for suspected cases to stay at home, "the emergency department gives the patient a test sample tube ", they spit in and the results are known later Tests of suspected cases of COVID-19 by in-car service, health care professionals take appropriate precautions to reduce the spread or disinfection of ambulances.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: ኣብ ጎደናታት ኣብ መኻይን ምርመራ ዝገብሩ ማእኸላት ንደቡብ ኮሪያ ካብ ካልኦት ሃገራት ንላዕሊ ኣዝዩ ብዝቀልጠፈን ዝጸዓቀን መንገዲ ምርመራታት ንኽትገብር ኣኽኢሉዋ እዩ። ኣብ ጀርመን ናይ ሃገራዊ ማሕበር ስታቱቶሪ ጥዕና( National Association of Statutory Health Insurance) ሰብ ሞያታት ጥዕና ኣብ መጋቢት 2፡ ብተንቀሳቐሲ መስርሕ ኣብ መዓልቲ 12000 ምርመራታት ናይ ምግባር ዓቕሚ ከምዘለዎ ብምሕባር ኣብቶም ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ድማ 10700 ዝኾኑ ምርመራታት ከምዝገበሩ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: Street vehicle testing centers have enabled South Korea to conduct tests much faster and more intensively than other countries. In Germany, health professionals from the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance said on March 2 that the mobile process has the capacity to perform 12,000 tests a day, up from 10,700 last week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: አቲ ምርመራ ብዶክተር ዝተኣዘዘ እንተኾይኑ ወጻኢታት ብናይ ጥዕና መድሕን ይሽፈን።
en-mt: If the test is prescribed by a doctor, the cost is covered by health insurance.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: ናይ Robert Koch Institute (ሮበርት ኮኽ ትካል) ፕረዚደንት ከምዝበልዎ፣ ጀርመን ኣብ ሰሙን 160,000 ምርመራታት ናይ ምክያድ ሓፈሻዊ ብቕዓት ኣለዋ።
en-mt: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity of 160,000 tests a week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 19 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ብዙሓት ከተማታት ኣብ መኪናታት ዝግበር ምርመራ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Since March 19, vehicle inspections have been conducted in many cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: ካብ 26 መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተኻየደ ሓፈሻዊ ምርመራ ኣይፍለጥን፣ ምኽንያቱ ኣወንታዊ ምርመራታት ጥራሕ እዮም ሪፖርት ዝግበሩ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: The total number of tests in Germany since 26 March 2020 is unknown, as only positive tests are being reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ቤተ ፈተነ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ናይ ካላንደር ሰሙን 12/2020 ጀሚሩ እንተንኢሱ ብሓፈሻ 483,295 ናሙናታት ክሳብ 12/2020 ምርመራ ተገይርሎም 33,491 ናሙናታት (6.9%) ድማ ን SARS-CoV-2 ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢት ኣርእዮም።ኣብ እስራኤል፣ መጽናዕቲ መካየድቲ Technion ን Rambam ሆስፒታልን ናይ 64 ሕሙማት ናሙናታት ብሓደ ግዜ ምምርማር ዝከኣለሉ ሜላ ምሂዞም ፈቲኖሞን፣ እቶም ናሙናታት ብምሕዋስ እቶም ዝተሓወሱ ናሙናታት ኣዎንታዊ ኮይኑ እንተተረኺብዎም ጥራሕ ተወሳኺ ምርመራ ክግበሮም ዝገብር።ኣብ ውሃን 2000-sq-ሜትር ሃንደበታዊ መለለዪ ቤተ ፈተነ "Huo-Yan" (ቻይንኛ: 火眼, ወይ "Fire Eye" ብኢንግሊሽ) ኣብ 5 ለካቲት 2020 ብ BGI ተኸፊቱ፣ ልዕሊ 10,000 ናሙናታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ፕሮሰስ ዝገብር።
en-mt: Initial laboratory tests A total of 483,295 samples were tested at least since calendar week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, study conductors Technion and Rambam Hospital They devised and tested a method of simultaneously testing samples of 64 patients, mixing the samples so that they could be further tested only if the mixed samples tested positive. Fire Eye" in English) opened on February 5, 2020 by BGI, processing more than 10,000 samples per day.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: እዚ ህንጻ ብናይ BGI-መስራቲ Wang Jian እንዳተራኣየ 5-መዓልታት ወሲዱ። እዚ ናይ ምርመራ ዓቕሚ ክምዕብል እንተዘይከኣል ኔሩ፡ ናይ ሁቤይ ኬዛት ካብዚ ናይ ሕዚ 47% ንላዕሊ ምኾኑ ነይሮም ናይ ክትትልን ውሸባን ወጻኢ ድማ ዕጽፊ ክውስኽ ይኽእል ምንባሩ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: This building took 5-days being shown by BGI-founder Wang Jian. If this testing capacity had not been developed, Hubei's cases would have been 47% higher than the current level and the cost of surveillance and quarantine could have doubled.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: ናይ ዉሃን ቤተ ፈተነ ብ Huo-Yan ቤተ ፈተነታት ናይ Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, ከምኡውን Shanghai ተኸቲሉ፣ ብጠቕላላ ኣብ ናይ ቻይና 12 ከተማታት።
en-mt: The Wuhan lab was followed by the Huo-Yan labs of Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 Chinese cities.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: ኣብ 4 መጋቢት 2020 መዓልታዊ ምርመራታት ብሓፈሻ 50,000 ምርመራታት ብመዓልቲ ኮይኖም።ክፍቲ ምንጪ፣ ብ Origami ምርመራታት ዝቐረበ ንድፊ ልዕሊ ናይ 1122 ሕሙማት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ናሙናታት 93 መመርመሪታት ጥራሕ ክምርምር ይገብር።እዞም ዝተመጣጠኑ ንድፊታት ኣብ ኣናእሽተይ ቤተ ፈተነታት ብዘይ ናይ ሮቦት ፈሰስቲ ተሓዝቲ ሓገዝ ክካየዱ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: As of March 4, 2020, daily tests totaled 50,000 tests per day.Open source, the design by Origami Tests allows only 93 tests to test more than 1,122 patients' COVID-19 samples They can .

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት፣ ኣብ EU ን UK ን ከምኡውን US ናይ ሪኤጀንት ሕጽረታትን ዘይብቑዕነትን ብዙሕ ምርመራ ንምክያድ ዓብዪ ውጥረት ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: In March, reagent shortages and inefficiencies in the EU and the UK and the US have been a major stress to conduct a lot of testing.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: እዚ ሓደሓደ ጸሓፍቲ ንናሙናታት ኣብ 98 °C (208 °F) ን 5 ደቓይቕ ምውዓይ RNA ጄኖማት ንዝበለጸ ምርመራ ምስዳድ እውን ዘካተተ ናይ ናሙና ምድላው ፕሮቶኮላት ንክድህስሱ ጌርዎም እዩ።ኣብ 31 መጋቢት United Arab Emirates (ሕቡራት መንግስታት ዓረብ ኤሜሬትስ) መብሕትኦም ብዝሒ ህዝቡ ልዕሊ ማንም ካልእ ሃገር ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ምርመራ እንዳገበረት ከምትርከብ ተሓቢሩ፣ ማዕረ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ምርመራ ንምግባር እንዳሰርሐት ከምትርከብ ድማ ተገሊጹ እዩ።
en-mt: This led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that also included heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes and sending RNA genomes for further analysis The country is testing for the virus, and is working to test as much as its population.
