sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: ናይ ኣብ መኪናኻ ከለኻ ብዝርከብ ኣገልግሎትን፣ ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ስኬል ካብ ቤተ ፈተነ ጉጅለ 42 ን BGIን(ኣብ ናይ "Huo-Yan" ሃንደበታዊ መለለዪ ቤተ ፈተነታት ናይ ቻይና መሰረት ዝገበረ) ምትሕብባር እዩ።
en-mt: of by the service available in your car, and the population scale from the laboratory of Group 42 and BGI (based on the "Huo-Yan" random identification laboratories of China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: ኣብ 14 መዓልቲታት ዝተሃንጸ ኮይኑ፣ እዚ ቤተ ፈተነ ዓሰርተ ኣሽሓት ናይ RT-PCR ምርመራታት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ከካይድ ይኽእል እዚ ድማ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ እንትካየድ ንመጀመርያ ግዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Built in 14 days, the laboratory can conduct tens of thousands of RT-PCR tests in a single day, the first time outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: ኣብ ናይቲ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተፈላለዩ ጀኒቲክ ገጽታ ዘነጻጸሩ ዝተፈላለዩ መመርመሪ ትእዛዛት ኣብ ቻይና፣ ፈረንሳይ፣ ጀርመን፣ ሆንግ ኮንግ፣ ጃፓንን ዩናይትድ ስቴትስን ማዕቢሎም።
en-mt: Various testing protocols comparing different genetic aspects of the coronavirus have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለወን ባዕለን ከምርታ ዘይኽእላ ሃገራት ዝስደድ ዘሎ ናይ ጀርመን ናይ ኪት ምህርቲ ተቐቢልዎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has welcomed German kits being exported to low-income countries that cannot produce themselves.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: ናይ ጀርመን ቅመማ ኣብ ጥሪ 17 2020 እዩ ተሓቲሙ፡ እቲ ብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ( U.S.) ማእከል ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ዝተዳለወ ፕሮቶኮል ክሳብ ጥሪ 28 ዝርከብ ስለዘይነበረ ናይ ምርመራታት ምድንጓይ ተፈጢሩ ነይር። ቻይናን U.S.ን እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምጅማሩ ኣብ ተኣማንነት ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት (test kits) ጸገም ኣጋጢሙወን ነይሩ እዩ፡ እዘን ሃገራት እዚእንን ኣውስትራሊያን ድማ ብሰብ ሞያ ሕክምና ብዝተብሃሎ መሰረትን ጠለብን ኣብ ምምላእ እኹል ኪትስ ክቕርባ ኣይከኣላን።
en-mt: The German formulation was published on January 17 2020. The protocol developed by the United States( US) Centers for Disease Control was not available until January 28, causing testing delays. China and the US had problems with the reliability of test kits at the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to meet the demands of medical professionals.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ክነጻጸር ከሎ፣ ሰብ ሞያታት ናይ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ሰፊሕ ናይ ምርመራ ኣቕርቦት ስርጭት ሓድሽ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ቀኒስዎ ይብሉ።
en-mt: In comparison, experts say South Korea's extensive testing supply has reduced the spread of the new coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: ናይ ምርመራ ዓቕሚ፣ ብዓብይኡ ኣብ ናይ ግሊ ቤተ ፈተነታት፣ ኣብ ብዙሓት ዓመታት ብናይ ደቡብ ኮርያ መንግስቲ ዝተሰርሑ እዮም።
en-mt: Testing capabilities, largely in private laboratories, have been built over many years by the South Korean government.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: ኣብ 16 ማርች፣ ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናይ ምርመራ ፕሮግራማት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ንምቕናስ ከሳልጡ ሓቲቱ።በቲ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ሰፊሕ ምስርጫው ብዝፈጠሮ ኣማኢት ኣሽሓት ናይ ግሊ ምርመራታት ኣብ ናይ U.S. ቤት ፈተነታት ስለዝተኻየዱ፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ስዋባትን ኬሚካል ሬጀንትን ኣቕርቦት ስለዝተዳኸመ ናይ ምርመራ ልዑል ሕቶታት ይቐርቡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization called for a reduction in testing programs for COVID-1 .

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ቻይና ኣብ ናይ መመርመሪ ኪቶም ዘጋጠመሞ ናይ ዘይትኽክለኛት ጸገም ሪፕሮት ጌሮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported an inaccuracy problem with their test kits.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴተስ፣ ብ CDC ዝማዕበሉ ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት "ጸገማት;" ነይርዎም፣ እቲ መንግስቲ ድሕሪኡ ናይ ግሊ ሕክምናታት ምርመራ ኣጊዱ ዝበረ ቢሮክራቲክ ገደብ ኣልዒሉ።ሰፔን ካብ ናይ ቻይና Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd መመርመሪ ኪታት ዓዲጋ፣ ውጽኢታቶም ድማ ዘይትኽክል ከምዝኾነ ኣረጋጊጻ።
en-mt: In the United States, test kits developed by the CDC have "problems;" The government then lifted bureaucratic restrictions that banned testing of private treatments. Spain bought test kits from China's Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd and confirmed that their results were inaccurate.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: እቲ ትካል እዞም ዘይትኽክለኛ ውጽኢታት ናይ ናሙናታት ኣተኣኻኽባ ጸገም ዘስዐብዎ ወይ እቶም ኪታት ብትኽክል ብዘይ ምጥቃም ዝመጸ ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ ኢሉ።
en-mt: The agency said these inaccurate results may have been caused by sample collection problems or by not using the kits correctly.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: ናይ ስፓኒሽ ሚኒስትሪ ዝተሰሓሓተ ውጽኢት ዘምጽኡ ኪታት ኣወጊዱ፣ ብ Shenzhen Bioeasy ዝቐረቡ ካልኦት መመርመሪ ኪታት ከምዝጥቀም ሓቢሩ።80% ናይ እዞም ቼክ ሪፐብሊክ ካብ ቻይና ዝዓደገቶም መመርመሪ ኪታት ዝተሰሓሓተ ውጽኢት ሂቦም።ስሎቫኪያ ካብ ቻይና 1.2 ሚለዮን ኪታት ዓዲጋ ዘይትኽክለኛታት ኮይኖም ድማ ረኺባቶም።
en-mt: The Spanish ministry said it had eliminated kits that gave conflicting results and would use other test kits provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy. 80% of the kits purchased by the Czech Republic from China gave conflicting results.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር Matovič እዚ ናብ Danube ንክድርበ ሓሳብ ሂቦም።Ateş Kara ናይ ቱርኪ ጥዕና ሚኒስትሪ ቱርኪ ካብ ቻይናዝዓደገቶም ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት "ልዑል ናይ ጌጋ ሬት" ከምዝነበሮምን "ከምዘይተጠቐምዎምን" ሓቢሮም።UK 3.5 ሚልዮን ናይ ምርመራ ኪታት ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020 መጀመርያታት ግን ንጥቅሚ ዝውዕሉ ከምዘይኮኑ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovič suggested this be thrown into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said test kits Turkey bought from China had a "high error rate" and "were not used She said they weren't.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: ምርመራ፣ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ዘርአዩ ምውሻብን እዞም ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝነኽእዎም ሰባት ምክትታልን፣ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢታት የርእዩ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Testing, quarantine of positive cases and follow-up of contacts of these SARS-CoV-2 positive cases are showing positive results.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ጣልያን ከተማ Vò፥ ኣብ ጣልያን ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቦታ ሞት ፣ ዝሰርሑ ዘለዉ ተመራመርቲ ኣብ 3,400 ዝኾኑ ሰባት ክልተ ዙር ምርመራ ኣካይዶም፣ በብ ዓሰርተ መዓልታት ኣፈላላይ።
en-mt: In the Italian city of Vò, Italy's first COVID-19 death site , researchers conducted two rounds of testing on some 3,400 people, ten days apart.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: ዳርጋ ፍርቂ ዝኾኑ ፖዚቲቭ ውጽኢት ዘለዎም ምልክት ዘይብሎም እዮም፣ ኩሎም ዝተረኸቡ ኬዛት ድማ ተወሺቦም።
en-mt: Nearly half of positive results are asymptomatic, and all detected cases were quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: ናብቲ ኮም ጉዕዞ ብምኽልካሉ፣ እዚ ሓደሽቲ ረኽሲታት ከወግድ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: By preventing travel to the com, this can prevent new infections.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: ብሓያል ናይ ንኽክእ ክትትል፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ምርመራታትን ውሸባን፣ ናይ 2020 ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ ምስ ካልኦት ዝማዕበላ ሃገራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ኣዝዩ ትሑት ክኸውን ክኢሉ እዩ፣ እዚ ክኸውን ዝኸኣለ ድማ ብዘይ ኣገዳዲ ናይ ሬስቶራንትታትን መሸጣ ቦታታት ምዕጻው እዩ።
en-mt: With strong contact surveillance, travel restrictions, testing and quarantine, the 2020 coronavirus outbreak in Singapore has been very low compared to other developing countries, without the mandatory closure of restaurants and outlets.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ምድላዋት ተሰሪዞም እዮም፣ ሲንጋፖር ድማ ንነበርቲ ኣብ ገዝኦም ንክጸንሑ ኣብ 28 መጋቢት ምልላይ ጀሚራ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ቤት ትምህርቲታት ድሕሪ ናይ በዓል ዕረፍቲ ኣብ 23 መጋቢት ኣብ ግዚኦም ተኸፊቶም።
en-mt: Most arrangements were cancelled, and Singapore began promoting residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time on 23 March after the holiday break.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ካልኦት ሃገራት ነቲ ለበዳ ብሓያል ናይ ንኽክእ ክትትል፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ምርመራታትን ኳራንቲንን፣ እሞ ግን ክነንድቲ ኣገዳዲ ብዘይኮነ ምዕጻዋት ክቆጻጸርኦ ክኢለነ እየን፣ ንኣብነት ኣይስላንድን ደቡብ ኮርያን።
en-mt: Various other countries have been able to control the outbreak with strong contact surveillance, travel restrictions, testing and quarantine, but not so mandatory closures, such as Iceland and South Korea.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: ስታስቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ብዙሕ ምርመራ ዝገበራ ሃገራት፣ ምስ ናይ ሞት ቁጽሪ ክነጻጸር ከሎ፣ ዝተሓተ ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣለወን፣ እዚ ድማ እዘን ሃገራት ቀሊል ምልክት ዘለዎምን ምንም ምልክት ዘይብሎምን ሰባት ምፍላይ ብምኽኣለን እዩ ዝኸውን።
en-mt: Statistical studies Countries with multiple diagnoses have lower mortality rates, compared to death rates, because these countries are able to distinguish between people with mild symptoms and those with no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: ውድብ ዓለም ጥዕና(WHO) ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚን ዘይብለንን ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ COVID-19 ወሱን ልምዲ ዘለዎ ሃገራዊ ላብራቶሪ ዘለወን ሃገራትን፡ እቶም ናይ መጀመሪያ ሓሙሽተ ኣዎንታዊን፡ ዓሰርተ ኣሉታዊ ናይ COVID-19 ምርመራ ውጽኢታት ናብ እተን 16 ናይ WHO መወከሲ ላብራቶሪታት ክልእኻ ኣለወን ክብል ተላቢዩ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has urged countries without testing capacity and with national laboratories with limited experience in COVID-19 to send the first five positive and ten negative results to the 16 WHO reference laboratories .

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: ካብ 16 መወከስቲ ቤትፈተነታት፣ 7 ኣብ ኤስያ፣ 5 ኣብ ኣውሮፓ፣ 2 ኣብ ኣፍሪካ፣ 1 ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካ 1 ድማ ኣብ ኣውስትራሊያ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: ኣብ ዝስዕብ ቻርት፣ ረድፊ “ኣወንታዊናይ % ምርመራታት” ብናይታ ሃገር ናይ ምርመራ ፖሊሲ እዩ ዝውሰን።
en-mt: In the following chart, the ranking of “positive % tests” is determined by the country’s testing policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: ናብ ሆስፒታል ዝመጹ ሰባት ጥራሕ ምርመራ ትገብር ሃገር ካብ ዜጋታታ ኩሎም ትምርምር ሃገር ንላዕሊ ፖዘቲቭ ብ % ምርመራ ይህልዋ፣ ምልክት የርእዩ ኣየርአዩ ብዘየገድስ፣ ካልኦት ነገራት ማዕረ እንከለዉ።
en-mt: A country that only tests people who come to the hospital will have a higher % of positive tests than a country that tests all its citizens, regardless of whether they show symptoms or not, other things being equal.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ፣ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት እውን ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ኮይኑ፣ ካብ ኢድካ ሓመድ፣ ቅብኣት፣ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት፣ ወይ ካልኦት ዘይተደለዩ ጥረ ነገራት ንምእላይ ዕላማ ዝሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing, also known as hand hygiene, contains the goal of removing dust, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted raw materials from your hands.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽጢ መዓልቲ ኣብ ዘለዉ "ኣገደስቲ ግዘታት " ብቐጻልነት ኣእዳውካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ናይ ብዙሓት ሕማማት ምምሕልላፍ ይቕንስ እዩ፣ ንኣብነት ተቕማጥን ኮሌራን፣ ብ ካብ ፍታን–ናብ ኣፍ መገዲ ዝመሓላለፉ ሕማማት እዮም።
en-mt: Washing your hands regularly with soap at “critical times” during the day reduces the transmission of many diseases, such as diarrhea and cholera, which are transmitted by the mouth–to-mouth route.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: ሰባት ንኣብነት፣ ዓይኖም፣ ኣፍንጭኦም፣ ወይ ኣፎም (ንኣብነት፣ ሙከስ መምብሬን) ቅድሚ ምንክኦም ኢዶም እንተዘይተሓጺቦም ብናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት እውን ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም ።
en-mt: People can also get respiratory diseases if they do not wash their hands before touching, for example, their eyes, nose, or mouth (e.g., mucous membranes).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ኣብ መዓልቲኹም ኢድ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዘድልየሎም ሓሙሽተ ወሰንቲ ግዘታት: ቅድሚን ድሕሪን ምፍታንኩም፣ ድሕሪ ናይ ህጻንኩም መዓኮር ምሕባስኩም ወይ ናፒ ምቕያርኩም፣ ቅድሚ ውላድኩም ምምጋብኩም፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕኩምን ቅድሚ ምግቢ፣ ጥረ ስጋ፣ ዓሳ፣ ጸባን ምድላውኩም እዮም።
en-mt: The five key times in your day to wash your hands with soap are: before and after testing, after rubbing your baby’s butt or changing a nappy, before feeding your baby, before eating and before preparing food, raw meat, fish, and dairy.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: ማይን ሳሙናን ኣብ ዘይርከበሉ ግዘ፣ ኣእዳውኩም ብሓሞኽሽቲ ምጽራይ ትኽእሉ። ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ እዩ ዝመክር:
en-mt: When soap and water are not available, you can clean your hands with soap. The World Health Organization recommends hand washing:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: ምግቢ ቅድሚ ምድላውኩም፣ ኣብተዳልዉሉ ግዘን ድሕሪኡን።
en-mt: Before, during and after preparing food.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: ንዝሓመመ ሰብ ቅድሚን ድሕሪን ምትንካፍ።
en-mt: Before and after touching a sick person.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: ሽቓቕ ናይ ዝተጠቐመ ህጻን ዳየፐር ድሕሪ ምቕያር ወይ ድሕሪ ምጽራይ።
en-mt: After changing or cleaning the toilet of a used baby’s diaper.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫኹም ምንፋጥኩም፣ ምስዓልኩም ወይ ምህንጣስኩም።
en-mt: After you sneeze, cough or sneeze.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: እንስሳት ድሕሪ ምትንካፍ፣ ምምጋብ፣ ወይ ናይ እንስሳት ቀልቀል ድሕሪ ምትንካፍ።
en-mt: After touching, feeding, or touching animal droppings.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ምስ ሕክምናዊ ከይዲታት ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ጽሬት ተግባራት ይውክሉ።
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene represent hygiene practices associated with medical procedures.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: ቅድሚ መድሓኒት ወይ ሕክምናዊ ክንክን ምትግባር ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ስርጭት ክከላኸል ወይ ክቕንስ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands before applying medicine or medical care can prevent or reduce the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ዋና ናይ ጥዕና ዕላምኡ ኣእዳው ካብ ፓቶጂናትን (ሕማም ከስዐቡ ዝኽእሉ ባክቴርያ፣ ቫይረስመ፣ ወይ ካልኦት ማይክሮኦርጋኒዛማት) ጉድኣት ወይ ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ኬሚካላትን ምጽራይ እዩ።
en-mt: The main health purpose of hand washing is to clean hands from pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals that can cause harm or disease.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ብፍላይ ምግቢ ንዝሕዙ ሰባት ወይ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምና ፊልድ ዝሰርሑ ሰባት እዩ ዘገልግለል፣ ንሓፈሻዊ ህዝቢ እውን ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: This is especially useful for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but it is also useful for the general public.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናይ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ፣ ኮሮናቫይርስ፣ ከምኡውን ካልኦት ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ዝርጋሐ ምቕናስ፣ ናይ ተቕማጥ ረኽሲ መምጽኢ ምኽንያታት ምክልኻል፣ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ረኽሲታት ምቕናስ ሓዊሱ፣ ብዙሓት ናይ ጥዕና ጥቕሚታተ ኣለዉዎ።
en-mt: Hand washing has many health benefits, including reducing the spread of influenza, coronaviruses, and other infectious diseases, preventing the causes of diarrheal infections, and reducing respiratory infections.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ኣብ ገዛ ንዘጋጥም ሕርሲ ናይ ናጽላታት ቁጽሪ ሞት ምቕናስ።
en-mt: Reduce the number of infant deaths due to home deliveries.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: ኣብ 2013 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ዝተመሓየሸ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተግባራት ናብ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ዝኾኑ ህጻናት ናይ ንውሓት ጸገም ከምዘስዕብ ኣርእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices lead to height problems in children under five.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ዘይማዕበሉ ሃገራት፣ ብሰንኪ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስን ናይ ተቕማጥ ሕማማትን ዘጋጥሙ ናይ ህጻናት መጠን ሞት፣ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ብምሕጻብ ካልኦት ቀለልቲ ባህርያዊ ለውጢታትን ብምልላይ ከተጉድሎም ትኽእል።
en-mt: In underdeveloped countries, you can reduce child mortality from respiratory and diarrheal diseases by washing your hands with soap and introducing other simple behavioral changes.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: እዚ ቀሊል ተግባር በዚ ሕማም ዝመጽእ ሞት ብ 50% የጉድሎ።
en-mt: This simple act reduces deaths from the disease by 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ዘበረታትዑ ጎስጓሳት፣ ንብዝሒ ናይ ተቕማጥ ናብ ሓደ ሲሶ የውርድዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለዎም ቦታታት ምስ ጽሩይ ማይ ምቕራብ ክነጻጸር ዝኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Campaigns that encourage hand washing, reduce the incidence of diarrhea to one-third, which is comparable to providing clean water in low-income settings.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: ሕማም ተቕማጥ ብ48% ንምጉዳል ኢድ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዓብዪ ግደ ይጻወት። ኣእዳው ብማይን ሳሙናን ምሕጻብ ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ፣ ገዛን ማሕበረሰብን ዝተለምዱ ናይ ተቕማጥን ረኽስታት ስርዓተ-ምስትንፋስን ንምክልኻን እቲ ዝነጠፈን ዝሓሰረን ኣማረጺ እዩ።
en-mt: Washing hands with soap plays a big role in reducing diarrhea by 48%. Washing hands with soap and water is the most effective and cheapest option to prevent diarrhea and respiratory infections common in school, home and community.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: ረኽሲ ሳንቡእ፣ ከቢድ ዓይነት ARI ኮይኑ፣ ኣብ ዓመት ህይወት ኣስታት 1.8 ሚልዮን ቆልዑ ብምቕጣፍ፣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ዘለዉ ቆልዑ ቁጽሪ ሓደ ቀታሊ ሕማም እዩ ።
en-mt: Pneumonia, a serious form of ARI, is the number one killer of children under five, killing about 1.8 million children a year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: በቢዓመቱ ብተቕማጥን ኒሞንያን 3.5 ሚልዮን ዝኾኑ ህጻውንቲ ይሞቱ።
en-mt: Every year, 3.5 million children die from diarrhea and pneumonia.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: UNICEF ከምዝበሎ፣ ቅድሚ ምግቢ ምብላዕን ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ቤት ምጥቃምን ኢድካ ብሳሙናን ማይን ምሕጻብ ልምዲ ምግባር ልዕሊ ክትባትን ሕክምናን ናይ ብዙሓት ሰባት ህይወት የድሕን። ብሰንኪ ተቕማጥ ዝስዕብ ቁጽሪ ሞት ብፍርቂ፣ ብኸቢድ ረኽሲ ናይ ስርዓት ምትንፋስ ዝመጹ ሞታት ድማ ብርብዒ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: According to UNICEF, washing hands with soap and water before eating and after using the toilet saves more lives than vaccines and treatment. Deaths from diarrhea are halved and deaths from severe respiratory infections are reduced by a quarter.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ምስ ካልኦት ጽሬት መሐለዊ ስጉምቲታት ከም ኣካል ናይ ማይ ፣ ጥዕናን ጽሬትን (WASH) ዝኣመሰሉ መደባት ዝተኣሳሰር እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is often associated with other hygiene measures such as part of water, health and hygiene (WASH) programs.

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ካብ እቲ ብቀጥተኛ ኣካላዊ ምትንኽኻፍ ዝመሓላለፍ ኢምፔቲጎ(impetigo) እውን ይከላኸል እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands also protects against impetigo, which is transmitted by direct physical contact.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: ንእሽተይ ኣሉታዊ ጎድኒ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ንቆርበት ስለዘንቅጽ ናይ ቆርበት ምብልሻው ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: A slight downside of hand washing, washing your hands frequently can cause skin damage as it dries out the skin.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: ናይ 2012 ኣብ ዴንማርክ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ከምዝረኸቦ፣ ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ናብ ምኽካኽ፣ ደረቕ ቆርበት ኤክዜማ ወይ ናይ ኢድ ደርማታይተስ ዝበሃል ኩነታት ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሰራሕተኛታት ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: A 2012 study in Denmark found that, frequent hand washing can lead to a condition called itching, dry skin eczema or hand dermatitis, which is common among healthcare workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: ኣዚኻ ደጋጊምካ ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ከም ናይ obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) ምልክት ተገይሩ እዩ ዝርአ።
en-mt: Washing your hands too frequently is seen as a sign of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ናይ ካብ ቀልቀል ናብ ኣፍ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ተኽእሎ ናይ'ዚ ሕማም ንምቕናስ፣ ኣብ መዓልቲ ሓሙሽተ ወሰንቲ ኢድና ንሕጸበሎም ግዘታት ኣለዉ፣ ንሳቶም ድማ ሽንቲ ቤት ድሕሪ ምጥቃም (ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ማይ ወይ ቀልቀል ምሻን)፣ ናይ ቆልዑ መዓኮር ድሕሪ ምጽራግ (ናፒታት ድሕሪ ምቕያር)፣ ቅድሚ ቆልዑ ምምጋብ፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕን ቅድሚ/ድሕሪ ምግቢ ምድላው ወይ ጥረ ስጋ፣ ዓሳ፣ ወይ ጸባ ምድላው እዮም።
en-mt: To reduce the chance of mouth-to-mouth transmission of the disease, there are five critical times a day to wash your hands: after using the toilet (after urinating or urination), after cleaning children's nipples (after changing diapers), and before Kids are feeding, pre-meal and before/after cooking or preparing raw meat, fish, or dairy.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ቴክኒካት ኣብ ካልኦት ኣጋጣሚታት እውን ነቲ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍ ንምግታእ ይሕግዝ እዩ። ገለ ኣብነታት፥ ቁስሊ ቅድሚ ምሕካም ድሕሪኡን ; ድሕሪ ምህንጣስ፣ ምስዓል፣ ወይ ኣፍንጫ ድሕሪ ምንፋጥ; ናይ እንስሳት ቀልቀል ምትንካፍ ወይ እንስሳት ድሕሪ ምሓዝ; ድሕሪ ጎሓፍ ምሓዝ እውን።
en-mt: Hand washing techniques also help curb the transmission of the disease in other instances. Some examples are: before and after treatment of wounds; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing the nose; touching animal droppings or after handling animals; Even after garbage handling.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት፣ ትሑት ናይ ኢድ ብሳሙናን ማይን ምሕጻብ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እዩ ዘሎ።
en-mt: In many countries, there is a relatively low level of hand washing with soap and water.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: ኣብ 2015 ኣብ 54 ሃገራት ዝተኻየደ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መጽናዕቲ ብማእከላይ ገምጋም 38.7% ስድራቤታት ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ከምዘተግብሩ ኣርእዩ። ኣብ 2014 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ሳዑዲ ዓረብያ ዝለዓለ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 97 ሚእታዊ ከምዘለዋ የረኢ፣ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ጥቓ ማእኸል 77 ሚእታዊ ፣ ቻይና ድማ ብዝተሓተ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 23 ሚእታዊ። ኣብ ወሰንቲ ግዘታት ኣእዳውካ ብሳሙና ናይ ምሕጻብ ናይ ባህሪ ለውጢ ንምምዕባል ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ባህሪታት ለውጢ ሜላታት ኣብ ጥቕሚ እንዳውዓሉ ይርከቡ። ኣብ ዝምዕብሉ ሃገራት ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ናብ ናይ ቆልዑ ልምዲ/ጠባይ ንምእታው ኣብ ቤት ትምህርቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ግዘ ክፍለየሎም ይግበር እዩ።
en-mt: A 2015 hand washing survey conducted in 54 countries showed that an average of 38.7% of households practice hand washing with soap. A 2014 survey shows Saudi Arabia with the highest comparative rate of 97 percent, the United States of America near the middle at 77 percent , and China with the lowest comparative rate of 23 percent. Various behavior change techniques are being used to develop the behavioral change of washing your hands with soap at critical times. In developing countries, hand washing time is set aside in schools to instill hand washing with soap in children's habits.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: እቲ "ወሳኒ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ፕሮግራም " በቲ ናይ ትምህርቲ ክፍሊ ኣብ ተግባር ዝወዓለ ኣብ ፊሊፒኒስ ናይ'ቲ ዝተወሰደ ስጉምቲ ስኬል ናይ ቆልዑ ጥዕናን ትምህርቲን ንምብርትታዕ ኣብነት እዩ።
en-mt: The "Critical Health Care Program " implemented by the Department of Education is an example of the scale of action taken in the Philippines to promote children's health and education.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: ንዓመት ክልተ ግዘ ካብ ናይ መዓናጡ ሓሳኹ ምሕካም ምስ መዓልታዊ ብሳሙና ኢድ ምሕጻብ ከምኡ'ውን ስኒ መዓለታዊ ብፍሎራይድ ምቡራሽ፣ ናይ እዚ ሃገራዊ ፕሮግራም ቀንዲ ዕላማ እዩ።
en-mt: Treatment from intestinal mosquitoes twice a year with daily hand washing with soap and daily fluoride tooth brushing is the main objective of this national program.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንዶኔዥያ እውን ዕዉት ብዝኾነ መልክዑ ኣብ ስራሕ ውዒሉ እዩ።
en-mt: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: ሳሙናን ዲተርጀንትን ናብ ማይ ምሕዋስ ንምውጋድ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ካብ ቆርበት የመሓያይሾ።
en-mt: Mixing soaps and detergents into water improves the elimination of microorganisms from the skin.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: ናይ ሳሙናን ዲተርጀንትን ዋና ተግባር ናይ ገደባት ብጽባጽ ምቕናስን ሓቓቒነት ምውሳኽን እዩ።
en-mt: The main function of soaps and detergents is to reduce restrictions and increase absorption.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: ቆርበት ንምጽራይ ማይ ጥራሕ እኹል ኣይኮነን፣ ምኽንያቱ ክፋል ኦርጋኒክ ሓመድ ዝኾኑ ስብሕን ፕሮቲናትን ብማይ ጥራሕ ኣይሓቁን እዮም።
en-mt: Water alone is not enough to clean the skin, because fats and proteins that are part of organic soil are not absorbed by water alone.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: ምጽራይ ግን፣ ብምኽንያታዊ ናይ ማይ ውሕዘት ዝተደገፈ እዩ..
en-mt: Cleaning, however, is supported by reasonable water flow.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: ደረቕ ሳሙና፣ ዳጋጊምካ ስለትጥቀመሉ፣ ካብ ዝሓለፈ ዝተጠቐምካሉ ግዘ ባክቴርያ ሒዙ ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Dry soap, because you use it over and over again, can carry bacteria from the last time you used it.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: ብዙሓት መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘካየድዎ ናይ ካብ ዝተበከለ ሓመድ ዝመሓላለፍ ናይ ባክቴርያ ዝርጋሐ ውሑድ እዩ ምኽንያቱ እቲ ባክቴርያ በቲ ዓፍራ ስለዝጠፍእ።
en-mt: Many studies have shown that the spread of bacteria from contaminated soil is low because the bacteria are killed by the fungus.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC ክሳብ ሕዚ "ብኢድካ ከይተንከፍካ ክትጥቀመሉ ትኽእል ፈሳሲ ሳምና እዩ ዝምረጽ " ኢሉ።
en-mt: The CDC has so far said that "liquid soap that can be used without touching your hands is preferred.

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙናታት ንኽጥቀሙ፣ ኣብ ጥዕናዊ ንቕሓት ዘለዎም ህዝቢ ጽዑቕ ጎስጓስ ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The use of antibacterial soaps, has been intensively campaigned among health conscious population.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ እዞም ዝምከሩ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ወይ ጸረ-ረኽሲታት ምጥቃም፣ ነቶም ብተፈጥርኦም ተጻዋርነት ናይ ጸረ-ባክተርያ መድሃኒት ዘለዎም ኦርጋኒዝማት መሪጾም ዘጥፍኡ ምዃኖም ዘርኢ መረዳእታ የለን።
en-mt: To date, there is no evidence that the use of these recommended antibiotics or antimicrobials selectively eliminates organisms that are inherently resistant to antibiotics.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙናታት ከም triclosan ዝኣመሰሉ ጸረ -ባክቴርያ ኤጀንትታት ዝሓዙ እዮም፣ ብዙሓት ነዚ ዝጻወርዎ ናይ ስትረይናት ዝርዝር ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, antibacterial soaps contain anti -bacterial agents such as triclosan, and there is a range of strains that many are resistant to.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: ስለዚ፣ ጸረ-ረኽሲ ተጻወርቲ ስተርይናት በቲ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ዋላ ኣይመረጹ ፣ ክንድቲ ዝድለ ኣድማዕቲ ዘይክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: So, even if antimicrobial resistant styrenes are not selected by the antibacterial soap , they may not be as effective.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: ምስ'ቲ ስርፋክታንትን ናይ ቆርበት ተኸላኻሊ ኤጀንት ጎኒ ን ጎኒ፣ እዚ ውስብስብ ፎርሙሌሽን ኣሲድ ዝሓዘ ክኸውን ይኽእለል እዩ (ኣሰቲክ ኣሲድ፣ ኣስኮርቢክ ኣሲድ፣ ላክቲክ ኣሲድ) ከም ናይ pH መመጣጠኒ፣ ጸረ ማይክሮቢያል ንጡፍ ዝኾነ ቤንዞኒክ ኣሲድን ተወሳኺ ናይ ቆርበት ኮንዲሽነራትን (ኣሎይ ቬራ፣ ቪታሚናት፣ ሜታኖል፣ ካብ ኣትክልቲ ዝተወሰዱ)። ብ University of Oregon School of Public Health(ኦሪጎን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ቤት ትምህርቲ) ዝተገበረ ሓፈሻዊ ሳይንሳዊ ገምጋም ከም ዘርኣዮ፣ ተራ ሳምና ማዕረ እቶም ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዘለዉ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ሳምናታት ብቑዓት እዮም።
en-mt: Accompaniment and leather defender acid to the scab and leather defender acid (asthetic acid, assid, assid, lactic acid) such as a PH qualifier, anti-microbien-offens and additional leaflets (Aloy Vera, Vera, Vira, , methanol, herbal extracts). A comprehensive scientific evaluation by the University of Oregon School of Public Health showed that ordinary soaps are as effective as antibacterial soaps on the market.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: ኢድካ ንምሕጻብ ዝምችው ውዑይ ማይ፣ ባክቴርያ ንምቕጣል ዘኽእሎ መጠነ ሙቐት የብሉን።
en-mt: Hot water that is suitable for washing your hands does not have the temperature to keep bacteria alive.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: ባክቴረያ ኣብ ናይ ሰብነት መጠነ ሙቐት (37 °C) ብቕልጡፍ ይዓቢ።
en-mt: Bacteria grow rapidly at body temperature (37 °C).

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ውዑይን ሳሙና ዘለዎን ማይ ካብ ዝሑልን ሳሙና ዘለዎን ማይ ሓመድን ባክቴርያን ዝሕዙ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ዘይትታት ኣብ ምውጋድ ዝሓሸ ኣድማዕነት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, hot, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils that carry soil and bacteria.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: ኣንጻር እምነት ብዙሓት ግን፣ ሳይንሳዊ መጽናዕቲታት ውዑይ ማይ ብምጥቃም ኣብ ኢድ ንዝርከቡ ብዝሒ ኦርጋኒዝምስ ኣብ ምቕናስ ጥቕሚ ከምዘይብሉ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Contrary to popular belief, however, scientific studies have shown that using hot water does not reduce the number of organisms on hands.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታየዘራት ወይ ናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ ማይ ዘይብሎም ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ኤጀንትታት እዮም።
en-mt: Hand sanitizers or hand antiseptics are non-aqueous hand cleaning agents.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ 1990ታትን መፈለምታ 21 ክፍለዘመን፣ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ማያዊ ዘይኮኑ ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ፈሰስቲ (ኣልኮላዊ መጽረዪ ኢድ፣ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ መጽረዪ ኢድ፣ ወይ ሳኒታይዘር) ተጠላብነት ክረኽቡ ጀሚሮም።
en-mt: In the late 1990s and early 21st century, alcohol-based non-aqueous hand sanitizers (alcohol hand sanitizers, antiseptic hand sanitizers, or sanitizers) became in demand.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ኣይዞፕሮፓይል ኣልኮል ወይ ኢታኖል ምስ መሕፈሲ ኤጀንት ከም ካርቦመር (ናይ ኣክሪሊክ ኣሲድ ፖሊመር) ተሓዊሶም ጄል ይኾኑ፣ ወይ ሂዩመክታንት ይኾኑ ከም ግላይሰሪን ፈሳሲ፣ ወይ ናይ'ቲ ኣልኮል ናይ ምንቃጽ ጽልዋ ንምቕናስ ዓፍራ ዘለዎ ምግባር።
en-mt: Most isopropyl alcohol or ethanol is mixed with a harvesting agent such as a carbomer (an acrylic acid polymer) to form a gel, or a humectant such as liquid glycerin, or a foam to reduce the drying effect of the alcohol.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: ዝተጽበጸበ ሃይድሮጂን-ፐርኦክሳይድ ምጥቃም ተወሳኺ ጸረ-ማይክሮቢያል ንጥፈት ይውስኽ። እንተንኢሱ 60 ክሳብ 95% ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ብቑዓት ቀተልቲ ጀርም እዮም።
en-mt: The use of compressed hydrogen-peroxide adds additional antimicrobial activity. Hand sanitizers with at least 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት ባክቴርያ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ መድሓኒታት ዝጻወሩ ባክቴርያ (MRSA ን VRE ን)፣ ቲበርኪሎሲስ፣ ከምኡውን ገለ ቫይረሳት (HIV፣ ሀርፒስ፣ RSV፣ ራይኖቫይረስ፣ ቫክሲንያ፣ ኢንፍሉዌንዛ፣ ከምኡውን ሄፓታይተስ እውን ሓዊሱ) ከምኡ ውን ፋንጋይ ይቐትል።
en-mt: Alcohol-based sanitizers kill bacteria, various drug-resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis as well) and fungi.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: 70% ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት ኣብ ኢድካ ድሕሪ ምጥቃም፣ ኣብ ውሽጢ 30 ሰከንድታት 99.97% (3.5 ሎግ ምቕናስ፣ ምስ 35 ዴሲቤል ምቕናስ ብተመሳሳሊ) ናይ'ቶም ባክቴርያ፣ ኣብ ውሽጢ 1 ደቒቕ ድማ 99.99% ክሳብ 99.999% (4 ክሳብ 5 ና ሎግ ምቕናስ) ናይ'ቶም ባክቴርያ የጥፍእ ። ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣንጻር ባክቴርያ ብሉጻት እዮም፣ ኣንጻር ሓደ ቫይረሳት ግን ክንድቲ ኣድማዕነት የብሎምን።
en-mt: After using 70% alcohol hand sanitizers, 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria in 30 seconds, and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 na log reduction) in 1 minute. It kills the bacteria of those. Hand sanitizers are great against bacteria, but not so effective against a viruses.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣንጻር እቶም ንቡር ናይ ተላባዒ ጋስትሮኢንተራይትስ ሕማም መልዐሊ ዝኾኑ ኖሮቫይረስ (ወይ Norwalk) ዓይነት ቫይረሳት ኣድማዕነት የብሎምን። ኣእዳውኩም ንምትርካስ ወይ ክልቲኦም ኣእዳው ንምሽፋን ዘኽእል እኹል ናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሴፕቲክ ወይ ኣልኮል መድረዚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) strains of viruses that are a common pathogen of infectious gastroenteritis. Adequate hand antiseptic or alcohol wipe should be used to disinfect your hands or cover both hands.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: ናይ ክልቲኦም ኣእዳውኩም ቅድሚትን ድሕሪቶምን ከምኡ'ውን ማእኸል ኣጻብዕቲኹም ክሳብ እቲ ፈሳሲ፣ ዓፍራ ወይ ጄል ዝነቅጽ ን 30 ሰከንድታት ዝኸውን ክድረዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: The front and back of both your hands and the middle of your fingers should be wiped for 30 seconds until the liquid, abrasive or gel dries.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ጫፋት ብክልቲኡ ከብዲ ኢድ ብምድራዝ ብኣግባቡ ክሕጸቡ ኣለዎም።ናይ US Center for Disease Control and Prevention (ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻልን ቁጽጽርን ማእኸል) ልዕሊ ሳኒታይዘር መድረዚታት ኢድካ ምሕጻብ የበረታትዕ እዩ።
en-mt: Fingertips should be washed thoroughly by wiping both abdominal hands.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention encourages hand washing with wipes over sanitizer.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: ተጠቃምነት ናይ'ዞም ኤጀንትታት ዝዓብየሉ ዘሎ ምኽንያት፣ ኣጠቃቕምኦም ቀሊል ስለዝኾነን ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ቀልጢፎም ስለዝቀትሉን እዩ። እንተኾነ ግን ከም መተካእታ ናይ ትኽክለኛ ኣተሓጽባ ኢድ ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ዝርከበሉ ክኾኑ የብሎምን ።
en-mt: The use of these agents is growing because they are easy to use and kill microorganisms quickly. However, they should not be in the presence of soap and water as a substitute for proper hand washing.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ብተደጋጋሚ ምጥቃም ደረቐ ቆርበት ከስዕብ ይኽእል እዩ፣ ስለዚ መተርከስቲ/ወይ ናይ ቆርበት መርሓስቲ ናብቲ ፎርሙላ ክሕወሱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin, so conditioners and/or skin conditioners should be incorporated into the formula.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ኣልኮል ናይ ምንቃጽ ጽልዋ ግላይስሪንን/ወይ ካልኦት መተርከሲታት ናብ እቲ ፎርሙላ ብምሕዋስ ምቕናስ ወይ ምጥፋእ ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: The drying effect of the alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by incorporating glycerin and/or other stabilizers into the formula.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: ኣብ ክሊኒካላዊ ፈተነታት፣ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ሳኒታይዘራት መርሓሲ ዝሓዙ እንትኾኑ ምስ ሳሙናታትን ኣንቲማይክሮቢል ዲተርጀንትን ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ትሑት ናይ ቆርበት ምንቃጽን ምብልሻውን ዕድል ኣለዎም።
en-mt: In clinical trials, alcohol-based sanitizers contain lead and have a lower risk of skin drying and damage compared to soaps and antimicrobial detergents.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: ኣለርጂክ ኮንታክት ደርማታይቲስን(allergic contact dermatitis) ዩሪቲካርያ ሲንድረምን(urticaria syndrome) ምስ ኣልኮል ዝተሓሓዝ ወይ ምስቶም ናብ ኣልኮል መድረዚ ኢድ ዝኣትዉ ተወሰኽቲ ነገራት ልዕሊ መጠን ተኣፋፍነት(hypersensitivity) ሓልሓሊፉ ዘጋጥሙ እዮም።
en-mt: Allergic contact dermatitis and urticaria syndrome are rarely associated with alcohol or hypersensitivity to additives in alcohol hand sanitizers.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: ምስ ብማይን ሳሙናን ብምሕጻብ ዘስዕቦ ክነጻጸር እንከሎ፣ ኢሪታንት ኮንታክት ደርማታይተስ(irritant contact dermatitis) ናይ ምስዓብ ተኽእሎ ውሑድ ስለዝኾነ፣ ሳሓቢ ንክኸውን ዝገበር እዩ።
en-mt: Compared to washing with soap and water, it is less likely to cause irritant contact dermatitis, making it attractive.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: ኣድማዕነቶም ብዘየገድስ፣ ማይ ዘይኮኑ ኤጀንትታት ን ኣእዳው ካብ ኦርጋኒክ ማቴርያል ከጽርዩ ኣይኽእሉን፣ ካብ ረኽሲ ነጻ ክገብሩ ጥራይ እዮም ዝኽእሉ።
en-mt: Regardless of their effectiveness, non-aqueous agents cannot clean hands of organic material, they can only disinfect them.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: እቶም ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ባእታታት ኣብ ኢድ ስለዝጸንሑ፣ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ክንዲ ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ናይ ብዙሓት ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ባእታታት ዝርጋሐ ኣብ ምክልኻል ብቑዓት ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: Because the pathogens remain in the hands, hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water in preventing the spread of many pathogens.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘይብሎም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣድማዕነት ኣብ እቲ ንጥረ ነገራቱን ፎርሙሌሽንኑን ኣዝዩ መሰረት ዝገበረ እዩ፣ ኣብ ታሪክ እውን ብቕዓቱ ትሕቲ ኣልኮልን ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መድረዚን ኮይኑ ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: The effectiveness of non-alcohol hand sanitizers is very much based on the ingredients and formulation, and historically its performance has been shown to be inferior to alcohol and alcohol hand sanitizers.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን፣ benzalkonium chloride ዝጥቀሙ ፎርሙሌሽናት ቀጻሊን እኩብን ናይ ጸረ-ማይክሮብስ ንጥፈት ኣርእዮም፣ ኣንጻር ኣልኮል፣ ድሕሪ ብተደጋጋሚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ምውዓሉ ግን ኣድማዒነቱ ቀኒሱ እዩ፣ ኣብ ቆርበት ብዘለዎ ጎድናዊ ጸገም ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Recently, formulations using benzalkonium chloride showed sustained and collective antimicrobial activity, against alcohol, but reduced effectiveness after repeated use, possibly due to side effects on the skin.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊ ዘለዎም ማሕበረሰባት ዝነብሩ ብዙሓት ሰባት ሳሙና ክዕድጉ ኣይኽእሉን ስለዚ ኣብ ክንድኡ ሓሙኽሽቲ ወይ ሓመድ ዝጥቀሙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Many people living in low-income communities cannot afford soap so they have ash or dust instead.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: ካብ ማይ ጥራሕ ምጥቃም ሓሞኽሽቲ ወይ ሓመድ ምጥቃም ዝበለጸ እዩ፣ ክንዲ ሳሙና ግን ኣድማዒ ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: It is best to use ashes or soil rather than just water, but it is not as effective as soap.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: እቲ ሓመድ ወይ ሓሞኽሽቲ ብማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ዝተለኸፈ ከይኸውን እዩ ዘስግእ፣ ከምዚ እንተኾይኑ ዝርግሐ ናይ'ቲ ቫይረስ ከጉድሎ ዘይኮነ ከብዝሖ እዩ።
en-mt: There is a risk that the soil or ash may be infected with microorganisms, which will increase the spread of the virus rather than reduce it.

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: ከም ሳሙና፣ ሓሙኽሽቲ ምስ ማይ ኣብ ዝሕወሰሉ ግዘ ኣልካላይን ብጽባጽ ስለዝፈጥር፣ ዲስኢንፌክት ዝገብር ኤጀንት እዩ ።
en-mt: Like soap, ash is a disinfectant agent because it forms alkali in a solution when mixed with water.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: ሳሙና ኣብ ዘይንረኽበሉ ከም መተካእታ ሓሞኽሽቲ ወይ ሑጻ ሳሙና ክንጥቀመሎም ከም ንኽእል ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO ) ይላቦ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization(WHO ) recommends using them as an alternative to ash or sand soap when soap is not available.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: ናይ US Centers for Disease Control  (ሕብራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽር ማእኸል) ዘቕረብዎ ትኽክለኛ ናይ ኢድ ኣተሓጻጽባ ቴክኒክ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ዝርጋሐ ንምቕናስ እዞም ዝስዕቡ ስጉምቲታት የጠቓልል:
en-mt: Proper hand washing techniques proposed by the US Centers for Disease Control include the following steps to reduce the spread of the disease:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: ኣእዳውኩም ብውዑይ ወይ ዝሑል ፈሳሲ ማይ ኣተርክሱ።
en-mt: Get your hands dirty with warm or cold liquid water.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: ዝፈስስ ማይ እዩ ዝምከር ምኽንያቱ ደው ዝበሉ ባዚናት ክብከሉ ይኽእሉ፣ እቲ ናይ ማይ ረስኒ ድማ ኣፈላላይ ዝፈጥር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: Running water is recommended because stagnant basins can become contaminated, and the water spray is not discriminatory.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: ዝባን ኢድካ ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ኣጻብዕቲ፣ ትሕቲ ጽፍሪ እውን ሓዊሱ ብብዝሕ ዝበለ ሳሙና ኢድካ ደራሪዝካ ምሕጻብ።
en-mt: Wash your hands with plenty of soap, including the tops of your hands , between your fingers, and under your fingernails.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: ሳሙና ካብ ቆርበት ነቲ ጀርም የልዕሎ፣ መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእይዎ ድማ ሰባት ብማይ ጥራሕ ካብ ዝሕጸብዎ ንላዕሊ ብሳሙና እንተኾይኑ እዮም ብደምቢ ዝሕጸቡ።
en-mt: Soap removes germs from the skin, and studies have shown that people wash more thoroughly with soap than with water alone.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ድረዝዎ።
en-mt: Wipe for at least 20 seconds.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: ኢድካ ምድራዝ ምፍሕፋሕ ይፈጥር፣ ጀርምታት ካብ ቆርበትካ ንክጠፍኡ ድማ ይሕግዝ፣ ንንውሕ ዝበለ ግዘ ምድራዝ ድማ ብዙሓት ጀርምታት የወግድ።
en-mt: Wiping your hands creates friction, and helps get rid of germs from your skin, and wiping for longer removes many germs.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: ብትሕቲ ዝፈስስ ማይ ኣእዳው ይላቕልቑ።
en-mt: Hands are soaked under running water.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: ኣብ ባዚን ምጽራይ ንኣእዳው መሊሱ ክብክለን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Cleaning in a basin can contaminate hands again.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: ብጽሩይ ሽጎማነ ኢድኩም ኣጽርዩ ወይ ብ ናይ ኣየር መንቀጺ ኣንቅጹ።
en-mt: Clean your hands with a clean towel or dry with an air dryer.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: ርሑስን ትርኩስን ኣእዳው ብቐሊሉ ይብከሉ። ብበዝሒ ዝርስዑ ኣካላት ኣእዳው ዓባይ ኣጻብዕቲ፣ ናይ ኢድ ክሳድ፣ ሞንጎ ኣጻብዕቲን ውሽጢ ጽፍሪን እዮም።
en-mt: Clean and dirty hands are easily contaminated. The most commonly forgotten parts of the hands are the thumb, the neck of the hand, the middle finger and the inside of the nail.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: ኣርቴፊሻል ጽፍሪታትን ዝቕብኡ ናይ ጽፍሪ ቀለማትን ማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ክሕዙ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Artificial nails and painted nail paints can harbor microorganisms.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: ደረቕ ቆርበት ሕማም ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ክውስኽ ስንዝገብር ናይ ኢድ ሎሽን ኣእዳው ካብ ድርቀት ንምክልኻል ክንጥቀመሎም ይምከር።
en-mt: Hand lotions are recommended to protect hands from dryness as dry skin increases the risk of infection.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ትሑት ዋጋኦም መማረጺታት ናይ ቡንባ ማይን/ ወይ ሳሙና ዘይክህሉ ከሎ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንምብርትታዕ ክቐርቡ ይኽእሉ ንኣብነት፣ ካብ ዝተንጠልጠለ ጀሪካን ማይ ብምቕዳሕ ወይ ብምንኳልን/ ወይ ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ ሓሞኽሽቲ ምጥቃም ይከኣል። ወይ ናይ ማይ ኣቕርቦት ዝህልወሉ ኩነታት (ከም ቤት ትምህርቲታት ወይ ናይ ገጠር ቦታታት ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት)፣ ኣለዉ፣ ንኣብነት ከም "tippy-taps" ከምኡውን ትሑት ዋጋ ዘውጽኡ መማረጺታት ዝበሉ ማይ መዐቀቢ መፍትሒታት ኣለዉ ።
en-mt: Various low-cost alternatives can be provided to encourage hand washing when tap water and/or soap is not available, for example, by drawing or pumping water from a suspended jerrycan and/or using ashes if necessary in developing countries. or situations where a water supply is available (such as schools or rural locations in developing countries), there are, for example, water conservation solutions such as "tippy-taps" and low-cost options .

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: tippy-tap ብገመድ ዝተኣሰረ ጆክ ብምጥቃም ዝሰርሕ፣ ብእግሪ ድማ ብምርግጋጽ ውሑድ ማይን ሳሙናን ናብ ኢድኩም ብምፍሳስ ንምጥቃም ዘኽእል ቀሊል ቴክኖሎጂ እዩ።
en-mt: The tippy-tap is an easy-to-use technology that works by using a wired jock, and by kicking the foot and pouring a small amount of water and soap into your hands.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: ብቑዕ ናይ ኢድ ምንቃጽ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ምሕላው ከይዲ ወሳኒ አካል እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ኣብ ናይ ህዝባዊ ሽንቲ ቤታት ዘሎ ናይ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ ከይዲ ክርክራት ኣሎ እዩ።
en-mt: Proper hand drying is a critical part of the hand hygiene process, but there are controversies about the hand drying process in public toilets.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: ብዙሓት መጽናዕቲታት ከምዘርእዩዎ ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ልዕሊ እቶም ኣብ ብዙሓት መሕጸቢ ክፍሊታት ዝርከቡ ናይ ኤሌክትሪክ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺታት ጽሬየቶም ዝሓለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Many studies have shown that paper towels are cleaner than the electric hand dryers found in many bathrooms.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: ኣብ 2008፣ ኣብ ለንደን ዝርከብ፣ University of Westminster (ዌስትሚንስትር ዩኒቨርሲቲ)፣ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ዝህብዎ ናይ ጽሬት ደረጃ ምስ ውዑይ-ኣየር ናይ ኢድ መድረቒን ዘመናዊ ዝኾኑ ጀት-ኤርን(jet-air) ዘነጻጸር መጽናዕቲ ተኻይዱ። እዚ ድማ ብ ናይ ኣውሮፓ ሶፍት ሲምፖዝየም ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣ መምረቲ ስፖንሰር ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ እዩ።
en-mt: In 2008, a study was conducted at the University of Westminster in London comparing the quality of paper towels with hot-air hand dryers and modern jet-air. This is a study sponsored by the European Soft Symposium of Paper Foil Manufacturers.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: ኢድካ ተሓጺብካ ብውዑይ ኣየር ኢድካ ምድራቕ፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ባክቴርያታት በዝሒ ኣብ ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ፓዳት ብ 194% ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ 254% ክውስኽ ከምዝገብር ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands and drying your hands with warm air increased the overall bacterial count on the finger pads by 194% and on the abdomen of the hand by 254%.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: ብናይ ጀት ኤር( jet-air) መንቀጺ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ፣ ናይ ባክቴርያ ምጥፋእ ዕድሉ ኣብ ውሽጣዊ ኣካል ኣጻብዕቲ ብኣቭሬጅ 42% ክኸውን ከሎ፣ ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ 15% እዩ።
en-mt: Drying your hands with a jet-air( jet-air) hand dryer, the chance of bacterial destruction is 42% on average on the inside of the fingers, and 15% on the abdomen of the hand.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: ኣእዳውካ ተሓጺብካ ብወረቐት ፎጣ ድሕሪ ምንቃጽ፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ባክቴርያ ብዝሒ ብኣቭሬጅ ኣብ ናይ ኣጻብዕቲ ፓዳት ብ76% የጉድሎ፣ ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ድማ ብ77%። ናብ ካልኦት ናይ ሽንቲ ቤት ተጠቀምቲ ናይ ምትሕልላፍ ዕድል እንተሃሊዎ ብዝምልከት መጽዕቲ ተኻይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: After washing your hands and drying them with towel paper, it reduces the overall bacterial count by an average of 76% on the finger pads and 77% on the abdomen of the hand. Investigations have been conducted regarding the possibility of transmission to other toilet users.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: ካብ እቲ ዩኒት ብ 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) ናህሪ ኣየር ዘውጽእ ናይ ጄት-ኤር(jet-air) መንቀጺ፣ ካብ ኣእዳው ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት ኣልዒሉ ናብ ካልኦት ናይ መሕጸቢ ክፍሊ ቦታታት ብምብካል ናይ እቲ መሕጸቢ ቦታ ከባቢ ክሳብ 2 ሜትር ዝኣክል ናይ ምብካል ክእለት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: A jet-air dryer that expels air from the unit at 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) picks up microorganisms from the hands and contaminates the bathroom area up to 2 m It has the ability to contaminate enough.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: ናይ ውዑይ ኣየር ኢድ መንቀጺ ንማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ካብቲ መንቀጺ 0.25 ሜትር ዝኣክል ክነጽጎም ይኽእል እዩ ።
en-mt: Hot air hand dryers can spray micro organisms as far as 0.25 m from the dryer .

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ናይ ማይክሮ ኦርጋኒዝማት ክንድቲ ስርጭት ኣይተራኣዮምን። ኣብ 2005፣ብ TÜV Produkt und Umwelt ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ፣ ዝተፈለየ ናይ ኢድ ምንቃጽ ሜላታት ገምጊሙ ነይሩ።
en-mt: Paper foam did not show as much spread of microorganisms. In 2005,a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, evaluated different hand drying techniques.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: ድሕሪ ኢድ ምንቃጽ፣ ኣብ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ እዞም ዝስዕቡ ለውጢታት ዝተረኣዩ እዮም:
en-mt: After hand drying, the following changes in bacterial counts were observed:

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ መፍረይቲ ኣለዉ፣ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጽቲ ምስ ናይ ወረቐት ፎጣታት ክነጻጸሩ ጸኒሖም እዮም።
en-mt: There are many different hand dryer manufacturers, and hand dryers have been compared to paper towels.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብዘይርከበሉ እዋን ኢድ ብትርኩስ ሳኒታይዚንግ ሶፍት ምሕጻብ ይመክር።
en-mt: Washing hands with dirty sanitizing soft is recommended when soap and water are not available.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መጽረይቲ እንተንኢሱ 60% ኣልኮል ዝሓዙ ክኾኑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers must contain at least 60% alcohol.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ኣተሓጻጽባ ኢድ፣ ኢግናዝ ሰመልውይስ ዝተባህለ ሃንጋሪያዊ ዶክተር ኣብ ውሽጢ ሆስፒታል ሕማም ከይመሓላለፍ ንምግባር ብቑዕነቱ ድሕሪ ምርግጋጹ(ኣብ 1846)፣ ግድን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕል ኮይኑ።
en-mt: Medical hand washing became compulsory after Ignaz Semelwis, a Hungarian doctor, proved its ability to prevent the spread of disease inside a hospital (in 1846).

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል ሰራሕተኛታት ኣእዳዎም ንክሕጸቡ ዘዘኻኽሩ ኤሌክትሮኒክ መሳርሒታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are electronic devices that remind hospital staff to wash their hands.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ኣጠቓቕምኡ ንመጠነ ምትሕልላፍ ረኽሲ ከምዘጉድል ረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: In one study he found that its use reduced the rate of infection transmission.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ኣተሓጻጽባ ኢድ ብውሕዱ ን15 ሰከንድታት እዩ ዝግበር፣ ብዙሕ ሳምናን ማይን ብምጥቃም ወይ ጄል ብምጥቃም ንነፍስ ወከፍ ክፋል ኣእዳው ድረዝዎ።
en-mt: Medical hand washing is done for at least 15 seconds, wipe each part of the hands with plenty of soap and water or gel.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: ኣእዳው ብሓባር ኣጻብዕቲ ኣቆላሊፍካ ክድረዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Hands should be wiped together with fingers curled.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: ኣብ ትሕቲ ኣጻፍር ርስሓት እንተልዩ፣ ጸጓር ብሩሽ ጠጠቒምኩም ምውጻእ ትኽእሉ ኢኹም።
en-mt: If there is dirt under the nails, you can use a soft brush to remove it.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: ጀርምታት ኣብ እቲ ኣብ ኢድና ዘሎ ማይ ክጸንሑ ስለዝኽእሉ ብኣግባቡ ምፍሕፋሕን ብዝነቐጸ ፎጣ ኢድካ ምንቃጽ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Since germs can remain in the water on our hands, it is important to rinse them thoroughly and dry your hands with a dry cloth.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).
targetString: ድሕሪ ምንቃጽ፣ እቲ ወረቐተ ፎጣ ማይ ንምጥፋእ ተጠቐሙሉ (ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ እውን ዝተዓጸወ በሪ ክፈቱሉ)።
en-mt: After drying, use the paper towel to turn off the water (also open a closed door if necessary).

sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ኣእዳውኩም እቶም ቦታታት ብምንካእ ደጊሞም ከይብከሉ ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: This will help prevent your hands from getting contaminated again by touching the areas.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: ኣብ ክንክን-ጥዕና ቦታ ዘሎ ናይ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ዕላማ፡ ተጓዳእቲ ታህዋስያን (ጀርምታት) ካብ ምስፍሕፋሕ ንምዕጋትን ናብ ካልኦት ንኸይመሓላለፍ ድማ ንምዕጋት'ዩ።
en-mt: The purpose of hand washing in a health-care setting is to prevent the spread of harmful bacteria (germs) and prevent them from being passed on to others.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ New England Journal of Medicine ኣብ መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ሕክምና ከባቢታት ሕጽረት ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተቐባሊነት ዘይብሉ ነገር ከምዝኾነ ሓቢሩ፣ ብዙሓት ዶክተራትን ነርስታትን ሕሙማት ቅድሚ ምትንካፎም ኢዶም ምሕጻብ ብምርሳዖም፣ በዚ ድማ ማይክሮኦርጋኒዝማት የመሓላልፍሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: In the New England Journal of Medicine he reported that lack of hand washing in most medical environments is something unacceptable, with many doctors and nurses forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thereby transmitting microorganisms to them.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ከምዘርኣዮ ግቡእ ዝኾነ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ካልኦት ቀለልቲ ከይዲታትን፣ ምስ ካቴተር ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ደም ቱቦታት ረኽሲ ብ 66 ሚአታዊ ምቕናስ ይከኣል እዩ። ናይ ወድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሴክተራት ክህሉ ዝግበኦ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ኢድ ምድራዝን ደረጃታት ጽሬት ዘርእዩ ወረቐት ኣሕቲሙ እዩ።
en-mt: One study showed that proper hand washing and other simple procedures can reduce catheter-related blood vessel infections by 66 percent. The World Health Organization has published a paper on hygiene standards for hand washing and hand wiping in health care sectors.

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: እዚ በቶም ትካላት ዝተደለወ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ውጥን/መምርሒ፣ ንህዝባዊ ርእይቶ ዝተዳለወ ዌብሳይቶም ምርካብ ይከኣል።
en-mt: This hand hygiene plan/guideline, required by the organizations, can be found on their website for public comment.

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: ነዚ ዝምልከት ተተሓሓዚ ገምጋም ብ Whitby et al ተኻይዱ ነይሩ።
en-mt: A companion review of this had been carried out by Whitby et al.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: ሕጋዊ ተገዳዲነት ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ፣ ናይ ንግዲ መሳርሒታት ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ምልካዕን ምግላጽን ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: If legal requirements are necessary, commercial tools can measure and describe hand hygiene.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: ናይ ውደብ ጥዕና ዓለም ንኢድ ምሕጻብ "ሓሙሽተ ግዘታት " ኣለዉዎ፡
en-mt: The World Health Organization has "five times " for hand washing:

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: ንደም/ናይ ሰውነት ፈሳሲ ድሕሪ ምቅላዕ
en-mt: After exposure to blood/body fluids

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: ቅድሚ ናይ ምምካን ስራሕ፣ ከምኡ'ውን
en-mt: Before sterilization work, as well

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: ድሕሪ ናይ ተሓካሚ ክንክን። ናይ ጸረ-ታህዋስያን ኬሚካላት ናብ ሳሙና ምሕዋስ ("መድሓኒትነት ዘለዎም" ወይ "ጸረ ማይክሮቢያል" ሳሙናታት) ነቲ ኢድ መሐጸቢ ናይ ምቕታል ስርሑ የበራትዖ።
en-mt: After patient care. The addition of antibacterial chemicals to soap (“medicinal” or “antimicrobial” soaps) enhances the killing effect of the hand sanitizer.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: ከም'ዚ ዓይነት ቀታሊ ስጉምቲ ቅድሚ መጥባሕቲ ምክያድ ወይ ጸረ-ረኽሲ ተጻወርቲ ኦርጋኒዝማት ኣብ ዝበዝሑሉ ኩነታት ምጥቃም ይከኣል። ንናይ መጥባሕቲ ኦፕሬሽን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ኢድ 'ምድራዝ'፣ ብኣእዳውካ ከይነኻእካ ዝውላዕን ዝጠፍእን ታ ኣድላዪ እዩ፣ ከምኡውን ዝተወሰነ chlorhexidine ወይ iodine መሕጸቢ፣ ስተራይል ፎጣታት ድማ ንመድረቒ ኣእዳው፣ ስተራይል ብሩሸት ድማ ንመድረዚ ካልእ ስተራይል መሳርሒታት ድማ ትሕቲ ጽፍሪ ንምጽራይ ኣድለይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Such a lethal measure can be used before surgery or in situations where antibiotic resistant organisms are prevalent. For a surgical operation 'wiping' one's hands, ta on and off without touching one's hands is necessary, as well as certain chlorhexidine or iodine rinses, and sterile towels for drying hands, sterile brushes for wiping and other sterile instruments for cleaning under the nails.

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: ኩሎም መጋየጺታት ክውገዱ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: All decorations must be removed.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: እዚ ከይዲ እዚ ኣእዳወኩም ክሳብ ኩርናዕ ኢድኩም፣ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ን 2–6 ደቓይቕ ምሕጻብ ዝሓትት እዩ።
en-mt: This process requires washing your hands up to the corner of your hand, usually for 2–6 minutes.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: ንነዊሕ ግዘ ምድራዝ (10 ደቓይቕ) ኣድላዪ ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: Prolonged rubbing (10 minutes) is not necessary.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: ላዕለዋይ ክፋል ኢድ እንተነለቕልቕ ማይ ናብ ኣእዳው ከይወርድ ጥንቃቐ ምግባር የድሊ።
en-mt: If we wet the upper part of the hand, be careful not to let water get on the hands.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: ኢድኩም ምሕጻብ ድሕሪ ምውዳእኩም፣ ኣእዳውኩም ብዝመኸነ ደረቕ ፎጣ ኣንቅጹዎ፣ ናይ ሰርጂካል ጋውንኩም ድማ ኣውጽእዎ።
en-mt: After you finish washing your hands, dry your hands with a damp dry towel, and remove your surgical gown.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: ናይ ጀርምታት ዝርጋሐ ንምቕናስ፣ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ቅድሚ ምርካብኩምን ድሕሪኡን ኣእዳውኩም ምሕጸብ ወይ ኣንቲሴፕቲክ ምጥቃም ዝሓሸ እዩ።
en-mt: To reduce the spread of germs, it is best to wash your hands or use antiseptics before and after contact with someone who is sick.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዘለዉ ናይ staphylococcal(ስታፍይሎኮካል) ረኽሲታት ንምቁጽጻር፣ ናይ ኢድ ምጽራይ ካብ'ቶም ዝዓበየ ጥቕሙ ኣብ ውሽጢ 20% ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ግዘ እዩ፣ እቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ተደጋጋሚነት ናብ 35% ምስወሰኸ ድማ ዋላ ንእሽተይ ይኹን እምበር ተወሳኺ ረብሓ ተረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: To control staphylococcal(staphylococcal) infections in hospitals, hand hygiene is one of the greatest benefits within 20% of hand washing time, and even a small but additional benefit was found when the hand washing frequency increased to 35%.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: ብንቡር ሳሙና ምሕጻብ ምስ ጸረ ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ምሕጻብ ክነጻጸር ከሎ ልዕሊ ሰለስተ ዕጽፊ ባክቴርያ ኢንፌክሽን ናብ መግቢ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ዕድል ኣለዎ። ናይ ኣልኮል ዘለዎ ናይ ኢድ መድረዚ ምስ ብጸረ ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ን 30 ሰከንድ ክነጻጸር ከሎ እቲ ኣልኮል ዝሓዘ ኢድ መድረዚ ናይ ባክቴርያ ብከላ ልዕሊ እቲ ጸረ-ባክቴርያ ሳሙና ብ 26% ይቕንስ።
en-mt: Washing with normal soap has more than three times the chance of transferring bacterial infection to food compared to washing with antibacterial soap. Compared to washing your hands with antibacterial soap for 30 seconds, the alcohol-based hand wipe reduces bacterial contamination by 26% more than the antibacterial soap.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን ማይን ሳሙናን ካብ ኣልኮል ዘለዎም ናይ ኢድ መድረዚታት H1N1 ኢንፍሉዌንዛ A ቫይረስን ክሎስትሪዲየም ካብ ኢድ ኣብ ምውጋድ ዝበለጹ እዮም። ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መሰናድኦታት ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ንምምሕያሽ ዝግበሩ ጣልቃ ምእታዋት፣ ብዛዕባ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንሰረሕተኛታት ምምሃር፣ ናይ ኣልኮል ዘለዎ መድረዚ ኣቕራቦት ምውሳኽን ጽሑፋዊን ብኣፍን ነቲ ስራሕተኛ መዘኻኸሪታት ምቕራብ ዘጠቓለሉ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: However, soap and water are better than alcohol-based hand wipes at removing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium from hands. Interventions to improve hand hygiene in health care settings may have included teaching staff about hand washing, increasing the supply of alcohol-based wipes and providing written and oral reminders to the staff.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: ካብ'ዞም ሕክምናታት እዚኦም ኣየኖት ብሉጻት ከምዝኾኑ ንምፍላጥ ተወሰኽቲ መጽናዕቲታት ከድልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Further studies will be needed to determine which of these treatments are best.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት፣ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ዋጋ ዘገናዘበ ፣ ጽቡቕ ጥዕና ንምሕላውን ንጽቡቕ ኣመጋግባ እውን ከም ወሳኒ መሳርሒ ተገይሩ እዩ ዝውሰድ።
en-mt: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is considered valuable , and is also considered a crucial tool for good health and good nutrition.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ናይ ማይ፣ ሳሙና ወይ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ መሳለጥያታት ሕጽረት ኣብ ገዛ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታትን ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታን ዘሎ ናይ ኣቕርቦት ሕጽረት ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ባህርያት ንምምዕባል ከቢድ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: however, lack of water, soap or hand washing facilities The supply constraints at home, schools and in the workplace make it difficult to develop universal hand washing behaviours.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ ኣብ መብዛሕትኦም ገጠራት ናይ ኣፍሪካ፣ ዋላ'ኳ ሕሱር ኣማረጺታት ከም ባዕልኻ ናይ መሕጸቢ ጣብያ ምህናጽ ተኽእሎ እንተሃለወ፣ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ቡንባ ዳርጋ ኣብ ነፍስ ወከፍ ሽንቲ ቤታት ሕጽረት ኣሎ።
en-mt: For example, in most rural areas of Africa, there is a shortage of hand sanitizers in almost every toilet, despite the possibility of cheap alternatives such as building your own washing stations.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ትሑት ዝኾነ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ናይ ባህሪ ውጽኢት እምበር ናይ ሳሙናን ማይን ሕጽረት ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: however, comparative rates of low hand washing are a result of behavior, not a lack of soap and water.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: ናይ ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ምብርትታዕ ናይ ፖሊሲ ውሳነታት ክጸልው ይኽእል እዩ፣ ብዛዕባ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ጥቕሚ ግንዛበ ክፈጥርን ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ እቲ ህዝቢ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ባህሪ ክፈጥርን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Encouraging hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, create awareness about the benefits of hand washing and create long-term hand washing behavior of the population.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: እዚ በኣግባቡ ንክሰርሕ፣ ቁጽጽርን ክትትልን ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: For this to work properly, control and monitoring are essential.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: ኣብ 70 መጽናዕቲታት ዝተኻየደ ስርዓታዊ ገምጋም ከምዝረኸቦ፣ ማሕበረሰብ መሰረት ዝገበረ ኣቀራርባ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ LMICs ኣብ ምዕባይ ኣድማዕቲ እዮም፣ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ዕዳጋ ኣቀራርባታት ክንድቲ ኣድማዕቲ ኣይኮኑን። ሓደ ኣብነት ናይ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ጎስጓስ ብ UNICEF ዝቐረበ "ሰለስተ ኮኾብ ኣቀራርባ " ዝተብሃለ እዩ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ቀለል፣ ሕሳር ዝኾኑ ስጉምቲታት ብምውሳድ ምስ ካልኦት ናይ ጽሬት ረቛሒታት፣ ተመሃሮ ኣእዳዎም ብሳሙና ንክሕጸቡ ምግባር ዘበረታትዕ እዩ።
en-mt: A systematic review of 70 studies found that, community-based approaches are effective in promoting hand washing in LMICs, social marketing approaches are not so effective. One example of a school hand washing campaign offered by UNICEF is the so-called "Three Star Approach ", which encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive measures to encourage students to wash their hands with soap, along with other hygiene factors.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: ዝተሓተ ስታንዳርድ እንተተማሊኡ፣ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ካብ ሓደ ናብ ሰለስተ ኮኾባት ሓፍ ክብሉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: If minimum standards are met, schools can be promoted from one to three stars.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: ናይ እቲ ሕማምን ናይ ህጻናት ሞትን ንምቕናስ፣ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ጣብያታት ምህናጽ ከም ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መበረታትዒ ጎስጓስ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: To reduce the disease and child mortality, building hand washing stations could be used as a hand washing incentive campaign.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ መዓልቲ ናይ ባህሪ ለውጢ ከምጽእ ዝፍትን ዘሎ ጎስጓስ እዩ። በዚ ናይ 2019-20 ኮሮናቫይረስ ምኽንያት፣ UNICEF ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኢሞጂ ኣብ ስራሕ ምውዓል ኣፋሊጡ እዩ።
en-mt: World Hand Washing Day is a campaign that is trying to bring about behavioral change. Because of the 2019-20 coronavirus, UNICEF has announced the introduction of a hand washing emoji.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: ገለ መጽናዕቲታት ኣብ ማዕበልቲ ሃገራት ምስ DALYs ብዝተትሓሓዘ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ወጻኢ ኣድማዒነት ኣብ ግምት ዘአተዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Some studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of handwashing in relation to DALYs in developing countries.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ሓደ ገምጋም ብሳሙና ኢድካ ምሐጻብ ምስካልኦት ናይ ማየን ጽሬትን ከይዲታት ክረአ ከሎ ዋጋ ቖጣቢ ከምዝኾነ ኣረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: However, one evaluation found that hand washing with soap is cost-effective compared to other water and sanitation processes.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ ደቂ ሰባተ ዘለዎ ናይ ጥዕና ጥቕሚ – ብፍላይ ኣብ ተጋላጺነት ኩነታት ዘለዉ ሰባት ንኣብነት ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን ዝወለዳ ኣደታት ወይ ዝቖሰሉ ወታደራት ኣብ ሆስፒታላት – መጀመርያ ኣብ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ማእኸል ብክልተ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት መስረትቲ እዩ ተፈሊጡ፣ ሃንጋርያዊ ሓኪም Ignaz Semmelweis፣ ኣብ ቬና፣ ኦስትሪያን ዝሰርሐን ናይ ኢንግሊዝ "ናይ ዘመናዊ ምጥዋብ መስራቲ" ፍሎረንስ ናይቲንግሌን እዮም።
en-mt: The health benefits of hand washing in children – especially people in vulnerable situations such as mothers who have recently given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – were first recognized in the mid-19th century by two hand hygiene founders, Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis, in Vienna, Austria and the English "founder of modern tapping" Florence Nightingale.

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: ኣብቲ ግዘ እቲ ብዙሓት ሰባት ረኽሲታት ብ ሚያስማስ ዝበሃል ሕማቕ ጨና ዝመጹ እዮም ኢሎም ይአምኑ ኔሮም።
en-mt: At the time, many people believed that infections were caused by a bad smell called miasma.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: ኣብ 1980፣ ብመግቢ ዝመሓለለፉ ለበዳታትን ምስ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን-ዝተተሓሓዙ ረኽሲታትን ንናይ United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention( ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ማእኸላት ሕማም ቁጽጽርን ምክልኻልን) ብዝበለጸ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ነቲ ረኽሲ ከም ዋና መከላኸሊ መንገዲ ጌሮም ከበረታትዑ ዝገበረ ነይሩ።
en-mt: In 1980, foodborne outbreaks and health care-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to promote better hand hygiene as the main preventive measure against infection.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: እቲ ኣብ 2009 ዘጋጠመ ናይ ስዋይን ፍሉ ለበዳ ን ናይ 2020 ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ለበዳ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ካብ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ዓርስኻ ንምክልኻል ኢድካ ብሳሙና ምሕጻብ ብዛዕባ ዘለዎ ጥቕሚ ግንዛበ ዝፈጠረ እዩ።
