en-mt: The 2009 swine flu pandemic and the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic have raised awareness in many countries about the benefits of washing your hands with soap to protect yourself from infectious diseases.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: ንኣብነት፣ "ትኽክለኛ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ቴክኒካት" ዘርእዩ ፖስተራት ኣብ ጎኒ ናይ ህዝባዊ ሽንቲ-ቤታትን ኢድ መሕጸቢ ሲንክታትን ተንጠልጢሎም ይርከቡ። ኣብ ናይ ቤት ጽሕፈታት ማዕጾን ናይ ጀርመን ኤርፖርትታትን እውን ይርከቡ።
en-mt: For example, posters showing “proper hand washing techniques” are hung next to public toilets and hand washing sinks. They are also found at office doors and at German airports.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: እዚ "ኢድ ምሕጻብ " ዝብል ሓረግ፣ ማለት ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ነቲ ነገር ሓላፍነት ዘይምውሳድ ወይ ኣብ ገበን ተሳታፍነት ምህላው ዘርኢ እዩ።
en-mt: This phrase "washing hands ", means a person's lack of responsibility for the thing or involvement in a crime.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: ካብ ናይ መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ መልእኽቲ ማቲዎስ መንጌል እዩ መበቆሉ ጴንጥዮስ ጲላጦስ ንኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ናይ ምስቃል ውሳነ ኢዱ ተሓጺቡ፣ እዚ ቃል እዚ ግን ኣብ ኢንግሊሽ ማሕበረሰባት ሰፊሕ ተጠቃሚነት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: It originates from the biblical gospel of Matthew Pontius Pilate washed his hands in the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but this word is widely used in English communities.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: ኣብ Shakespeare Macbeth፣ Lady Macbeth ዝፈጸመቶ ገበንን ንሰብኣያ እውን ክፍጽሞ ዝደፋፈአቶ ገበን ብዝምልከት ናይ ገበነኛነት ስምዒታ ንምጽራይ፣ ኣእዳዋ ብሓይሊ ክትሕጸብ ትጅምር።
en-mt: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to wash her hands vigorously to cleanse herself of guilt over the crime she has committed and the crime she has induced her husband to commit.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: ሰባት፣ ዘይስነ-ስርዓታዊ ተግባር ምግባሮም እንተዘኪሮም ወይ እንተሓሲቦም፣ ልዕሊ ካልኦት ብተደጋጋሚ ኣእዳዎም ከምዝሕጸቡ ተፈሊጡ፣ ንናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ናውቲታት ድማ ልዕሊ ካልእ ዋጋ ይህብዎም።
en-mt: It has been found that people, if they remember or think of committing an unethical act, wash their hands more frequently than others, and value hand sanitizers above others.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ኣእዳዎም ንክሕጸቡ ዝፍቀደሎም ሰባት ድሕሪ ከምዚ ዓይነት ተግባር ኣብ ካልኦት ወለንታዊ "ንንጽህና ዝውክሉ" መከሓሓስቲ ተግባራት ናይ ምፍጻም ክእለቶም ውሱን እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, people who are allowed to wash their hands are limited in their ability to perform other voluntary “hygiene” compensatory acts after such an act.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: ሃይማኖታት ኢድ ምሕጻብ ንጉዳይ ጽሬትን ምልክታዊ ተግባርን ዕላማ ገይሮም ይመኽሩ። ምልክታዊ ዝኾነ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ኢድካ ብዘይ ሳሙና ብማይ ጥራሕ ምሕጻብ ዋላ ይኹን፣ ኣብ ናይ ባሃይ እምነት፣ ሂንዱይዝም፣ ኣብ ጁዱይዝም ዝርከቡ ቴቪላህን ኔቲላት ያዳይምን፣ ኣብ ክርስትና ዝርከብ ላቫቦ፣ ኣብ እስልምና ዝርከብ ዉድሁ ሓዊሱ፣ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃይማኖታት ዝርከብ እምነታዊ ተገባር እዩ። ሃይማኖታት ብፍላይ ድሕሪ ገለ ተግባር ኢድካ ን ምጽራይ ምሕጻብ እውን ይመኽሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Religions recommend hand washing for hygiene issues and symbolic functions. Symbolic hand washing, whether it is washing your hands with only water without soap, is a religious practice in many religions, including Baha'iism, Hinduism, Tevilah and Netilat Yadaim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam. Religions also recommend washing your hands for cleansing, especially after some action.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: ሂንዱዝም፣ ጁዲዝምን እስላምን ድሕሪ ሽንት-ቤት ምጥቃም ኢድካ ምሕጻብ ሕጎም እዩ።
en-mt: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam prescribe washing hands after using the toilet.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: ከምኡ'ውን፣ ሂንዱዝም፣ ቡደሂዝም፣ ስኪዝም፣ ጁዲዝምን እስልምናን ቅድሚ ምግቢ ምብላዕ ኢድ ምሕጻብ የበረታትዑ።
en-mt: Also, Hinduism, Buddhism, Schism, Judaism and Islam encourage hand washing before eating.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ናይ ኮቪድ-19
en-mt: Workplace risk control of COVID-1

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: ኣብ ስራሕ ቦታ ዝግበሩ ናይ COVID-19 ሓደጋታት ቁጽጽራት ማለት ንምክልኻል ሕማም ኮረና ቫይረስ 2019(COVID-19) ዘገልግሉ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ድሕንነታትን ን ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር መንገዲታት ምትግባር ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: Workplace COVID-19 risk controls mean the implementation of workplace safety and risk control measures to prevent the spread of the coronavirus 2019(COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: ኣግባባዊ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽራት ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታን ዓይነት ስራሕን፣ ብመሰረት ናይ ምቅላዕ ሓደጋ ምንጪ ምርመራ፣ ናይቲ ከባቢ ናይቲ ሕማም ከቢድነት፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ንኮቪድ-19 ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ ዝኾኑ ሰባት ክቃልዑሎም ዝኽእሉ ምኽንያትን ዝተመርኮሰ እዩ።
en-mt: Appropriate workplace risk controls are based on the workplace and type of work, according to the source of exposure risk, the severity of the disease in the area, and the reasons for the exposure of people at high risk of exposure to COVID-1

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: ናይ U.S. ስራሕ ድሕንነትን ጥዕናን ምምሕዳር (OSHA) ብዝበሎ መሰረት፣ ትሑትናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስቲ ህዝቢ ወይ መሳርሕቲ ትሑት ምንኽኻእ ዘለዎም ኮይኖም፣ መሰረታዊ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ዝውሰድዎ፣ ከም ኢድ ምሕጻብ፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ክሓሙ ከለዉ ኣብ ገዛ ክጸንሑ ምግባር፣ ናይ መተንፈሲ ስነ ስርዓት፣ በቢ ግዚኡ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ምጽራይን ዲስኢንፌክት ምግባርን ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: According to the US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), low-exposure jobs have low contact with the public or co-workers, and basic infection prevention measures are taken, such as hand washing, keeping employees home when they are sick, respiratory discipline, They include cleaning and disinfecting the work area periodically.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: ማእኸላይ ተቓላዕነት ሓደጋ ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ብዝተረጋገጸ ዝተተሓዙ ሰባት ብቐጥታ ብተደጋጋሚ ምንኽኻእ ክሰርሑ ዝገብሩ ስራሕቲ ዘካትቱ እዮም፣ በዚ ቀጻላይ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰባዊ ለበዳ ምኽንያት ወይ ናይ ዓለም ለኻዊ ምጉዕዓዝ ግን ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Moderate exposure risk occupations include occupations that require frequent direct contact with suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19, but may become infected due to this ongoing community outbreak or international travel.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ምስ ሓፈሻዊ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ከም ቤት ትምህርቲታት፣ ልዑል ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ዝጽዕቖም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት፣ ከምኡውን ገለ ልዑል ብዝሒ ዘለዎም ናይ መሸጣ መሰንድኦታት ዝሰርሑ ሰራሕተኛታት እውን የካትት።
en-mt: This also includes employees who work with general populations such as schools, high-density workplaces, and some high-density sales channels.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ጉጅለ፣ ንናይ መሰረታዊ ናይዚ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ብተወሳኺ፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ብኮቪድ-19 እንተታሒዙ ናይ ቬንትሌሽን ተጠቃሚነት ልዑል ናይ ኣየር መጻረይታት፣ ናይ ምህንጣስ መሸፈኒን ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲን ምጥቃም ይከኣል።
en-mt: Risk Control Team, in addition to the basic preventive measures of this infection, if anyone is infected with COVID-19 ventilation utilization high air purifiers, cough masks and personal protective equipment can be used.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA ንዝተረጋገጸ ወይ ዝተጠርጠረ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙም ዝጋለጹ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ ስነስርዓት ሰራሕተኛታትን ልዑል ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ከምዘለዎም ሓበሩ፣ እዞም ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ዘካይዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ ወይ ናይ ዝተረጋገጸ ወይ ዝተጠርጠረ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙም ናሙናታት ዝእክቡ እንተኾይኖም ድማ ተቓላዕነቶም ይውስኾ።
en-mt: OSHA reported that health care and funeral workers who are exposed to a confirmed or suspected COVID-19 patient have a higher risk of exposure, and their exposure increases if these workers conduct aerosol-producing tests, or collect samples from a confirmed or suspected COVID-19 patient.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: ናይዞም ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ሓደጋ ምቁጽጻር ከም ኣሉታዊ ጸቕጢ ቨንትሌሽን ክፍሊታት፣ ከምኡውን ነቲ ስራሕ ኣግባባዊ ዝኾነ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ ዝኣመሰሉ ዝሓዘ ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽር እውን ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: The risk control of these workers also included engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation compartments, and personal protective equipment appropriate for the job.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: ናይ COVID-19 ለበዳ ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ብዙሕ ጽልዋታት ክህልዎ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic can have many impacts in the workplace.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: ሰራሕተኛታት ሓሚሞም፣ ንካልኦት ሰባት ክከናኸኑ ኢሎም፣ ወይ ንከይቃልዑ ፈሪሖም ካብ ስራሕ ክተርፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Employees may miss work because they are sick, to care for other people, or for fear of exposure.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: ናይ ንግዲ ከይዲታት ብክልተ መልክእ ክቕየሩ ይኽእሉ`ዮም፣ እንደልዮም ነገራት ዘሎ ኣቐርቦትን ነዞም እንደልዮም ነገራት ድማ እረኽበሉ መገዲን ብዝምልከት (ከም ኣብ ናይ ዘይተለመዱ ሰዓታት ምዕዳግ ወይ ኣብ መኪናኻ ኮይንካ ኣገልግሎት ምርካብ)።
en-mt: Business processes can change in two ways, in terms of the availability of what we want and how I get these things (such as shopping during unusual hours or getting service in your car).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፣ ካብ ብኮቪድ-19 ብኸቢዱ ዝተጎድኣ ሃገራት ዝግበሩ መጎዓዓዘዝያታት ክቋረጹ ክግበር ይኽእል እዩ።ናይ ተላባዒ ሕማም ምድላዋትን ናይ ምላሽ ትልሚታትን ናይ ምክልኻል ተግባራት ንምክያድ ክሕግዙ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Finally, transportation from countries severely affected by COVID-19 may be suspended. Infectious disease preparedness and response plans can help conduct preventive measures.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: ውጥናት ን ምስ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ዕዮታትን ዝተሓሓዝ መጠን ሓደጋ፡ ምንጭታት ተቓላዕነት ዘጠቓለለ፡ ምስ ገዛን ናይ ሕበረተሰብ ኣቀማምጣን ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ሓደጋ መበገሲታትን፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምስ ነፍስወከፍ ሰራሕተኛ ዝተሓሓዙ ናይ ሓደጋ መበገሲታትን ከምእርጋን ወይ ድማ ሕዱር ሕክምናዊ ጸገማት ኣብ ግምት ዘእተው እዮም።
en-mt: Plans take into account the amount of risk associated with workplaces and occupations, including sources of exposure, risk factors related to home and community location, and risk factors associated with each employee such as aging or chronic medical problems.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: ኣብ እዋን ምልዓል ለበዳ ክፍጠሩ ንዝኽእሉ ኩነታት ንምቁጽጽር፡ ነቶም ናይ ሓደጋን ወዝባዊ ውጥናት ንምፍላጥ ዘኽእሉ ቁጽጽራት ኣቐሚጦም ኣለው።
en-mt: They have put in place controls to identify the emergency and emergency plans to control situations that may arise during an outbreak.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: ናይ ተላባዕቲ ሕማማት ድልውነትን ምላሽ ትልሚን ንናይ ብሄራውን ክፋል ብሄራውን ምኽሪታት ተገዛኢ እዩ።
en-mt: Infectious disease preparedness and response planning is subject to ethnic and part-ethnic recommendations.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: ንለበዳ ምላሽ ናይ ምሃብ ዕላማታት ኣብ መንጎ ስታፍ ምልባዕ ምቕናስ፣ ንዝኸፈአ ጎድናዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሕልኽለኻት ተቓላዕቲ ዝኾኑ ሰባት ምክንኻን፣ ናይ ንግዲ ኦፕሬሽናት ምሕላው፣ ከምኡውን ኣብቲ ናይቲ ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ዘለዉ ከጋጥሞም ዝኽእል ጎድናዊ ጽልዋታት ምቕናስ ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: The objectives of responding to an outbreak included reducing contagion among staff, caring for people vulnerable to the worst side health complications, protecting business operations, and minimizing potential side effects for those in the supply chain.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: እቲ ንግዲ ናይ ዝርከበሉ ቦታ ናይ ሕማም ከቢድነት ነቲ ዝውስድ ምላሽ ይጸልዎ።
en-mt: The disease severity of where the business is located affects the response it takes.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: መቆጻጸሪ ቅድመ-ተኸተል ሓደጋ መብዛሕቲኡ ጊዜ፡ ኣብ ውሕስነት ስራሓት ጥዕናን ዝተሓሓዝ ኮይኑ ክሳዕ ዕቱብ ናይ ጉጅለ ሓደጋታት መቆጻጸሪ ስርሓት ዘለዎ ባይታ እዩ።
en-mt: Pre-accident control is often related to occupational safety and health and is the basis for controlling operations up to serious group accidents.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ሓደጋታት ክውገዱ ኣብ ዘይክእሉሉ፣ ብሉጻት ዝበሃሉ ቁጽጽራት ምህንድስናዊ ቁጽጽራት፣ ብምቅጻል ናይ ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት፣ ኣብ መወዳእታ ድማ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲታት እዮም።
en-mt: Where the risks of COVID-19 cannot be eliminated, the best controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and finally personal protective equipment.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: ናይ ኢንጅነሪንግ ቁጽጽራት ኣብ ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ውልቃዊ ባህሪ ከይተደረኽካ ን ሰራሕተኛታት ካብቶም ምስ ስራሕ ዝተትሓዙ ሓደጋታት ምንጻል እንትኾን፡ ብደረጃ ዋጋ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዘዋጽእ ክትግበር ዝኽእል መፍትሒ እዩ።
en-mt: Engineering controls are the most cost-effective solution to isolate employees from work-related hazards without relying on employee personal behavior.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ወይ ናይ ምህርቲ ዝግበሩ ናይ ፖሊሲ ለውጢታት ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ወይ ሓላፊ ስጉምቲ ዝደልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Administrative controls are policy changes in operations or production that require employee or manager action.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ (PPE) ምስ ናይ ምህንድስናን ምምሕዳራዊን ቁጽጽራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ትሑት እዩ፣ ገለ ምቅላዓት ግን ንምክልኻል ክጠቅም ይኽእል።
en-mt: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is low compared to engineering and administrative controls, but can be useful to prevent certain exposures.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: ኩሎም ዓይነታት ናይ ውልቀ መሐለዊ መሳርሒታት ንምምራጽ ብመሰረት ነቲ ሰራሕተኛ ክወርዶ ዝኽእል ሓደጋ፣ ብዝግባእ ዝገጥሙ ከከም ኣገባብራ(ንኣብነት፣ መሳርሒታት ምስትንፋስ), ብዘይምቁራጽ ብዝግባእ ዝግበር፣ ብስሩዕ ዝምርመር፣ ዝጽገን፣ ቅያር ዝግበረሉ፣ከም ኣድላይነቱ ብዝግባእ ክውገድ፣ ምልኽኻፍ ንምውጋድ ጽርየቱ ኣብ ዝሕለወሉ ዝዕቀብ ወይ ዝጎሓፍ ክኾኑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Select all types of personal protective equipment according to the potential hazard to the employee, properly fitted depending on the procedure(e.g., respirators), regularly maintained, regularly inspected, repaired, replaced,properly disposed of as necessary, stored or disposed of in hygienic conditions to avoid infection They must be.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ U.S. ናይ ስራሕ ድሕንነትን ጥዕናን ምምሕዳር (OSHA)፣ ትሑት ናይ ተቓላዒነት ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ህዝቢን ምስ መሳርሕቲን ትሑት ናይ ምንኽኻእ ዕድል ዘለዎም እዮም።
en-mt: According to the US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), jobs with a low chance of exposure are those with a low chance of contact with the public and with co-workers.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: ንኹሎም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ዝምከር መሰረታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲታት ከም ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ብማይን ሳሙናን ምሕጻብ፡ ሰራሕተኛታት እንተ ሓሚሞም ኣብ ገዛ ንኽጸንሑ ምብርታዕ፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስኣካላት ሕግታት ከም ኣፍካ ሸፊንካ ምስዓልን ምህንጣስን ምኽባር፡ ሶፍትን ናይ ጎሓፍ መጠራቐሚን ምሃብ፡ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ናይ ቴሌኮም መራኸቢታት ወይ ድማ ናይ ሺፍት ስርዓት ምዝርጋሕ፡ ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ካልኦት ሰባት ኣቑሑን መሳርሒታትን ንከይጥቀሙ ምግባር፡ ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ መዓልታዊ ጽሬት ምሕላውን ጸረ-ህዋስያን ምግባርን ምቕጻልን የጠቃልሉ።
en-mt: Basic disinfection measures recommended for all workplaces such as frequent hand washing with soap and water, encouraging employees to stay home if they are sick, following respiratory rules such as covering your mouth and coughing and sneezing, providing soft and garbage bins, telecommunications or Shifts include extending the system, ensuring that employees do not use other people’s goods and equipment, maintaining and maintaining daily hygiene and disinfection in the workplace.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: ኣላባዕቲ ውልቀሰባት ብቅልጡፍ ምልላይን ምፍላይን ንሰራሕተኛታት፣ ዓማዊል፣ በጻሕቲን ካልኦት ኣብቲ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታ ዘለዉን ሰባት ካብቲ ሕማም ኣብ ምክልኻል ወሳኒ ስጉምቲ እዩ።
en-mt: Prompt identification and isolation of infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting employees, customers, visitors, and others in the workplace from the disease.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ( U.S.) ማእኸል ቁጽጽር ሕማም ን ምክልኻልን( CDC) ከቢድ ናይ ኣካለ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ፡ ክሳብ ን ኣስታት 24 ሰዓታት ካብ ረስኒ፣ ምልክታት ረስኒ፣ ካብ ዝኾኑ ዓይነት ምልክታት ን ብዘይ ዝኾነ ይኹን ናይ ረስኒ መቐነሲ መድሓኒት ወይድማ ምልክታት ዝቕንሱ መድሓኒታት ከይተጠቐሙ ነጻ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ገዛ ንኽጸንሑ ይላቦ፡ ካልእ ድማ፡ ናይ ሕማም ፍቓድ ፖሊሲታት ድማ ስራሕተኛታት ኣብ ገዛ ንዘሎ ኣባል ስድራ ቤት ንኸተሓምሙ ብዘኽእል መልክዑ ክተዓጻጸፉ እዮም፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ድማ ነዞም ፖሊሲታት ክፈልጡዎም ይግባእ።
en-mt: The United States( US) Centers for Disease Control and Prevention( CDC) employees with severe respiratory problems , up to about 24 hours from cough, cough symptoms, from any symptoms and without any cough relievers or symptom relievers It encourages those who are exempt to stay home without using it, and sick leave policies will be adapted to allow employees to make a family member at home sick, and employees should be aware of these policies.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: ብመሰረት OSHA፣ ምእከላይ ተቓላዕነት ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲታት ምስ ዘይተፈለጡ ወይ ዝተጠርጠሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት፣ እሞ ግን ብ SARS-CoV-2 በቲ ኣብ ናይ ንግዲ ቦታታት ዘጋጥም ዘሎ ማሕበረ ሰባዊ ምልባዕ፣ ወይ ናብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሰፊሕ ምልባዕ ዘለዎም ሃገራት ብምጉዓዞም ዝተለኸፉ ክኾኑ ምስ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ብተደጋጋሚ ወይ ብቐረባ ንኽክእ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሽድሽተ ጫማ (1.8 m) ርሕቐት ክኾኑ ዘገድድ ስራሕ ዘለዎም ሰባት እዮም።
en-mt: According to OSHA, moderately exposed jobs with unknown or suspected COVID-19 patients, but infected with SARS-CoV-2 by the community outbreak in businesses, or by travel to countries with widespread COVID-19 outbreaks People with jobs that require them to be within six feet (1.8 m) of frequent or close contact with able-bodied people.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ምስ ሓፈሻ ሀዝቢ ንኽክእ ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ዘካትት እዩ ንኣብነት ቤት ትምህርቲታት፣ ልዑል ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ጻዕቒ ዘለዎም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት፣ ገለ ልዑል ብዝሒ ናይ መሸጣ መሰንድኦ ዘለዎም ቦታታት እውን ዘካትት እዩ።ነዚን ካብዚ ዝልዕል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ኣጋጣሚ ዘለዎም ጉጅለታትን ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽር ልዑል ብቕዓት ዘለዎም ናይ ኣየር መጻረዪታት ምግጣም፣ ናይ ቬንትሌሽን ሬት ምውሳኽ ኣካላዊ ገደባት ከም ንጹር ፕላስቲክ ናይ ምህንጣስ መከላኸሊ ምግጣምን፣ ንዓማዊል ድማ ኣብ መኪንኦም ኮይኖም ኣገልግሎት ዝረኽቡሌ መስኮት ምኽፋትን ዘካትት እዩ።ነዚን ካብዚ ዝልዕል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ኣጋጣሚ ዘለዎም ጉጅለታትን ምምሕዳራዊ ቁጽጽራት ድማ ዝሓመሙ ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ገዝኦም ክጸንሑ ምብርትታዕ፣ ብኣካል ዝግበሩ ኣኼባታት ብቨርችዋል ምቕያር፣ ዘይተለመዱ ሽፍቲታት ምፍጣር፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብሰፊሑ ናብ ዘለወን ቦታታት ዝግበሩ ወሰንቲ ዘይኮኑ ጉዕዞታት ምቕናስ፣ ከም ናይ ሰራሕተናታት ጭንቀት መመለሲ ፎረም ዘካተተ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ርክባት ምምዕባል፣ ንሰራሕተኛታት ብዛዕባ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መቃለዕቲን መከላኸሊ ባህርያትን ብዝምልከት ሓደሽቲ ዝኾኑ ትምህርቲታትን ስልጠናታትን ምሃብ፣ መከላኸሊ ክዳውንቲን መሳርሒታትን ክጥቀሙ ንዘለዎምሰራሕተኛታት ኣጠቓቕምኡ ምስልጣን፣ ውልቃዊ ንጽህና ዘበረታትዑ ሓገዛትን ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ምፍጣር፣ ተደጋጋሚ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ምብርትታዕ፣ ናይ ዓማዊልን ብዝሒ ህዝቢን ናይ ስራሐ ቦታ ተጠቓሚነት ምግዳብ፣ ብዛዕባ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ካልኦት ናይ ኮቪድ -19 መከላኸሊ መገዲታትን ዘርእዩ ምልክታት ምልጣፍ ዝኣመሰሉ የካትት።ኣብ ናይ ስራሕ ዓይነት መሰረት ብምግባር፣ ሰፊሕ ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ሰራሕተኛታት ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲታት ከም ጓንቲ፣ ጋውን፣ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ወይ ማስክ፣ መነጽር ክገብሩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: This includes employees in contact with the general public for example schools, high population density workplaces, and some high density sales outlets This includes installing air conditioners, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical restrictions such as clear plastic respirators, and opening windows for customers to access services from their cars Virtualize meetings, create unfamiliar shifts, reduce non-critical trips to areas where COVID-19 is widespread, develop emergency communications such as employee anxiety response forums, and educate employees about COVID-19 exposure and prevention behaviors and providing trainings, It includes training employees in the use of protective clothing and equipment, creating personal hygiene aids and workplaces, encouraging frequent hand washing, limiting customer and public use of the workplace, and posting signs about hand washing and other protective measures Depending on the type of work, workers with a wide range of exposures must wear personal protective equipment such as gloves, gowns, face masks or goggles.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: እዞም ንሓደጋ ተቓላዕቲ ሰራሕተኛታት ጉጅለ መተንፈሲ ምጥቃም ክንድቲ ኣየድልዮምን።
en-mt: These vulnerable group workers do not need to use respirators as much.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: ሓደ ሰብ ኣብ ኣውሮፕላን እንተደኣ ሓሚሙ፡ ንሰራሕተኛታትን ንተሳፈርቲን ኣብ ምሕላው ኣግባብ ዘለዎም ቁጽጽራት ፡ ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ካብ ካልኦት ብ 6 ጫማ ምንጻል፡ ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ድማ ናይ ገጽን ኣፍንጫኝ መሸፈኒ (mask) ምሃብ ውይድማ ኣብ ዘስዕለሉ ውይድማ ኣብ ዝህንጥሰሉ ሰዓት ኣፉን ኣፍንጫኡን ብ ሶፍት ን ኽሽፍን ምግባር ዘጠቓለለ እዩ።
en-mt: If someone is sick on an airplane, appropriate controls in protecting crew and passengers , isolate the sick person from others by 6 feet, and provide the sick person with a face and nose mask It involves doing.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: ናይ ካቢን ጉጅለታት ዝሓመመ ተጎዓዚ ኣብ ዝከናኸኑሉ ወይ ናይ ሰብነት ፈሳሲ ወይ ተበኪሉ ክኸውን ዝኽእል ቦታ ኣብ ዝነኽኡሉ እዋን ተተጠቒሞም ክድርብይዎም ዝኽእሉ ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲታት ክጥቀሙ ኣለዎም፣ እቲ ዝሓመመ ተጎዓዚ ረስኒ፣ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ሰዓል፣ ወይ ናይ ምትንፋስ ጸገም እንተልይዎ ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ እውን ክጥቀሙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Cabin crews should wear disposable medical gloves when caring for a sick passenger or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated areas, and personal protective equipment if the sick passenger has a runny nose, persistent cough, or breathing problems.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: ጓንቲታትን ካልኦት ተጠቒምካ ምድርባይ ዝከኣሉ ኣቑሑትን ኣብ ባዮሃዛርድ ሳንጣ ክድርበዩ ኣለዎም፣ ዝተበከሉ ቦታታት ድማ ክጸርዩን ዲስኢንፌክት ክግበሩን ኣለዎም።ንናይ ንግዲ መጎዓዓዝያ፣ ናይ መዘናግዒ ጉዕዞ መርከባትን ካልኦት ናይ ተጎዓዓዝቲ ጀልባታትን፣ ናይ ሓደጋ ቁጽጽር ክትሓምም ከለኻ ጉዕዞኻ ምንዋሕ፣ ዓርስኻ ምፍላይን ኣብቲ መርከብ እንከሎ ዝኾነ ሰብ ረስኒ ወይ ካልኦት ምልክታት እንተተርእዩ ድማ ንኣብኡ ዘለዉ ናይ ሕክምናኣባላት ምፍላጥ ዝኣመሰሉ ዘካትት እዩ።
en-mt: Gulons and other utensils should be thrown into a baoahzary bag, and contaminated places should be cleaned and disinfected. Other symptoms include notifying medical personnel.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: ብሓሳብ ደረጃ፣ ሕክምናዊ ክትታላት ኣብቲ ናይቲ ዓርሱ ፈልዩ ዘሎ ሰብ ካቢን ክካየዱ ኣለዎም።ንቤት ትምህርቲታትን ናይ ህጻናት ክንክን ትካላትን፣ እቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ኣብ ቤት ትመህርቲ ህንጻ እንተነይሩ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰብ ምስርጫው ብዘየገድስ CDC ነቲ ህጻን ክሳብ ዘጸሪን ዲስ ዲስኢንፌክት ዝግበርን ንክዕጾ ይመክር።
en-mt: Ideally, medical observations should be conducted in the isolated person's cabin. For schools and child care facilities, the CDC recommends that the child be closed until the child is cleaned and disinfected regardless of community exposure if the sick person was in the school building.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: ትሑት ወይ ማእኸላይ ናይ ማሕበረ ሰብ ስርጭት እንተልዩ፣ ናይ ኣካላዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ኣብ ስራሕ ክውዕሉ ኣለዎም ከም ናይ ሜዳ ጉዕዞታት፣ ኣኼባታትን ካልኦት ዓበይቲ ምትእኽኻባትን ንኣብነት ኣካላዊ ብቕዓት ትምህርቲታት ወይ ናይ ኳየር ክላሳት ወይ ኣብ ካፍቴርያ ምግቢ ምምጋብ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ጠረጴዛታት ዘሎ ክፍተት ብምስፋሕ፣ ናይ መእተዊን መውጽኢን ሰዓታት ብምውሳነን፣ ወሰንቲ ዘይኮኑ በጻሕቲ ብምቕናስ፣ ንከም ናይ ጉንፋዕ ዝበለ ምልክት ዘለዎም ህጻናት ፍሉይ ናይ ሕክምና ቦታ ምጥቃም።
en-mt: If there is low or moderate community prevalence, physical distancing techniques should be used such as field trips, meetings and other large gatherings such as physical fitness classes or choir classes or eating in a cafeteria, widening the gap between tables, entry and exit Use a special treatment area for children with flu-like symptoms by limiting hours, reducing non-essential visitors.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢያዊ ማሕበረሰባት ምልባዕ እንተልዩ፣ ንናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ብተወሳኺ፣ ንነዊሐ ግዘ ቤት ትምህርቲታት ተዓጽዮም ክጸንሑ ክግበር ይኽእል እዩ።ሕጊ ኣስፈጸምቲ መዓልታዊ ንጥፈታት እንዳካየዱ፣ ቀጥታዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሓደጋ ድማ ብ CDC ትሑት እዩ ተባሂሉ ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: If there is an outbreak in local communities, schools may be closed for longer periods of time, in addition to social distancing measures. Law enforcement is conducting daily activities, and the direct health risk is considered low by the CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: እቶም ምስ COVID-19 ከይህልዎምዝተጠርጠሩ ወይድማ ከምዘልዎም ዝተረጋገጸ ሰባት ርክብ ክህልዎም ዝኽእል ናይ ሕጊ መኽበርቲ ኣካላት ፡ ናይ ወልቀ መሐለዊ መሳርሒ ሓዊሱ፡ ልክዕ ክም ናይ ሰብ ሞያ ሕክምና ተመሳሳሊ መምርሒታት ክስዕቡ ይግባእ።
en-mt: Law enforcement agencies who may have contact with people suspected or confirmed to have COVID-19 , including personal protective equipment, should follow the same guidelines as medical professionals.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: ብድንጋጸ ናይ ቀረባ ምንኽኻእ እንተተፈጢሩ፣ ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ግዳጅ ቀበትኦምን መሳርሒታቶምን ደጊሞም ቅድሚ ምጥቃሞም ናይ ገዛ መጽረዪ ስፐረይ ወይ ዋይፕ ተጠቒሞም ከጽርዩን ዲስኢንፌክት ክገብሩን ኣለዎም፣ ዝተጠቐሙሎም PPE ታት ኣቀማምጣን ኣጎሓሕፋን ከምኡውን ክዳውንቲ ላውደሪ ብዛዕባ ምእታው ብዝምልከት ድማ ስታንዳርድ መምርሒታት ይጠቐሙ።
en-mt: In the event of sympathetic close contact, employees should clean and disinfect their seat belts and equipment with a household cleaning spray or wipe before reusing them, and use standard guidelines for the placement and disposal of used PPE and laundry clothing.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA ገለ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ ስነ ስርዓትን ሰራሕተኛታት ንምቅላዕ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ሓደጋ ከምዘለዉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: OSHA said some health care and funeral home workers are at increased risk for exposure.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድል ዘለዎም ስራሕቲ ምስ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ተቓላዒነት ዘለዎም ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ኣቕርቦት፣ ሓገዝ፣ ቤተ ፈተነን ናይ ሕክምና መጎዓዓዝያ ሰራሕተኛታትን ዘካትቱ እዮም።
en-mt: High-risk occupations include health care delivery, assistance, laboratory and medical transport workers with exposure to suspected or confirmed COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እቶም ሰራሕተኛታት ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ዘካይዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ ወይ ካብ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝፍለጡ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ናሙናታት ዝወስዱ እንተኾይኖም ኣዚዮም ተቓላዕቲ እዮም።
en-mt: The workers are most vulnerable if they conduct tests that produce aerosols, or if they take samples from suspected or known COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ከይዲታት ኢንቱቤሽን፣ ሰዓል ዘጀምሩ ከይዲታት፣ ብሮንኮስኮፒ፣ ገለ ናይ ስኒ ሕክምናታትን ምርመራታትን፣ ወይ ኢንቫሲቭ ናይ ናሙና ምእካብ ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Procedures that produce aerosols include intubation, cough-initiating procedures, bronchoscopy, certain dental treatments and examinations, or invasive sample collection.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ተቓላዒነት ሓደጋ ዘለዎም ናይ ቀብሪ ስራሕቲ ንናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ከምዝተተሓዙ ዝተጠርጠሩ ወይ ዝተረጋገጹ መወትቲ ሬሳ ዘዳልዉ ሰባት; እዚኦም ናይ ሬሳ ምርመራ እንተካይዶም ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ሰፊሕ እዩ።ተወሳኺ ናይቶም ብኮቪድ-19 ከም ዝተተሓዙ ዝተረጋገጹ ወይ ዝተጠርጠሩ ዝፍለዩሉ ክፍሊ ዘካትት ናይ ምህንድስና ቁጽጽራት፣ ናይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርት ከይዲታት ዘካይዱ እውን ዘካተቱ እዮም።
en-mt: High-risk funeral operations for people preparing the bodies of deceased suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19; These are more likely to be exposed if they conduct autopsies.In addition to engineering controls that include the isolation of confirmed or suspected cases, they also include those that conduct aerosol production processes.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: ስፔሻላይዝ ዝተገበሩ ኣሉታዊ ቬንትሌሽን ኣብ ገለ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ናይ ቀብሪ መሰንድኦታትን ኣግባባዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Specialized negative ventilation may be appropriate in some health care and funeral settings.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: ናሙናታት ብ Biosafety ደረጃ 3 ጥንቃቐታት ክተሓዙ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Samples must be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት (WHO) ናብ ሕክምና ዝመጹ ተሓከምቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተጠርጠርቲ ድዮም ኣይኮኑን ብምፍላይ ኣብ ፍሉይ መጸበዪ ቦታ ክጸነንሑ ምግባር ይመክር።ን ካልእ PPE ብተወሳኺ፣ OSHA ምስ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ተታሒዞም ከምዝኾኑ ዝፍለጡ፣ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ኣብ ውሽጢ 6 እግሪ ጫማ ንዝሰርሑ ሰባት መተንፈሲታት ይመክር፣ ነቶም ኣብ ናይ ኤሮሶል መምረቲ ምርመራ ዝሰርሑ ሰባት እውን።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that patients coming to the hospital be kept in a separate waiting area by isolating whether they are suspected of having COVID-1 He recommends respirators for shoemakers, as well as those working in aerosol manufacturer testing.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ፣ ብ NIOSH-ፍቓድ ዝተወሃቦ N95 ፊልተር ዝገብር ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ መተንፈሲ ወይ ዝሐሸ ኣብ ሓፈሻዊ፣ ጽሑፋዊ ናይ ምትንፋስ መከላኸሊ ፕሮግራም እኹል ፈተነ፣ ስልጠናን ናይ ሕክምና ፈተናታትን እውን ሓዊሱ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕል።
en-mt: In the United States, a NIOSH-approved N95 filtering face mask respirator or better is used in a general, written respiratory protection program including adequate testing, training, and clinical trials.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: ካልኦት ናይ መተንፈሲ ዓይነታት ዝበለጸ ምክልኻልን ዝሓሸ ናይ ሰራሕተኛ ምቾትን ይህቡ።WHO ሙሉእ መሸፈኒታት ኣይመክርን፣ ኮቪድ-19 ብናይ ሰውነት ፈሳሲ ዝመሓላለፍ ዘይኮነስ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም ብምዃኑ።
en-mt: Other types of respirators provide better protection and better worker comfort.WHO does not recommend full masks, as COVID-19 is not transmitted by body fluids but is a respiratory disease.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO ንመርመርቲ ሰባት ናይ ሰርጂካል ማስክ ምጥቃም ጥራሕ እዩ ዝመክር።
en-mt: The WHO only recommends the use of surgical masks for test subjects.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: ብዘይ ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት ናይ ምትንፋስ ናሙናታት ዝወስዱ፣ ዝሕብሕቡ፣ ወይ ዘጎዓዕዙ ሰባት፣ WHO ሰርጂካል ማስክ፣ መነጸራት፣ ወይ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ፣ ጋውንን ጓንቲን ክጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: Aerosol-free tests WHO recommends that people who take, care for, or transport breath samples from COVID-19 patients wear a surgical mask, goggles, or a face mask, gown, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: ኤሮሶል ዘምርቱ ምርመራታት ክካየዱ እንተኾይኖም፣ እቲ ሰርጂካል ማስክ ብ N95 ወይ FFP2 መተንፈሲ ክቕየር ኣለዎ።
en-mt: If aerosol-producing tests are to be performed, the surgical mask should be replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ PPE ኣቕርቦት እኹል ብዘይ ምዃኑ፣ WHO ናይ PPE ኣድላይነት ብቴሌሜዲሲን ንምቕናስ፣ ኣካላዊ መፈላለዪታት ከም ንጹር መስትያት ክጥቀሙ፣ ናይ ቀጥታ ክንክን ዝገብሩ ሰባት ጥራሕ ናቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ክኣትዉ፣ ነቲ PPE ንንጹር ስራሕ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ጥራሕ ብምጥቃም፣ ንተመሳሳሊ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዝተፈላለዩ ሕሙማት ክንክን ኣብ ዝህቡሉ ግዜ ከየውጽእዎ ምጥቃም ክቕጽሉ፣ ነቲ ናይ PPE ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ክቆጻጸርዎን ከተሓባብሩን፣ ንናይ ሕማም ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ማስክ ዘይምጥቃም ብምብርትታዕ ንክሰርሑ ይመክር።
en-mt: Due to insufficient international PPE supply, WHO to reduce the need for PPE through telemedicine, use physical separations as a clear mirror, only direct caregivers to enter people with COVID-19, using the PPE only where it is necessary for clear work He recommends that various patients continue to use it without removing it while providing care, monitor and coordinate the PPE supply chain, and encourage people who do not show signs of illness not to wear masks.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: ካብ: ካተሪነ ማሀር፣ Wikimedia Foundation CEO
en-mt: From: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ን: ኩሎም ናይ Wikimedia Foundation staff (ዊኪሚድያ ፋውንዴሽነን ስታፍ)
en-mt: To: All Wikimedia Foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: ዋኒን መስመር: [ኮቪድ-19] እቲ ጽዕንቶ ብምቅላል ንመጻኢ ምድላው
en-mt: Business Line: [COVID-19] Prepare for the future by mitigating the impact

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: መስደዲ ዕለት/ሰዓት: 14 መግጋቢት፣ 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: Send Date/Time: March 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: ፍቓድ ምሃብ: CC0: ዝተዓቀበ መሰል የለን
en-mt: Licensing: CC0: No reserved rights

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: ኣብዚ ወርሒ እዚ ንባዕልና ኣብ ከቢድ ኩነታት ኢና ረኺብናዮ ዘለና።
en-mt: This month we find ourselves in a difficult situation.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ነንባዕልና ዘለና ዓለምለኻዊ ምትሕሓዛትናን ሓላፍነታትናን ግልጺ ገይሩ ዘርኢ ነገር እዩ።
en-mt: This COVID-19 pandemic is something that clearly demonstrates our global relationships and responsibilities to each other.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: ንማሕለኻታቱ ኣብነት የብልናን።እንተኾነ ግን ዋና ምላሽና ኣብ ናይ ዓለም ሓዘኔታ፣ ምትሕብባርን ማሕበረ ሰብ ምህናጽን ኣብ ማእከል ናይዚ ድርጅት ልቢ ምፍጣር ከምዝኾነ ንፈልጥ ኢና።
en-mt: We have no example of its obstacles. However, we know that our main response is to create a heart in the world of grief, cooperation and community building at the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: ብኢመይል፣ ምድውዋልን ቻትን ዝረኣናዮ ኣብ መንጎ መሳርሕቲታትና ዘሎ ምሕዝነትን ምትሕልላይን ምስኦም ክንሰርሕ ዕድል ዝረኸብና ዘደንቑ ሰባት ከምዝኾኑ ዘረጋግጽ እዩ።
en-mt: What we have seen through emails, calls and chats is the camaraderie and caring amongst our colleagues which proves that they are amazing people we have the opportunity to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: ንኩልኹም ከም መሳርሕተይ ጌረ ክቖጽረኩም ብምኽኣለይ ኣዝየ ሕጉስ እየ።
en-mt: I am very happy to be able to consider you all as my colleagues.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ኣብ ስራሕና ዘለዎ ምስጋና ኣካፊሉኒ።
en-mt: Last week, anyone shared their gratitude for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ዓለም ናብ Wikipedia ገጻ ክትጥምዝዝ ምኽኣላ ክንደይ ትርጉም ከምዘለዎ ኣዘኻኺሮምኒ፣ እዚ ወሳኒ ሓገዝ ኦንላይን ኮይኑ ንኩሉ ሰብ ቅሩብ ኮይኑ ምጽንሑ ሓያል ምልክት እዩ።
en-mt: They reminded me how much it means that the world is turning to Wikipedia these days, a powerful sign that this crucial help remains online and available to everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: ስራሕኩም እዚ ንክሳኻዕ ይገብር፣ እዞም ሳይታት ንክጸንሑ ወይ መሳርሕቲና ክኽፈሉ ክትገብሩ እንተኽኢልኩም ወይ ማሕበረ ሰብና ድሕንነቱ ሓልዩ ንክጸንሕ ይገብር።
en-mt: Your work makes this happen, if you can keep these sites or get our colleagues paid or keep our community safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: ዓለም Wikipedia ዘቕርቦ ሓበሬታ የድልያ እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ካብ ካልእ ግዜ ንላዕሊ።
en-mt: The world needs the information Wikipedia has to offer, especially more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: እዚ ግዜ እዚ እንገብሮ ነገር ጥራይ ዘይኮነስ፣ ነቲ ነገር ከመይ ንገብሮ ዝብል ነገር፣ ኣብ ዓለም ትርጉም ዘለዎ ጽልዋ ዘሕድረሉ ግዜ እዩ።
en-mt: This is a time when not only what we do, but how we do that thing, makes a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: ብምኽንያት ናይ'ዚ ተልእኾ ኣድላይነትን ተበርክቱዎ ግደን ፡ ካብ'ዚ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ሰሙን ጀሚሩ ሓቢርና ኣብ ንሰርሐሉ መንገዲ ዝተወሰኑ ርኡያት ለውጢታት ክንገብር ኢና።
en-mt: Because of the need for this mission and your contribution , we will be making some significant changes in the way we work together starting next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: ናይ ስራሕ መደባትና ምትዕርራያት
en-mt: Adjustments to our work schedules

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Robyn ቅድም ክብል ከምዝበሎ፣ እዚ ናይ c-team ብዛዕባ ኣሰራርሓና ንክመያየጡን ንዝመጹ ዝተወሰኑ መዓልቲታትን ኣዋርሕን መደብ ከውጽኡን ተራኺቦም ነይሮም።
en-mt: Robyn said earlier, this c-team met to discuss our process and plan for the next few days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዝርርብ እዚ፣ ነዚ ኣጋጢሙና ዘሎ ኩነታት ኣግባብ ምላሽ እዩ ኢልና ዝሓሰብናዮ ነገርን ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ እቲ ድርጅት ቀጻሊነት ክህልዎ እንታይ ክንገብር ከምዘለናን ኣብ ግምት ኣእቲና።
en-mt: In this conversation, we considered what we thought was the appropriate response to the situation and what we needed to do to keep the organization going at this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: ብዓብይኡ ጭንቀት ኣወጊድና ተልእኾና ንነዊሕ ግዜ ክንሕግዝ ኢና ደሊና።
en-mt: Most importantly, we wanted to eliminate anxiety and help our mission long term.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: መሊስኩም ክትድውሉ ትደልዩ እንተኾይንኩም፣ ጸገም የብሉን።
en-mt: If you want to call again, no problem.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: ንኩሎም ስታፋት፣ ኮንትራክተራትን ናይ ኮንትራት ሰራሕተኛታትን:
en-mt: To all staff, contractors and contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: መዓልታዊ ናይ ስራሕ ትጽቢታትና ኣብ መዓልቲ 4 ሰዓታት ዝኾኑ እዮም፣ ወይ 20 ሰዓታት ኣብ ሰሙን ክሳብ ካልእ ሓበሬታ ዝወሃብ።
en-mt: Our daily work expectations are 4 hours per day, or 20 hours per week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: በዓል ኣይኮንናን ንእውጅ ዘለና - ልዕሊ ልሙዳት ሰዓታት ክትሰርሑ ትኽእሉ እንተኾይንኩም፣ እዚ ተልእኾ ክጥቀመልኩም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: We are not declaring a holiday – if you can work above usual hours, this mission could benefit you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ዓለም ኣብዚ ግዘ እዚ ምግማታ ከቢድ እዩ፣ ንትፈትውዎም ሰባት ንምክንኻን ኮነ፣ ግሮሰሪ ንምዐዳግ፣ ወይ ናብ ዶክተር ንምኻድ፣ ድሕንነትኩም እዩ ንሕና ቅድሚያ ንህቦ።
en-mt: However, the world is hard to predict these days, whether it is to take care of your loved ones, buy groceries, or go to the doctor, your safety is our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: ግዜኹም ኣይንከታተሎን ኢና።
en-mt: We do not track your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: እንድሕር ሓሚምኩም ናብ ስራሕ ኣይትኺዱ።
en-mt: If you are sick, do not go to work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: እዚ ብዘይ ምባል ምርዳእ ዝከኣል ነገር እዩ፣ ግን ንብሎ ኣለና።
en-mt: This is something that can be understood without saying it, but we are saying it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: ናይ ሕማም መዓልታት ወይ PTO ኣድልዩን - ንማናጀርኩም ንገርዎ ጉጅለኹም ድማ ካላንደሮም ንከስተኻኽሉ ሓግዝዎም እቶም ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ምሽፋኖም ንምርግጋጽ ድማ መደብ ኣውጽኡ።
en-mt: Sick days or PTO needed – tell your manager and help your team adjust their calendar and make a plan to make sure those positions are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መርመራ ውጽኢትካ ኣወንታዊ እንተኾይኑ፡ ብኽብረትካ ንBryan ኣብ T&amp:C Ops ኣፍልጦ መታን T&amp:C ደገፍን ነቲ ኩነታትካ ካብ ምሕደራ ዘድሊ ኣተክሮት ክግበረሉ ክሕግዙኻ)።
en-mt: (If you test positive for COVID-19, please let Brian in T&:C Ops know so they can help you with T&:C support and the necessary attention from management to your condition).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: ብሰዓት ዝሰርሑ ሰባት ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ክኽፈሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Hourly workers will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: ምስ ኮንትራክተራትናን ሰዓታዊ ስታፍ መሳርሕትናን ዝኣተናዮ ቃል ክነኽብር ኢና።
en-mt: We will honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: ኩሉ ሰብ ብመሰረት እቲ ኣብ ልሙድ ኩነታት ዝነበረ ኣብ ስራሕ ዘወዕሎ ሰዓት ክፍሊት ይፍጸመሉ።
en-mt: Everyone is paid according to the number of hours spent working under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: እዚ ድማ እንተሓሚምኩምን ናብ ስራሕ ክትከዱዘይትኽእሉ እንተኾይንኩምን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: This includes if you are ill and unable to go to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: ክትሰርሑ ትደልዩ እንተኾይንኩም፣ ክንሕግዘኩም ኢና።
en-mt: If you want to work, we will help you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሰባት ንስራሕ ኣብ ዘለናዮ ዓለም ንዘሎ ጭንቀት መወገዲ መንገዲ ጌሮም ይጥቀምዎ።
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to relieve stress in today’s world.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: እንሰርሖ ስራሕ ኣዝዩ ዘዕግብ ውጽኢት ዘለዎ ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ኣብ ከምዚ ዓይነት ግዜ።
en-mt: The work we do can be very satisfying, especially at times like this.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: ሕጂ'ውን፣እዚ ብዛዕባ ንነብስኻምክንኻን እዩ።
en-mt: Again,this is about taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: ምስ ማናጀርኩም ክትርዳድኡ ኢና ንሓተኩም፣ እንታይ ክንጽበ ከምዘለና ፈሊጥና ንክንዳሎ ምእንታይ።
en-mt: We ask that you communicate with your manager, so that we know what to expect and are prepared.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: ገለ ስራሕቲ ወሰንቲ ተባሂሎም ይምደቡ።
en-mt: Some jobs are classified as critical.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: ምግባር ክንቅጽሎም ዝግብኡ ሓደሓደ ነገራት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are some things we need to keep doing.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: ናይ SRE; HR Ops; Trust&ampን ናይ ድሕንነትን ምእካብ ምወላን ጉጅለታት(ምስ ካልኦት) ነቲ ኣድላዪ ስራሕ ሓገዝ ከድልዮ ዝኽእል ይሰርሑ።
en-mt: of the SRE; HR Ops; Trust& and security and fundraising teams(among others) do the necessary work that may need assistance.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: ናይዚ ግዜ እዚ ዕላማታት ንምኽላስን ንተልእኾና ዋና ኣገዳሲ ዝኾነ ነገር ንምሕጋዝ ብዝብል ትኹረትና ንምቕያርን ከይዲ ንጅምር ኢና።
en-mt: We begin the process of revising the goals of this time and changing our focus to help with what is most important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: ኩላትና ክንገብሮ ዝግባእ ብዙሕ ነገር ኣሎ፡ ኣብቶም ኣዝዮም ኣድለይቲ ዝኾኑ ፕሮጀክቲታት ጠመተ ክንገብር ኢና።
en-mt: There is a lot for all of us to do, and we will focus on the most needed projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: ሕዚ ቀስ ምባል ጸኒሑ ኣይጎድእን።
en-mt: Slowing down now doesn't hurt later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ እዚ ምስ ሓለፈ “ንምርካብ ክልተ ዕጽፊ ንምኻድ” ኣይተለምናን ኣለና።
en-mt: We are not begging to “go twice as much to find” after this pandemic.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: ናይ ሰዓት ገደባት ንምኽባር ተወሰኽቲ ሰዓታት ክትሰርሑ ትጽቢት ኣይግበረኩምን።
en-mt: You are not expected to work overtime to comply with hourly restrictions.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: ገለ ነገራት ከምዝተቐየሩ ንቕበል፣ ሓደሽቲ ዕላማታትን ግዜ ገደባትን ንምድላው ድማ ንሰርሕ ኣድላዪ እንተኾይኑ።
en-mt: We accept that some things have changed, and work to set new goals and deadlines if needed.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: ነቲ APP (ዓመታዊ ትልሚ) እንታይ የጋጥሞ?
en-mt: What happens to the APP (annual plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: ናብዚ ሓድሽ ነባራዊ ዓለምና ንምእታውን ናይ መዓልታዊ ናይ ስራሕ ሰዓታት ንምስትኽኻልን፣ ናይ 2020-2021 ዓመታዊ ትልሚና ዝርከበሉ ግዘ ገደብ ክነስተኻኽል ንሓስብ ኣለና።
en-mt: To accommodate our new residential world and adjust daily working hours, we are considering adjusting the deadline for our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: ዕላማና ናይ 2019-2020 ትልሚና ምንዋሕ ሓሳብ ምቕራብ እዩ እዚ ድማ ሰራሕተኛታት ወሳኒ ስራሕ፣ ዓርሶም ምክንኻንን፣ ዝፈትውዎም ሰባት ምክንኻንን ቅድሚያ ንክህቡ ዝፈቅድ ደጀት ንምፍጻም እኹል ግዜ ይህብ፡ ከምኡውን ኣብ ዝቅጽል ዝተወሰኑ ሰሙናት መደቦም ተቐኒሱ ክሰርሑ ዝደልዩ ንምምዳብን እዩ።
en-mt: Our goal is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that will allow employees enough time to complete a budget that allows them to prioritize critical work, self-care, and loved ones, and to assign those who want to reduce their schedule in the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ግዜ ገደብ ምንዋሕ ናይዚ ግዜ እዚ ዘተተለሙ ናይ ስራሕ ጽዕንቶታትን ጸቕጢታትን ኣብ መላእ እቲ ድርጅት ብሓይሊ ይቕንስ።
en-mt: This deadline extension drastically reduces the planned workloads and pressures across the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: ፕሮፖዛልና ናብቲ ቦርድ ኣብ ቀጻላይ ሰሙን ክነቕርብ ኢና ፍቓድ ምስረኸብና ድማ ኣብ ቀጻላይ ስጉምቲና ተወከልቲን ጉጅለታትን ብዝምልከት ክነሐድሶ ኢና።
en-mt: We will submit our proposal to the board next week and once we have approval, we will update you on our next steps regarding reps and groups.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: ን APP ጉጅለ ንናይዚ መሪሕነትኩም ነመስግን።
en-mt: Thank you to the APP team for your lead on this.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: ናይ ቤት ጽሕፈት ኩነታት፣ ተቓላዕነትን ምጽራይን
en-mt: Office conditions, vulnerabilities and screening

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፣ ካብቶም SF-መሰረት ዝገበሩ መሳርሕትና ሓዲኡ ንኮቪድ-19 ተቓሊዑ ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ፈሊጥና።
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to COVID-1

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ካብ ናይ ጥንቃቐ ኣድላይነት ዝተለዓለ፣ ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መጽረዪ ጉጅለ ቆጺርና ኣብ ናይ ሳንፍራንሲስኮ ቤት ጽሕፈት ዘለዉ ቦታታት ዲስኢንፌክት ንክገብሩ ኣትዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: However, out of a precautionary measure, we have hired an antivirus cleaning team to disinfect the areas in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል ደረጃ ጸረ ቫይረስ ብጽባጽ ተጠቒሞም ኩሉ ዝንካእ ቦታ ዲስኢንፌክት ጌሮምዎ፣ ነቲ ሎቢን ናብ ደብሪና ዝመጹ ናይ ሊፍት ባክታትን እውን ከይተረፈ።
en-mt: They used hospital grade disinfectant in a blitz and disinfected every touchable area, even the lobby and the elevator backs coming to our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: እቲ ህንጻ ናይ ተቐማጦኡ ድሕንነት ድጋፍ ዝህቡ ናይ ባዕሉ ሓላፍነታዊ ክንክን ፕሮቶኮል ዝጥቀሙ ፍርያማትይሰርሓሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: The building is manufacturing products that use its own Responsible Care Protocol that support the safety of its occupants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: ክንምለስ ክንውስን ከለና ቤት ጽሕፈትና ብኣግባቡ ዝተዳለወ ከምዝኸውን ርግጸኛታት ኢና።
en-mt: We are confident that when we decide to come back our office will be appropriately set up.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: ናይ DC ቤት ጽሕፈትና ኣብ WeWork እዩ ቦትኡ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ፕሮቶኮሉ ድማ ምሳናን ምስ ኩሎም ናይ DC-መሰረት ዝገበሩ ናይ ስታፍ ኣባላት ኣካፊልዎ እዩ።
en-mt: Our DC office is based in WeWork, and has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: ካብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ DC ቤት ጽሕፈትና ናብ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ርሕቐት ዘለዎ ቦታ ምስ ብሳንፍራንሲስኮ ሼር ዝተገበረ መምርሒ ኣተግቢሩ።
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office implemented to a fully remote location with guidelines shared by San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: ከም ገለ ናይ NYC-መሰረቶም መሳርሕትና፣ ኣብ ብሩክሊን ቦታ ብዛዕባ ምክራይ እንዳተመያየጥና ኢና ኔርና።
en-mt: Like some of their NYC-based colleagues, we were discussing leasing a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: እዞም ዝርርባት ቀጺሎም እዮም ግን ድማ ክደናጎዩ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: These conversations have continued but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: ገለ መሳርሕትና ንመጀመርያ ግዜ እዮም ርሒቖም ዝሰርሑ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ ርሑቕ ቦታ መሳርሕትና ምስትኽኻል እዩ ኢሎም ይኣምኑ፣ ስለዚ ድማ ገለ ምኽሪታት ከቕርቡልኩም ይደልዩ:
en-mt: Our long-term remote colleagues believe it is an adjustment, and so they want to offer you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: ኣኼባታት ዝካየዱሉ ንውሓት ግዜ ካብ ሓደ ወይ ድማ ክልተ ሰዓት ንላዕሊ ከይውስኽ ምግባር።
en-mt: Keep the duration of meetings to no more than one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: ነዋሕቲ መደባት ዘድልዩ እንተኾይኖም፣ ኣብ ዝተወሰኑ መዓልታት ብኸመይ ክሰባበሩ ከምዝኽእሉ ኣብ ግምት ኣእትዉ።
en-mt: If longer sessions are needed, consider how they can be broken into certain days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: እቶም ኣኼባታት ብገልጺ ፍለይዎም፣ ኣጀንዳ ይሃልኹም ኣቐዲምኩም ድማ ዝንበብ ማቴርያል ስደዱ።
en-mt: Separate the meetings clearly, have an agenda and send reading material in advance.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: ነዚ ቪድዮ ዲፎልት ግበርዎ፣ ብናይ ጎግል ዶክስን ዙምን ናይ ቀጥታ ሕብረትን ርክባትን ንምስላጥ።
en-mt: Make this video the default, to run live feeds and contacts with Google Docs and Zoom.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: ሕድሕድ ኣኼባታት ንምክያድ መምርሒ ይሃሉኻ፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ነቲ ቻት ይቆጻጸሮ ናይ ተዛረብቲ ዝርዝር ድማ ይከታተል፣ ዝኾነ ሰብ ድማ ማስታወሻ ይውሰድ (ወይ ብሕብረት ማስታወሻ-ይውሰዱ)።
en-mt: Have instructions for conducting individual meetings, have someone control the chat and keep track of the speaker list, and have someone take notes (or be note-taken collectively).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: ዝምችው ሄድሴት ኣድሊኩም እንተነይሩ ናብ ናይ ቴክ ሓገዝ ኢመይል ስደዱ።
en-mt: Email tech support if you needed a suitable headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: ናይ ድሕንነት ካሕሳከም ንምግቢ ተጠቐሙሉ።
en-mt: Use your security compensation for food.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: ናብ #remoties ቻነል ኣብ ስላክ ብዛዕባ ዘተሰራጨዉ ስራሕቲታት ምስ መሳርሕቲታትኩም ንምዝርራብ ተሓወሱ
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to chat with your colleagues about distributed tasks

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: እዚ ናይ HR ኦፕሬሽን ጉጅለ ኣብ መላእ እቲ ፋውንዴሽን ምውሳኹ ንምሕጋዝ ንናይ webinar-መሰረት ዝገበሩ ኤርጎኖሚክስ ይከታተሉ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: This HR operations team are overseeing webinar-based ergonomics to help with its increase across the foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ንኩሎም ማሕበረሰባት ብWikimedia ዝምወሉ ከም editathons ዝኣመሰሉ ህዝባዊ ምድላዋት፡ WHO እቲ ለበዳ ጠፊኡ እዩ ኢሉ ክሳብ ዝእውጅ፡ ከስርዙ ሓቲትናዮም።
en-mt: Last week we asked all communities to cancel Wikimedia-sponsored public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declared the outbreak gone.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ምስራዝ ሕቶና ወይ ካልኦት ገደባት እቲ ተስማዕሚዕናሉ ዝነበርና ናይ ፈቓድ ንጥፈታቶም ምርካብ ዘይከኣል ከምዝገብሮ ከምዝርደኣናን ንምድንጓዩ ወይ ነዞም ሽቶታት ምምሕያሽ ማንም ሰብ ከምዘይቕጻዕ ክነፍልጦም ንደሊ።
en-mt: We understand that this cancellation request or other restrictions will make it impossible to obtain their agreed licensed activities and that no one will be penalized for delaying or improving these goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: ኣብ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ሰሙን ናይ Wikimania ተወሳኺ መምርሒታትን ካልኦት ክልላዊን ቴማቲክ ማሕበረሰባዊ ኮንፈረንስታተን ክንከታተል ኢና።
en-mt: Next week we will follow Wikimania's additional guides and other regional and thematic community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: ናይ ዓለም ማሕበረ ሰብ ሓፈሻዊ ስምዒት ሓዘንን ምድንጋጽን እዩ፣ ኣብ ናይ ባዕሎም ማሕበረ ሰባት፡ Wikimedia ወይ ካልእት ኣትኲሮም ክሰርሑ ብምኽኣሎም ድማ ዕረፍቲ ይስምዖም።
en-mt: The world community's general feeling is sadness and pity, and they feel relieved to be able to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia or otherwise.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: ኣብ ምቕጻል፣ CRT ነቲ ማሕበረ ሰብ ጽዕንትኡ ንክቆጻጸርን ምስኦም ዘለና ርክብ ንክንከታተልን ዘኽእል ቦታ ንምፍጣር ኣብ Meta-Wiki ፔጅ ንምፍጣር ይሰርሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Moving forward, CRT is working to create a page on the Meta-Wiki to create a space for the community to control their impact and track our interactions with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: ምስ COVID-19 ዝተሓሓዙ ጉዳያት ኣፍልጦ ምህላው
en-mt: Knowledge of COVID-19 related issues

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: ንቀጻላይ ሓሙስ ናይ ዕደመ መልእኽቲ ናብ ካላንደርኩም ክንሰድድ ኢና፣ 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT ንፍሉይ ናይ ስታፍ ኣኼባ።
en-mt: We’ll send an invitation to your calendar next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: ነዚ ግዜ እዚ ተወሰኽቲ ምሕዳሳት ንምክፋል፣ ሕቶታትኩም ንምምላስን ነን ባዕልና ንምርኻብ ግዜ ንምውሳድን ክንጥቀመሉ ኢና።
en-mt: We will use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and take time to meet each other ourselves.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: ኣብዚ ነገር እዚ ብሓባር ኢና ኣቲናዮ ዘለና ብዝተኸኣለና ድማ ክንተሓጋገዝ ኣለና።
en-mt: We are in this thing together and we need to help each other as much as we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ፣ ነዚ ሓበሬታ ኣብ ኢመይል ምርካብ ክትቅጽሉ ትኽእሉ፣ ካልኦት ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተተሓሓዙ ወሰንቲ ሓበሬታታት እውን፣ ኣብ Office Wiki ይርከቡ።
en-mt: In the meantime, you can continue to receive this information by email, and other important information related to COVID-19 is also available on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT እዞም ገጻት ክሕደሱን ኩሎም እዞም ሓበሬታታት ድማ ኣብ ሓደ ቦታ ክኾኑ ይገብር።
en-mt: CRT keeps these pages updated and all of this information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ ብኸቢዱ ተጠቒዖም ኣብ ዘለዉ ሃገራት ምስ ዝነብሩ ስታፍ ዘለና ርክብ ክንቅጽል ንሰርሕ ኣለና።
en-mt: We are currently working to maintain contact with staff living in countries that are severely affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ጉዕዞ፣ ምድላዋት፣ ዓብዩ ናይ ስራሕ ከይዲ፣ ወይ ናይ ሽፋን ማሕለኻ፣ ወይ ካልእ ሓገዝ እትደልየሉ ነገር፣ ብኽብረትኩም ን CRT ከተመልክቱን ምስኦም ንኽትሰርሑን ከይትፈርሑ።
en-mt: Please don't be afraid to contact CRT and work with them about travel, preparations, major work processes, or coverage obstacles, or anything else you need help with.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: ንሕና ሓገዝን ክራይን ከም ኣድላይነቱ ክንህበኩም ኢና ኣብዚ ዘለና።
en-mt: We are here to provide assistance and rentals as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: ምስጢራዊ ወይ ዘሕፍረኩም ጉዳይ እንተሊኩም፣ ብኽብረትኩም ናብ Bryan Judan ኢመይል ግበሩ - ናይ HR International Global Operations (ኤች ኣር ዓለም ለኻዊ ኦፕሬሽን) ዳይሬክተር።
en-mt: If you have a confidential or embarrassing issue, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: እዞም ለውጢታት እዚኦም ስራሕናን ግቡእናን ከምዝገደፍና ክርኣዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: These changes should not be seen as abandoning our jobs and duties.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: እኳ ድኣስ፣ ኣብዚ ግዜ እዚ፣ ስራሕናን ግቡእናን ኣብ ሕሉፍ ካብ ዝነበረ መንገዲና ፍልይ ብዝበለ ክቕየሩ ከምዘለዎም መርአይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Rather, they are indicators that, today, our work and duties must change in a different way than we did in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: ነንባዕልና ንክንተሓጋገዝን ሓቢርና ክንሰርሕን ክጠቕሙና ይኽእሉ እዮም ኢልና ንሓስቦም ስጉምቲታት እዚኦም እዮም፣ ዘድልይዎም ሓገዛት ንምንቅስቓሳትና እንዳቕረብና፣ ንዓለም ድማ ብዝድገፉሉ ሓገዝ እንዳሓገዝነና።
en-mt: These are the steps we think can help us help each other and work together, providing our movements with the help they need, and helping the world with the help they support.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: ትልሚ ዝተገበሮ ስራሕና እቲ ግዜ ክሳብ ዝመጽእ ክጽበየና ክጸንሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Our planned work will be waiting for us until that time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: ንግዚኡ ነንሕድሕድና ንተሓጋገዘሉን ነቲ ኣገዳሲ ዝኾነ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ሰሙን ወይድማ ኣብቶም ዝቅጽሉ ኣዋርሕ ንዝመጽእ ስራሕ ባይታ ንፈጥረሉን ግዜ እዩ።
en-mt: It is a time to help each other for the time being and pave the way for the more important work to come next week or in the months ahead.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: ኩልኹም እዚ ክኸውን ንክትሰርሑ ንጽበየኩም፣ ስለዚ ድማ ንባዕልኹምን ቤተ ሰብኩምን ክትከናኸኑ ዘድልየኩም ነገራት ክርከቡ ከለዉ ባዕልኹም ክትረኽብዎ ብቑዓት ክትኾኑ መታን።
en-mt: We expect all of you to work to make this happen, so that you are eligible to get what you need to take care of yourself and your family when it becomes available.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: ሐዚ፣ ብኽብረትኩም -- ኣእዳውኩም ተሓጸቡ ገጽኩም ድማ ኣይትንክኡ!
en-mt: Now, please -- wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, ን Tony S), ከምኡውን እቶም ዝተረፉ ኣመራርሓ ጉጅለታት (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, ን Toby N ን)።
en-mt: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the leadership teams (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'Angiotensin- ኢንዛየም ቀያሪ 2 (ACE2) ኣብ ሳንቡእ፣ ኣብ ልቢ፣ ኣብ ኩላሊትን ኣብ መዓናጡን ኣብ ዝርከቡ መትኒታት ደጋዊ ኣካል (ግድግዳ ዋህዮ) ተጣቢቑ ዝርከብ ኢንዛየም እዩ።
en-mt: b'Angiotensin- Enzyme converter 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the membranes of the outer body (cell wall) in the lungs, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 ን ዓቐን ኣንጅዮተንሲን-II ብምጉዳልን ንኣንጅ(1-7) ብምውሳኽን ንንጥፈታት ናይ ኣንጂዮተንሲን ኮንቨርቲንግ ኢንዛይም (ACE) ይጻረር ።እዚ ድማ ንናይ መትነ-ልባዊ ሕማማት ንምፍዋስ ተስፋ ዘለዎ መድሃኒት ይገብሮ ። ACE2 ን ገሊኦም ኮሮናቫይረሳት ከም መእተዊ ናብ ዋህዮታት እውን የገልግል እዩ ።
en-mt: ACE2 antagonizes the activity of angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) by decreasing the levels of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) , making it a promising drug for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases . ACE2 also serves as an entry point for some coronaviruses into cells.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: ኣብ ሰባት ዝርከብ ነፍሳዊ ቅመም መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ hACE2ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ።
en-mt: The soul formulation in humans is often referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 ዚንክ ዝሓዘ ሜታሎኢኤንዛይም እንትኸዉን ኣብ ናይ ኢንዶቴልያልን ካልኦት ዋህዮትን ደጋዊ ኣካል ይርከብ።
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme found on the outer surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 ፕሮቲን N-ተርሚናል ፔፕቲዴዝ M2 ዶሜን ከምኡውን C-ተርሚናል ኮሌክትሪን ሬናል ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ መጎዓዓዚ ዶሜን ዝሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 ነጸላ መሕለፊ ዘለዎ ዓይነት I መምብሬን ፕሮቲን እዩ፣ ናይ ኤንዛይም ንጡፍ ዝኾነ ዓብላልነት ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ሳንቡእን ካልኦት ቲሹታትን ብላዕሊ ተቓሊዑ ዝረኣይ እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I membrane protein with a single passage, enzymatically active with a predominance of surface exposed lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ካብ ዋህዮ ወጻኢ ዝኾነ ናይ ACE2 ዶሜን ካብ ትራንስመምብሬን ዶሜን ብካልእ ሼዴዝ ዝበሃል ኢንዛይም ይቑረጽ፣ እቲ ድሕሪኡ ዝፍጠር ሓቓቒ ፐሮቲን ድማ ናብ ናይ ደም ትቦታት ይስደድ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ብሽንቲ ክውገድ ይግበር።
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cut from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme called shadease, and the resulting digestive perotin is exported to the blood vessels and then eliminated in the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 ኣብ መብዛሕትኦም ኣካላት ሰብነት ይርከብ: ACE2 ብፍላይ ኣብ ናይ ሳንቡእ ዓይነት II ኣልቪዮላር ዋህዮታት፣ ናይ ቀጢን መዓንጣ ኢንትሮሳይታት፣ ናይ ኣርተሪን ቨይንን ኢንዶቴልያል ዋህዮታትን ናይ ኣርተሪ ልሙጽ ጭዋዳታት ዋህዮታትን ናይ ዋሀዮ ሽፋናት መብዛሕትኦም ኦርጋናት ተተሓሒዙ ይርከብ።
en-mt: ACE2 is found in most organs: ACE2 is specifically bound to pulmonary type II alveolar cells, small intestinal introcytes, arterial and vein endothelial cells, and arterial smooth muscle cells of the cell membranes of most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 mRNA ኣገላልጻ ኣብ ሰረብራል ኮርቴክስ፣ ስትሪያተም፣ ሃይፖታላመስን ብረይንስተምን እወን ይርከብ።
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ኣገልግሎት ናይ ACE2 ን ACE ንምምዝዝዛን እዩ።
en-mt: The first use of ACE2 is to displace ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE፣angiotensin I hormone ናብ ደም ሰራዉር ዘፅብብ angiotensin II ይኸፍሎ።
en-mt: ACE,angiotensin I hormone is divided into angiotensin II which narrows blood vessels.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 ድማ ብወገኑ ን carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine ካብ angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) ን ብምፍላይ ናብ vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) ህይድሮልይሰ ይገብሮ:
en-mt: ACE2, in turn, cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and converts it to the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val- Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) hydrolyses:

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ከም [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin ዝመሳሰሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ፔፕታይዳት ክመቅል ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 can cleave a variety of peptides such as [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 ንናይ ገለተኛ ኣጎዓዓዚ ኣሚኖ-ኣሲድ SLC6A19 ምዕጋት መምብራና ይቆጻጸር ከምኡ’ውን ምስ ሕማም ሃርትናፕ እውን ይተኣሳሰር እዩ ።
en-mt: ACE2 regulates membrane inhibition of the neutral transporter amino-acid SLC6A19 and is also associated with Heartnap disease .

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ከም ትራንስመምብሬን ፕሮቲን, ACEI 2 ን HCoV-NL63 ን እንኮላይ ን ገለ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከም በዓል SARS-CoV (SARS ንቫይረስ); ከምኡ’ውን SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 ን effect ቫይረስ) ዋና መተኣታተዊ ነጥቢ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል እዩ።
en-mt: as a transmembrane protein, ACEI 2 for HCoV-NL63 and even for some coronaviruses such as SARS-CoV (SARS for virus); It also serves as the main point of entry for SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 and effect virus).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: ብፍላይ ድማ ናይ SARS-CoV S1ን SARS-CoV2ን ፕሮቲን ስፓይክ ምስ ኣብ ደጋዊ ኣካል ናይ እቶም ዋህዮታት ዝርከብ ACE2 ኤንዛይም ዶሜይን ዝግበር ምትእስሳር ኢንዶሳይቶሲስን ትራንስሎኬሽንን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስን ናይ እቲ ኤንዛይምን ኣብ ዋህዮ ዉሽጢ ናብ ዝርከብ ኢንዶሶም ዝፍጠር እዩ።
en-mt: Specifically, the interaction of the SARS-CoV S1 and SARS-CoV2 protein spikes with the ACE2 enzyme domain on the outer body of the cells results in endocytosis and translocation of the virus and the enzyme to endosomes inside the cell.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: እዚ መተኣታተዊ መስርሕ ከዓ TMPRSS2 ዝበሃል ናይ እቲ ተሸካሚ ሴሪን ፕሮቴዝ ንS ፕሮቲን ፕራይም ምግባር የድሊዮ። ምዕጋት እዚ ፕሮቴዝ ድማ ከም መድሃኒት ክንጥቀመሉ ከምንኽእል መፅናዕቲ ይካየድ ኣሎ። እዚ ድማ ካልኦት ኣብ ዋህዮታት ናይ ACE2 ዓቐን ብምቕናስ ነዚ ረኽሲ ምቅላስ ይከኣል ዝብል ሓሳብ ንኸቕርቡ ገይሩዎም እዩ።
en-mt: This introduction process requires priming of the S protein by the carrier's serine protease, TMPRSS2. The inhibition of this prosthesis is being studied as a cure. This has led others to propose that it is possible to combat this infection by reducing the amount of ACE2 in cells.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር ብዙሓት ሰብ ሞያን ተቖጻጸርቲ ኣካላትን ንምቕጻል ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ACE ገታኢ ን ARB ፍወሳን ይመኽሩ ።
en-mt: However, many professionals and regulatory bodies recommend continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy .

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
