targetString: ኣብ ጁላይ 11, 2012 ዝተሓተመ ስሩዕ ዝኾነ ገምጋምን ሜታ አናላይሲስን ፣ "ናይ ACE inhibitors ምጥቃም ምስ ቁጽጽራት ክነጻጸር ከሎ 34% ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ናይ ምምዕባል ዕድል ከምዝቐነሰ" ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: A peer-reviewed review and meta-analysis , published July 11, 2012, showed that "the use of ACE inhibitors reduced the risk of developing pulmonary stroke by 34% compared with controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: ልዕሊ እዚ፣ "ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ምፍጣር ዕድል ብናይ ACE ኢንሂቢተራት ኣብ ዝተሓከሙ ኣብ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ናይ ምምዕባል ዕድል ዝነበሩ ሕሙማት ክቕነስ ተኻኢሉ እዩ፣ ብፍላይ ስትሮክን ናይ ልቢ ውድቀትን ከጋጥሞም ኣብ ዝኽእለሉ ሰባት።
en-mt: More than that, "the risk of pulmonary stroke has been reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at risk of developing a severe pulmonary stroke, especially in people at risk of stroke and heart failure."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: ዋላ እኳ እቲ ውጽኢት ንኒሞንያ ከም ዝንኪ እተዘይኣመተ ምጥቃም ናይ ACE ገታእቲ ምስ ምንካይ ብሰንኪ ኒሞንያ ዝስዕብ ሞት ይተሓሓዝ እዩ ።
en-mt: Use of ACE inhibitors is associated with reduced mortality from pneumonia , although the results do not suggest a reduction in pneumonia .

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሪኮምቢናንት ናይ ሰብ ACE2 (rhACE2) ንህጹጽ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣት ሓድሽ ሕክምና እዩ፣ ፑልምናሪ ሃይፖዳይናሚክስን ናይ ኦክሲጅን ሳቹሬሽንን ብ lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome( ሊፖፖሊሳካራይድ-ዝመጸ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ምጭንናጭ ምልክታት ሕማም) ናይ ዘለወን ውላዳት ሓሳማታት ከመሓይሽ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is a new treatment for acute lung injury, pulmonary hypodynamics and oxygen saturation of piglets with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome( lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome) c Improvements were seen.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: ናይ rhACE2 ካብቲ ዝነበሮ ፃዕቂ ፍርቂ ዝበፅሓሉ ጊዜ ከባቢ 10 ሰዓታት ኮይኑ ፣ ካብቲ ናይ 24 ሰዓታት ኣብ ስራሕ ዝጸንሓሉ (ጻንሒት) ጊዜ በተወሳኺ ናብ ስራሕ ዝኣትወሉ ጊዜ ድማ ኣብ ውሽጢ 30 ደቓይቕ ይኸውን።
en-mt: The time of rhACE2 to reach half of its concentration is about 10 hours , and the time of action is within 30 minutes in addition to the 24-hour incubation (stay) time.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ብዙሓት ርካቦታት rhACE2 ንናይ renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ዘይቕበሉ ሰባት ተስፋ ዘለዎ መድሓኒት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ ኣንጂዮቴንሲን II ልዑል ኣብ ዝኾነሎም ሕማማት።ዝተከሉ rhACE2 ንከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም ክሕክም ኣብ ክሊኒካል ፈተነ ተረጋጊጹ እዩ።
en-mt: Many findings rhACE2 may be a promising therapy for people refractory to renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) in diseases where angiotensin II is elevated.implanted rhACE2 has been shown in clinical trial to treat severe respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 ናይ ሞባይል ሶፍትዌር መተግበሪ ማለት ነቲ ኣብ 2019-20 ኮሮና ቫይረስ ለበዳ መልሲ ኣብ ምሃብ፣ ብምትንካፍ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍ ንምክትታል ሓበሬታ ይህቡ እዮም፥ ማለት ምስ ብሕማም ዝተታሕዘ ውልቀ-ሰብ ርክብ ዝነበሮም ሰባት ናይ ምፍላይ መስርሕ እዩ።
en-mt: b'COVID-19 mobile software application means that in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, they provide information to track transmission by contact: the process of isolating people who have had contact with an infected individual.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: ኣብ ገሊኦም ግዝኣታትን ሕጋዊ ስልጣናትን ብወግዓዊ ሓገዝ ናይ መንግስቲ ተሰንዮም ብዙሓት ኣፕሊኬሽናት ተኣሚሞምን ተሰሪሖምን።
en-mt: In some states and jurisdictions, many applications have been approved and developed with official government assistance.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: ርክባት ንምክትታል ዝሕግዙ ኣፕሊኬሽናት ንምምዕባል ብዙሓት ስርዒታት ተሰሪሖም ኣለዉ ።
en-mt: Many systems have been developed to develop applications for monitoring communications .

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ እቶም ናይ እቲ መተግበሪ ተጠቀምቲ ጂኦግራፊያዊ ኣከባቢ ብምክትታል ዝተመስረቱ ስርዓታት ብዛዕባ ብሑትነት ዝምልከት ስግኣት ክለዓሎም ጸኒሑ እዩ።
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially in systems based on tracking the geographical location of the application's users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ካብቶም ናይ ውልቀ ሰባት ብሓትውነት ኣብ ምሕላው ዝሓሹ ዝበሃሉ ኣማራጺታት ብሉቱዝ ብምጥቃም ናይ ተጠቃሚ ደረጃ ቅርበት ናብ ካልኦት ስልክታት ምልኣኽ እዩ።
en-mt: Alternatives that are supposedly better at fraternizing than individuals are using Bluetooth to send user-level proximity to other phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: ኣብ 10 ኤፕሪል 2020 ጎግል ምስ ኣፕል ብሓባር ኮይኖም ብሉቱዝ መሰረት ጌሩ ዝሰርሕ መተግበሪ ቀጥታ ናብ ኣንድሮይድን iOS ኦፕሬቲንግ ሲስተምን ኣብ ምዉህሃድ ከምዝሰርሑ ተዛሪቦም።
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google announced that it is working with Apple to integrate a Bluetooth-based application directly into the Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ መንግስቲ ቻይና ምስ ኣሊፓይ ብምትሕብባር ዜጋታት ምስ COVID-19 ዝተትሓዘ ሰብ ርክብ ከምዝነበሮም ዝነግሮም መተግበሪ ኣብ ስራሕ ኣውዒሎም።
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government has partnered with Alipay to launch an application that tells citizens if they have been in contact with someone infected with COVID-1

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ 200 ከተማታት ቻይና ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ይርከብ። ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ትሬስ_ቱጌዘር ዝተባህለት ኣፕሊኬሽን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣብ ምውዓል ተርከብ።
en-mt: It is in use in more than 200 cities in China. An application called Trace_Together is in use in Singapore.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: እዚ መተግበሪ ብናይ ከባብያዊ IT ማሕበረሰብ ዝማዕበለ ኮይኑ ንመንግስቲ ተዋሂቡ ንህዝቢ ድማ ክፍቲ ኮይኑ ይርከብ። ሰሜን ማሴዶኒያ "StopKorona!" ብዝብል ዝጀመሮ ብብሉቱዝ መሰረት ዝተሰርሐ መተግበሪ እዩ። ጥቕሙ ድማ ምስ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ርክብ ዘለዎ ሰብ ንምርካብን ንጥዕና ባዓል ሞያ ቅልጡፍ ዝኾነ መልሲ ምሃብን እዩ።
en-mt: This application was developed by the local IT community and is available to the government and open to the public. Northern Macedonia "StopKorona!" is a Bluetooth-based application that he started with. The benefit is to find someone who has been in contact with the sick person and to provide a quick response to the health professional.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: እቲ መተግበሪ ብ Ministry of Communication and Technology(ናይ ርክብ ን ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስቴር) ን ብ Ministry of Health(ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስቴር)ን ዝማዕበለ እዩ።
en-mt: The application is developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: ካብ14, ኤፕሪል 2020 ኣቢሉ እቲ መተግበሪ ብጉግል ፕሌይ ስቶርን ኣፕል ስቶር ክሳብ ዚጸድቅ ይጽበ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Since14, April 2020, the app has been waiting for approval by the Google Play Store and Apple Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል 12፡ እታ ርክባት ትከታተል ምምዕባል ኣፕሊኬሽን ከም ዝሰጎመን ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰሙናት ንምስላፍ ቅሩብ ምዃኑን እቲ መንግስቲ ሓቢሩ ።ተመሳሳሊ ኣፕሊኬሽን ንምምዕባል ኣብ ኣየርላንድን ፈረንሳን ይውጠን ኣሎ(“ኮቪድ ግታእ”) ።
en-mt: On April 12, the government announced that development of the communications tracking application had advanced and was ready to be deployed within weeks. Similar applications are planned in Ireland and France (“Contain COVID”).

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: ኣውስትራሊያ ኒውዚላንድን ኣብ ናይ ሲንጋፖር TraceTogether መተግበሪ ን BlueTrace ፐሮቶኮልን መሰረት ዝገበሩ መተግበሪታት ንምጥቃም ኣብ ግምት የእትዋ ኣለዋ።ሩስያ ንዝተረጋጹ ኣብ ሞስኮ ዝነብሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕሙማት geofencing መተግበሪ ክተላሊ እያ፣ ካብ ገዝኦም ከምዘይወጹ ንምርግጋጽ ዝተነደፈ መተግበሪ እዩ።
en-mt: Australia and New Zealand are considering using applications based on Singapore's TraceTogether application and the BlueTrace protocol.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: ሮስ ኣንደርሰን ኣብ ካምብሪጅ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ድሕነት ምህንድስና ፕሮፌሰር፡ ምስ ኣብ ኣፕሊኬሽን መሰረት ዝገበሩ ስርዓታት ተተሓሒዞም ክመጽኡ ዝኽእሉ ብዙሓት ተግባራዊ ጸገማት ዘርዚሩ ።እዚ ድማ ንግጉይ ኣዎንታዊ ውጽኢት ምሃብን ምስ ምጥቃም እታ ኣፕሊኬሽን ኣብ ውሑድ ክፋል እቲ ህዝቢ ተተሓሒዙ ክመጽእ ዝኽእል ምጉዳል ኣድማዕነትን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Ross Anderson, a safety engineering professor at Cambridge University, outlined the many practical problems that can arise with application-based systems .These include false positives and potential lack of effectiveness associated with using the application in a small proportion of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: ዝተሰሓሓተ ወይ ጎዳኢ ሓበሬታ ናይ ዝህቡ ናይ "ኮሮናቫይረስ" መተግበሪታት ስርጭት ንምፍታሕ፣ Apple ምስ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝተተሓሓዙ መተግበሪታት ናብ App Store ክሓውሱ ዝፈቕደሎም ድርጅታት ገደብ ጌሩ፣ ን "ዕላዊ" ወይ ንተኣመንቲ ድርጅታት ጥራሕ እዩ ዝፈቅድ።
en-mt: To address the spread of "coronavirus" apps that provide conflicting or harmful information, Apple has limited the number of companies it allows to include coronavirus-related apps into the App Store, allowing only "public" or trusted companies.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: ጉግልን ኣማዞንን ተምሳሳልቲ እግዳታት ኣተግቢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Google and Amazon have implemented similar bans.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: ናይ ብሕታውነት ጎስጎስቲ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ መተግበሪታት ብምጥቃም ዝግበር ናይ ሓፋሽ ክትትል ከምጽኦ ዝኽእል ጽልዋ ብዘለዎም ስግኣት ድምጾም ኣስሚዖም፡ ብፍላይ ድማ እዚ ንለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ንምግታእ ኢሉ ዝተሃንጸ ናይ ክትትል ሃዋሁ እቲ ሓደጋ ድሕሪ ምሕላፉ ይፍንጣሕ ድዩ ዋላስ ኣይኮነን ብዝምልከት ።
en-mt: Privacy advocates have raised concerns about the potential impact of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, especially whether the surveillance environment built to contain the outbreak will unravel after the disaster.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty Internationalን ካልኦት ልዕሊ 100 ዝኾኑ ትካላትን ኣብ ከም ዚኦም ዓይነታት ስለላታት ገደብ ክግበር መግለጺ ሂቦም።
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations have called for restrictions on such espionage.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: እቲ ትካል ኣብ ናይ መንግስቲ ፕሮጀክትታት ሸሞንተ ኩነታት ኣዊጁ፡
en-mt: The agency declared eight conditions on government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: እቲ ክትትል ‘’ሕጋዊ፣ኣገዳስን ተመጣጠነን’’ ክኸዉን ይግባእ።
en-mt: The monitoring should be ''legal,relevant and proportionate'

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ናይ ምቁጽጻርን ምክትታልን መደባት ናይ ዘብቅዑሉ እዋን መግለጺ የድልዮም እዩ።
en-mt: Control and monitoring programs require a statement of when they expire.

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: ናይ ዳታ ጥቕሚ ንCOVID-19 ጥራሕ ክወሰን እዩ።
en-mt: Data benefits will be limited to COVID-19 only.

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ናይ ሓበሬታ ድሕነትን ሕቡእነትን ኣብ ጭብጢ መርኩስ ብምግባር ክሕለውን ከምዝሕለው ክረኣይን ኣለዎ ።
en-mt: The security and confidentiality of information must be protected and ensured to be protected on an evidence-based basis.

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ዲጂታዊ ጽኑዕ-ሓለዋ ንምብኣስ ፍልልይን ጉስያን ከወግድ ኣለዎ፡
en-mt: Digital fixed-protection must eliminate differences and gussies to fight:

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: ዝኾነ ይኹን ዳታ ምስ ሳልሳይ ኣካል ምክፋል ብሕጊ ክግለጽ ኣለዎ;
en-mt: Sharing any data with third parties must be disclosed by law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ኣንጻር ጥቕዓታትን ናይ ዜጋታት ነዞም ጥቕዓታት እዚኦም መልሲ ናይ ምሃብ መሰል ሓለዋ ክህልዉ ኣለዎ;
en-mt: There must be protection against attacks and the right of citizens to respond to these attacks;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: "ትርጉም ዘለዎ ተሳትፎ" ብ ኩሎም "ዝምልከቶም ሼር ተሓዝቲ" የድሊ እዩ፣ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታትን ናይ ዝተሓዋወሱ ጉጅለታትን ሓዊሱ። ናይ ጀርመን ኮኣስ ኮምፒዩተር ክለብን(CCC) ዶብ ዘይግድቦም ጸብጸብቲን(Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) እውን ቼክሊስት ኣውጺኦም እዮም።
en-mt: "Meaningful participation" by all "relevant shareholders" is required, including public health professionals and mixed groups. The German Coas Computer Club (CCC) and Reporter ohne Grenzen (RSF) have also issued checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: እዚ ቀሪቡ ዘሎ ናይ Google/Apple ትልሚ ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዘይኮነሉ ግዘ እዚ ናይ ክትትልን ሓለዋን ሜላ ካብ ናይ ኤሌክግሮኒክስ መጥቀሚታቶም ብምውጋድ ቀጻላይ ዝኾነ ናይ ሓለዋ ጸገም ክፈትሑ ይደለዩ።
en-mt: When this proposed Google/Apple plan is not necessary, they want to solve the ongoing security problem by removing this monitoring and protection technique from their electronics devices.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: ገለ ሃገራት መተግበሪታት ካብ ምጥቃም ኔትዎርክ መሰረት ዝገበረ ናይ ቦታ መድለዪ መገዲታት ተጠቒመን፣ መተግበሪታት ካብ ኢንተርኔት ናይ ምውራድን ኣድላይነትን ናይ ምክትታላት ተኽእሎታት ንምውጋድ ጠቓሚ እዩ።
en-mt: Some countries have resorted to using network-based location tracking mechanisms rather than applications, useful to avoid the possibility of downloading applications from the Internet and the need for monitors.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: ኣብ እስራኤል ኣብ ኔትዎርክ መሰረት ዝገበረ ምክትታል ጸዲቑ ኣሎ ።
en-mt: Network-based monitoring has been approved in Israel .

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: ንጥረ ናይ ከባቢ ሓበሬታ ክረከብ ዝኽእል ኣብ መርበብ ዝተመስረተ መፍትሒ ዓቢ ዝኾነ ናይ ብሑትነት ፀገም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: A network-based solution where raw local information can be accessed has a huge privacy problem.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: ኮይኑ ግን ኩሎም ማእኸላይ ሰርቨር ዘለዎም ናብ ውልቃዊ ናይ ኣከባቢ መሐበሪ ክረኸቡ ኣለዎም ማለት ኣይኮነን፡ ማእከላይ ሰርቨር ውሽጣዊ ርክባት ንምስልሳል ጥራይ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንኽውዕሉ ዝገብሩ ብዙሓት ናይ ብሑትነት ፖሊሲታት ተፈጢሮም ኣለዉ (ኣብ ታሕቲ ዘሎ ክፋል ይርኣዩ)።
en-mt: However, not all central server owners must have access to private local information, and many privacy policies have been created to allow central servers to be used only for internal communications (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፣ ናይ ንኽክእ ከይዲ ንምክትታል ካብ መተግበሪ ወጻኢ ዝኾነ ስርዓት ኣብ ጥቕሚ ውዒሉ እዩ።
en-mt: In South Korea, an off-the-shelf system has been used to monitor the contact process.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: ርእሱ ዝወሰነ መተግበሪ(app) ካብ ምጥቃም፡እዚ መስርሕ መጠቆሚ ሓበሬታ ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ምንጭታት ከም በዓል ናይ ሞባይል መከታተሊ ዳታ ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ካርታ ሽመታ ዳታ ብምሕዋስ ናብቲ ሕማም ዝተቃልዑ ውልቀ-ሰባት ጽሑፋዊ መልእክትታት ይሰድድ።
en-mt: Rather than using a self-contained app, this referral process incorporates information from a variety of sources such as mobile tracking data and map appointment data to send text messages to vulnerable individuals.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: እዚ ሓበሬታ እዚ ተነኻኺኦም ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ሰባት ካብ ምንቃሕ ብተወሳኺ፣ እቲ መንግስቲ እቲ ናይ ቦታ ሓበሬታ ንህዝቢ ቅሩብ ጌርዎ፣ ድሕሪ ናይ እታ ሃገር ናይ MERS ለበዳ ምኽንያት ዝተፈጠረ ናይ ሓበሬታ ፖሊሲ ለውጢ ክፍቀድ ዝገበሮ ነገር እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to alerting people who may have been touched by this information, the government made the location information available to the public, something that allowed for information policy changes that occurred in the wake of the country's MERS outbreak.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: እዚ ሓበሬታ እዚ ብዝተፈላለዩ መተግበሪታትን መርበብ ሓበሬታትን ቅሩብ እዩ።ከም በዓል ጀርመን ዝበላ ሃገራት እውን ማእኸላይን ናይ ውልቃዊነት -ዓቃቢ ስርዓት ይጥቀማ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: This information is available through various applications and websites. Countries such as Germany are also using a centralized and privacy -protective system.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 6, 2020 ጀሚሩ ዝርዝራት ኣይወጽኡን።
en-mt: Details have not been released since April 6,

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ብሑትነት ብምሕላው ምስ ሕሙም ርክብ ዘለዎም ሰባት ንምርካብ ዝግበር ኣከያይዳ ብሕጋዊ ኣግባብ ዝተሰረተ ኮይኑ ነዚ ዝምርምር ስነፅሑፍ ኣካል ተነኣሰ ኣብ 2013 ተጀሚሩ። ካብ 7 ሚያዝያ 2020 ጀሚሩ ልዕሊ ደርዘን ዝኾኑ ጉጅለ ባዓል ሞያታት ከም ብሉቱዝ ሎው ኢኔርጂ (BLE) ብምጥቃም ተጠቃማይ ናብ ካልኦት ስልክታት ክንደይ ዝኣክል ይቐርብ ዝብል ብምምዝጋብ ብሑትነት ዘይጎድእ መፍትሒ ምጥቃም ይከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: The practice of contacting patient contacts by maintaining confidentiality is legally established and a body of literature examining this began at least in 2013. Starting April 7, 2020, more than a dozen teams of professionals will use Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to record how close a user is to other phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ PEPP-PT ዝተማእኸለን ዘይተማእኸለን ኣቀራርባ ዝሓዘ ናይ ሕብረት ጻዕሪ እዩ፣ ነጸላ ፕሮቶኮል እውን ኣይኮነን። ዘይተማእኸሉ ፕሮቶኮላት ዝበሃሉ ናይ ውልቃዊነት-ዝሕልዉ ኣቕርቦታት ክትትል (DP-PPT/DP-3T)፣ ግዜያዊ ናይ ንኽክእ ቁጽሪታት (TCN, fka ንኽክእ ምድላው ቁጽሪታት፣ CEN)፣ ውልቃዊ ብቐሊሉ ተቓላዒ ፕሮቶኮላትን ናይ ተንቀሳቓሲ ንኽክእ ምክትታልን (PACT) ከምኡውን ካልኦት ካብ ማእኸለ ምብታን እዩ።
en-mt: however, PEPP-PT is a fellowship effort with centralized and decentralized approaches, and is not an isolated protocol. Decentralize decentralized protocols such as privacy-preserving presentations monitoring (DP-PPT/DP-3T), temporary contact numbers (TCN, fka contact preparation numbers, CEN), personal vulnerable protocols and mobile contact tracking (PACT) and others is.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: ኣብዚኦም ፕሮቶኮላት፡ ዝልለ ውልቃዊ ሓበሬታ ካብ'ዚ መሳርሒ ኣይወጽእን ከምኡ'ውን ኩሉ ምስምማዕ ሓበሬታ ኣብ'ቲ መሳርሒ ይፍጸም።
en-mt: In these protocols, identifiable personal information does not leave this device and all information synchronization takes place on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ MIT ሚድያ ላብራቶሪ ዝርከብ ናይ ፅንዓት ጉጅለ ኣንይ ቦታ መረዳእታት ኣብ ምእካብን ኣብ ምጥቃምን ናይ privacy-preserving ቴክኒካት ብምጥቃም ውይድማ path intersection data ብምጥዋም ናይ COVID-19 ናይ ተላባድነት ቅልጣፈ ንምፍላጥ ውሕስ መንገዲ ኣብ ምምዕባል ይርከቡ።
en-mt: A research team at the MIT Media Laboratory is developing a safe way to determine the speed of COVID-19 infection by using privacy-preserving techniques to collect and use location data.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: መሰረቱ ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ካብ ዋይትፔፐር "ዝወስለቱ ኣፓት፡ ምዕቃብ ውልቃዊ ብሕትና ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ" ብምግባር ኣብ ማርች 2020 ዝተዘርግሐ እዩ ።ካልእ ተመሳሳሊ ጻዕሪ ድማ ብ ኤኒግማ ኤምፒሲ ዝበሃል ኣብ ኤምኣይቲ ሜድያ ላብራቶሪ ዝማዕበለ ናይ ብሕቲ ቴክኖሎጂታት ዘማዕብል ትካል ዝተሰርሐ ሴፍ ትሬስ ፕላትፎርም እዩ።
en-mt: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Zweslet Apat: Preserving Personal Privacy in a Pandemic," released in March 2020. Another similar effort is the Safe Trace platform by Enigma MPC, a private technologies developer developed at MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: ሴፍ ትሬስ ውሕሰነቶም ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ ሃርድዌር ቴክኖሎጂታት ብምጥቃም፡ ተጠቀምቲ ናይ ውልቂ ኣድራሻን ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ምስ ካልኦት ተጠቀምቲን ሰራሕተኛታትን ብዘይ ስግኣት ክለዋወጡ ዝገብር እዩ።
en-mt: Using proven hardware technologies, Safe Trace allows users to safely exchange personal address and health status with other users and employees.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ኣፕሪል 2020፣ ዓለም ለኻዊ TCN ሕብረት ብዛዕባ ተመሳሳሊ ዝኾኑ ኣቀራርባታትን ተደራረብቲ ፕሮቶኮላትን ብዝምልከት ዝሓበሩ ጉጅለታት ዝተመስረተ እዩ፣ ዕላምኡ ድማ ምቁርራጽ ንምቕናስን፣ ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ መከታተሊን መንቅሒን ኣፓት ኣብ ምፍጣር ብሓባር ምስራሕን እዩ፣ ናይ ብሰፊሑ ዝተሰራጨወ ቁልፊ ከይዲ።
en-mt: On April 5, 2020, the Global TCN Alliance was formed by groups that reported on similar approaches and overlapping protocols, with the goal of reducing disruption and working together to create a global tracking and alarm app, a widely distributed key process.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: ኣብ ኤፕሪል 9, 2020 መንግስቲ ሲንጋፖር እቲ ስሩዕ ናይ እቲ መንግስቲ መተግበሪ ዝጥቀመሉ ብሉትሬስ ፕሮቶኮል ከምዝተኸፈተ ገሊፁ።
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the Singapore government announced that the BlueTrace protocol used by the government's regular application has been launched.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል 10, 2020 ን ናይ ኣንድሮይድን ኣይ ኦ ኤስን ናይ ሞባይል መድረኽ ዝቆጻጸሩ ጉግልን ኣፕልን፡ ብሕታዊነት ይዕቅብ እዩ ዝበልዎ ብምጽንባር ኣብ ትሑት ሓይሊ ብሉቱዝ ቴክኖሎጂን ውሕስነት መዐቀቢ ክሪፕቶግራፊን መሰረት ዝገበረ ርክባት ናይ ምክትታል ተበግሶ ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, which control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative to monitor communications based on low-power Bluetooth technology and secure cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ሲስተም እዚ ናይ ዝተጠቐሙ ወሰንቲ ቴክኖሎጂታት መብራህርሂታት እውን ኣሐቲሞም እዮም።
en-mt: They also published explanations of the key technologies used in this system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: ብ መሰረት ኣፕልን ጉግልን ፣ እቲ ስርዓት ኣብ ሰለስተ ብርኪታት እዩ ናብ ስራሕ ክኣቱ።
en-mt: According to Apple and Google , the system will be launched in three phases.

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: መንግስቲታት ዕላዊ ናይ ውልቃውነት-ዓቃቢ ኮሮናቫይረስ መከታተሊ መተግበሪ ንክፈጥሩ ዘኽእሉ መሳርሒታት
en-mt: Tools to enable governments to create public privacy-preserving coronavirus tracking applications

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: ናይ'ዚ መስርሕ እዚ ብቐጥታ ናብ 'ቲ OS ን Android ጉግል ን ኣፕልን መጀምሪያ ብ መንገዲ ነቲ ስርዓት ብመንገዲ ናይ ኮምፒውተር ኦፕሬቲንግ ስርዓት ምህዳስ ኣቢልካ ብምዝርጋሕ ደሓር ከዓ እቲ ሓድጋ ምስ ሓለፈ ብተመሳሳሊ መንገዲ ካብቲ ስርዓት ንኸውፅእ ናይ ምግባር ናይ ምውሳድን ቀፀልቲ ናይ ዳህሳስ ፀገማትን ንምፍላጥ ትልሚ ምትእሰሳር እዩ።
en-mt: Link this process directly to the OS and Android Google and Apple first by way of deploying the system through a computer operating system update and then removing it from the system in the same way after the legacy has passed and planning to identify further survey problems is.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: b'Drug ደጊምካ ምመሕያሽ (ናይ መድሓኒት ደጊምካ ንካልእ ዕላማ ምውዓል፣ ሪ -ፕሮፋይሊንግ፣ ንካልእ ስራሕ ምውዓል ወይ ናይ መድሓኒት ምቕያር እውን ተባሂሉ ይፍለጥ) ንካልእ ሕማም ወይ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ክሕክም ኣፍልጦ ዝተወሃቦ መድሓኒት ንካሊእ ሕማም ክውዕል ምግባር ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: b'Drug Repurposing (also known as drug repurposing, re -profiling, repurposing or drug conversion) is the use of a drug that has been approved to treat another disease or health condition for another disease.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: እዚ ኣብ’ዚ ግዜ’ዚ ኣድማዕነቱን ድሕነቱ ዘተኣማምንን ናይ COVID-19 ፍወሳታት ንምምዕባል ክትትል ዝግበረሉ ሓደ መስመር ናይ ሳይንሳዊ መጽናዕቲ እዩ።
en-mt: This is one line of scientific research currently being pursued to develop effective and safe COVID-19 treatments.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: ካልኦት ናይ መጽናዕቲ ኣንፈታት ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ክትባት ምምዕባልን ኮንቨልሰንት ፕላስማ ትራንስፊዩዢንን ዘካትት እዩ። SARS-CoV-2 66 ዝኾኑ መድሓኒት ክስርሖም ዝኽእሉ ፕሮቲናት ኣለዉ፣ ሕድሕዶም ብዙሓት ሊጋንድ መትሓዚ ቦታታት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of COVID-19 vaccines and convulsive plasma transfusion. SARS-CoV-2 has 66 druggable proteins, each with multiple ligand binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: መላገቢ ቦታታት ምምርማር ኣንጻር COVID-19 ፕሮቲናት ኣድማዒ ዝኾነ መድሃኒት ንምምዕባል ሓቀኛ ዝኾነ ዕቅድ የቕርብ።
en-mt: Examining binding sites offers a realistic plan for developing effective drugs against COVID-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: ካብ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ዕላማ ዝግበሩ ፕሮቲናት ኣዚዮም ጠቐምቲ ፓፓይን-ዓይነት ፕሮቴዝ፣ RNA ጽግዕተኛ RNA ፖሊመሬዝ፣ ሄሊኬዝ፣ S ፕሮቲንን ADP ራይቦፎስፊቴዝን እዮም።
en-mt: Among the most useful target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 are papain-type protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein and ADP ribophosphitase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein AA, et al ዝተፈላለዩ ዉሁዳት ኣጽኒዑ ድሕሪኡ ድማ ምስቲ ልዑል ተመሳሳሊ ኣፍልጦ ዝተወሃቦ መድሓኒት ናይ ብቑዕ ጸረ -SARS-CoV-2 መድሓኒት ምዕባለ ኣብ ቅድመ ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ክሊኒካል መጽናዕቲ ንድፊ ክውስኽን ክገብር ድማ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: Hussein AA, et al studied various compounds and then with the highly similar recognized drug of efficient anti -SARS-CoV-2 drug development in preclinical studies and was able to add in clinical study design.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: ክሎሮክዊን ናይ ዓሶ መድሓኒት ኮይኑ ንሓደሓደ ኣዉቶኢምዩን ሕማማት እዉን ይጥቀም እዩ።
en-mt: Chloroquine is a tuberculosis drug and is also used for some autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: ብማርች 18 WHO ክሎሮኪንን ምስኡ ዝዛመድ ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኪንን ካብቶም ኣርባዕተ ከም ኣካል ስምረት ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ዝተጸንዑ መድሃኒታት ከምዝኾኑ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 18, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine were among the four drugs studied as part of Simret clinical trials.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: ናይ ኒውዮርክ ኣማሓዳሪ ኣንድሪው ኩዎሞ ናይ ኒውዮርክ ግዝኣት ናይ chloroquine(ክሎሮኲን) ን hydroxychloroquine(ሃይድሮክስይልክሎሮኲን) ን ፈተነ ኣብ 24 ማርች ከምዝጅምር ሓቢሮም።ኣብ 28 ማርች፣ FDA ናይ hydroxychloroquine sulfate(ሃይድሮክስይልክሎሮኲን ሰልፌት)ን chloroquine phosphate(ክሎሮኲን ፎስፌት) ን ኣብ ትሕቲ ሃንደበታዊ ጥቕሚ ፈቓድ (EUA) ንምጥቃም ፈቓድ ሂቡ።
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State will begin testing chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine on March 24. On March 28, the FDA approved hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate quinone phosphate) and under contingency benefit license (EUA) to use.

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: እቲ ፍወሳ ብ ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕትታት ናይ FDA ተቐባልነት ዝረኸበ ኣይኮነን ከምኡ’ውን ብ ናይ EUA ህጹጽ እዋን ፍቓድ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂሶም ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ግን ፍወሳ ክረኽቡ ንዘይከኣሉ ሕሙማት ከም ናይ ሙከራ ህጹጽ ፍወሳ እዩ ተፈቒዱ።
en-mt: The therapy has not been approved by FDA clinical studies and is approved as an experimental emergency therapy for patients who have been hospitalized but have not been treated in clinical trials with an EUA emergency approval.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC ‘’ንSARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮክዊን ከም መከላኸሊ ወይድማ ከም መድሃኒት ክንጥቀመሉ ከምዝከኣል’’ ገና ኣይተሰረተን ኢሉ።
en-mt: The CDC said it has not yet been established whether hydroxychloroquine can be used as a prevention or treatment for SARS-CoV-2 infection.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: ዶክተራት “ካልእ ኣማራጺ ምስ ዘይህልው” ነቲ መድሃኒት ከም ዝጥቀሙሉ ሓቢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Doctors have said they will use the drug “when there is no other option”.

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: ኣብ ኢስታንቡል ናይ ቱርኪ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ንእሽተይ ምጽናዕቲ ኣብ ኣጠቓቕማ ክሎሮኪን ምስ ዚንክ፡ ቫይታሚን ኤ፡ ቫይታሚን ሲ ከምኡ’ውን ቫይታሚን ዲ የካይድ ኣሎ ።
en-mt: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: ኣብ ዱክ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ን ኣብ ኦክስፎርድ ዩኒቨርሲቲን ዓባይቲ መፅናዕቲታት እናትኻየዱ ይርክቡ።
en-mt: Major research is underway at Duke University and Oxford University.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: NYU Langone ናይ ሕክምና ቤት ትምህርቲ ንናይ hydroxychloroquine ምክልኻል ኣጠቓቕማ ናይ ደሕንነትን ብቕዓትን ፈተነ የካይድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: NYU Langone School of Medicine is conducting a safety and efficacy trial for the preventive use of hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ክሊኒካል ፈተነታት ኣብ ውሃንን ሺንዘንን favipiravir(ፋቪፒራቪር) "ብግልጺ ብቑዕ" ከምዝኾነ ኣርእዮም እዮም።
en-mt: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Xinzhen have shown favipiravir to be "clearly eligible.

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: ኣብ ሸንጀን ኣብ ዉሽጢ 4 መዓልቲታት ካብቲ ቫይረስ ናፃ ዝተብሃሉ 35 ሰባት፣ እቶም ዘይወሰዱ 45 ሰባት ድማ ን 11 መዓልቲታት ዝኾን ኣብ ሕማም ፀኒሖም እዮም።
en-mt: In Shenzhen, 35 people were declared free of the virus within four days and 45 people who did not receive it remained sick for 11 days.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: ኣብ ውሃን ኣብ 240 ናይ ሳንቡእ ውቕዒ ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ፣ ፍርቆም favipiravir ፍርቆም ድማ umifenovir ክዋሃቡ ተገይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: In a study of 240 patients with pulmonary stroke in Wuhan, half were given favipiravir and half umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: ናይ ጣልያን ፋርማሲቲካዊ ትካል ነቲ መድሃኒት ዝድግፍ ህሉው መርትዖ መባእታዊን ዘይእኹልን ከም ዝኾነ ንህዝቢ ኣዘኻኺሩ።
en-mt: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the current evidence in support of the drug was preliminary and insufficient.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2, ጀርመን ነቲ መድሃኒት ካብ ጃፓን ንምእካብ ከምእትገዝኦን ናብ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ዝሕከሙሉ ሆስፒታላት ዩኒቨርሲቲ ንምዝርጋሕ ሰራዊት ከም ትጥቀምን ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: On March 2, Germany announced that it would buy the drug from Japan and use the army to distribute it to university hospitals where COVID-19 patients are treated.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ ደቡብ ቻይና ሞርኒንግ ፖስት( South China Morning Post) ከምዝበሎ፣ ሺንዞ ኣቤ ብዛዕባ እቲ መድሓኒት ምዕዳግ ንናይ ትራምፕ ምምሕዳር ኣቕርቦታት ከምዘቕረበ ሓቢሩ።እዚ መድሓኒታት ኣብ ከበድቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ክንድ'ቲ ዘይክጠቅም ይኽእል እዩ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣዝዩ ዝተባዛሐ ብምዃኑ።
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made offers to the Trump administration about the drug purchase, which may not be as useful in severe epidemic cases as the virus is so widespread.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: ብ ጥኑሳት ውይድማ ጥንሲ ንምሓዝ ብዝምኩራ ዘለዋ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ኣብ ጥቅሚ ምውዓሉ ውሑስ ዘይክኽውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: It may not be safe to use by pregnant women who are experiencing pregnancy.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር(ካሌትራ) ዝተገብረ፡ ውህደት ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ሎፒናቪርን ሪቶናቪርን ”ምንም ጥቕሚ ከምዘነበሮም” ደምዲሙ ኣሎ ።
en-mt: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir(Caletra) concluded that the combination of the antiviral drugs lopinavir and ritonavir ”had no benefit”

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: እዞም መድሓኒታት HIV ምስ ፕሮቴዛት ብምትሕሓዝ ከይባዛሕ ዝኽእልክሉ እዮም።
en-mt: These drugs are used to prevent HIV from multiplying by associating it with prostheses.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: ኣብ ኮሎራዶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዘለዉ ኣጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ምስ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ፕሮቴዝ ዝተሓሓዘ ኮምፓውንድ ንምፍጣር መድሓኒታት ከመሓይሹ ይፍትኑ ኣለዉ።ኣብ እቲ ናይ ሳይንሳዊ ማሕበረ ሰብ ን HIV/AIDS(ኤች ኣይ ቪ/ ኤዲስ) ጥራሕ ተባሂሎም ዝማዕበሉ መድሓኒታት ንካልእ ዓላማ ንምውዓል ሓፍቲታት ኣብጥቕሚ ይውዕሉ ኣለዉ ብዝብል ነቐፌታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to improve drugs to create a compound that is linked to the SARS-CoV-2 protease There is criticism.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ኣብቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ምትሕግጋዝ ፈተነ ኣጠቓሊሎምዎ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international cooperative trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir(ሬምድስቪር) ብ Gilead Sciences ን ናይ ኢቦላ ቫይረስ ሕማምን ማርበርግ ቫይረስ ረኽሲን ንክከላኸል ተፈጢሩ።Gilead Sciences እዚ Remdesivir(ሬምድስቪር) ኣንጻር ዝተፈላለዩ ፊሎ -፣ ኒሞ -፣ ማራሚክሶ -፣ከምኡውን ኮሮና- ቫይረሳት ናይ ጸረ ቫይረስ ንጥፈታት ከምዘለውዎ ጸኒሖም ተረዲኦሞ።
en-mt: Remdesivir(Remdesivir) was developed by Gilead Sciences to prevent Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection.Gilead Sciences later discovered that this Remdesivir(Remdesivir) has antiviral activity against various philo -, pneumonia -, maramixo -,and corona- viruses .

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: ናይ እዞም ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሓኒታት ሓደ ጸገም ብሚቹዌሽን ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቕሚ ምምዕባል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ናብ ዝኸበደ ሕማምን ዝርጋሐን ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: One problem with these antiviral drugs is the development of resistance by mutation, which may lead to more severe disease and spread.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: ገለ ቅድም ክብሉ ዝወጹ ቅድመ ፈተነ መጽናዕቲታት remdesivir ንምጽዋር ልዑል ጀነቲክ ገደብ ኣለዎ ኢሎም።ብ ክሊቭላንድ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሆስፒታላት ዝተኻየዱ ክልተ ፈተነታት፡ ሓደ ን ማእኸላይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሰባት ሓደ ድማ ን ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሓዊሱ ብዙሓት ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Some previously published preliminary studies have shown that there is a high genetic limit to resistance to remdesivir. Several clinical trials are underway, including two trials conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals, one for people with moderate disease and one for people with severe disease.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ሕዚ እዋን ብምኽንያት COVID-19 ከቢድ ሕማም ሒዝዎም ናብ ሕክምና ንዝኣተዉ ሕሙማት ብደም ሱር ዝወሃብ ቫይታሚን ሲ ዘፅንዑ ሰለስተ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ኣለዉ። ካብዚኦም ድማ፡ ክልተ ናይ ፕላሴቦ ቁፅፅር (ቻይና፣ካናዳ) ሓደ ድማ ብዘይ ቁፅፅር (ጣልያን) ኣለዎም።
en-mt: There are currently three clinical trials studying intravenous vitamin C in patients admitted with severe illness due to COVID-1 Of these, two have placebo controls (China,Canada) and one without controls (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 24፣ 2020 ናይ ኔውዮርክ ክልል ናይ ኣዚትሮማሲን ዝተብሃለ ፀረ-ተሃዋስያን ሙከራ ጅሚራ ኣላ።
en-mt: On March 24, 2020, New York State began a trial of the antibiotic azithromycin.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ጃፓን ብሄራዊ ናይ ዓለማዊ ጥዕናን ሕክምናን ማእኸል (NCGM) Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide) ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ንኣስሚ ዝጠቅም ዝትንፈስ ኮርቲኮስቴሮይድ ናይ ኖቭል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ምልክት ገና ንዘየርአዩ ሕሙማት ከም ፈዉሲ ዝጠቅም ምዃኑ ንምምርማር ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ ከምዝጅምር ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) has announced that it will begin a clinical trial of Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, to test its usefulness as a cure for patients who have not yet shown symptoms of the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: ካብ ዴንማርክ፣ጀርመንን ኣዉስትሪያን ኣብ ሕክምና ዝርከቡ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘጋጠሞም 200 ሕሙማት ተወሲዶም ንዉፅኢታዉነት ናይ angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 ደረጃ II ፈተነ ኣብ መስርሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A phase II trial of the efficacy of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is underway in 200 critically ill patients undergoing treatment from Denmark, Germany and Austria.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: ናይ ኣብ ካናዳ ዝርከብ Montreal ናይ ልቢ ትካል colchicine(ክሎኪሳይን) ኣብ ቀሊል ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ፑልሙናሪ ሕልኽላኻትን ቁጠዐን ኣብ ምቕናስ ዘለዎ ግደ ኣብ ምጽናዕ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: The Montreal Heart Institute in Canada is studying the role of colchicine(cloquicine) in reducing pulmonary complications and irritation in people with mild COVID-19 symptoms.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: እቲ COLCORONA ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ መፅናዕቲ 6000 ዝኾኑ ዕድሜኦም ካብ 40 ንላዕሊ ዝኾኑ ብCOVID-19 ዝተትሓዙን ቀሊል ዝበሃል ምልክታት ዘርኣዩ፡ ሕክምና ዘየድልዮም ሕሙማት ኣብ ምምልማል ይርከብ።
en-mt: The COLCORONA study is recruiting 6,000 patients over the age of 40 who are infected with COVID-19 and show mild symptoms that do not require treatment.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: ጥኑሳት ወይ ጸባ ጡብ ዝዕንግላ ኣዴታት ወይ ኣድማዒ ናይ ጥንሲ መከኸሊ ኣገባብ ዘብለን ብቑዓት ኣይኮናን።
en-mt: Pregnant or breastfeeding mothers or those without effective contraception are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: ብዙሓት ጸረ-ምርጋእ ዝኾኑ ባእታታት ኣብ ጣልያን ይፍተኑ ኣለው ።
en-mt: Many anti-sedimentation agents are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: ትሑት ናይ ሞለኪዩላዊ ክብደት ዘለዎ ሄፓሪን ብብዝሒ ሕሙማት ንምሕካም ይጥቅም፡ ብዚ ምኽንያት ከኣ ናይ ጣልያን ሕክምና ኤጀንሲ ናይ ኣጠቃቕማኡ መምርሒታት ንከሐትም ተገዲዱ።
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is used to treat a large number of patients, prompting the Italian Medical Agency to publish guidelines for its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: ኣብ 300 ሕሙማት ዝተገብረ ናይ ብዙሕ ማእኸል መፅናዕቲ ናይ ኢኖክሳፓሪን ሶድየም ከም መከላኸልን ከም መድሃኒት መጠን ጥቕሚ ንኽፅናዕ ኣብ ጣልያን ኣብ ሚያዝያ 14 ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: A multicenter study of enoxaparin sodium in 300 patients was announced in Italy on April

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ስለዝኾነ፡ ብዙሕ ስነፍልጠታዊ ኣድህቦ ኣብ ቅድሚ ዝርግሐ MERS፡SARS ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ምዕራብ ናይል ቫይረስ ማዕቢሎም ተቐባልነት ንዝረኸቡ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ዳግማይ ኣብ ዕላማ ኣብ ምእታው ክግበር ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: Because SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, much scientific attention has been focused on re-targeting antiviral drugs that were developed and approved before the outbreak of MERS, SARS and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ሪባቪሪን: ሪባቪሪን ከም መድሃኒት COVID-19 ኮይኑ ንኽሰርሕ ናይ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም መምርሒ ይመክር።
en-mt: Ribavirin: China's 7th edition guidelines recommend ribavirin as a treatment for COVID-1

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir(ኡሚፈኖቪር): umifenovir(ኡሚፈኖቪር) ብናይ ቻይና መበል 7ይ ሕታም መሰረት ንኮቪድ-19 መሐከሚ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ተመኺሩ ነይሩ
en-mt: Umifenovir(umifenovir): umifenovir(umifenovir) was recommended for use for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the Chinese 7th edition

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: ገለ ጸረ-ረኽሲታት ከም ንኮቪድ-19 መድሓኒት ኮይኖም ክቐርቡ ይኽእሉ እዮም ተባሂሎም ዝተፈለዩ ኣለዉ:
en-mt: Some antibiotics have been identified as potential cures for COVID-19:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab(ቶሲሊዙማብ) (ጸረ-IL-6 ተቐባሊ): ኣብ ቻይና ፈቓድ ተዋሂብዎ።
en-mt: Tocilizumab(tocilizumab) (anti-IL-6 receptor): licensed in China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: ከምኡ’ውን ፈተነታት ኣብ ጣልያንን ቻይናንን ቶሲሊዙማብ# COVID-19 ን ርአ።
en-mt: See also trials in Italy and China for tocilizumab# COVID-1

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: b'A ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት ኣብ 2019 ንዘጋጠመ ኮሮና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ዝከላኸል ናይ ስነሓሳብ ክትባት እዩ።
en-mt: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is an ideological vaccine that protects against the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈትነኡ ዝወደአ ዝኾነ ዓይነት ከትባት እኳ እንተዘይ ሃለወ፣ ነዚ ክምዚ ዝበለ ከትባት ንምምዕባል ብዙሓት ፈተነታት ኣብ መስርሕ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Although no vaccine has completed its clinical trial, many trials are underway to develop such vaccines.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 መወዳእታታት፣ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ኣብ ውሽጢ 18 ኣዋርሕ ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2፣ ነቲ ሕማም ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ዝኸውን ክትባት ክምዕብል እዩ ኢሉ ከምዘይጽበ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization(WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the disease, to be developed within 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ሓሙሽተ ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት ኣብ መድረኽ I ናይ ድሕነት መስናዕትታት ኔሮም።
en-mt: In April, five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 እዩ ህላወኡ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: COVID-19 was diagnosed in December

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 2020 ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዓብዪ ለበዳ ዝተዘርገሐ እንኾን፣ ክትባት ንምምዕባል ድማ ብዝሕ ዝበለ ኢንቨስትመንትን ናይ መጽናዕቲ ንጥፈታት ኣስዒቡ እዩ።
en-mt: By 2020, there will be a major pandemic around the world, which has led to a lot of investment and research activities to develop vaccines.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብዙሓት ትካላት ንSARS-CoV-2 ዝኸዉን ዝተሓተሙ ጄኖማት ብምጥቃም ክትባት ንምምዕባል ይሰርሑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many companies are working to develop vaccines using imprinted genomes for SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: ኣብ ኣፕሪል ዝተገለጸ፣ ናይ CEPI ትካል ናይ ክትባት ምዕባለ ወሰንቲ ነጥቢታት፣ ፍጥነት፣ ናይ ምምራት ዓቕሚ፣ ብበዝሒ ምርካብ ምኽኣል፣ ከምኡውን ዓለም ለኻዊ ኣቕርቦታት እዮም።
en-mt: Announced in April, the key points of CEPI's vaccine development are speed, manufacturability, mass availability, and international offerings.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ናይ CEPI ኣይ ተመራመርቲ ስነ-ፍልጠት 10 ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ቴክኖሎጂ መድረኻት ኣብ መጀመርታ 2020 ኣድማዒ ክትበት ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ንምፍጣር ኣብ ትሕቲ መጽናዕቲን ምዕባለን ከምዝነበሩ ጸብጻብ ሂቦም።
en-mt: In April, CEPI I scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19 by early

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: ናብ ናይ ፌዝ I ናይ ደሕንነት መጽናዕቲ ዝዓበዩ ዋና መድረኻት ነዞም ዝስዕቡ ዘጠቓለሉ እዮም:
en-mt: The core stages that grew into a Phase I safety study included the following:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: ኒኩሊክ ኣሲድ (DNA and RNA))( ብርኪ I ኣማዕባሊን ናይ ክትባት ሕፁይን)፡ ሞደርና mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Nucleic acid (DNA and RNA))( Phase I developer and vaccine candidate), Moderna mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: viral vector(ቫይራል ቬክተር) (ፌዝ I መማዕበሊን ናይ ክትባት ሕጹይን: CanSino Biologics(ካንሲኖ ባዮሎጂክስ), ኣድኖቫይረስ ዓይነት 5 ቬክተር)
en-mt: viral vector(Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics(Cansino Biologics), adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: ብናይ CEPI ሳንቲስትታት ኣብ ኣፕሪል ሪፖርት ከምዝተገበረ፣ 115 ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ኣብ ናይ ምዕባለ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃታት ይርከቡ፣ ምስ 78 ዝተረጋገጹ ንጡፋት ፕሮጀክትታት (79፣ Milken Institute ከምዝበሎ)፣ 37 ካልኦት ድማ ኣዊጆም፣ እንተኾነግን ንእሽተይ ህዝባዊ ሓበሬታ ብምጥቃም እዩ (ኣብ ትልሚ ክህልዉ ዝሕሰቡ ወይ ዝተነደፉ)።
en-mt: Reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 overall vaccine candidates are in the early stages of development, with 78 confirmed active projects (79, Milken Institute said), and 37 others announced, but using little public information or designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: ደረጃ I-II ፈተነ ካብ ኩሉ ንላዕሊ ድሕንነት፣ኢምኖጀነሲቲ ምርመራ፣ዘይስሩዕ ኮይኑ ናይ ፕላሴቦ ቁፅፅር ዘለዎ ከምኡ እውን ኣብ ብዙሕ ቦታታት ዝካየድ ኮይኑ ትኽክለኛን ዉፅኢታዉነትን ናይ መድሓኒት መጠን እዉን ዝዉስን እዩ።
en-mt: Phase I-II trials are above all safety, immunogenicity testing, randomized, placebo-controlled, and multicenter to determine the accuracy and efficacy of drug dosing.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: ናይ ፌዝ III ፈተነታት ዝበዝሑ ተሳተፍቲን መምዘኒ ጉጅለ ዘለዎምን ከምኡ’ውን ንምክልኻል ሕማም ናይ ክታበት ኣድማዕነት ፈተነታት ምስ ምቁጽጻር ኣብ ተደላዩ መጠን መድሃኒት ዝመጽኡ ኣሉታዊ ሳዕቤናት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Phase III trials include larger numbers of participants and a control group, as well as vaccine efficacy trials to prevent disease with controls for adverse effects at desired doses.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: ካብ እቶም 79 ኣብ ንጡፍ ምዕባለ ዘለዉ ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት( April 2020 መጀመርታ ጀሚሩ ዝተረጋገጹ)፡ 74 ኣብ ናይ ወዲ-ሰብ ፈተነ ደረጃ ኣይነበሩን (ሕጂ'ውን ኣብ ቅድመ-ክሊኒካዊ ምርምር እዮም ዘለዉ)።
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in active development( approved as of early April 2020), 74 were not in the human trial stage (they are still in preclinical research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 24፣ 2020 ኣብ ኣውስትራሊያ፣ ናይ ኩዊንስ ላንድ ዩኒቨርስቲ ናይ ሞለኪዩላዊ ክላምፕ ን ናይ ቫይርስ ፕሮቲን ብምቕያር ናይ ሰብነት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ተኽእሎ ክነቓቕሕ ዝኽእል ክትባት ዓቕሚ ኣብ ምምርማር ከምዘልው ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that they are investigating the potential of a vaccine that can stimulate the body's immune system by altering the molecular clamp of a virus protein.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 24፣ 2020 ኣብ ካናዳ ኣብ ሳስካቻውን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝርከብ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ክትባት ማእኸል(VIDO-InterVac) ኣብ 2021 ፈተነ ዝግበረሉ ክትባት ስራሕ ክምዝ ጀመሩ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020, the International Vaccine Center(VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan in Canada announced that they will begin work on a 2021 trial vaccine.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: ክትባት ናይ ምምዕባል ፕሮጀክትታት ጃንዋሪ 26፣ 2020 ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ማእኸል ሕማም ቁፅፅርን ምክልኻልን ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ድማ ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 28 ተጋዊሖም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Vaccine development projects were announced on January 26, 2020 at the China Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and at the University of Hong Kong on January

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ ጃንዋሪ 29, 2020፡ ጃንሰን ፋርማሰውቲካል ካምፓኒታት ብ መሪሕነት ሃነከ ሽዊተሜከር ንምምዕባል ክታበት ስራሕ ከም ዝጀመሩ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: Around January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies announced that it had begun work on a vaccine under the leadership of Haneke Sweetmaker.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: ጃንሰን ምስ ቫክሳርት ዝተብሃለ ናይ ባዮቴክኖሎጂ መሻርኽቱ ብምትሕብባር ብኣፍ ዝዉሰድ ክትባት የማዕብል ኣሎ።
en-mt: Janssen is developing an oral vaccine in collaboration with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 18 2020፡ ኢመርጀንት ባዮ_ሶልዩሽንስ ምስ ቫክሳርት ብምዃን ነቲ ክታበት ንኸማዕብሉ ኣዊጆም ።
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent Bio_Solutions announced that it would develop the vaccine in partnership with Vaxart

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 8፣ 2020 ኣብ ሮማኒያ ዝርከብ ና ኦንኮገን ላብራቶሪ ኣብ ምስ ን ካንሰር ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዘወዓለ ኒዮኣንቲጅን ክትባት ሕክምና ዝመሳሰል ናይ ክትባት ቴክኖሎጂ ንድፊ ኣመልኪቱ ናይ ፅናዓት ወረቐት ኣሕቲሞም ኣለው።
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, Na Oncogen Laboratory in Romania published a research paper on the design of a vaccine technology similar to the neoantigen vaccine used for cancer treatment.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 25 ፣ናይ ምርምር ትካል ዋና ሓላፊ ናይ ክታበት ምስራሕ ከምዝወድኡን ፈተነታት ኣብ ምጅማር ከምዘለዉ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On March 25 , the research institute's chief executive announced that they had completed development of the vaccine and that trials were underway.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ 27 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ ናይ Generex መሓዛ ትካል, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology፣ ናይ Ii-Key(ሊ-ኪይ) ፔፕታይድ ክትባት ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ንምፍጣር ናይ ክትባት ፕሮጀክት ይጅምሩ ምህላዎም ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, Generex's partner company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced that they are launching a vaccine project to develop an Ii-Key(Li-Key) peptide vaccine against COVID-1

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: ኣብ ‘’ዉሽጢ 90 መዓልትታት’’ ኣብ ሰብ ክፍተን ዝኽእል ናይ ክትባት ሕፁይ ንምምዕባል ደልዮም።
en-mt: They wanted to develop a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans ''within 90 days.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ማርች 2020፣ ናይ Washington University (ዋሽንግተን ዩኒቨርሲቲ) ኣብ St. Louis(ሴንት ሉዊስ) ክትባት ናይ ምምዕባል ፕሮጀክት ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the Washington University (Washington University) in St. Louis, Missouri, will hold a press conference. Louis(St. Louis) announced a vaccine development project.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ማርች 2020፣ United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick ን ናይ ኣብ ሲልቨር ስፕሪንግ ዘሎ ናይ Walter Reed Army Institute of Research፣ ክልቲኦም ኣብ ምዕራባዊ ሜሪላንድ ዝርከቡ ኮይኖም፣ ክትባት ኣብ ምምዕባል ይሰረሑ ምህላዎም ድማ ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced that they are working on developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ 10 ማርች 2020፣ Emergent Biosolutions ምስ Novavax Inc ብሓባር ምስራሕ ምጅማሩ ኣብሲሩ።
en-mt: Around March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced a partnership with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ምምዕባልን ምፍራይን ክታበት።
en-mt: in vaccine development and production.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: እቶም መሻርኽቲ ናይ ቅድሚ ክሊኒካዊ ምርመራን ደረጃ I ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነን ኣብ ጁላይ 2020 ንምክያድ ትልሚ ከምዘለዎም ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: The partners announced plans to conduct preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial in July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 12, 2020 ናይ ህንዲ ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስቴር ምስ 11 ዝተነጸሉ ሰባት እንዳሰርሑ ምዃኖም ኣፍሊጡ ፣ ነቲ መድሓኒት ንምስራሕ በቲ ዝቐልጠፈ ኣሰራርሓ እውን እንተኾነ ብንኡሱ ካብ ሓደ ዓመትን ፈረቓን ክሳብ ክልተ ዓመት ከምዝወስድ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, India's health ministry announced that it was working with 11 isolates , and that it would take at least a year and a half to two years to develop the drug, even in the fastest way.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 12፣ 2020፣ ኣብ ከተማ ኩዩቤክ ዝርከብ መዲካጎ ዝተብሃለ ትካል ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ካናዳ ናይ ጥዕና ምርምር ትካል ዝግበር ውሱን ናይ ገንዘብ ሓገዝ ኮይኑ ኮሮና ቫይረስ መሳሊ ባእታ ኣብ ምምዕባል ክምዝርከብ ፀብፃብ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, Quebec City-based Medicago, a limited funding organization under the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, reported that it was developing a coronavirus-like component.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹይ ኣብ ናይ ቤትፈተነ መጽናዕቲ ይርከብ፣ ኣብ ሰብ ምፍታን ድማ ኣብ ጁላይ ወይ ኦገስት 2020 ክካየድ ትልሚ ተታሒዝዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: This vaccine candidate is in laboratory studies, and human trials are scheduled for July or August

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: ኣቐዲሙ ኣብ’ቲ ሰሙን፡ ናይ US ፕሬዝደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ን CureVac ፡ ነቲ መንግስቲ ጀርመን ዝተቓወሞ ንምርካብ ክታበት “Covid-19 ዝውዕል ‘ብዙሕ ገንዘብ’ ኣቕሪቡ“ ክብል ዘ-ጋርዲያን ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Earlier that week, US President Donald Trump offered CureVac , a “covid-19 vaccine” that the German government opposed, The Guardian reported.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 17, 2020 ናይ ኣሜሪካ ናይ መድሓኒት ኩባንያ ፊዘር ምስ ናይ ጀርመን ኩባንያ ባዮኤንቴክ ብሓደ ናይ mRNA-based ክትባት ንምስራሕ ክምዝተውዓዓሉ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, US pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced an agreement with German company Bioentech to develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: ኣብ mRNA ዝተመርኮሰ ክትባት ሕፁይ ዝኾነ BNT162 ኣብ ፕሪክሊኒካል ምርምር ዝርከብ እንትኾን፡ ቀፃሊ ናይ ክሊኒካል ፈተነታት ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020 ክጅመር ከምዝኾነ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: BNT162, an mRNA-based vaccine candidate, is in preclinical research and further clinical trials are expected to begin in April

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: ኣብ ጣልያን ኣብ ማርች 17፣ 2020 ታኪስ ባዮቴክዝበሃል ናይ ጣልያን ትካል ኣብ ኣፕሪል፣2020 ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ውፂኢታት ብምርካብ እቲ ናይ መጨረሻ ኣብ ወዲ ሰብ ዝግበር ፈተነ ድማ ካብ መስከርም ኣቢሉ ክምዝጅምር ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: In Italy on March 17, 2020 Takis Biotech, an Italian company, announced that clinical results will be available in April,2020 and the final human trial will start around Meskerm.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: ማርች 19 2020 ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ናይ ኤፒደሚክ ኢኖቬሽን ሕብረት (CEPI) ናይ US$4.9 ሚሊዮን ኣብ ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት መፅናዕቲ ኢንቨስትመንት ከምዝገበረ ሓቢሩ። ካብ እዚ ብተወሳኺ ድማ ንኢኒስቲቱት ፓስተር፣ ቴሚስ ባዮሳይንስ (ቪዬና፣ኣዉስትሪያ) ከምኡ’ዉን ዩኒቨርስቲ ፒትስበርግ ብምስታፍ ጠቕላላ ንCOVID-19 ክትባት ምዕባለ ዝዉዕል ናይ CEPI ኢንቨስትመንት ናብ US$29 ሚልዮን ክዓቢ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the French Epidemic Innovation Union (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in COVID-19 vaccine research. In addition, the total CEPI investment for COVID-19 vaccine development has increased to US$29 million with the participation of the Pasteur Institute, Themis Biosciences (Vienna, Austria) and the University of Pittsburgh.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: ናይ CEPI ናይ ኢንቨስትመንት ምሻርኽቲ ንCOVID-19 ዝኸዉን ክትባት ንምምዕባል ዝሳተፉ፡ ሞደርና፣ ኩሬቫክ፣ ኢኖቭዮ፣ ኖቫቫክስ፣ ዩኒቨርስቲ ሆንግ ኮንግ፣ ዩኒቨርስቲ ኦክስፎርድ ከምኡዉን ዩኒቨርስቲ ክዊንስላንድ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: CEPI's investment partners involved in the development of vaccines for COVID-19 include Moderna, Curevac, Innovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford and the University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: ኣብ 20 ማርች 2020፣ ናይ ሩስያ ጥዕና ኦፊሻላት ሳይቲስትታት ናይ ሽድሽተ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ኣብ እንስሳት ምፍታን ምጅማሮም ገሊጾም።
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun testing six different vaccine candidates on animals.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 20፣2020 ናይ ሎንደን ኢምፐሪያል ኮሌጅ ተመራመርቲ ን COVID-19 ዝኾን ዓርሱ ዘጋውሕ ናይ RNA ክትባት ኣብ ምምዕባል ክምዝርከቡ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: On March 20,2020, researchers at Imperial College London announced that they are developing a self-promoting RNA vaccine for COVID-1

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: እቲ ተወዳዳሪ ክታበት ኣብ ውሽጢ 14 መዓልታት ምቕባል ኣሰራርዓ ሕነተ-ሰረት ካብ ቻይና ማዕቢሉ።
en-mt: The competitive vaccine was developed within 14 days of receiving the baseline regimen from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ ማርች፡ መንግስቲ ካናዳ ከም መዲካጎ ን ተበግሶ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሳስካቸዋንን ዝመሰሉ ናይ ካናዳ ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ትካላትን ከም ሕክምናዊ ሰረ-ስጉምቲ ኣንጻር COVID-19 ኣብ ዘቕረብዎም ብዙሓት ሕጹያት ክታበታት ዝትግበሩ 96 ናይ መጽናዕቲ ውጥናት ንምምዋል 275 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ካናዳ ክህብ ምዃኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: In late March, the Government of Canada announced that it would provide C$275 million to fund 96 research projects on multiple vaccine candidates proposed by Canadian universities and institutions such as Medicago and the University of Saskatchewan Initiative.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ግዜ መንግስቲ ካናዳ ንምምዕባል ናይ COVID-19 ክታበት ዝውዕል 192 ሚልዮን ዶላር ካናዳ ከምኡ’ውን ካልእ ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ምስ ዘጋጥም ዝጠቅም ብዙሓት ሕደስቲ ክታበታት ዝህልዎ “ናይ ክታበት ባንክ” ንምምዕባል መደባት ኣፍሊጡ፡፡
en-mt: At the same time, the Canadian government announced plans to spend C$192 million to develop a COVID-19 vaccine and a “vaccine bank” with many new vaccines to use in the event of another pandemic.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: ኤፕሪል 2 2020 ናይ ፒትስበርግ ዩኒቨርስቲ ቤት-ትምህርቲ ሕክምና ተመራመርቲ ናይ PittCoVacc ዝበሃል ናይ COVID-19 ክትባት ኣብ ኣናፁ ምርምር ‘’ናይ SARS-CoV-2 S1 ሳብዩኒት ክትባት ጠንካራ ናይ ኣንቲጅን-ስፔስፊክ ኣንቲቦዲ መልሲ [ኣብ ኣናፁ] ከምዘምፀ MNA ኣፍሊጡ። እዚ ድማ ኢምዩናይዜሽን ምስተፈጥረ ድሕሪ 2 ሰሙን ይፍጠር።’’
en-mt: April 2, 2020 Researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine have tested the PittCoVacc COVID-19 vaccine in mice ''The SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccine has produced a strong antigen-specific antibody response [in mice], MNA reported. This occurs 2 weeks after immunization.”

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: ኤፕሪል 16 2020 ኣብ ካናዳ ውሽጢ ዝርከብ ዋተርሉ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ቤት-ትምህርቲ ፋርማሲ DNA ዝመሰረቱ ናይ ክታበት ብኣፍንጫ ዝንጸግ ሕጹይ ይምስርት ከምዘሎ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: April 16, 2020 The University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy in Canada is developing a DNA-based nasal vaccine candidate.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: ባክቴሪዮፌጅስ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ብምዋዓል፣ እቲ DNA ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ ወዲስብ ኣብ ዝርከብ ባክቴሪያ ውሽጢ ብምርባሕ ጉዳኣት ዘይብሉ ቫይረስ መስል ባእታታት ብምፍራይ እቲ ናይ ሰብነትና ሕማምም ተከላኻሊ ኣናፃር ሳርስ ኮሮና ቫይረስ (SARS-CoV-2) ናይ ባዕዳዊ ነገራት መከለኻሊ የፍሪ።
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, the DNA multiplies inside the bacteria inside the body to produce harmless virus-like elements that produce the body’s immune system against the SARS-CoV-2 foreign object defense.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020፣ ናይ US መንግስቲ፣ ኢንዳስትሪን ሰለስተ ዩኒቨርስቲታትን ናይ IBM ሱፐር ኮምፒዩተራት ፣ ምስ ናይ ክላውድ ኮምፒቲንግ ሓገዛት ናይ Hewlett Packard Enterprise፣ Amazon፣ Microsoft፣ ከምኡውን Google ብምትሕብባር ንምጥቃም ፍልፍላት ሃብቲ ኣኪቦም እዮም።
en-mt: In March 2020, US government, industry, and three universities mobilized resources to use IBM supercomputers , in conjunction with cloud computing services from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: ሓድሓደ ክትባታት ውሱናት ዘይኮኑ ወይድማ ዝበሃሉ ሳዕቤናት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Some vaccines have limited or so-called side effects.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: እዚ ማለት ድማ ካብቲ ዝከላኸልዎ ሕማም ንላዕሊ ጥቕሚ ክረኽቡ ይኽእሉ እዮም ማለት እዩ።
en-mt: This means that they can benefit from more than the disease they prevent.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: ኣብ አውስትራሊያ ዝግበር ተወሳኺ ሃንደበታዊ ሙከራ 4,170 ናይ ጥዕና ሰራሕተኛታት እናጠለበ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Additional randomized trials in Australia are requiring 4,170 health workers.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: ኣብ ምምዕባል ዝርከቡ ክትባታት ውሕስነቶም ዝተሓለዉ ወይ ኣድማዕቲ ዘይክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Vaccines in development may not be safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: ኣድማዕነት ክታበት ንምፍታሽ ኣብ ን COVID-19 ውሱናት ሞዴል እንስሳታት ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ከም ACE2-ስግረ-ጂናዊ ኣናጹ፡ ካልኦት ናይ ላብራቶሪ እንስሳታት፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ሰባት ዘይኮኑ መጥበውቲ ቫይረሳት ንምቁጽጻር ኣገዳስነት ናይ ደረጃ 3 ባዮ-ሴፍቲ ናይ ምሓዝ ስጉምትታት ከምኡ’ውን ደረጅኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ድሕነት መስርሓት ንምውሓስ ኣህጉራዊ ምውህሃድ የመልክት።
en-mt: The importance and degree of Level 3 biosafety containment measures to control viruses in limited animal models for COVID-19, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human mammals, to examine vaccine effectiveness Refers to international coordination to ensure protected safety processes.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: ን SARS ከምኡ’ውን ንMERS ዝኸውን ክታበት ኣብ ደቂሰብ ዘይኮኑ ናይ እንስሳት ሞዴላት ይፍተኑ ጸኒሖሞ እዮም።
en-mt: Vaccines for SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: ኣብ 2020 SARS ድሕንነቱ ዝሓለወን ዉፅኢታዊ ዝኾነን መድሓኒት ወይድማ ተኻላኸሊ ክትባት የብሉን።
en-mt: By 2020, SARS will not have a safe and effective cure or vaccine.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: ኣብ 2005 ን 2006 ን ብዝተሓተሙ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ወረቐታት መሰረት፣ ናይ እዚ SARS ሓድሽ ክትባት ወይ መድሓኒት ምምዕባል ናይ መንግስቲታትን ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ሓለዋን ቀዳምነት ዝህብዎ ነገር እዩ።ኣንጻር MERS እውን ዝተረጋገጸ ክትባት የለን።
en-mt: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the development of a new vaccine or cure for SARS is a priority for governments and public health. There is no proven vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: MERS ብጣዕሚ ኣስፋሕፊሑ ኣብ ዝነበረሉ ግዘ ሕጂ ዘሎ ናይ SARS ምርምር ኣንጻር MERS-CoV ረኽሲ ክታበትን መድሓኒታትን ንምምዕባል ጠቓሚ ኣብነት ክህልዎ ከምዝኽእል እምነት ነይሩ እዩ።
en-mt: At a time when MERS was very prevalent there was a belief that current SARS research could provide a useful example for developing vaccines and drugs against MERS-CoV infection.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: ካብ ማርች 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ሓደ  ብርኪ I ኣብ ደቂ ሰባት ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ ዝወደአን ፣ ካልኦት ሰለስተ ድማ ኣብ መሰርሕ ዝርከቡሉን፣ ኩሎም ድማ viral-vectored እቶም ክልተ ድማ adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac) ሓድ ድማ MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S) ዝኾነ (DNA ዝተድረኸ) ናይ MERS ክትባትት ነይሩ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, one phase I clinical trial in humans has been completed , and three others are in progress, all viral-vectored, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac) and one MVA-vectored (MVA). -MERS-S) was any (DNA based) MERS vaccine.

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: ናይ ማሕበራዊ ሚድያ ፖስትታት እቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ይፍለጥ ከምዝነበረን ክትባት እውን ከምዘለዎን ዝገልጽ ስነ-ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Social media posts have suggested that the virus was known and that there is a vaccine.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: እቶም ኣብ ማሕበራዊ ሚድያታት ዝርከቡ ናይ ዋንነት ሰርትፍኬታት ከም SARS ዝመሳሰሉ ናይ ካልኦት ኮሮና ቫይረስ ስትሬናት ጀነቲክ ሲኩዌንስን ክትባትን ዋንነት ሰርትፍኬታት እዮም።
en-mt: The patents on social media are patents for the genetic sequences and vaccines of other coronavirus strains, such as SARS.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ሕማም b'ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ብከቢድን ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ዝመጽእ ተላባዒ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Disease b'Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by the severe and acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: ልሙዳት ምልክታት ረስኒ፣ ሰዓልን ትንፋስ ምሕጻርን ዝኣመሰሉ ዘካትቱ እዮም።
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: ካልኦት ምልክታት ድኻም፣ ናይ ጭዋዳ ቃንዛ፣ ተቕማጥ፣ ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛ፣ ናይ ምጭናው ክእለት ምስኣንን ናይ ከብዲ ቃንዛን የካትቱ።
en-mt: Other symptoms include fatigue, muscle aches, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of ability to carry and abdominal pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ካብ ግዘ ምቅላዕ ክሳብ ምልክት ምርኣይ ዝጅምረሉ ግዘ ዘሎ ግዘ ከባቢ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲታት እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲታት ኣብ ዘሎ ክፈላለ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The time from the time of exposure to the onset of symptoms is about five days, but it can vary between two and fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ጉዳያት ናይ ለበዳ ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ዘርእዩ ዋላ እንተኾኑ፣ ገለ ናብ ቫይራል ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒን ናብ ብዙሓት ኦርጋናት ውድቀትን ዘምርሑ እዮም።
en-mt: Although most cases of epidemics show mild symptoms, some lead to viral pulmonary stroke and multi-organ failure.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: ካብ 17 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ልዕሊ 2.24 ሚልዮን ጉድያት ለበዳ ኣብ መላእ 210 ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ጸብጻብ ተገይሮም እዮም፣ ልዕሊ 153,000 ሞት ድማ ኣስዒቦም።
en-mt: As of April 17, 2020, more than 2.24 million outbreak cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, causing more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: ልዕሊ 568,000 ሰባት ካብቲ ሕማም ሓውዮም እዮም። እዚ ቫይረስ መብዛሕትኡ ግዘ ብምስዓል፣ ብምህንጣስ፣ ወይ ብምዝራብ ዝወጹ ኣናእሽተይ ንጣባት ኣብ መንጎ ቀረባ ንኽክእ ዘለዎም ሰባት እዩ ብዋናነት ዝመሓላለፍ ።
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have recovered from the disease. The virus is usually transmitted mainly by coughing, sneezing, or talking droplets between people with close contact.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: እዞም ንጣባት ንደገ ኣብ ምትንፋስ ዝፍጠሩ ዋላ እንተኾኑ፣ ናብ ነዊሕ ርሐቐት ከይዶም ክንዲ ሰብ ምብካል ናብ መሬት ወይ ካልኦት ቦታታት እዮም ዝወድቁ።
en-mt: Although these droplets are formed by breathing out, they travel long distances and fall to the ground or other places instead of contaminating humans.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: ሰባት ዝተበከለ ቦታ ነኺኦም ዓይኖም፣ ኣፍንጭኦም ወይ ኣፎም ብምንካእ ክልከፉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: People can become infected by touching a contaminated area and touching their eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረሳት ኣብ ደጋዊ ቦታታት ን 72 ሰዓታት ዝኣክል ክጸንሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: These viruses can stay outdoors for up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: ኣብ ናይቲ ምልክታት ዝጀመረሉ ናይ መጀመርያ ሰለስተ መዓልቲታት ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፊ እዩ፣ ምምሕልላፍ ኣብ ዳሕራይ ናይቲ ሕማ ደረጃታት እውን ክፍጠር ዝኽእል እንተኾነ እውን። ናይ ሕማም ውጽኢት ምርካብ ስታንዳርድ ሜላ ብናይ ብሓቂ ሪቨርስ ትራንስክሪፕቴዝ ፖሊመሬዝ ቸይን (rRT-PCR) ካብ ናዞፋሬንጃል ስዋብ ብምውሳድ እዩ።
