en-mt: It is highly contagious during the first three days of the onset of symptoms, although transmission can also occur in later stages of the disease. The standard method of obtaining disease results is by real reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from nasopharyngeal swabs.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: ማስክ ምጥቃም ነቶም ባዕሎምን ሓብሐብቶምን በቲ ቫይረስ ተታሒዝና ኢና ኢሎም ዝጥርጥሩ እዩ ዝምከር።
en-mt: Wearing a mask is recommended for those who suspect themselves and their caregivers of being infected.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: እቲ ሓፈሻዊ ህዝቢ ማስክ ናይ ምጥቃም ምኽሪ ዝተፈላለየ እዩ፣ ገለ ሰበ ስልጣናት ክጥቀም የብሉን ይብሉ፣ ገለ ክጥቀም ይመኽሩ፣ ካልኦት ድማ ጠቓሚነቶም ይደልዩ።
en-mt: The general public's advice on wearing masks varies, with some authorities saying they shouldn't be used, some recommending them, and others looking for their usefulness.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብዚ ግዘ እዚ፣ ንኮቪድ-19 ንጹር ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓኒት ወይ ክትባት የለን።
en-mt: At this time, there is no clear antiviral cure or vaccine for COVID-1

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: ከባቢያዊ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ስርጭት ኣብ መላእ ኩሎም ሽድሽተ ናይ WHO ክልላት ተመዝጊቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Local outbreaks of the disease have been recorded across all six WHO regions.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ምልክት ዘይከርእዩ ይኽእሉ ወይ ድማ ከም ረስኒ፣ ሰዓል፣ ድኻምን ትንፋስ ምሕጻርን ዝኣምሰሉ ናይ ጉንፋዕ ምልክታት ጥራሕ ከማዕብሉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: People infected with the virus may show no symptoms or may develop only flu symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: ከም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምሕጻር፣ ቀጻላይ ናይ ኣፍ ልቢ ቃንዛ፣ ምድንጋር፣ ናይ ምስጓም ጸገም፣ ሰመያዊ ገጽ ወይ ከንፈር ዝበሉ ሃንደበታዊ ምልክታት እንተተራእዮም ብቕልጡፍ ናይ ሕክምና ትኹረት የድልዮም እዩ።
en-mt: Sudden symptoms such as shortness of breath, persistent oral chest pain, confusion, difficulty walking, blue face or lips require immediate medical attention.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: ክንድቲ ዘይተለመዱ፣ ናይ ላዕለዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ምልክታት ከም ምህንጣስ፣ ኣፍንጫ ዘረብረብ ምባል ወይ ናይ ጎሮሮ ቃንዛ ክጠቓለሉ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: As uncommon, upper respiratory symptoms may include coughing, runny nose or sore throat.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: ከም ምቕልውላው፣ ቮሚትን ተቕማጠን ዝበሉ ጋስትሮኢንተስታይናል ምልክታት ብ ዝተፈላለዩ ምኢታዊ መጠናት ተራእዮም ኔሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhea were observed in varying percentages.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: ገለ ናይ ቻይና ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ መጀመርያ ናይ ኣፍ ልቢ ጸቕጢን ፓልፕቴሽንን ምልክታት ጥራሕ እዮም ኔሮምዎም።
en-mt: Some Chinese cases of outbreaks initially had only oral cardiac pressure and palpitations.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: ኣብ ገለ ሰባት፣ እቲ ሕማም ናብ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ፣ ናብ ናይ ብዙሓ ኣካላት ውድቀት ከምኡውን ናብ ሞት ይኽእል።
en-mt: In some people, the disease can lead to pneumonia, multiorgan failure and death.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: እዚ ድማ መራብሒ ግዘ ይበሃል።
en-mt: This is called multiplication time.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ -19 መጫጭሒ ግዘ ካብ ሓሙሽተ ክሳብ ሽዱሽተ መዓልቲ ዘሎ ግዘ እዩ እንተኾነ ግን ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ 14 መዓልቲታት እውን ክወስድ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The incubation period is five to six days but can also take two to 14 days.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: 97.5% ምልክታት ዘማዕብሉ ሰባት ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ እቲ ረኸሲ 11.5 መዓልቲታት የርእዩ። ጸብጸባት ከምዘርአይዎ ኩሎም ዝተለኸፉ ምልክት የርእዩ ማለት ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms show it within 11.5 days of the infection. Reports show that not all infected people show symptoms.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: ናይ እዞም ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ተሸከምቲ መመሓላለፊ መንገዲ ክሳብ ሕዚ ሙሉእ ብሙሉአ ኣይተፈልጠን; እነተኾነ ግን፣ ናይ መጀመርታ መረዳእታት ነቲ ናየ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ክሕግዙ ይኽእሉ እዮም ዝብል ኣንፈት ይህቡ።
en-mt: The route of transmission of these asymptomatic carriers is still not fully understood; However, preliminary data suggest that they may help the spread of the virus.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: ምልክት ናይ ዘየርእዩ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት በዝሒ ኣብዚ ግዘ እዚ ኣይፍለጥን፣ ጽንዓት ድማ ይግበረሉ ኣሎ፣ ምስ ናይ Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) ( ኮርያ ናይ ሕማም ቁጽጽርን ምክልኻልን ማእኸል ) 20% እቶም ዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳይት ለበዳ ኣብ ናይ ሆስፒታል ጻንሒቶም ምልክት ኣይርአዩን ክብል ጸብጻብ ጌሩ።
en-mt: The number of asymptomatic infected people is currently unknown and is being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of confirmed cases are asymptomatic during their hospital stay He did it.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: ናይ China's National Health Commission( ቻይና ብሄራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን) ኣብ 1 ኣፕሪል ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ጉድያት ለበዳ ከጠቓልል ጀሚሩ; ካብ 166 ኣብ እቲ መዓልቲ ዝተመዝገቡ ጉዳያት ለበዳ፣ 130 (78%) ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ኔሮም ክምርመሩ ከለዉ።
en-mt: China's National Health Commission( China National Health Commission) began covering asymptomatic outbreak cases on April 1; Of 166 outbreak cases recorded on the day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic when diagnosed.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: ዓኽታን ትፈታፍን ብዙሕ ናይ ቫይረስ በዝሒ ክሕዙ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Coughs and sneezes can carry large amounts of virus.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: ዓዊ ኢልካ ምዝራብ ካብ ልሙድ ኣዘራርባ ንላዕሊ ብዙሓት ንጣባት ይሰድድ።
en-mt: Speaking out loud sends out many more drops than ordinary speech.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ኣፍካ ከይሸፈንካ ምስዓል ንጣባት ክሳብ 4.5 ሜትር (15 ፊት) ክጎዓዙ ክገብር ከምዝኽእል ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: A study in Singapore showed that coughing without covering your mouth can cause droplets to travel up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ እዚ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ብኣየር ዝመሓላለፍ ሕማም ስለዘይኮነ፣ በሄራዊ ናይ ሳይንስ ኣካዳሚ ናይ ባዮኤሮሶል ምምሕልላፋት ክህሉ ይኽእል ኣየር ኣከብቲ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ካልኦት ሰባት ክፍሊ ዝርከቡ ሰባት ናሙና ንናይቲ RNA ፖዚቲቭ ውጽኢት ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Since this virus is not entirely an airborne disease, there may be National Academy of Sciences of bioaerosol transmissions and air collectors samples of people in other people's rooms tested positive for the RNA.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ገለ ናይ ሕክምና ከይዲታት ከም ኢንቱቤሽነንን ካርድዮፕሉምናሪ ሪሰስቴሽን (CPR) ኤሮላይዝድ ክኾኑ ዘለዎም ናይ መተንፈሲ ፈሰስቲ ከስዕቡ ይኽእሉ እዚ ድማ ብኣየር ምምሐልላፍ ከስዕብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may result in respiratory fluids that need to be aerolized which may result in airway transmission.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: ብሰገራ ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ ዝብል ስግኣት ዋላ እንተሃለወ፣ እዚ ኣጋጣሚ እዚ ትሑት እዩ ተባሂሉ ይእመን። እዚ ቫይረስ እቶም ሰባት ምልክት የርእዩ እንተልዮም እዩ ብዝበለጸ ዝላባዕ፣ እንቶኾነ ግን ዝርጋሐ ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምፍጣሮም እውን ክፍጠር ይኽእል እዩ፣ ኣጋጣሚኡ ግን ትሑት እዩ።
en-mt: Although there is a risk of fecal transmission, this incidence is believed to be low. The virus spreads best if people are showing symptoms, but spread can also occur before symptoms develop, but the incidence is low.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: ናይ European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (ኣውሮፓ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻልን ቁጽጽርን ማእኸል) እቲ ሕማም ክንደየናይ ብቐሊሉ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ግልጺ ከምዘይኮነን፣ ሓደ ሰብ ክልተ ወይ ሰልስተ ዝኾኑ ሰባት ክብል ከምዝኽእልን ሓቢሮም። እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝኾነ ቦታ ንሰዓታት ክጸንሕ ድማ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) said it was unclear how easily the disease was transmitted, and one could say two or three people. The virus can stay anywhere for hours.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: ብፍላይ ድማ፣ እቲ ቫየረስ ኣብ ኣርማድዮ ሓደ መዓልቲ ክጸንሕ ክኢሉ እዩ፣ ንሰለስተ መዓልቲታት ድማ ኣብ ፕላስቲክ (polypropylene) ኣብ ስተይንለስ ስቲል እውን (AISI 304)፣ ኣብ 99% ኮፐር ድማ ንኣርባዕተ ሰዓታት ይጸንሕ።
en-mt: Specifically, the virus was able to survive one day in the cupboard, and three days on plastic (polypropylene) also on stainless steel (AISI 304), and four hours on 99% copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: እዚ ግን፣ በቲ ራሕሲን ሙቐትን መሰረት ክፈላለ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: This, however, may vary depending on the roof and temperature.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: ሳሙናን ዲተርጀንትን እውን ብኣግባቡ ኣብ ጥቕሚ እንተውዒሎም ብቑዓት እዮም፣ ናይ ሳሙና ምህርቲታት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ መከላኸሊ መሸፈኒ ኣካል የዳኽሙ፣ ከይሰርሕ ድማ ይገብርዎ፣ ካብ ቆርበትን ካብ ካልኦት ቦታታት ድማ የጽርይዎ።
en-mt: Soaps and detergents are also efficient if used appropriately, soap products weaken the protective covering of the virus, making it ineffective, and clean it from the skin and from other areas.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: ካልኦት ፈሰስቲ፣ ከም benzalkonium chloride ን chlorhexidine gluconate (ሰርጂካል ዲስኢንፌክታንት)፣ ትሕት ዝበለ ኣድማዒነት ኣለዎም። ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ብዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ፣ ድሕሪ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂስካ ምሕካ ምጅማሩ ናይ እንትፍታፍ ናሙናታት ብማእኸላይ ኣብ ክልተ መዓልቲታት ተወሲዶም።
en-mt: Other solvents, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (surgical disinfectants), are less effective. In a study in Hong Kong, sputum samples were taken on average every two days after hospitalization.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: ካብ ሽዱሽተ ተሓከምቲ ሓሙሽቲኦም፣ አቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናሙና እቲ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ በዝሒ ኣርእዩ፣ እቲ ሻዱሻይ ድማ ኣብ ካልኣይ መዓልቱ ክምርመር እንከሎ ዝለዓለ ናይ ቫይረስ በዝሒ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Five of the six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth showed the highest viral load when tested on the second day.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ንመጀመርታ ኣብ ከተማ ዉሃን ሰለስተ ከቢድ ናይ ምትንፋስ ሕማምን ናይ ሳምባ ምቺ ሕማም ኣብዝተረኽቦም ሰለስተ ሰባት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) first appeared in Wuhan in three cases of severe respiratory illness and pneumonia.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ሓድሽ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ኩሎም ባህርያታት ብተፈጥሮኦም ምስ ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝመሳሰሉ ኮይኖም እዮም ዝርከቡ።
en-mt: All the characteristics of the new SARS-CoV-2 virus are similar in nature to the coronavirus.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: ካብ ናይ ሰብ ሰብነት ወጻኢ፣ እዚ ቫይረስ በቲ ናይ ዳጋዊ መከላኸሊኡ ዘንተዓሉ፣ ናይ ገዛ ሳሙና ይመውት እዩ፣ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ እቲ ዋና SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ እዩ።
en-mt: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap that has lifted its external defenses, SARS-CoV-2 is similar to the main SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: ሳንቡእት እዮም ብኮቪድ-19 ብ ኣብዝሓ ዝጉድኡ ኦርጋናት ምኽንያቱ እቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እቲ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ዋህዮታት ብኤንዛይም ኣንጂዮቴንሲን-ቀያሪ ኤንዛይም 2 (ACE2) ብምጥቃም ይኣቱ፣ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ናይ ሳንቡኣት ዓይነት II ኣሊቪዮላር ዋህዮታት ብበዝሒ እዩ ዝርከብ።
en-mt: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus enters the person's cells using the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is found in large quantities in type II alveolar cells of the lungs.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ፍሉይ ግላይኮፕሮቲን "ስፓይክ" (peplomer) ተጠቒሙ ምስ ACE2 ይተሓሓዝ እሞ ናብ እቲ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ዋህዮ ይኣቱ።
en-mt: The virus uses a special glycoprotein "spike" (peplomer) to bind to ACE2 and enter the person's cell.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ልቢ ጉድኣት ኣብ 12% ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ተረኺቡ ኣብ ውሃን፣ ቻይና ሆስፒታል ኣብ ዝኣተዉ ሕሙማት ኣጋጢሙ፣ ኣብ ኣዝዮም ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ድማ ይብእስ።
en-mt: Severe cardiac damage was found in 12% of infected persons and occurred in patients hospitalized in Wuhan, China, and worsens in critically ill persons.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: ናይ ካርድዮቫስኩላር ምልክታት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ልዑል እዩ፣ እዚ ድማ ብምኽኒያት ኣብ ናይ እዚ ሕማም ከይዲ ዝህሉ ስርዓታዊ ናይ ረኽሲ መልሲን ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ስርዓትን ጸገምን እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ሓድሽ ማይካርዲያል ጉድኣት ምስ ናይ ልቢ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ምኽንያት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The comparative rate of cardiovascular symptoms is high, due to the systemic infectious response and immune system complications in the course of this disease, but new myocardial damage with cardiac ACE2 receptors may be attributable.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: ናይ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ኣብ ልቢ ብዙሓት እዮም ምስ ናይ ልቢ ስራሕ ድማ ዝተተሓሓዙ እዮም።
en-mt: ACE2 receptors are numerous in the heart and are associated with cardiac function.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: ልዑል ናይ ደም ምርጋእ ኣጋጣሚ (31%) ናይ ቬነስ ደም ምርጋእ (25%) ኣብ ናይ ICU ናይ ኮቪደ-19 ሕሙማት ተረኺቡ እዩ እዚ ዳማ ምስ ድኹም ናይ ትንበያ ተኽእሎ ክተሓሓዝ ይኽእል እዩ። ብኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ሬሳ ምርመራ ዲፊዩዝ ኣሊቮላር ጉድኣት (DAD)፣ ከምኡውን ኣብ ውሽጢ እቲ ሳንባ ሊምፎሳይታት ዝሓዙ ናይ ቁጥዐ ነዃላት ተረኺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: A high incidence of blood clots (31%) of venous blood clots (25%) has been found in ICU COPD patients which may be associated with poor prognostic probability. Autopsies of people who have died from COVID-19 have found diffuse alivolar damage (DAD), and irritation holes containing lymphocytes within the lungs.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: SARS-COV-2 ን ACE2-ንናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ኢፒተልያል ዋህዮታት ዝገልጽ ትሮፒዝም ኣለዎ፣ ከቢድ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ስርዓታዊ ሃይፐርኢንፍላሜሽን ምልክታት ኣለውዎም።
en-mt: SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing respiratory epithelial cells, people with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ብፍላይ፣ ኣብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓመሙ ከቢድ ናይ ሳንባ ፓቶሎጂ ዘለዎም ሰባት፣ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ GM-CSF-መምረቲ T-cells ምስ ናይ ኢንፍላማቶሪ IL-6-መምረቲ ሞኖሳይታት ክተሓባበሩ ተራእዮም እዮም ።
en-mt: Specifically, in COVID-19 patients with severe lung pathology, pathogenic GM-CSF-producing T-cells have been shown to cooperate with inflammatory IL-6-producing monocytes.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: ሊምፎሳይቲክ ኢንፍልትሬት ኣብ ናይ ሬሳ ምርመራ ክርከቡ ክኢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Lymphocytic infiltrates have been found at autopsy.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: WHO ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ እዚ ሕማም ናይ ምርመራ ፕሮቶኮላት ኣሐቲሙ ኣሎ።
en-mt: WHO has published various screening protocols for this disease.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: እቲ ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ምርመራ መንገዲ real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)እዩ።
en-mt: The standard diagnostic method is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: እዚ ምርመራ ኣብ ናይ መተንፈሲ ናሙናታት ብ ናዞፋሪንጃል ስዋብ ዝካየድ እዩ; እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ኣፍንጫ ስዋብ ወይ ዓኽታ እውን ምጥቃም ይከአል እዩ።
en-mt: This test is performed on respiratory samples with a nasopharyngeal swab; However, a nasal swab or cough can also be used.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: ውጽኢታት ብሓፈሻ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝተወሰኑ ሰዓታት ክሳብ ክልተ መዓልቲታት ምርካብ ይከኣል።
en-mt: Results can generally be obtained within a few hours to two days.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: ናይ ደም ምርመራታት ምጥቃም ይከኣል፣ እዚ ግን ክልተ ናይ ደም ናሙናታት በቢ ክልተ ሰሙን ኣፈላላይ ክውሰዱ ይሓትት፣ ድማ ውጽኢታት ድማ ቅልጡፍ ዝኾነ ዋጋ ዳርጋ የብሎምን።
en-mt: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples to be taken every two weeks, and the results are of little value immediately.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ሳይንቲስታት ናይ እቲ ኮሮናቫይረስ ስተረይን ክፈልዩን ናይ ጀነቲክ ተኸታታልነት ከሐትሙን ክኢሎም እዮም፣ በዚድማ ኣብ ዓለም ዘለዉ ቤት ፈተነታት ኩሎም ዓርሶም ክኢሎም ነቶም በቲ ቫይረስ ዝመጽእ ረኽሲ ንምልላይ ዝግበሩ ናይ polymerase chain reaction (PCR)( ፖሊመሬዝ ሰንሰለታዊ ምውሃድ) ፈተነታት ንኸካይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: Chinese scientists have been able to isolate the coronavirus strain and publish the genetic sequence, so that laboratories around the world can all independently conduct polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to identify infections caused by the virus.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: ካብ 4 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምርመራ (ንጡፋት ረኽሲታት ከለሊ ይኽእል እቲ ሰብ ድማ ቅድሚ ሕዚ ተለኺፉ ምንባሩ ንፍላጥ የኽእል) ኣብ ምዕባለ ኔሮም፣ ብሰፊሑ ግን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኣይወዓሉን።
en-mt: As of April 4, 2020, antibody tests (which can detect active infections and allow the person to know if they have been infected before) have been in development, but have not been widely used.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ናይ ምርመራ ተሞክሮ እቲ ትኽክለኝነት ካብ 60 ክሳብ 70% ከምዝኾነ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Chinese testing experience showed the accuracy to be between 60 and 70%.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዘሎ FDA ነቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ ምርመራ ነጥቢ ኣብ 21 ማርች 2020 ኣብቲ ወርሒ መወዳእታ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ንክውዕል ፈቒዱ። ናይ ምርመራ መምርሒታት ብናይ ውሃን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ጆንግናን ሆስፒታል ብክሊኒካላዊ ባህርያታትን ኢፒደሞሎጂካል ሓደጋታትን ረኽሲታት ናይ ምርካብ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: The US FDA approved the first test point on March 21, 2020, by the end of the month. Diagnostic guidelines suggested the detection of infections by clinical features and epidemiological risks by Wuhan University Jongnan Hospital.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: ክልተኣዊ ማልቲሎባር ሳዕሪ ዝመስሉ ፐሪፈራል፣ ኣሲመትሪክን ዳሕረዋይን ዝርጋሐ ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያታት ረኽሲ ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: Bilateral multilobar grass-like peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior spreads are common in primaries of infection.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: ሳብፕሉራል ዓብላሊነት፣ crazy paving (ናይ lobular septal(ሎቡላር ሴፕታል) ምሕፋስ ምስ ተለዋዋጢ ናይ alveolar(ኣልቪዮላር) ምምላእ)፣ እቲ ሕማም እንዳበኣሰ ክኸይድ እንከሎ ቁሳዊ ጥማር እውን ክፈጠር ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (harvesting of the lobular septal with variable alveolar filling), and material lumps may also form as the disease progresses.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ማይሮስኮፒክ ቁስሊታትን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ፓቶፊዝዮሎጂ ዝተወሰኑ ዳታታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are limited data on microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COPD.

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ሬሳ ምርመራ ዋና ፓታሎጂካዊ ርካቦታት:
en-mt: Main pathological findings at autopsy:

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: ማክሮስኮፒ፡ ፐሉሪሲ፣ ፔሪካርዳይትስ፣ ናይ ሳንባ ኮንሲዲሌሽንን ፑሉሙናሪ ሕብጠትን
en-mt: Macroscopy: Peluricy, pericarditis, pulmonary considilation and pulmonary swelling

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: ኣርባዕተ ዓይነት ናይ ቫይረስ ኒዩሞንያ ከቢድነት ምርኣይ ይከኣል:
en-mt: Four types of viral pneumonia severity can be seen:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: ቀሊል ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ: ናይ ፑልሙኒሪ ኢዴማ፣ ኒሞሳይት ሃይፐርፕላዠያ፣ ዓብዪ ኤታይፒካል ኒሞሳይታት፣ ኢንተርስቲሻል ቁጥዐ ምስ ሊምፎሳይቲክ ኢንፍልትሬሸንን ማልቲኒኩሌትድ ዓበይቲ ዋህዮታትን
en-mt: Simple pulmonary stroke: pulmuniri edema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial irritation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cells

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ፣ ዲፊዩዝ ኣልቪዮላር ጉድኣት (DAD) ምስ ዲዩዝ ኣልቪዮላር ኤክሱዴት።
en-mt: Severe pulmonary stroke, diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with deuce alveolar exudate.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: DAD ብህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ምውዳቕ ሲንድረምን (ARDS) ከቢድ ሃይፖክሲምያን ዘምጽእ እዩ።
en-mt: DAD brings on acute respiratory failure syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: ዝሓዊ ዘሎ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ፣ ኣብ ኣልቪዮላር በእታትን ፑልሙናሪ ኢንተርስቲሽያል ፋይብሮሲስ ፈሰስቲ ምእካብ
en-mt: Recovering pulmonary stroke, fluid collection in alveolar beats and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: ደም: ዝተበተነ ኢንትራቫስኩላር ምርጋእ (DIC); ሊኮኢሪትሮብላስቲክ ውህደት
en-mt: Blood: dispersed intravascular coagulation (DIC); Leucoerythroblastic combination

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: ናይ ምልካፍ ዕድል ዝቕንሱ መከላኸሊ መገዲታት ኣብ ገዛኻ ምጽናሕ፣ ሰብ ዝበዝሖም ቦታታት ምውጋድ፣ ኣእዳው ብሳሙናን ማይን እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ምሕጻብ፣ ጽቡቕ ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ጽሬት ብምሕላውን ዓይኒ፣ ኣፍንጫ ወይ ኣፍ ምንካእ ምውጋድን ዘተቓልል እዩ።
en-mt: Preventive measures to reduce the risk of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, maintaining good respiratory hygiene and avoiding eye, nose or mouth contact.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: CDC ክትስዕሉ ወይ ክትህንጥሱ ከለኹም ኣፍኩም ብሶፍት ምሽፋንን ሶፍት እንተዘይሃሊኩም ድማ ኩርናዕ ኢድኩም ክትጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: The CDC recommends covering your mouth with a soft tissue when coughing or sneezing and using the corner of your hand if you don’t have one.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: ግቡእ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ድሕሪ ምስዓል ወይ ምህንጣስ ዝበረታታዕ እዩ።
en-mt: Proper hand hygiene is encouraged after coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: CDC ምልክት ካብ ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለት ንምግታእ፣ ብዙሕ ሰብ ኣብ ዘለዎ ቦታ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ምጥቃም ይመክር። ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቐት ሜላታት ጉዕዞታት ብምግዳብን ናይ ብዙሕ ሰብ ምእካብ ዘለዎ ቦታታት ብምዕጻውን፣ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ምስ ብዙሓት ሰባት ንከይራኸቡ ቤት ትምህርቲታትን ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን ብምዕጻው ዝተገበሩ እዮም።
en-mt: The CDC recommends wearing a face mask in public places to prevent transmission from asymptomatic people. Social distancing measures included restricting travel and closing crowded places, and closing schools and workplaces to prevent infected people from coming into contact with large numbers of people.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: ናይ ርሕቐት ምሕላው መምርሒታት ሰባት እንተንኢሱ 6 ጫማ (1.8 ሜ) ክረሓሓቑ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: DISTANCE GUIDELINES People should stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: ኮቪድ -19 ንምክልኻል ብቑዕ ዝኾነ መድሓት የለን። ከትባት ድማ ዝቐረበ ተባሂሉ ክሳብ 2021 ትጽቢት ኣይግበሮን፣ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምቁጽጻር ቁልፊ ሜላ ናይ እዚ ለበዳ ጫፍ ምውራድ እዩ እዚ ድማ፣ "ነቲ ከርቭ ፍላት ምግባር "ይበሃል።
en-mt: There is no effective insurance to prevent COVID-1 Vaccines are not expected to be available until 2021. The key to controlling COVID-19 is to bring down the peak of the epidemic, which is called "flat the curve.

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: CDC ውልቀ ሰባት በተደጋጋሚ እንተንኢሱ ን 20 ሰከንድታት ኢዶም ክሕጸቡ ይመክር፣ ብፍላይ ድሕሪ ናብ ሽንቲ ቤት ምኻድኩም ወይ ኣእዳውኩም ዝረአ ርስሓት እንተሊዎ፣ ቅድሚ ምብላዕ ወይ ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫኹም ምንፋጥኩም፣ እንተስዒልኩም ወይ እንተሀንጢስኩም።
en-mt: The CDC recommends that individuals wash their hands frequently for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or if your hands are visiblely dirty, before eating or after sneezing, coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ድማ ሳሙናን ማይን እንተዘይህሉዉሉ ግዘ ጥራይ፣ እንተንኢሱ 60% ኣልኮል ዘለዎ ሳኒታይዘር ምጥቃም ዝምከር እዩ።ንግዳዊ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣብ ዘይርከበሉ፣ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ክልተ ንከባቢያዊ ምህርቲ መዳላዊ ዝኾኑ ቅመማታት ሂቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In addition, it is recommended to use a sanitizer containing at least 60% alcohol, only when soap and water are not available.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: ኣብ እዞም ሰነ-ሓሳባት እዚኦም፣ እዞም ጸረ ማይክሮቢያል ንጥፈታት ካብ ethanol ወይ isopropanol ዝመጹ እዮም።
en-mt: In these theories, these antimicrobial activities are derived from ethanol or isopropanol.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: ምስ ኣልኮል ሃይድሮጅን ፐር ኦክሳይድ ናይ ባክቴርያ ተሃዋስያን ኣብ ምጥፋእ ይሕግዝ፤ “ንናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሰፕሲስ ንጡብ ውሁድ ኣይኮነን”
en-mt: Along with alcohol, hydrogen peroxide helps in destroying bacterial allergens; “Not compound for hand antisepsis for nipples”

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: ግላይሴሮል ከም ሂዩመክታንት ዝተሓወሰ እዩ።
en-mt: Glycerol is included as a humectant.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: ሰባት ሓገዝቲ ክንክናት እዮም ዝግበሩሎም፣ ናይ ፈሳሲ ሕክምና፣ ናይ ኦክሲጅን ሓገዝን ካልኦት ዝተጎድኡ ዓበይቲ ኦርጋናትን ምሕጋዝ ድማ የጠቓልል።
en-mt: People are given supportive care, which includes fluid therapy, oxygen assistance and help with other major organ damage.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: CDC እቲ ቫይረስ ከምዘለዎም ዝጥርጥሩ ሰባት ማስክ ክገብሩ ኣለዎም ኢሉ።
en-mt: The CDC said people suspected of having the virus should wear masks.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) ናይ ስርት ምስትንፋስ ውድቀት ኣብ ምፍታሕ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝወዓለ እዩ፣ ዝህቦም ጥቕሚታት ግን ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣብ ግምት ውሽጢ እናኣተዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used in the management of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: ውልቃዊ ጽሬታትን ጥዕንኡ ዝሓለወ መነባብሮን ኣመጋግባን ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምምዕባል ዝምከሩ እዮም።
en-mt: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet are recommended to develop immunity.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: ሓገዝቲ ሕክምናታት ቀለልቲ ምልክታት ኣብ ዘለዎም ሰባት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያታት ምልክታት እዮም ዝጠቕሙ። WHO ን ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሸንን ብኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ሆስፒታል ናይ ዝደቀሱ ሰባት መተሓመሚ መምርሒታት ኣሐቲሞም።
en-mt: Adjuvant treatments are useful in the first signs in people with mild symptoms. The WHO and China's National Health Commission have published treatment guidelines for people hospitalized with COVID-1

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዝርከቡ ተመራመርቲ ሕክምና ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ምንጪታት ዝረኽብዎም ሓበሬታታትን ምኽርታትን ናብ IBCC ብምጥርቓም ብነጻ የቕርቡ።
en-mt: Medical researchers in the United States compile information and advice from a variety of sources and provide it free of charge to the IBCC.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ፣ ንኮቪድ-19 ዝኸውን መድሓኒት የለን።
en-mt: As of April 2020 , there is no cure for COVID-1

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: ንምልክታት፣ ገለ ናይ ሕክምና ሰብ ሞያታት paracetamol (acetaminophen) ኣብ ልዕሊ ibuprofen ከም ናይ መጀመርያ መጥቀሚ መሰመር ገይሮም ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) as a first-line use over ibuprofen.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: ብፍላይ ከም ኢንቲቤሽን ወይ ናይ ኢድ ቬንትሌሽን ዝበሉ ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መሰናድኦ ኤሮሶላት ክፈርዩ ዝኽእሉ ከይዲታት ኣብ ዝስረሐሎም እዋናት ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ምምሕልላፍ ዓቕሚ ንምቕናስ ቅድመ ጥንቃቐታት ክውሰዱ ኣለዎም ።
en-mt: Precautions should be taken to reduce the transmission potential of the virus, especially when processes such as initiation or hand ventilation are used to produce aerosols in health care settings.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: ነቶም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝከናኸኑ ናይ ጥዕና ሰብ ሞያታት፣ እቲ CDC ነቲ ዝሓመመ ሰብ ደረጃ ጽሬት ጥንቃቐታት፣ ናይ ኽንክን ጥንቃቐታትን ናይ ብኣየር ምምሕልላፍ ጥንቃቐታትን ምስ ምጥቃም ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ናይ ብኣየር ዝመሓላለፉ ረኽሲታት መፍለዪ ክፍሊ (AIIR) ከእትውዎ ይመክር። እዚ CDC ኣብ እዚ ናይ እዚ ለበዳ ግዘ እዚ ናይ ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ (PPE) ኣጠቓቕማ መምርሒ ኣውጺኡ እዩ።
en-mt: For health professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends that the sick person be admitted to an airborne infection isolation unit (AIIR) in addition to using standard hygiene precautions, care precautions, and airborne precautions. The CDC has issued guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during this pandemic.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: እቲ ዝምክር ናይ ዓርሰ ምክልኻል ዕጥቂ: PPE ጋውን፣ መተንፈሲ ወይ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ፣ ናይ ዓይኒ መከለኸሊን ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲታትን እዮም። ቅሩባት እንተኾይኖም፣ መተንፈሲታት (ኣብ ክንዲ ናይ ገጽ ማስክታት) ይምረጹ።
en-mt: The recommended self-protection kit is: PPE gown, respirator or face mask, eye protection and medical gloves. If ready, respirators (instead of face masks) are preferred.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: N95 መተንፈሲታት ንኢንዳስትራያል መሰናድኦ ፈቓድ ረኺቦም እዮም ግን FDA እዞም ማስክታት ኣብ ሃንደበታዊ ናይ ፈቓድ ምጥቃም (EUA) ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ እዩ ዝፈቅድ።
en-mt: N95 respirators have been approved for industrial preparation but the FDA allows these masks to be used in an emergency approval use (EUA).

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: እዚኦም ካብ ከም ኣቦራ ዝበሉ ናይ ብኣየር ዝመሓላለፉ ንጥረ ነገራ ንክከላኸሉ ተባሂሎም ዝተነደፉ እዮም፣ ይኹን ደኣምበር፣ ኣብ ዝተወሰኑ ስነ-ሂወታውያን ኤጀንታት ንምጥቃም ዘኽእል ውሕስና የብሎምን።
en-mt: These are designed to protect against airborne particles such as aerosols, however, they are not safe for use in certain biological agents.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: ማስክ ዘይርከበሉ ግዘ፣ CDC ናይ ገጽ መከላኸሊ ወይ፣ ከም ናይ መወዳእታ መማረጺ ድማ ኣብ ገዛ ዝተሰርሑ ማስክታት ክትጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ሜካኒካዊ ቬንትሌሽን ወይ ካልእ መማረጺ ክሳብ ዘድሊ ከበድቲ ኣይኮኑን፣ ዝተወሰኑ ክፋላት ናይ እዞም ጉዳያት ለበዳ ግን ዝደልዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Most COVID-19 outbreak cases are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or other options, but certain parts of these outbreak cases do require it.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: ንኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትፋስ ውድቀት ዘጋጥሞም ሰባት ዘድልዮም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ንዘለዉ ሰባት ብንጥፈት እንዳተጸንዐ ይርከብ፣ ኢንቱቤሽን ንምውጋድ ብልዑል ፍሰት ዘለዎ ናይ ኣፍንጫ ካኑላ ወይ bi-level ፖዘቲቭ ናይ ኣየር መተንፈሲ ጸቕጢ ምውጋድ ይከኣል።
en-mt: The ventilatory assistance needed for people experiencing respiratory failure with COVID-19 is being actively studied for people in hospital, and intubation can be avoided with a high-flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive ventilatory pressure.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: ካብ እዞም ክልተ እዚኦም ንኣዝዮም ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ናብ ተመሳሳሊ ረብሓ ዘምርሑ እንተኾይኖም ክሳብ ሕዚ ኣይተፈለጠን።
en-mt: It is not yet known if either of these leads to similar benefits for severely ill people.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: ገለ ዶክተራት ኢንቫሲቭ ሜካኒካል ቬንትሌሽን ምጥቃም ይመርጹ ቅሩባት እንተኾይኖም ምኽንያቱ እዚ ሜላ እዚ ምስ ልዑል ናይ ኣፈንጫ ውሕዘት ካኑላ ክነጻጸር ከሎ ናይ ኢሮሶል ንጥረ ነገራት ምስርጫው ስለዝቕንስ። ከበድቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ዕድምኦም ዝደፍኡ ሰባት(ልዕሊ 60 ዓመቶም ኣብ ዝኾኑ፣ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ልዕሊ 80 ዓመቶም ሰባት) እዩ መብዛሕትኡ ዝፍጠር ።
en-mt: Some doctors prefer to use invasive mechanical ventilation if they are prepared because this technique reduces the infiltration of aerosol particles compared to a high-flow nasal cannula. Severe epidemic cases occur mostly in older people(over 60, especially people over 80).

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝማዕበሉ ሃገራት ንሕድሕድ ሕሙም እኹል ዝኾነ ናይ ሆስፒታል ዓራት የብሎምን፣ እዚ ድማ ንናይ እቲ ሕክምና ስርዓት ዓቕሚ ብኮቪድ -19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንዝፍጠሩ ከበድቲ ጉዳያት መከናኸኒ ዓቕሙ ክወድቕ ዝገብሮ እዩ።
en-mt: Many developing countries do not have enough hospital beds per patient, which reduces the medical system's ability to care for serious cases caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: ሓደ ኣብ ቻይና ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ከምዝረኸቦ 5% ናብ ጽዑቕ ክትትል ዩኒት ኣትዮም፣ 2.3% ሜካኒካል ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ የድልዮም ኔሩ፣ 1.4% ድማ ሞይቶም እዮም።
en-mt: One study in China found that 5% were admitted to an intensive care unit, 2.3% required mechanical ventilatory assistance, and 1.4% died.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ዳርጋ 30% ዝኾኑ ብኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝነበሩ ሰባት ቀስ እንዳበሉ ናብ ICU ኣትዮም እዮም።
en-mt: In China, nearly 30% of people hospitalized for COVID-19 have slowly been admitted to the ICU.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: ሜካኒካዊ ቬንትሌሽን ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ክምዕብል ከሎ ውስብስብ ይኸውን ኦክሲጅኔሽን እውን ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ይኸውን።
en-mt: Mechanical ventilation becomes complicated when acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes very difficult.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: ናይ ጸቕጢ ቁጽጽርን ልዑል PEEP ዘለዎም ቨንቲሌተራት ናይ ኦክሲጅን ምብጽጻሕ ብምውሳኽ ምስ ቬንትሌተር ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ሳንባ ጉድኣታትን ኒሞቶራክስን ዝቕንሱ እዮም።
en-mt: Pressure control and high PEEP ventilators increase oxygen delivery and reduce ventilator-related lung injury and pneumothorax.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: ልዑል PEEP ኣብ ናይ ቀደም ቨንቲሌተራት ዘይክህሉ ይኽእል።
en-mt: High PEEP may not be present on older ventilators.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: ኣብቶም ክህልዉ ዝኽእሉ ሕክምናታት ዝግበር መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020 ተጀሚሩ፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓታት ድማ ኣብ ክሊኒካላዊ ፈተነታት ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Studies on the potential treatments began in January 2020, and various antiretroviral drugs are in clinical trials.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: Remdesivir(ረምድስቪር) ዝሓሸ ተስፋ ወሃቢ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Remdesivir has been shown to be more promising.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: ዋላ ሓደሽቲ መድሓኒታት ምምዕባል ክሳብ 2021 ክጸንሕ ዝኽኣሉ ይኹኑ፣ መብዛሕትኦም ዝፍተኑ ዘለዉ መድሓኒታት ግን ንካልኦት ጥቕሚታት ፈቓድ ረኺቦም ወይ ኣብ ልዑል ናይ ፈተነ ደረጃ እዮም ዘለዉ።
en-mt: Although development of new drugs could last until 2021, most of the drugs being tested have been approved for other uses or are in advanced trial stages.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: ጸረ ቫይረስ ሕክምና ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዝተረኣዮም ውልቀ ሰባት ክፍተን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Antiviral treatment may be tried in individuals who have developed severe illness.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ኣብ ናይ ገለ መድሓታት ብቑዕነትን ደሕንነትን ውሕስነትን ንምርግጋጽ ኣብ ዝግበር ፈተነ ወለንታዊያን ን ክሳትፍ ሓቲቱ። FDA ንኮንቨልሰንት ፕላዝማ ናይ እቲ ሰብ ህይወት ብከቢድ ወይ ብቐጠታ ኣብ ሓደጋ ኣብ ዝኣትወሉ ግዘ ከም ናይ ፈተነ መድሓኒት ን ክኾን ግዜኣዊ ፈቓድ ሂቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has asked volunteers to participate in trials to ensure the efficacy, safety and security of some medicines. The FDA has temporarily approved convulsant plasma as an experimental drug when the person's life is seriously or directly in danger.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ሕማም ደሕንነቱ ዝሓለወን ኣድማዒን ከምዝኾነ ዘርኢ ክሊኒካላዊ መጸናዕቲ ኣይገበረን።
en-mt: He has not conducted clinical studies to show that the disease is safe and effective.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ ቻይና ናይ እዚ ሕማም ለበዳ ንምቁጽጻር ናይ ሞባይል መተግበሪ ኣላልያ እያ።
en-mt: In February 2020, China introduced a mobile application to control the outbreak.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: ተጠቀምቲ ሽሞምን ናይ ID ቁጽሮምን ከእትዉ ይሕተቱ።
en-mt: Users are prompted to enter their name and ID number.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: እዚ መተግበሪ ናይ ሰርቬላንስ ዳታ ብምጥቃም ናይ ረኽሱ ሓደጋ ኣጋጣሚ ክኸውን ዝኽእል ናይ 'ቀረባ ንኽክእ ' ክፈልጥ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: This application can use surveillance data to determine the risk of infection of a potential 'close contact'

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: ሕድሕድ ተጠቃሚ ናይ ካልኦት ሰለስተ ተጠቀምቲ ኩነታት ክርኢ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Each user can view the status of three other users.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: ሓደጋ ከስዕብ ዝኽእል ኣጋጣሚ እንተተፈጢሩ፣ እዚ መተግበሪ ዓርስኻ ምፍላይ ጥራሕ ዘይኮነ ዝመክር፣ ንከባቢያዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሰበ ስልጣናት እውን ይሕብሮም እዩ። ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፣ ታይዋንን ሲንጋፖርን ኣብ ተንቀሳቓሲ ቴሌፎን ዳታ፡ናይ ገጽ መለለዪ ቴክኖሎጂ፣ ናይ ሞባይል ተሌፎን መድለዪን ኣርቴፊሻል ኢንተለጀንስን ዝርከብ ናይ ቢግ ዳታ ኣናላይቲክስ ፣ ዝተለኸፉ ሰባት ንምእላሽን ዝነኽእዎም ሰባት ንምፍላጥን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ዝውዕል እዩ።
en-mt: If a potentially dangerous incident occurs, the app not only advises self-isolation, but also notifies local health authorities. In South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore, big data analytics in mobile data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and identify their contacts.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020፣ ናይ እስራኤል መንግስቲ ናይ ደሕንነት ኤጀንሲታት ኮሮናቫይረስ ናይ ዘለዎም ሰባት ሞባይል ተሌፎን ዳታ ንኽከታተሉ ፈቒዱሎም እዩ።
en-mt: In March 2020, the Israeli government allowed security agencies to track the mobile phone data of people with the coronavirus.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: እዚ ስጉምቲ ኳረንቲን ንምብርትታዕን ምስ ዝተለኸፉ ዜጋታት ዝተነኻኽኡ ሰባት ንምሕብሓን እዩ ተወሲዱ።
en-mt: The move was taken to strengthen quarantine and to protect people who have been in contact with infected citizens.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች 2020 እውን፣ Deutsche Telekom ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝርጋሐ ንምጽናዕን ንምክልኻልን፣ ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ተሌፎን ቦታታት ዳታ ንጀርመን ፌደራላዊ ኤጀንሲ፣ Robert Koch ትካል፣ ኣካፊልዎም።
en-mt: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared general telephone location data with the German federal agency, the Robert Koch Institute, to study and prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: ሩስያ ኳረንቲ ሴሮም ዝወጹ ሰበት ንምልላይ ናይ ገጽ መለለዪ ቴክኖሎጂ ናብ ስራሕ ኣእቲያ ኣላ።
en-mt: Russia has deployed facial recognition technology to identify those who have left the quarantine serum.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: ናይ ጣልያን ክልላዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽነር ጁሊዮ ጋሌራ ብሞባይል ተሌፎን አፕሬተራት "40% ዝኾኑ ሰባት ምንቅስቓሶም ቀጺሎም " ከምዘለዉ ከምዝተሓበረ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Italy's regional health commissioner Giulio Galera said mobile phone operators had reported that "40 percent of people continued to move.

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: መንግስቲ ጀርመን ልዕሊ 42,000 ተሳተፍቲ ዝተዓደምሉ ናይ 48 ሰዓታት ሃካቶን ኣካይዱ።
en-mt: The German government held a 48-hour hackathon to which more than 42,000 participants were invited.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: ናይ Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid ፕረዚዳንት፣ ኣንጻር ኮሮናይረስ ዝኸውን ዓለምለኻዊ ፈጠራዊ መፍትሒ ክፍጠር ጻውዒት የቕርቡ።
en-mt: Estonia's President Kersti Kaljulaid calls for an innovative global solution to the coronavirus.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: ውልቀሰባት ኣብ ኳረንቲን፣ ናይ ጉዕዞ እገዳታት፣ ጎድናዊ ጸገማትን ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ፍርሒ ንባዕሉ ጭንቀት ከሕድረሎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Individuals may be anxious about quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects and the fear of the infection itself.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: BBC ሮርይ ኦኮኖር ኢሉዎ ኣብ ዝበሎ "ማሕበራዊ ተነጽሎ፣ ጽምዋ፣ጥዕናዊ ጭንቀት፣ ኣዕምሮኣዊ ውጥረትን ኢኮኖሚካዊ ውድቀትን እንትበዝሕ፣ ንናይ ሰባት ስነ ኣእምሮኣዊ ጥዕናን ደሕነነት ዝጎድኡ ነገራት እዮም"።
en-mt: BBC Rory O'Connor said that "social isolation, loneliness,health anxiety, mental stress and economic decline are things that are detrimental to people's mental health and well-being"

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ካልኦት ልሙዳት ከም ሰዓል ዝበሉ ናይ ላዕለዋይ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ሕማማት ብዝምስል መልክዑ ዝተወሰኑ ምልክታት ክህልውዎ ይኽእሉ ወይ ምንም ምልክታት ዘይከርኢ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The disease may have certain symptoms or no symptoms that mimic other common upper respiratory illnesses such as the common cold.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: ቀለልቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ውሽጢ ክልተ ሰሙናት ይሓውዩ፣ እቶም ከቢድ ወይ ኣስጋኢ ሕማም ዘለዎም ግን ንክሓውዩ ካብ ሰለስተ ክሳብ ሽድሽተ ሰሙናት ይወስደሎም እዩ።
en-mt: Mild cases of outbreaks recover within two weeks, but those with severe or dangerous illnesses take three to six weeks to recover.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: ካብ ከም SARS ን MERS ን ዝበሉ፣ ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ሓበሬታ ዝተማልእ ኣይኮነን፣ ካልኦት ተመሳሰልቲ ቫይረሳት ዝተወሰደ ሓበሬታ ከምዘርእዮ፣ ጥኑሳት ኣንስቲ ንናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከቢድ ረኽሲ ተጋለጽቲ እየን። ኣብ ገለ ሰባት፣ ኮቪድ-19 ን ሳንቡእ ብምጥቃዕ ናይ ሳንቡእ ወቕዒ ከሰዕብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Data from other similar viruses, such as SARS and MERS, are incomplete. Data from other similar viruses show that pregnant women are more susceptible to severe infection. In some people, COVID-19 can attack the lungs and cause a pneumonia.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: ኣብ እዞም ብከቢድ ዝተሃሰዩ፣ ኮቪድ-19 ብቕልጡፍ ናብ ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ብምዕባይ ናብ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ውድቀት፣ ሰፕቲክ ሾክ ወይ ናብ ናይ ብዙሓት ኣካላት ሰብነት ውደቀት ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In these severely affected, COVID-19 can rapidly progress to severe respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) leading to respiratory failure, septic shock or multiorgan failure.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: እቶም ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተተሓሓዙ ዝኸፍኡ ጽልዋታት ሰፕሲስ፣ ዘይስሩዕ ደም ምርጋእን ናይ ልቢ፣ ኩላሊትን ጉበትን ጉድኣትን ዝጠቓለሉ እዮም።
en-mt: The worst effects associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, irregular blood clots and heart, kidney and liver damage.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: ናይ ደም ምርጋእ ዘይንቡር ኣጋጣሚታት፣ ብፍላይ ናይ ፕሮትሮምቢን ምውሳኽ፣ ኣብቶም ብ ኮቪድ-19 ምኽንያት ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝደቀሱ 6% ሰባት ተራእዩ፣ ዘይንቡር ናይ ኩሊት ተግባር እውን ኣብ 4% ናይ እዞም ጉጅለ ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Blood clotting abnormalities, especially increased prothrombin, were observed in 6% of people hospitalized for COVID-19, and abnormal renal function was also observed in 4% of these groups.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: ዳርጋ ካብ 20-30% ዝኾኑ ብኮቪድ -19 ዝተተሓዙ ሰባት ልዑል ናይ ጸሊም ከበዲ ኤንዛይማት (ትራንሳሚኔዝ) ኣርእዮምእዮም።
en-mt: Almost 20-30% of people infected with COVID-19 have shown elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: ብመሰረት ተመሳሳሊ ጸብጻብ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ምልክታት ዝረኣዩሉ መዓልቲን ሞትን ዘሎ ኣፈላላይ ዓሰርተ መዓልቲ እዩ፣ ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዝጽንሑሉ መዓልቲ እዩ።
en-mt: According to the same report, the difference between the day of symptoms and death is ten days, five days of hospitalization.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ እቶም ናብ ICU ዝተዘዋወሩ ሕሙማት ካብ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ደቂሶም ምሕካም ዝጀመሩሉ ስጋብ ሞት ብማእኸላይ ሸውዓተ መዓልቲታት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: However, patients transferred to the ICU have an average of seven days from hospitalization to death.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያታት መጽናዕቲ፣ ናይ መጀመርያ ምልክታት ድሕሪ ምርኣይ ክሳብ ሞት ዘሎ ግዘ 14 መዓልቲታት እዩ፣ ካብ ሽድሽተ ክሳብ 41 መዓልቲታት ግን ክኾን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In early studies, the time from the first symptoms to death is 14 days, but it can range from six to 41 days.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: ብ National Health Commission (NHC) (ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን) ዝተገበረ ጽንዓት፣ ሰብኡት ናይ 2.8% ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እንትህልዎም ኣንስቲ ድማ 1.7% ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እዩ ዘለወን።
en-mt: According to a study by the National Health Commission (NHC), men have a comparative mortality rate of 2.8% and women have a comparative mortality rate of 1.7%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: ናይ ዝሞተ ሰብ ሳንባ ናይ ሂስቶፓቶሎጂካል ምርመራታት ናሙናታት ዲፊዩዝ ኣልቪዮላር ጉድኣት ኣብ ክልቲኦም ሳንባታት ድማ ፋይብሮሜክሶይድ ኤክሱዴታት ሒዞም ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Histopathologic examinations of the lungs of a deceased subject contained samples of diffuse alveolar damage and fibromexoid exudates in both lungs.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: ቫይራል ሳይቶ ፓቲክ ለውጢታት ኣብ ኒሞሳይታት ተራይኦም እዮም።
en-mt: Viral cytopathic changes are their role in pneumocytes.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: እዚ ናይ ሳንባ ስእሊ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዲስትረስ ሲንድረም (ARDS) ይመስል።
en-mt: This lung picture looks like acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: ኣብ 11.8% ብናይ ቻይና ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን ጸብጻብ ዝተገበሩ ሞታት፣ ናይ ልቢ ጉድኣት ብናይ ትሮፖኒን ምልዓል ወይ ናይ ልቢ ምዕራፍ ዝመጹ እዮም።
en-mt: In 11.8% of deaths reported by the Chinese Health Commission, cardiac damage was caused by troponin elevation or cardiac arrest.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: ካብ ሕቡራት መንግስቲታት ኣሜሪካ ዝወጹ ናይ ማርች ዳታታት ብዝብልዎ መሰረት፣ 89% እቶም ደቂሶም ዝሕከሙ ዘለዉ ሰባት ቅድሚኡ ካልእ ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ዝነበሮም እዮም። ናይ ሕክምናዊ ምንጪታትን ሶሽዮኢኮኖሚክ ዓቕሚን ንበዝሒ ሞት ይጸልዉ እዮም።
en-mt: According to March data from the United States, 89% of people being treated for insomnia have previously had other health conditions. Medical sources and socioeconomic capacity affect mortality.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: ብ ሰንኪ ክልላዊ ፍልልያትን ከምኡውን ብሜትዶሎጂካል ፍልልይ እዚ ናይ ዝሞቱ በዝሒ ግምታት ዝተፈላለዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Due to regional and methodological differences, these death toll estimates vary.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: ነቶም ቀለልቲ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ብኣግባቡ ዘይምቑጻር ናይ እቲ ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ካብ እቲ ዝተገመተ ንላዕሊ ክገብሮ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Not counting the simple epidemic cases significantly could make the comparative mortality rate higher than estimated.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: ይኹን እምበር ሕጂ ዝረኣዩ ሞት ናይ ዝጸንሑ ሕሙማን ብምዃኖም ናይ ሕጂ መጠን ሞት ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ኣይግልጹን
en-mt: However, current deaths are of established patients and do not fully reflect current mortality rates

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: ሽጋራ መትከኽቲ 1.4 ግዘ ከቢድ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምልክታት ናይ ምርኣይ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎም ዳርጋ 2.4 ግዘ ጽዑቕ ክትትል የድልዮም እዩ፣ ወይ ድማ ምስ ዘየትክኹ ክነጻጸሩ ከለዉ ክሞቱ ዝኽእሉ እዮም። ብዛዕባ ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘ ናይ እቲ ሕማም ሳዕቤን ስግኣታት ነይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: Smokers are 1.4 times more likely to develop severe symptoms of COVID-19, nearly 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care, or to die compared to nonsmokers. There were concerns about the long-term effects of the disease.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: ናይ ሆንግ ኮንግ ሆስፒታላት ምምሕዳር ኣብቶም ካብ እቲ ሕማም ዝሓውዩ ሰባት 20% ክሳብ 30% ዝኸውን ናይ ሳንባ ዓቕሚ ምውራድ ረኺቡ፣ ናይ ሳንባ ስካናት ድማ ናይ ሰብነት ኣካላት ዕንወት ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: The Hong Kong hospital administration found a 20% to 30% drop in lung capacity in those recovering from the disease, and lung scans showed organ damage.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ምሕዋይ፣ ናብ ድሕሪ-ጽኑዕ ክትትል ሲንድረም ከምርሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: This may lead to post-intensive follow-up syndrome, after recovery.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: ስጋብ ማርች 2020፣ ዝሓለፉ ረኽሲታት ንጡፍን ናይ ነዊሕ ግዘን ናይ ሰብነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ክፈጥሩ ይኽኣሉ ኣይኽኣሉ ኣይፍለጥን እዩ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, it is not known whether past infections can produce active and long-term immunity.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: በቶም ካልኦት ኮሮናቫይረሳት ባህርይ መሰረት ዝገበሩ፣ በዚ ሕማም ዘይምጥቓዕ ተኸእሎታት ኣለዉ እዮም፣ ካብ ኮቨድ-19 ዝሓወዩ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ድሕሪ ግዘ ብ ናይ ኮረናቫይረስ ፖዘቲቭ ውጽኢት ዝተዓጀቡ ምዃኖም ዘርእዩ ጸብጻባት ወጺኦም እዮም።
en-mt: Based on the behavior of the other coronaviruses, there are reports that cases of recovery from COVID-19 are later accompanied by positive results.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: እዞም ኬዛት ናይ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝጸንሐ ረኽሲ ምግዳድ እምበር ዳግም በቲ ረኽሲ ምትሓዝ ኣይኮኑን ተባሂሉ ይእመን።
en-mt: These cases are believed to be exacerbations of an existing infection, not reinfection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ተፈጥሮኣዊን ብመንገዲ ካብኡ ዝወሓዘ ረኽሲ ናይ እንስሳ መበቆል ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ ይሕሰብ።
en-mt: The virus is thought to have natural and animal origin through infection.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: ትኽክለኛ መበቆሉ ኣይፍለጥን፣ ኣብ ዲሰምበር 2019 ግን ናይ እቲ ረኽሲ ዝርጋሐ ዳርጋ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ዝተመሓላለፈ እዩ።
en-mt: The exact origin is unknown, but in December 2019 the spread of the infection was almost entirely human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020 ኣብ The Lancet ዝተሓተመ ኣብቶም ናይ መጀመርያ ዝተረጋጋጹ 41 ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ጉዳያት ለበዳ ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ፣ ጀሚሩ ዘሎ ናይ እቶም ምልክታት ዝተርኣዩሉ መጀመሪ ዕለት 1 ዲሰምበር 2019 ከም ዝኾነ ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: A study of the first 41 confirmed cases of COVID-19, published in The Lancet in January 2020, showed that the onset of symptoms began on December 1,

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: ካብ WHO ዝወጹ ዕላዊ ሕታማት ነቶም ቀዲሞም ዝተርኣዩ ምልክታት ኣብ 8 ዲሰምበር 2019 ጸብጺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: Official publications from WHO reported the earliest symptoms on 8 December

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ናይ ሞት በዝሒ ንምቑጻር ብዙሓት ስጉምቲታት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are many steps to counting deaths.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽሪታት እዚኦም በቢ ክልሉን በቢ ግዜኡን ይፈላለዩ እዮም፣ ብ ናይ ምርመራ በዝሒ፣ ናይ ስርዓት ጥዕና ክንክን ጽፈት፣ ናይ ሕክምና መማረጺታት፣ ካብ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ለበዳ ዘጋጠመሉ ግዘ ዘሎ ግዘን ናይ እቲ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ባህርያትን ንኣብነት ከም ዕድመ፣ ጾታን ሓፈሻዊ ጥዕናንን ይጽሎ እዩ።
en-mt: These numbers vary from region to region and from time to time, influenced by testing rates, health care system efficiency, treatment options, time since the first outbreak and population characteristics such as age, gender and overall health.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: ኣብ 2019 መወዳእታታት፣ WHO ናይ ሃንደበታዊ ICD-10 ሕማም ኮዳት ሂቡ፣ U07.1 ንካብ ብ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጹ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ዘጋጠመ ሞት፣ U07.2 ድማ ብዘይ ናይ ቤተ ፈተነ ዝተረጋገጸ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ረኽሲ ብክሊኒካላዊ ወይ ኢፒደሞሎጂያዊ መንገዲ ብኮቪድ-19 ንዝሞቱ ሰባት። እዚ ካብ ሞት-ናብ- ጉዳያት ለበዳ ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ዝሞቱ ሰባት በዝሒ ብዝተረጋገጹ ጉዳያት ለበዳ ኣብ ዝተወሃበ ግዘ ክካፈል ከሎ ዝብል እዩ ዘርኢ።
en-mt: By the end of 2019, WHO assigned sudden ICD-10 disease codes, U07.1 for deaths from laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infections, and U07.2 for deaths without laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infections by clinical or Epidemiological pathways for people who died from COVID-1 This shows the death-to- epidemic cases comparative rate when the number of deaths is divided by the number of confirmed epidemic cases in a given period.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ Johns Hopkins University ስታትስቲክስ፣ ካብ 17 ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ዓለምለኻዊ ናይ ጉዳይት ለበዳ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) እዩ።
en-mt: According to Johns Hopkins University statistics, as of April 17, 2020, the global case epidemic comparative death rate is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191).

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: እዚ ቁጽሪ በቢ ክልሉ ይፈላለ እዩ። ካልኦት ስጉምቲታት ናይ ኬዝ ሞት ሬት (CFR) የካትት፣ በቲ ሕማም ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ሚእታዊ ዘንጸባርቕ፣ ናይቲ ረኽሲ ናይ ሞት ሬት (IFR) ሓዊሱ፣ ናይ ዝተለኸፉን በቲ ሕማም ናይ ዝሞቱን ሰባት ሚእታዊ የንጸባርቕ (ተመርመሩን ዘይተመርመሩን)።
en-mt: This number varies by region. Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percentage of people who died of the disease, including the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percentage of people infected and who died of the disease (diagnosed and undiagnosed).

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽራዊ መረዳእታታት እዚኦም ብግዘ ዝተገደቡ ኣይኩኑን፣ ብዝሓወየ ጉዳይ ለበዳ ገለ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ይኽተል።ጉዳይ ለበዳ ኣነጺርካ ብምርኣይ ረኽሲ ዝርከብ በዝሒ ህዝቢ ዝስዕቡ እዮም።
en-mt: These numerical data are not time-limited, followed by a recovered outbreak.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: ኩሎም ዝተጠቕዑ ሰባት ሕማም ስለዘየማዕብሉ፣ ናይ ኣንቲቦዲታት ምህላው ብዛዕባ ክንደይ ሰባት ተኣኪቦም ዝብል ሓበሬታ ከቕርብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Since not all affected people develop disease, the presence of antibodies can provide information about how many people have gathered.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: ኣብ ጣልያን ናይ መጀመርታ ማዕከል እዚ ለበዳ ዝኾንት ግዝኣት ካብ 4600 ዝኾኑ ነበርቲ 80 (1.7%) ሞይቶም።
en-mt: In Italy, the first epicenter of the outbreak, 80 (1.7%) of the 4,600 inhabitants died.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: ኣብ ጋንግለት፣ እቲ ሕማም ብናይ ካርኒቫል ፌስቲቫል ምኽንያት አዩ ተላቢዑ፣ ናብ መናእሰይ እዩ ድማ ክላባዕ ክኢሉ በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ ውሑድ ሞት እዩ ኣጋጢሙ፣ ኩሎም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሞት ድማ ከምዚ ተባሂሎም ክፍለዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: In Ganglet, the disease spread because of the carnival festival, and it was able to spread to young people and as a result there were fewer deaths, and not all COVID-19 deaths should be distinguished as such.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፣ ናይ ጀርመን ጥዕና ስርዓት ካብ ዓቕሙ ንላዕሊ ብዝኾነ ዋሕዚ ኣይተውሓጠን።
en-mt: In addition, the German health system was not overwhelmed.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: ኣብ ኔዘርላንድስ፣ ብመሰረት ኣብ ደም ለገስቲ ዝተገበረ ዳህሳስ 3% ዝኾኑ ኣንቲቦዲታት ክህልዎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In the Netherlands, 3% of donors may have antibodies according to blood surveys.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 ሰባት (0.004% ናይ እቲ በዝሒ ህዝቢ) ብኮቪድ-19 ከምዝሞተ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ።
en-mt: 69 people (0.004% of the population) have died of COVID-1

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ለበዳ እዚ ጽልዋን ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠኑን ኣብ ደቂ-ተባዕትዮን ደቂ-ኣንስትዮን ዝተፈላለየ እዩ።
en-mt: The impact of this epidemic and its comparative mortality rate are different in men and women.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: ብመሰረት ኣብ ቻይናን ጣልያንን ዝተገበረ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣብ ሰብኡት ይበዝሕ።
en-mt: According to studies in China and Italy, the mortality rate is higher in men.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: ሰብኡት ናይ እቲ ዝዓበየ ናይ ተጋላጽነ ዕድመኦም ኣብ 50 ታት ዓመቶም እዩ፣ ኣብ መንጎ ኣንስቲን ሰብኡትን ዘሎ ኣፈላላይ ድማ 90 ጥራሕ እዩ።
en-mt: Men have their peak vulnerability in their 50s, and the difference between women and men is only

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፣ ናይ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን ንሰብኡት 2.8 ሚእታዊ እንትኸውን ንኣንስትዮ ድማ 1.7 ሚእታዊ እዩ።
en-mt: In China, the comparative mortality rate is 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: ናይ እዚ ጾታ ፍልልይ ትኽክለኛ ምኽንያቱ ኣይተፈለጠን፣ ናይ ዘርኡን ባህሪያውን ምኽንያታት ግን ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: The exact cause of this sex difference is unknown, but racial and behavioral factors are possible.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: ጾታ መሰረት ዝገበረ ናይ ሰበነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ኣፈላላያት፣ ኣብ ኣንስቲ ዘሎ ትሑት ሽፋን ምትካኽ፣ከም በዝሒ ደም ዝኣመሰሉ፣ በዝሒ ተደረብቲ ሕማማት ኣብ ሰብኡት ምብዝሖም፣ ንናይ ሰብኡት ብበዝሒ ሞት ንጽጽራዊ መጠን እጃም ኣበርኪቱ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Gender-based differences in immunity to severe disease, low smoking coverage in women, and higher rates of comorbidities such as high blood pressure in men may have contributed to the comparatively high mortality rate in men.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: ኣብ ኣውሮፓ፣ 57% ዝተለኸፉ ውልቀ ሰባት ሰብኡት እንትኾኑ 72% ናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝሞቱ ሰባት እውን ሰብኡት እዮም።
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of infected individuals are men and 72% of deaths from COVID-19 are also men.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ፣ ናይ ኣሜሪካ መንግስቲ ምስ ጾታ ዝተተሓሓዙ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ረኽሲታት ሓበሬታ ኣይከታተልን እዩ ዘሎ።
en-mt: As of April 2020, the US government is no longer tracking information on sexually transmitted infections.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: መጽናዕቲታት ቫይራል ሕማማት ከም ኢቦላ፣ HIV፣ ኢንፍሉዌንዛን SARS ንሰብኡትን ኣንስቲን ብዝተፈላለዩ መገዲ እዮም ዘጥቅዑ።
en-mt: Studies Viral diseases such as Ebola, HIV, influenza, and SARS affect men and women differently.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: ልዑል ክፋል ናይ ጥዕና ሰራሕተኛታት፣ ብፍላይ ነርስታት፣ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ እየን፣ ናብ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምቅላዕ ዕድሎም ድማ ልዑል እዩ።
en-mt: A high proportion of health workers, especially nurses, are women and are at high risk of exposure to the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: ትካል ዓለም ጥዕና ኣብ ጥሪ 11,2020 ናይዚ ሕማም መጸውዒ ሽም "COVID-19" እዩ ኢሉ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization declared the disease's nickname "COVID-19" on January 11,2

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: ናይ ውደብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ሓላፊ ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ገብረየሱስ፣ CO ኮሮና ዝውክል እንትኸውን ፣ VI ድማ ናይ ቫይረስ፣ D ድማ ሕማም ማለት ከምዝኾነ ኣብራህሪሆም፣ 19 ድማ እቲ ለበዳ መጀመርያ ዝተፈለጠሉ ዓመተ ምህረት የመላኽት: 31 ዲሰምበር 2019።
en-mt: World Health Organization(WHO) chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO represents coronavirus , VI stands for virus, D stands for disease, and 19 indicates the year the outbreak was first detected: 31 December

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: እዚ ሽም ናይ እንስሳት ዓሌት ወይ ናይ ሰባት ጉጅለ፣ ሽም እንተውጽእ ኣድልዎ ኣብ ምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ክኸውን ዝብል ዓለምለኻዊ ምኽሪታት መሰረት ብምግባር ንፍሉይ ጂኦግራፊያዊ ቦታ ከይገልጽ ተባሂሉ እዩ ተዋሂብዎ (ንኣብነት፣ ቻይና) ። እቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ከቢድ ህጹጽ ናይ ስርዓተ ምትንፋስ ሲንድረም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) እዩ ዝበሃል።
en-mt: This name of an animal species or group of people was given to it so as not to describe a specific geographical location (e.g., China) based on international recommendations that the name should be aimed at preventing discrimination. The virus that causes COVID-19 is called Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: WHO(ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም) ብተወሳኺ ን"ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ቫይረስ" ን "ንኮቪድ-19 ዘምጽእን ቫይረስ" ዝብሉ ኣገላልጻታት ኣብ ህዝባዊ መግለጺታት ይጠቀመሎም ኣሎ።
en-mt: The WHO(World Health Organization) is also using the terms "COVID -19 virus" and "virus that causes COVID-19" in public statements.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: ክልቲኦም እቲ ሕማምን እቲ ቫይረስን "ኮሮናቫይረስ" ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ።
en-mt: Both the disease and the virus are called "coronaviruses.

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ውሃን፣ቻይና ናይ መጀመርያ ለበዳ ግዘ፣ እቲ ሕማምን ቫይረስን ብሓባር "ኮሮናቫይረስ" ከምኡውን "ውሃን ኮሮናቫይረስ " ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ ነይሮም።
en-mt: During the first outbreak of Wuhan,China, the disease and virus were collectively referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: ኣብ ጃንዋሪ 2020፣ ነቲ ናይ 2015 ኣብ ናይ እቲ ሕማምን ቫይረስን ሽም ቦታታት ምጥቃም ዘይፍቀድ እዩ ዝብል መምርሒ መሰረት ብምግባር፣ ውደብ ጥዕና ዓለም(WHO) ናይ 2019-nCov ን 2019-nCoV ከቢድ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም ናይ እቲ ቫይረስን ሕማም ዝብሉ ግዜያዊ መጸውዒ ሽማት ክኾኑ መኺሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In January 2020, based on the 2015 guidelines on the prohibition of use in the disease and virus namespaces, the World Health Organization(WHO) will become the provisional designations for 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV severe respiratory disease of the virus and disease He has advised.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ን SARS-CoV-2 ን ዕላዊ ሽማት ኣብ 11 ፌብሩዋሪ 2020 እዮም ዕላዊ ተገይሮም።
en-mt: The official names for COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were announced on February 11,

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ኣብ እቲ ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ኣቕርቦት ሰንሰለት ዘሎ ናይ ዓቕሚ ሕጽረት፣ ገለ ዲጂታል መፍረይቲ ከም ናይ ኣፍንጫ ስዋባትን ናይ ቨንትሌተር ኣካላትን ዝበሉ ናይ ጥዕና ናውቲታት ኣብ ምሕታም ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Due to capacity constraints in the standardized supply chain, some digital manufacturers are printing health kits such as nasal swabs and ventilator components.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ ኣብነት፣ ናይ ጣልያን ሆስፒታል ብህጹጽ ቬንትሌተር ቫልቭ ከድልዮ ከሎ፣ እቲ መቕረባይ ድማ ኣብቲ ዝተበሃሎ ናይ ግዘ ገደብ ከቕርብ ብዘይምኽኣሉ፣ ናይ እቲ ከባቢ ጀማሪ ብግልባጥ ምህንድስና እቲ ዘድሊ 100 ቫልቭ ኣብ ሓደ ለይቲ ሰሪሑ ወዲኡ።
en-mt: In one example, an Italian hospital urgently needed ventilator valves, and the supplier failed to deliver them on time, so a local startup reverse-engineered the required 100 valves overnight.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: ድሕሪ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኮቪድ -19 ለበዳ፣ ብዛዕባ መበቆሉ፣ ስኬሉ፣ ምክልኻል መገዱ፣ መድሓኒትን ካልኦት ናይ እቲ ሕማም ኣካላትን ናይ ሴራ ስነ-ሓሳባት፣ ጌጋ ሓበሬታታትን ናይ ሓሶት ሓበሬታታትን ብቕልጡፍ ኣብ ኦንላይን ክሰራጨዉ ጸኒሖም።
en-mt: After the first outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and false information about its origin, scale, defense mechanism, drugs and other components of the disease have been spreading rapidly online.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ነቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እንስሳት ከመሓላልፍዎ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Humans can transmit the virus to animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሓሰማ፣ ማይ ደርሆን ምብዛሕ ንምኽኣሉ እቲ መጽናዕቲ መረዳእታ ክረክብ ኣይከኣለን።
en-mt: The study could not find data on the replication of the virus in pigs and poultry.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: ነዚ ሕማም ንምሕካም ዝተፈቐደ መድሓኒት ኮነ ክትባት የለን።
en-mt: There is no approved drug or vaccine to treat this disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝግበሩ ናይ ክትባታትን መድሓታትን ዓለምለኻዊ መጽናዕቲ ብመንግስታዊ ትካላትን፣ ኣካዳሚካዊ ጉጅለታትን ናይ ኢንዳስትሪ መጽናዕቲን እንዳተኻየደ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Global research on vaccines and drugs is being conducted by government agencies, academic groups and industry research.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: ኣብ ማርች፣ ናይ ዓለም ጥዕና ድርጅት ናይ "SOLIDARITY Trial" ናይዞም ዘለዉ ኣርባዕተ ጸረ ቫይረስ ኮምፓውንድታት ልዑል ተስፋ ይህቡ ምስ ምህላዎም ፈተነታት ጀሚሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In March, the World Health Organization launched a "SOLIDARITY Trial" of these four existing antiviral compounds with high promise.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: ክትባተ የብሉን ግን፣ ዝተፈላለዩ ኤጀንሲታት ናይ ክትባት ሕጹያት ብንቕሓት የማዕብሉ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: It should not be vaccinated however, various agencies are consciously developing vaccine candidates.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: ቅድም ክብል ኣብ SARS-CoV ዝተኻየዱ ስራሕቲ፣ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ይውዕሉ ኣለው እዚ ድማ SARS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2ን ክልቲኦም ናብ ናይ ሰብ ዋህዮ ንምእታው ACE2 ተቐባሊ ዝጥቀሙ ብምዃኖም እዩ።
en-mt: Previous work on SARS-CoV, is being utilized due to the fact that SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: ሰለስተ ናይ ክትባት ሜላታት ኣብ ምርመረ ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Three vaccine techniques are under investigation.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: መጀመርታ፣ ተመራመርቲ ሙሉእ ናይ ቫይረስ ክትባት ክሰርሑ እዮም ዝፍትኑ ዘለዉ።
en-mt: First, researchers are trying to develop a complete virus vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: ከምዚ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ምጥቃም፣ ዘይንጡፍ ይኹን ምውት፣ ናይ ደቂ ሰብ ሰውነት ነዚ ሓድሽ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ንምምዕባል ዕላማ ዝገበረ እዩ።
en-mt: The use of such viruses, whether inactive or dead, is aimed at developing the human body's ability to fight off the new COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: ካልኣይ ስትራቴጂ፣ ክፋል ዩኒት ክትባታት፣ነቲ ናይ ሰበነት ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ስርዓት ን ዝተወሰኑ ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ዩኒት ክፋላት ክነቓቓሕ ንምግባር ዝዓለመ እዩ።
en-mt: The second strategy, fractional unit vaccines, aims to stimulate the immune system for certain unit fractions of the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: ኣብ እዚ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ጉዳይ ለበዳ፣ ከምዚ ዓይነት መጽናዕቲ ኣብ S-spike ፕሮቲን ነቲ ቫይረስ ናብ እቲ ACE2 ኢንዛይም ተቐባሊ ንክኣቱ ዝሕግዝ ትኹረት ዝገበረ እዩ።
en-mt: In this SARS-CoV-2 case epidemic, such studies have focused on the S-spike protein that facilitates entry of the virus into the ACE2 enzyme receptor.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: እቲ ሳልሳይ ሜላ ድማ ናይ ኒዩክሊክ ኣሲድ ክትባታት እዮም (DNA ወይ RNA ክትባታት፣ ሓድሽ ናይ ክትባት ምፍጣር ቴክኒክ)።
en-mt: The third technique are nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a new vaccine generation technique).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: ካብዞም ዘዴታት ውሽጢ ናይ ሙከራ ኽትባት ንደሕንነትን ሓቅነትን ብፈተነታት ክሓልፉ ኣለዎም። ብኣቆጻጽራ ኣውሮፓ ኣብ መጋቢት 16፣ 2020 እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ክትባት ብኣርባዕተ ፈቓደኛ ሰባት ኣብ ሲያትል ተጀሚሩ።
en-mt: Within these methods, experimental vaccines must undergo testing for safety and validity. On March 16, 2020, the first vaccination was launched by four volunteers in Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
