targetString: እዚ ክትባትካብ እቲ ነቲ ሕማም ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ ዝቐድሖ ዘይጎድእ ጀኒቲክ ኮድ ኣለዎ። ብኣንቲቦዲ ዝድገፍ ምምሕያሽ ኣብ ናይ SARS-COV-2 ክትባት ምዕባለ ዝተመኸረ ነገር እዩ፣ እንተኾነ ግን እዚ እውን መዘራረቢ እዩ።
en-mt: This vaccine contains a harmless genetic code that is copied by the virus that causes the disease. Antibody-promoted modification is something that has been recommended in SARS-COV-2 vaccine development, but this is also moot.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: ካብ ኣፐሪል 2020 ጀሚሮም፣ ልዕሊ 300 ንጡፋት ክሊኒካል ፈተነታት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ እዮም።
en-mt: Since April 2020, more than 300 active clinical trials are underway.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: ኣብ hydroxychloroquine(ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኲን) ወይ chloroquine(ክሎሮኲን) ዝገበሩ መጽናዕቲታት ሓዊሱ፣ ሸውዓተ ፈተነታት ዓሶ ንምሕካም ፈቓድ ዘለዎም መድሓኒታት ይፍትኑ ነይሮም።
en-mt: Eight trials were testing drugs licensed to treat tuberculosis, including studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: ዳግም ንካልእ ዐላማ ዝተዳለወ ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሓኒት መብዛሕትኡ ናይ ቻይና መጽናዕቲ ዝሓዘ እዩ፣ ምስ ትሽዓተ ፌዝ III ናይ remdesivir ፈተነታት ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ሃገራት ኣብ ናይ ኣፕሪል መወዳእታ ዝወጸ ሪፖርት ከምዘርእዮ።
en-mt: Repurposed antiviral drugs account for most of the Chinese research, with nine Phase III trials of remdesivir in various countries shown in a report released in late April.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: ካብ ኣፕሪል 2020 ጀሚሩ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክትባት ምዕባለን ዝተመረጹ መድሓኒታትን ዓብዪ ገምጋም ተኻይዱ እዩ ። remdesivir(ሬምደስቪር)፣ chloroquine(ክሎሮኲን) ን hydroxychloroquine(ሃይድሮክስይክሎሮኲን) ን፣ lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ከምኡውን lopinavir/ritonavir(ሎፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር) ምስ interferon beta(ኢንተርፈሮን ቤታ) ሓዊሱ ዝተፈላለዩ ጸረ- ቫይረስ መድሓኒታት ንናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምርመራ ገምጋም ይግበሮም ኣሎ ።
en-mt: Since April 2020, a major evaluation of the development of COVID-19 vaccines and selected drugs has been conducted. Various antivirals including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir with interferon beta Drugs for COVID-1 They are undergoing an investigation and assessment.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: ካብ ማርች 2020 ጀሚሩ ናይ remdesivir ብቕዑነት ዘርኢ ዝተወሰነ መረዳእታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: As of March 2020, there is some data on the efficacy of remdesivir.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ ምምሕያሻት ኣብ ቀሊል ናይ remdesivir(ሬምደስቪር) መድሓኒት ኣብ ዝተፈተነሎም ሰባት ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Clinical improvements have been seen in people who have been tried on a simple dose of remdesivir(remdesivir).

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: ፌዝ III ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ኣብ US፣ ቻይናን ጣልያንን ይካየዱ ኣለዉ። Chloroquine፣ ዓሶ ንምሕካም ዝጠቅም ዝነበረ መድሓኒት፣ ኣብ ቻይና መጽናዕቲ ተገይሩሉ ኣብ ፌብሩዋሪ 2020፣ናይ መጀመርታ ውጽኢት ድማ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Phase III clinical trials are underway in the US, China and Italy. Chloroquine, a drug used to treat tuberculosis, was studied in China in February 2020,and showed first results.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ ናይ እቲ መጽናዕቲ ገምጋም ኣድለይቲ እዮም።
en-mt: However, the evaluation of the study are necessary.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: ናይ ኮርያን ቻይናን ናይ ጥዕና ሓለፍቲ chloroquine ምጠቃም ይመኽሩ።
en-mt: Korean and Chinese health officials recommend the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፣ Wuhan Institute of Virology (ናይ ውሃን ቫይሮሎጂ ትካል)፣ ናይ ሓደ ግራም መዓልታዊ ዶዝ ዝመክር እንትኸውን፣ ናይ እዚ ዶዝ ክልተ ምውሳድ ግን ኣዝዩ ሓደገኛ ከምዝኾነን ክቐትል እውን ከምዝኽእል ሓቢሩ እዩ።
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology recommends a daily dose of one gram, but two doses of this dose are very dangerous and can be fatal.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ 28 መጋቢት 2020፣ FDA ናይ hydroxychloroquineን chloroquineን ንኮቪድ-19 ንታሓከምቲ ዝሐክሙ ዘለዉ ሓካይም ኣብ እዋን ህጹጽ ረድኤት ክጥቀሙ ኣፍቂዱ። እዚ ናይ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም መምርሒ interferon፣ ribavirin ወይ umifenovir እውን ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ምጥቃም እውን ዘካተተ እዩ።
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA approved hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine for emergency use by physicians treating patients with COVID-1 The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include the use of interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir against COVID-1

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: ናይ መጀምርታ መረዳእታ ከምዝሕብሮ ልዑል ናይ ribavirin መጠን SARS-CoV-2 ብቪትሮን ንምግታዕ ኣድላዪ እዩ።
en-mt: Preliminary data suggest that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to neutralize SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Nitazoxanide(ኒታዞሳናይድ) ድሕሪ ኣብ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምውጋድ ትሑት ጻዕቒ ምርኣዩ፣ ንተወሳኺ ኣብ vivo ዝግበር መጽናዕቲ ተመኺሩ እዩ። መጽናዕቲታት ናይ መጀመርያ ስፓይክ ፕሮቲናት ብትራንስመምብሬን ፕሮቴዝ ሲሪን 2 (TMPRSS2) ዝተተሓሓዙ ን SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ACE2 ተቐበልቲ ብምትእትታው ንክኣቱ ወሰንቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo studies after showing low efficacy in SARS-CoV-2 elimination. Studies of initial spike proteins coupled by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) are critical for entry of SARS-CoV-2 by interacting with ACE2 receptors.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: ናይ chloroquine ን hydroxychloroquine ን ምስ azithromycinን ካብኡ ወጻኢ ዝተገበሩ መጽናዕቲታት ብዘይ ተወሳኺ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ሕክምና ማሕበረ ሰብ ክጥቀመሎም ዘይከኣለሉ ምኽንያት ዓበይቲ ግድፈታት ዘለዉዎም ብምዃኖም እዩ። Oseltamivir ን SARS-CoV-2 ኢን ቪትሮ ኣይግድብን ኣብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕክምና ድማ ዝኾነ ዓይነት እጃም የብሉን።
en-mt: Studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with and without azithromycin have not been used by the medical community without further study because of their major flaws. Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no role in the treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: Cytokine storm ናይ ከቢድ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ መጨረሻ ከባቢ ጎድናዊ ጽልዋ እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm is the last area side effect of severe COVID-1

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: hydroxychloroquine ጸረ-ሳይቶኪን ስቶርም ባህሪታት ከምዘለዎ መረጋገጺ ኣሎ።Tocilizumab ኣብ ናይ ቻይና ብሄራዊ ናይ ንእሽተይ መጽናዕቲ ድሕሪ ምክያዱ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምና መምርሒኡ ተጠቓሊሉ እዩ።
en-mt: hydroxychloroquine has evidence of anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in its treatment guidelines after a Chinese national small-scale study.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: ኣብ ከቢድ ሕማም ዘለዎም ሰባት ፖዘቲቭ ውጽኢታት ድሕሪ ምርኣይ ብ ብሄራዊ ደረጃ ኣብ ጣልያ ናይ ፌዝ 2 ኣጋጣሚ ዘይኮነ ፈተነ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: After showing positive results in people with severe disease, a national Phase 2 non-random trial is underway in Italy.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: ምስ ሴረም ፌሪቲን ዝተሓወሰ ሳይቶካይን ስቶርም ንምፍላይ ዝግበር ናይ ደም ምርመራ ነዞም ኣብ ገለ ሰባት ናይ ሞቶም ምኽንያት እዮም ተባሂሎም ዝእመኑ ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ምዕባለታት ጽልዋ ንምቕናስ ተባሂሉ እዩ ተኻይዱ።
en-mt: Blood tests to detect the cytokine storm combined with serum ferritin were performed to minimize the impact of these developments, which are believed to be the cause of death in some people.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ኣብ ሕሉፍ ዝተርኣየ ጉዳይ ንናይ ብዘተፈላለዩ ምኽንያታት ዝፍጠሩ ናይ steroid refractory cytokine ዝሰደዱ ሲንድረማት መሐከሚ interleukin-6 receptor antagonist ብ FDA ተፈቒዱ እዩ፣ CAR T ናይ ዋህየ ሕክምና፣ ኣብ 2017።
en-mt: On the basis of a case shown in the past for the treatment of steroid refractory cytokine sending syndromes caused by a variety of reasons an interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕዚ፣ ናይ ኣጋጣሚ ዝኾነ፣ ቁጽጽር ዝተገበሮመረዳእታ tocilizumab ብቑዕ ናይ CRS ከምዝኾነ ዘርኢ የለን።
en-mt: To date, no incidental, controlleddata have shown that tocilizumab is efficacious of CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: ብ ካብ ኮቪደ-19 ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ዝፈረየ ዘተጻረየን ዝሓፈሰን ኣንቲቦዲ ንዘድልዮም ሰባት ምምሕልላ፣ ከም ክትባት ዘይኮነ ግን ውሽጣዊ ናይ ሕማም ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ዝሃንጽ ተባሂሉ መጽናዕቲ እንዳተኻየደሉ ይርከብ።
en-mt: Oath taking of purified and harvested antibodies produced by the immune system of people who have recovered from COVID-19 is being studied for people in need, not as a vaccine but as an internal immune builder.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: እዚ ሜላ እዚ ኣብ SARS ተፈቲኑ ዘየዕግብ ውጽኢት ሂቡ እዩ።
en-mt: This technique has been tried in SARS with unsatisfactory results.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ናይ ቫይረስ ኒውትራላይዜሽን ማለት ፓሲቭ ኣንቲቦዲ ሕክምና ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2 ንምክልኻል ክገብሮ ዝኽእሎ ኣካይዳ እዩ።
en-mt: Viral neutralization is the course of action that passive antibody treatment can take to protect against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: ካልኦት ሜላታት ግን፣ ከም ኣንቲቦዲ -መሰረት ዝገበሩ ሴሉላር ሳይቶክሲሲቲን/ወይ ፋጎሳይቶሲስ፣ እውን ክግበሩ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: But other methods, such as antibody -based cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, can also be performed.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: ካልኦት ድሑራት ናይ ኣንቲቦዲ ሕክምናታት፣ ንኣብነት፣ ዝተመረቱ ሞኖክሎናል ኣንቲቦዲታት ምጥቃም፣ ኣብ ምምዕባል ይርከብ።
en-mt: Other late antibody treatments, e.g., the use of mutated monoclonal antibodies, are under development.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: ናይ ኮንቨልሰት ሴረም ምፍራይ፣ ካብ ካብቲ ሕማም ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ዝተወሰደ ደም ፈሳሲ ክፋል ዝሓዘ እንትኸውን ናይ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣንቲቦዲ ድማ ዝሓዘ እዩ፣ ንቅልጡፍ ኣድማዒነት ድማ ክጠቅም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: The production of Convelset serum, consists of a liquid fraction of blood taken from persons who have recovered from the disease and contains antibodies to the virus, and may be useful for immediate effectiveness.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ሕማም፣ ብቐረባ ዝተተሓሓዙ ሲንድሮማት ጉጅለ
en-mt: Coronary disease, a group of closely associated syndromes

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: ሊ ወንሊያንግ፣ ናይ ውሃን ማእኸላይ ሆስፒታል ዶክተር፣ብዛዕባ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ግንዛበ ፈጢሩ፣ ድሕሪ ግዘ ድማ በቲ ቫይረስ ተታሒዙ ዝሞተ እዩ።
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Wuhan Central Hospital, raised awareness about the virus and later died of the virus.
